atk-s0511a:10: Anantañāṇaṃ karuṇālayaṃ layaṃ, malassa buddhaṃ susamāhitaṃ hitaṃ;
atk-s0511a:11: Namāmi dhammaṃ bhavasaṃvaraṃ varaṃ, guṇākarañceva niraṅgaṇaṃ gaṇaṃ.
atk-s0511a:12: Paññāya seṭṭho jinasāvakānaṃ, yaṃ dhammasenāpati dhammarājaṃ;
atk-s0511a:26: Sotabbarūpaṃ pana buddhavaṃsakathāya aññaṃ idha natthi yasmā;
atk-s0511a:29: Saṃvaṇṇanaṃ vaṇṇayato suvaṇṇaṃ, nidhāya kaṇṇaṃ madhuraṃ suṇātha.
atk-s0511a:30: Sabbampi hitvā pana kiccamaññaṃ, sakkacca maccenidha niccakālaṃ;
atk-s0511a:31: Sotuṃ kathetumpi budhena yuttā, kathā panāyaṃ atidullabhāti.
atk-s0511a:32_0: Tattha “buddhavaṃsasaṃvaṇṇanā hessati sārabhūtā”ti vuttattā buddhavaṃso tāva vavatthapetabbo.
atk-s0511a:32_1: Tatridaṃ vavatthānaṃ – ito heṭṭhā kappasatasahassādhikesu catūsu asaṅkhyeyyesu uppannānaṃ
atk-s0511a:32_2: pañcavīsatiyā buddhānaṃ uppannakappādiparicchedavasena paveṇivitthārakathā “buddhavaṃso nāmā”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0511a:33_0: Svāyaṃ kappaparicchedo nāmaparicchedo gottaparicchedo jātiparicchedo nagaraparicchedo
atk-s0511a:33_5: parinibbānaparicchedoti imehi pāḷiyā āgatehi bāvīsatiyā paricchedehi paricchinno vavatthito.
atk-s0511a:34_0: Pāḷianāruḷho pana sambahulavāropettha ānetabbo. So agāravāsaparicchedo pāsādattayaparicchedo
atk-s0511a:34_2: padhānaparicchedo upaṭṭhākaparicchedo vihāraparicchedoti dasadhā vavatthito hoti.
atk-s0511a:38: Kenāyaṃ desito kattha, kassatthāya ca desito;
atk-s0511a:39: Kimatthāya kadā kassa, vacanaṃ kena cābhato.
atk-s0511a:42_0: Tattha kenāyaṃ desitoti ayaṃ buddhavaṃso kena desito? Sabbadhammesu appaṭihatañāṇacārena
atk-s0511a:42_1: dasabalena catuvesārajjavisāradena dhammarājena dhammassāminā tathāgatena sabbaññunā
atk-s0511a:43: Kattha desitoti? Kapilavatthumahānagare nigrodhārāmamahāvihāre paramarucirasandassane devamanussanayananipātabhūte ratanacaṅkame caṅkamantena desito.
atk-s0511a:44: Kassatthāya ca desitoti? Dvāsītiyā ñātisahassānaṃ anekakoṭīnañca devamanussānaṃ atthāya desito.
atk-s0511a:46_0: Kadā desitoti bhagavā hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsativassāni anibaddhavāso hutvā yattha
atk-s0511a:46_1: yattha phāsukaṃ hoti, tattha tattheva gantvā vasi. Kathaṃ? Paṭhamaṃ vassaṃ isipatane
atk-s0511a:46_2: dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā aṭṭhārasa brahmakoṭiyo amatapānaṃ pāyetvā bārāṇasiṃ upanissāya
atk-s0511a:46_3: isipatane migadāye vasi. Dutiyaṃ vassaṃ rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane mahāvihāre.
atk-s0511a:46_4: Tatiyacatutthānipi tattheva. Pañcamaṃ vesāliṃ upanissāya mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
atk-s0511a:46_5: Chaṭṭhaṃ makulapabbate. Sattamaṃ tāvatiṃsabhavane. Aṭṭhamaṃ bhaggesu saṃsumāragiriṃ
atk-s0511a:46_6: upanissāya bhesakaḷāvane. Navamaṃ kosambiyaṃ. Dasamaṃ pālileyyakavanasaṇḍe. Ekādasamaṃ
atk-s0511a:46_7: nāḷāyaṃ brāhmaṇagāme. Dvādasamaṃ verañjāyaṃ. Terasamaṃ cāliyapabbate. Cuddasamaṃ
atk-s0511a:46_8: jetavanamahāvihāre. Pañcadasamaṃ kapilavatthumahānagare. Soḷasamaṃ āḷavakaṃ dametvā
atk-s0511a:46_9: caturāsītipāṇasahassāni amatapānaṃ pāyetvā āḷaviyaṃ. Sattarasamaṃ rājagaheyeva. Aṭṭhārasamaṃ
atk-s0511a:46_10: cāliyapabbateyeva. Tathā ekūnavīsatimaṃ vīsatimaṃ pana vassaṃ rājagaheyeva vasi.
atk-s0511a:46_11: Tena vuttaṃ – “bhagavā hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsativassāni anibaddhavāso hutvā yattha
atk-s0511a:46_12: yattha phāsukaṃ hoti, tattha tattheva gantvā vasī”ti. Tato paṭṭhāya pana sāvatthiṃyeva
atk-s0511a:46_13: upanissāya jetavanamahāvihāre ca pubbārāme ca dhuvaparibhogavasena vasi.
atk-s0511a:47_0: Yadā pana satthā buddho hutvā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye paṭhamaṃ vassaṃ vasitvā
atk-s0511a:47_1: vuṭṭhavasso pavāretvā uruvelaṃ gantvā tattha tayo māse vasanto tebhātikajaṭile dametvā
atk-s0511a:47_2: bhikkhusahassehi kataparivāro phussamāsapuṇṇamāyaṃ rājagahaṃ gantvā dve māse tattheva
atk-s0511a:47_3: vasi, tadā bārāṇasito nikkhantassa panassa pañca māsā jātā. Sakalo hemanto atikkanto.
atk-s0511a:47_4: Udāyittherassa āgatadivasato sattaṭṭhadivasā vītivattā. So pana phaggunīpuṇṇamāsiyaṃ
atk-s0511a:47_5: cintesi – “atikkanto hemanto, vasantakālo anuppatto, samayo tathāgatassa kapilapuraṃ
atk-s0511a:47_6: gantu”nti. So evaṃ cintetvā kulanagaragamanatthāya saṭṭhimattāhi gāthāhi gamanavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:47_7: vaṇṇesi. Atha satthā cassa vacanaṃ sutvā ñātisaṅgahaṃ kātukāmo hutvā aṅgamagadhavāsīnaṃ
atk-s0511a:47_8: kulaputtānaṃ dasahi sahassehi kapilavatthuvāsīnaṃ dasahi sahassehīti sabbeheva vīsatiyā
atk-s0511a:47_9: khīṇāsavasahassehi parivuto rājagahato nikkhamitvā divase divase yojanaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0511a:47_10: rājagahato saṭṭhiyojanaṃ kapilavatthupuraṃ dvīhi māsehi sampāpuṇitvā tattha ñātīnaṃ
atk-s0511a:47_11: vandāpanatthaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ akāsi. Tadāyaṃ buddhavaṃso desito.
atk-s0511a:48: Kassa vacananti? Sāvakapaccekabuddhānaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ sammāsambuddhasseva vacanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:49_0: Kenābhatoti? Ācariyaparamparāya ābhato. Ayañhi sāriputtatthero bhaddajī tisso kosiyaputto
atk-s0511a:49_1: siggavo moggaliputto sudatto dhammiko dāsako soṇako revatoti evamādīhi yāva tatiyasaṅgītikālā
atk-s0511a:49_2: ābhato, tato uddhampi tesaṃyeva sissānusissehīti evaṃ tāva ācariyaparamparāya yāvajjakālā ābhatoti veditabbo.
atk-s0511a:52: Kimatthāya kadā kassa, vacanaṃ kena cābhato”ti. –
atk-s0511a:56_0: Evaṃ ābhatassa panassa idāni atthavaṇṇanā hoti, sā panāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā yasmā dūrenidānaṃ
atk-s0511a:56_1: avidūrenidānaṃ santikenidānanti, imāni tīṇi nidānāni dassetvāva vaṇṇitā suvaṇṇitā
atk-s0511a:56_2: nāma hoti. Ye ca naṃ suṇanti, tehi samudāgamato paṭṭhāya viññātattā suviññātāva hoti,
atk-s0511a:57_0: Tattha ādito paṭṭhāya tāva tesaṃ nidānānaṃ paricchedo veditabbo. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepato
atk-s0511a:57_1: atthadīpanā – dīpaṅkaradasabalassa pādamūle katābhinīhārassa mahāsattassa yāva vessantarattabhāvā
atk-s0511a:57_2: cavitvā tusitabhavane nibbatti, tāva pavattā kathā dūrenidānaṃ nāma. Tusitabhavanato
atk-s0511a:57_3: cavitvā yāva bodhimaṇḍe sabbaññutaññāṇappatti, tāva pavattā kathā avidūrenidānaṃ
atk-s0511a:57_4: nāma. “Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme”ti
atk-s0511a:57_5: ca, “rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe”ti ca, “vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane
atk-s0511a:57_6: kūṭāgārasālāya”nti ca evaṃ mahābodhimaṇḍe sabbaññutaññāṇappattito yāva parinibbānamañcā
atk-s0511a:57_7: etasmiṃ antare bhagavā yattha yattha vihāsi, taṃ taṃ santikenidānaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a:57_8: Ettāvatā saṅkhepeneva tiṇṇaṃ dūrāvidūrasantikenidānānaṃ vasena bāhiranidānavaṇṇanā samattā hotīti.
atk-s0511a:62: “Brahmā ca lokādhipatī sahampatī, katañjalī anadhivaraṃ ayācatha;
atk-s0511a:63: Santīdha sattāpparajakkhajātikā, desehi dhammaṃ anukampimaṃ paja”nti. –
atk-s0511a:65_0: Ettha “ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe”tiādisuttantesu
atk-s0511a:65_1: viya – “ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme. Atha
atk-s0511a:65_2: kho āyasmā sāriputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ buddhavaṃsaṃ
atk-s0511a:65_3: apucchī”ti evamādinā nayena nidānaṃ avatvā kasmā “brahmā ca lokādhipatī sahampatī,
atk-s0511a:65_4: katañjalī anadhivaraṃ ayācathā”tiādinā nayena nidānaṃ vuttanti? Vuccate – bhagavato
atk-s0511a:67: Kadā kattha ca kenāyaṃ, gāthā hi samudīritā”ti.
atk-s0511a:68_0: Vuccate – buddhabhūtassa pana bhagavato aṭṭhame sattāhe satthā dhammadesanatthāya
atk-s0511a:68_1: brahmunā ajjhiṭṭho āyācito. Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – mahāpuriso kira katābhinīhāro
atk-s0511a:68_4: kaṇḍakaṃ nāma turaṅgavaramāharā”ti kaṇḍakaṃ āharāpetvā channasahāyo varaturaṅgamāruyha
atk-s0511a:68_5: nagaradvāre adhivatthāya devatāya nagaradvāre vivaṭe nagarato nikkhamitvā tīṇi rajjāni
atk-s0511a:68_6: tena rattāvasesena atikkamitvā anomasatto anomāya nāma nadiyā tīre ṭhatvā channamevamāha
atk-s0511a:68_7: – “channa, tvaṃ mama imāni aññehi asādhāraṇāni ābharaṇāni kaṇḍakañca varaturaṅgamādāya
atk-s0511a:68_8: kapilapuraṃ gacchāhī”ti channaṃ vissajjetvā asitoraganīluppalasadisenāsinā sakesamakuṭaṃ
atk-s0511a:68_9: chinditvā ākāse ukkhipitvā devadattiyaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā sayameva pabbajitvā
atk-s0511a:68_10: anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno anilabalasamuddhutataraṅgabhaṅgaṃ asaṅgaṃ gaṅgaṃ nadiṃ
atk-s0511a:68_11: uttaritvā maṇigaṇaraṃsijālavijjotitarājagahaṃ rājagahaṃ nāma nagaraṃ pavisitvā tattha
atk-s0511a:68_12: issariyamadamattaṃ janaṃ parihāsento viya ca uddhatavesassa janassa lajjamuppādayamāno
atk-s0511a:68_13: viya ca vayakantīhi nāgarajanahadayāni attani bandhanto viya ca dvatiṃsavaramahāpurisalakkhaṇavirājitāya
atk-s0511a:68_14: rūpasiriyā sabbajananayanāni vilumpamāno viya ca rūpīpādasañcaro puññasañcayo viya
atk-s0511a:68_15: ca pabbato viya ca gamanena nissaṅgo santindriyo santamānaso yugamattaṃ pekkhamāno
atk-s0511a:68_16: rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā yāpanamattaṃ bhattaṃ gahetvā nagarato nikkhamitvā paṇḍavapabbatapasse
atk-s0511a:68_17: chāyūdakasampanne sucibhūmibhāge paramaramaṇīye pavivitte okāse nisīditvā paṭisaṅkhānabalena
atk-s0511a:68_18: missakabhattaṃ paribhuñjitvā paṇḍavagirānusārena bimbisārena magadhamahārājena mahāpurisassa
atk-s0511a:68_19: santikaṃ gantvā nāmagottaṃ pucchitvā tena pamuditahadayena “mama rajjabhāgaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti
atk-s0511a:68_20: rajjena nimantiyamāno – “alaṃ, mahārāja, na mayhaṃ rajjenattho ahaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya
atk-s0511a:68_21: lokahitatthāya padhānamanuyuñjitvā loke vivaṭacchado buddho bhavissāmīti nikkhanto”ti
atk-s0511a:68_22: vatvā tena ca “buddho hutvā sabbapaṭhamaṃ mama vijitaṃ osareyyāthā”ti vutto ‘sādhū’ti
atk-s0511a:68_23: tassa paṭiññaṃ datvā āḷārañca udakañca upasaṅkamitvā tesaṃ dhammadesanāya sāraṃ avindanto
atk-s0511a:68_24: tato pakkamitvā uruvelāyaṃ chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ karontopi amataṃ adhigantuṃ
atk-s0511a:69_0: Tadā pana uruvelāyaṃ senānigame senānigamakuṭumbikassa dhītā sujātā nāma dārikā vayappattā
atk-s0511a:69_1: ekasmiṃ nigrodharukkhe patthanamakāsi – “sacāhaṃ samajātikaṃ kulagharaṃ gantvā paṭhamagabbhe
atk-s0511a:69_2: puttaṃ labhissāmi, balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti. Tassā sā patthanā samijjhi. Sā vesākhapuṇṇamadivase
atk-s0511a:69_3: “ajja balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti pātova pāyāsaṃ anāyāsaṃ paramamadhuraṃ sampaṭipādesi.
atk-s0511a:69_4: Bodhisattopi tadaheva katasarīrapaṭijaggano bhikkhācārakālaṃ āgamayamāno pātova gantvā
atk-s0511a:69_5: tasmiṃ nigrodharukkhamūle nisīdi. Atha kho puṇṇā nāma dāsī tassā dhātī rukkhamūlasodhanatthāya
atk-s0511a:69_8: taruvaramupagataṃ munidivasakaramaddasa. Sarīrato cassa nikkhantāhi pabhāhi sakalañca
atk-s0511a:69_9: taṃ rukkhaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ disvā tassā etadahosi – “ajja amhākaṃ devatā rukkhato oruyha
atk-s0511a:69_10: sahattheneva baliṃ paṭiggahetukāmā hutvā nisinnā”ti. Sā vegena gantvā sujātāya etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0511a:70_0: Tato sujātā sañjātasaddhā hutvā sabbālaṅkārena alaṅkaritvā satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ
atk-s0511a:70_1: paramamadhurassa madhupāyāsassa pūretvā aparāya suvaṇṇapātiyā pidahitvā sīsenādāya
atk-s0511a:70_2: nigrodharukkhābhimukhī agamāsi. Sā gacchantī dūratova taṃ bodhisattaṃ rukkhadevatamiva
atk-s0511a:70_3: sakalaṃ taṃ rukkhaṃ sarīrappabhāya suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ katvā puññasañcayamiva rūpavantaṃ
atk-s0511a:70_4: nisinnaṃ disvā pītisomanassajātā sujātā “rukkhadevatā”ti saññāya diṭṭhaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0511a:70_5: onatonatā gantvā sīsato taṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ otāretvā mahāsattassa hatthe ṭhapetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0511a:70_6: vanditvā – “yathā mama manoratho nipphanno, evaṃ tumhākampi nipphajjatū”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0511a:71_0: Atha kho bodhisattopi suvaṇṇapātiṃ gahetvā nerañjarāya nadiyā tīraṃ gantvā suppatiṭṭhitassa
atk-s0511a:71_1: nāma titthassa tīre suvaṇṇapātiṃ ṭhapetvā nhatvā paccuttaritvā ekūnapaññāsapiṇḍe
atk-s0511a:71_2: karonto taṃ pāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā – “sacāhaṃ ajja buddho bhavissāmi, ayaṃ suvaṇṇapāti
atk-s0511a:71_3: paṭisotaṃ gacchatū”ti khipi. Sā pāti paṭisotaṃ gantvā kāḷassa nāma nāgarājassa bhavanaṃ
atk-s0511a:71_4: pavisitvā tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ thālakāni ukkhipitvā tesaṃ heṭṭhā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:72_0: Mahāsatto tattheva vanasaṇḍe divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye sotthiyena nāma
atk-s0511a:72_1: tiṇahārakena mahāpurisassa ākāraṃ ñatvā dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā bodhimaṇḍamāruyha
atk-s0511a:72_2: dakkhiṇadisābhāge aṭṭhāsi. So pana padeso paduminipatte udakabindu viya akampittha.
atk-s0511a:72_3: Mahāpuriso – “ayaṃ padeso mama guṇaṃ dhāretuṃ asamattho”ti pacchimadisābhāgamagamāsi.
atk-s0511a:72_4: Sopi tatheva kampittha. Puna uttaradisābhāgamagamāsi. Sopi tatheva kampittha. Puna
atk-s0511a:72_5: puratthimadisābhāgamagamāsi. Tattha pallaṅkappamāṇaṭṭhānaṃ niccalaṃ ahosi. Mahāpuriso
atk-s0511a:72_6: – “idaṃ ṭhānaṃ kilesaviddhaṃsanaṭṭhāna”nti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā tāni tiṇāni agge gahetvā
atk-s0511a:72_7: cālesi. Tāni tūlikaggena paricchinnāni viya ahesuṃ. Bodhisatto – “bodhiṃ apatvāva
atk-s0511a:72_8: imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ na bhindissāmī”ti caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
atk-s0511a:73_0: Taṅkhaṇaññeva sabbalokābhihāro māro bāhusahassaṃ māpetvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatikaṃ himagirisikharasadisaṃ
atk-s0511a:73_1: girimekhalaṃ nāma arivaravāraṇaṃ varavāraṇaṃ abhiruyha navayojanikena dhanuasipharasusarasattisabalenātibahalena
atk-s0511a:73_2: mārabalena samparivuto samantā pabbato viya ajjhottharanto mahāsapattaṃ viya mahāsattaṃ
atk-s0511a:73_3: samupāgami. Mahāpuriso sūriye dharanteyeva atitumūlaṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā vikasitajayasumanakusumasadisassa
atk-s0511a:73_5: pītiyā viya pūjiyamāno eva paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ labhitvā majjhimayāme
atk-s0511a:73_6: dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ visodhetvā pacchimayāme paṭiccasamuppāde ñāṇaṃ otāretvā vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0511a:77: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-s0511a:79_0: Imaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā sattāhaṃ vimuttisukhapaṭisevanena vītināmetvā aṭṭhame divase
atk-s0511a:79_1: samāpattito vuṭṭhāya devatānaṃ kaṅkhaṃ ñatvā tāsaṃ kaṅkhāvidhamanatthaṃ ākāse uppatitvā
atk-s0511a:79_2: yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā tāsaṃ kaṅkhaṃ vidhamitvā pallaṅkato īsakaṃ pācīnanissite
atk-s0511a:79_3: uttaradisābhāge ṭhatvā – “imasmiṃ vata me pallaṅke sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭividdha”nti
atk-s0511a:79_4: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca pūritānaṃ pāramīnaṃ phalādhigamaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0511a:79_5: pallaṅkañceva bodhirukkhañca animisehi akkhīhi olokayamāno sattāhaṃ vītināmesi, taṃ
atk-s0511a:80_0: Atha pallaṅkassa ca ṭhitaṭṭhānassa ca antare puratthimapacchimato āyate ratanacaṅkame
atk-s0511a:80_1: caṅkamanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ ratanacaṅkamacetiyaṃ nāma jātaṃ. Tato
atk-s0511a:80_2: pacchimadisābhāge devatā ratanagharaṃ nāma māpesuṃ, tattha pallaṅkena nisīditvā abhidhammapiṭakaṃ
atk-s0511a:80_3: visesato cettha anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānaṃ vicinanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi. Taṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0511a:80_4: ratanagharacetiyaṃ nāma jātaṃ. Evaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva cattāri sattāhāni vītināmetvā
atk-s0511a:80_5: pañcame sattāhe bodhirukkhamūlā yena ajapālanigrodho tenupasaṅkami; tatthāpi dhammaṃ
atk-s0511a:80_6: vicinantoyeva vimuttisukhañca paṭisaṃvedento ajapālanigrodhe sattāhaṃ vītināmesi.
atk-s0511a:81_0: Evaṃ aparaṃ sattāhaṃ mucalinde nisīdi. Tassa nisinnamattasseva bhagavato sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ
atk-s0511a:81_1: pūrento mahāakālamegho udapādi. Tasmiṃ pana uppanne mucalindo nāgarājā cintesi –
atk-s0511a:81_2: “ayaṃ mahāmegho satthari mayhaṃ bhavanaṃ paviṭṭhamatte uppanno vāsāgāramassa laddhuṃ
atk-s0511a:81_3: vaṭṭatī”ti. So sattaratanamayaṃ devavimānasadisaṃ dibbavimānaṃ nimminituṃ samatthopi
atk-s0511a:81_4: evaṃ kate – “na mayhaṃ mahapphalaṃ bhavissati, dasabalassa kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0511a:81_5: atimahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā satthāraṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari
atk-s0511a:81_6: mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhāsi. Atha bhagavā parikkhepassa antova mahati okāse sabbaratanamaye
atk-s0511a:81_8: gandhakuṭiyaṃ viharanto viya vihāsi. Evaṃ bhagavā taṃ sattāhaṃ tattha vītināmetvā
atk-s0511a:81_9: tato aparaṃ sattāhaṃ rājāyatane nisīdi. Tatthāpi vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvediyeva. Ettāvatā
atk-s0511a:81_10: sattasattāhāni paripuṇṇāni ahesuṃ. Etthantare bhagavā jhānasukhena phalasukhena ca vītināmesi.
atk-s0511a:82_0: Athassa sattasattāhātikkame – “mukhaṃ dhovissāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajji. Sakko devānamindo
atk-s0511a:82_1: agadaharītakaṃ āharitvā adāsi. Athassa sakko nāgalatādantakaṭṭhañca mukhadhovanaudakañca
atk-s0511a:82_2: adāsi. Tato bhagavā dantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā anotattadahodakena mukhaṃ dhovitvā rājāyatanamūle
atk-s0511a:82_3: nisīdi. Tasmiṃ samaye catūhi lokapālehi upanīte paccagghe selamaye patte tapussabhallikānaṃ
atk-s0511a:82_4: vāṇijānaṃ manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjitvā paccāgantvā ajapālanigrodharukkhamūle
atk-s0511a:82_5: nisīdi. Athassa tattha nisinnamattasseva attanā adhigatassa dhammassa gambhīrabhāvaṃ
atk-s0511a:82_6: paccavekkhantassa sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇo – “adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo gambhīro duddaso
atk-s0511a:82_7: duranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacaro nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo”ti paresaṃ dhammaṃ adesetukāmatākārappatto
atk-s0511a:83_0: Atha brahmā sahampati dasabalassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya – “nassati vata,
atk-s0511a:83_1: bho, loko, vinassati vata, bho, loko”ti vācaṃ nicchārento dasasahassacakkavāḷabrahmagaṇaparivuto
atk-s0511a:83_3: So attano patiṭṭhānatthāya pathaviṃ nimminitvā dakkhiṇaṃ jāṇumaṇḍalaṃ pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0511a:83_5: sirasmiṃ katvā – “desetu, bhante, bhagavā dhammaṃ, desetu sugato dhammaṃ, santi sattā
atk-s0511a:83_6: apparajakkhajātikā, assavanatā dhammassa parihāyanti, bhavissanti dhammassa aññātāro”ti –
atk-s0511a:84: “Pāturahosi magadhesu pubbe, dhammo asuddho samalehi cintito;
atk-s0511a:85: Apāpuretaṃ amatassa dvāraṃ, suṇantu dhammaṃ vimalenānubuddhaṃ.
atk-s0511a:86: “Sele yathā pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhito, yathāpi passe janataṃ samantato;
atk-s0511a:89: “Uṭṭhehi vīra vijitasaṅgāma, satthavāha anaṇa vicara loke;
atk-s0511a:91: “Nanu tumhehi ‘buddho bodheyyaṃ tiṇṇo tāreyyaṃ mutto moceyya”’nti –
atk-s0511a:94_0: Patthanaṃ katvā pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññubhāvaṃ pattoti ca, “tumhehi dhamme adesiyamāne
atk-s0511a:94_1: ko hi nāma añño dhammaṃ desessati, kimaññaṃ lokassa saraṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ parāyana”nti
atk-s0511a:94_2: ca evamādīhi anekehi nayehi bhagavantaṃ dhammadesanatthaṃ ayāci. Tena vuttaṃ – “buddhabhūtassa
atk-s0511a:94_3: pana bhagavato aṭṭhame sattāhe satthā dhammadesanatthāya brahmunā āyācito”ti.
atk-s0511a:95_0: Idāni “kadā kattha ca kenāyaṃ, gāthā hi samudīritā”ti imesaṃ pañhānaṃ vissajjanāya
atk-s0511a:95_1: okāso anuppatto. Tattha kadā vuttāti? Paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vuttā. Paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti
atk-s0511a:95_2: nāmesā saṅgītikkhandhe vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Kattha kena vuttāti? Bhagavati kira
atk-s0511a:95_5: daṭṭhabbasāramaṇḍe maṇḍape dhammāsanagatenāyasmatā ānandattherena “brahmā ca lokādhipatī”ti
atk-s0511a:95_6: ayaṃ gāthā vuttāti veditabbā. Ayamettha gāthāsambandho.
atk-s0511a:98: Kadā kattha ca kenāyaṃ, gāthā hi samudīritā”ti. –
atk-s0511a:99: Ayampi gāthā vuttatthā hoti. Evaṃ iminā sambandhena vuttāya panassā anuttānapadavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma.
atk-s0511a:100_0: Tattha brahmāti brūhito tehi tehi guṇavisesehīti brahmā. Ayaṃ pana brahma-saddo mahābrahmabrāhmaṇatathāgatamātāpituseṭṭhādīsu
atk-s0511a:100_1: dissati. Tathā hi “dvisahasso brahmā”tiādīsu mahābrahmāti adhippeto.
atk-s0511a:102: Anāsavo sabbadukkhappahīno, saccavhayo brahme upāsito me”ti. –
atk-s0511a:103_0: Ettha brāhmaṇo. “Brahmāti kho, bhikkhave, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacana”nti ettha tathāgato.
atk-s0511a:103_1: “Brahmāti mātāpitaro pubbācariyāti vuccare”ti ettha mātāpitaro. “Brahmacakkaṃ pavattetī”ti
atk-s0511a:103_2: ettha seṭṭho adhippeto. Idha pana paṭhamajjhānaṃ paṇītaṃ bhāvetvā paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0511a:103_3: nibbatto kappāyuko mahābrahmā adhippeto. Ca-saddo sampiṇḍanattho, brahmā ca aññe
atk-s0511a:103_4: ca dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu brahmāno cāti attho, padapūraṇamatto vā. Lokādhipatīti
atk-s0511a:103_5: ettha lokoti saṅkhāraloko sattaloko okāsalokoti tayo lokā. Tesu idha sattaloko adhippeto.
atk-s0511a:103_6: Tassa issaro adhipatīti lokādhipati, lokekadesassāpi adhipati lokādhipatīti vuccati
atk-s0511a:104_0: Sahampatīti so kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane sahako nāma thero paṭhamajjhānaṃ
atk-s0511a:104_2: hutvā nibbatto, tatra pana naṃ “sahampati brahmā”ti sañjānanti. “Sahakapatī”ti vattabbe
atk-s0511a:104_3: anussarāgamaṃ katvā ruḷhīvasena “sahampatī”ti vadanti. Katañjalīti katañjaliko, añjalipuṭaṃ
atk-s0511a:104_4: sirasi katvāti attho. Anadhivaranti accantavaro adhivaro nāssa atthīti anadhivaro,
atk-s0511a:104_5: na tato adhiko varo atthīti vā anadhivaro, anuttaroti attho, taṃ anadhivaraṃ. Ayācathāti ayācittha ajjhesi.
atk-s0511a:105_0: Idāni yassatthāya so bhagavantaṃ ayāci, tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “santīdha sattā”tiādi
atk-s0511a:105_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha santīti saṃvijjanti upalabbhanti, buddhacakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchantā
atk-s0511a:105_2: atthīti attho. Idhāti ayaṃ desāpadese nipāto. Svāyaṃ katthaci sāsanaṃ upādāya vuccati.
atk-s0511a:105_3: Yathāha – “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo, idha dutiyo samaṇo, idha tatiyo samaṇo, idha
atk-s0511a:105_4: catuttho samaṇo, suññā parappavādā samaṇebhi aññehī”ti. Katthaci okāsaṃ, yathāha –
atk-s0511a:107: Punarāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisā”ti. –
atk-s0511a:108_0: Katthaci padapūraṇamattameva hoti. Yathāha – “idhāhaṃ, bhikkhave, bhuttāvī assaṃ
atk-s0511a:108_1: pavārito”ti. Katthaci lokaṃ upādāya, yathāha – “idha tathāgato loke uppajjati bahujanahitāya
atk-s0511a:108_2: bahujanasukhāyā”ti. Idhāpi lokameva upādāya vuttoti veditabbo. Tasmā imasmiṃ sattaloketi
atk-s0511a:108_3: attho. Sattāti rūpādīsu khandhesu chandarāgena sattā visattā āsattā laggā lagitāti
atk-s0511a:108_4: sattā, sattāti pāṇino vuccanti. Ruḷhīsaddena pana vītarāgesupi ayaṃ vohāro vattatiyeva.
atk-s0511a:109_0: Apparajakkhajātikāti paññāmaye akkhimhi appaṃ parittaṃ rāgadosamoharajaṃ etesaṃ evaṃsabhāvā
atk-s0511a:109_1: ca teti apparajakkhajātikā, appaṃ rāgādirajameva vā yesaṃ te apparajakkhā, te apparajakkhasabhāvā
atk-s0511a:109_2: apparajakkhajātikāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Tesaṃ apparajakkhajātikānaṃ. “Sattāna”nti
atk-s0511a:109_3: vibhattivipariṇāmaṃ katvā – “desehi dhamma”nti iminā sambandhaṃ katvā attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a:109_4: Desehīti āyācanavacanametaṃ, desehi kathehi upadisāti attho. Dhammanti ettha ayaṃ
atk-s0511a:109_6: dissati. Tathā hi – “idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ…pe…
atk-s0511a:109_7: vedalla”ntiādīsu pariyattiyaṃ dissati. “Evaṃdhammā te bhagavanto ahesu”ntiādīsu samādhimhi.
atk-s0511a:111: Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, diṭṭhaṃ so ativattatī”ti. –
atk-s0511a:112_0: Ādīsu paññāya. “Jātidhammā jarādhammā, atho maraṇadhammino”tiādīsu pakatiyaṃ. “Kusalā
atk-s0511a:112_1: dhammā, akusalā dhammā, abyākatā dhammā”tiādīsu sabhāve. “Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye
atk-s0511a:112_2: dhammā honti khandhā hontī”tiādīsu suññatāyaṃ. “Dhammo suciṇṇo sukhamāvahātī”tiādīsu
atk-s0511a:112_3: puññe. “Dve aniyatā dhammā”tiādīsu āpattiyaṃ. “Sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa
atk-s0511a:112_4: bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchantī”tiādīsu ñeyye. “Diṭṭhadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo”tiādīsu
atk-s0511a:112_5: catusaccadhamme. Idhāpi catusaccadhamme daṭṭhabbo. Anukampāti anukampaṃ anuddayaṃ
atk-s0511a:112_6: karohi. Imanti pajaṃ niddisanto āha. Pajanti pajātattā pajā, taṃ pajaṃ, sattanikāyaṃ
atk-s0511a:115: Paṭhanti. Ettāvatā sabbaso ayaṃ gāthā vuttatthā hoti.
atk-s0511a:116_0: Atha bhagavato taṃ brahmuno sahampatissa āyācanavacanaṃ sutvā aparimitasamayasamuditakaruṇābalassa
atk-s0511a:116_2: udapādi. Taṃ pana bhagavato karuṇuppattiṃ dassentehi saṅgītikāle saṅgītikārakehi –
atk-s0511a:121: Tattha sampannavijjācaraṇassāti sampannaṃ nāma tividhaṃ paripuṇṇasamaṅgimadhuravasena. Tattha –
atk-s0511a:123: Paṭivedemi te brahme, na naṃ vāretumussahe”ti. –
atk-s0511a:124_0: Idaṃ paripuṇṇasampannaṃ nāma. “Iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto upagato
atk-s0511a:124_1: samupagato sampanno samannāgato”ti idaṃ samaṅgisampannaṃ nāma. “Imissā, bhante, mahāpathaviyā
atk-s0511a:124_2: heṭṭhimatalaṃ sampannaṃ, seyyathāpi khuddamadhuṃ anīlakaṃ, evamassāda”nti idaṃ madhurasampannaṃ
atk-s0511a:124_3: nāma. Idha paripuṇṇasampannampi samaṅgisampannampi yujjati. Vijjāti paṭipakkhadhamme
atk-s0511a:124_4: vijjhanaṭṭhena viditakaraṇaṭṭhena vinditabbaṭṭhena ca vijjā. Tā pana tissopi vijjā
atk-s0511a:124_5: aṭṭhapi vijjā. Tisso vijjā bhayabheravasutte āgatanayeneva veditabbā, aṭṭha ambaṭṭhasutte.
atk-s0511a:124_6: Tatra hi vipassanāñāṇena manomayiddhiyā ca saha cha abhiññā pariggahetvā aṭṭha vijjā
atk-s0511a:124_7: vuttā. Caraṇanti sīlasaṃvaro indriyesu guttadvāratā bhojane mattaññutā jāgariyānuyogo
atk-s0511a:124_8: saddhā hirī ottappaṃ bāhusaccaṃ āraddhavīriyatā upaṭṭhitassatitā paññāsampannatā
atk-s0511a:124_9: cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānānīti ime pannarasa dhammā veditabbā. Imeyeva hi pannarasa
atk-s0511a:124_10: dhammā yasmā etehi carati ariyasāvako gacchati amataṃ disaṃ, tasmā “caraṇa”nti vuttā.
atk-s0511a:124_11: Yathāha – “idha, mahānāma, ariyasāvako sīlavā hotī”ti sabbaṃ majjhimapaṇṇāsake vuttanayeneva
atk-s0511a:124_12: veditabbaṃ. Vijjā ca caraṇañca vijjācaraṇāni, sampannāni paripuṇṇāni vijjācaraṇāni
atk-s0511a:124_13: yassa soyaṃ sampannavijjācaraṇo, vijjācaraṇehi sampanno samaṅgībhūto, samannāgatoti
atk-s0511a:124_14: vā sampannavijjācaraṇo. Ubhayathāpi attho yujjateva, tassa sampannavijjācaraṇassa.
atk-s0511a:125_0: Tādinoti “iṭṭhepi tādī aniṭṭhepi tādī”tiādinā nayena mahāniddese āgatatādilakkhaṇena
atk-s0511a:125_1: tādino, iṭṭhāniṭṭhādīsu avikārassa tādisassāti attho. Jutindharassāti jutimato, yugandhare
atk-s0511a:129: Sambuddho tapataṃ seṭṭho, esā ābhā anuttarā”ti. ;
atk-s0511a:130: Tasmā ubhayathāpi sarīrapaññājutivisaradharassāti attho. Antimadehadhārinoti sabbapacchimasarīradhārino, apunabbhavassāti attho.
atk-s0511a:131_0: Tathāgatassāti ettha aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā “tathāgato”ti vuccati. Katamehi aṭṭhahi?
atk-s0511a:131_1: Tathā āgatoti tathāgato, tathā gatoti tathāgato, tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato,
atk-s0511a:131_2: tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato, tathadassitāya tathāgato, tathavāditāya
atk-s0511a:132_0: Kathaṃ bhagavā tathā āgatoti tathāgato? Yathā yena abhinīhārena dānapāramiṃ pūretvā
atk-s0511a:132_2: pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samattiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā aṅgapariccāgaṃ
atk-s0511a:132_3: jīvitapariccāgaṃ dhanarajjaputtadārapariccāganti ime pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajitvā
atk-s0511a:132_4: yathā vipassiādayo sammāsambuddhā āgatā, tathā amhākampi bhagavā āgatoti tathāgato. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a:134: Tathā ayaṃ sakyamunīpi āgato, tathāgato vuccati tena cakkhumā”ti.
atk-s0511a:135_0: Kathaṃ tathā gatoti tathāgato? Yathā sampatijātā vipassiādayo samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0511a:135_1: patiṭṭhāya uttarābhimukhā sattapadavītihārena gatā, tathā amhākampi bhagavā gatoti
atk-s0511a:136: “Muhuttajātova gavampatī yathā, samehi pādehi phusī vasundharaṃ;
atk-s0511a:137: So vikkamī sattapadāni gotamo, setañca chattaṃ anudhārayuṃ marū.
atk-s0511a:138: “Gantvāna so sattapadāni gotamo, disā vilokesi samā samantato;
atk-s0511a:140: Kathaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato? Sabbesaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ salakkhaṇaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇañca tathaṃ avitathaṃ ñāṇagatiyā āgato avirajjhitvā patto anubuddhoti tathāgato.
atk-s0511a:143_0: Kathaṃ tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato? Tathadhammā nāma cattāri
atk-s0511a:143_1: ariyasaccāni. Yathāha – “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni.
atk-s0511a:143_2: Katamāni cattāri? ‘Idaṃ dukkha’nti, bhikkhave, tathametaṃ avitathametaṃ anaññathameta”nti
atk-s0511a:143_3: vitthāro. Tāni ca bhagavā abhisambuddho, tasmā tathānaṃ abhisambuddhattā “tathāgato”ti
atk-s0511a:146_0: Kathaṃ tathadassitāya tathāgato? Bhagavā hi aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ
atk-s0511a:146_2: tathāgato sabbākārato jānāti passatīti, evaṃ tathadassitāya tathāgato. Atha vā yaṃ
atk-s0511a:146_3: loke tathaṃ, taṃ lokassa tatheva dasseti. Tatopi bhagavā tathāgato. Ettha tathadassiatthe
atk-s0511a:149_0: Kathaṃ tathavāditāya tathāgato? Yañca abhisambodhiyā parinibbānassa ca antare pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇakāle
atk-s0511a:149_1: suttādinavaṅgasaṅgahitaṃ bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena, sabbaṃ taṃ ekatulāya tulitaṃ
atk-s0511a:150_0: “Yañca, cunda, rattiṃ tathāgato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhati, yañca rattiṃ
atk-s0511a:150_1: anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati, yaṃ etasmiṃ antare bhāsati lapati niddisati,
atk-s0511a:150_2: sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hoti, no aññathā. Tasmā ‘tathāgato’ti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0511a:151: Ettha pana gadaattho hi gatasaddo. Evaṃ tathavāditāya tathāgato. Āgadanaṃ āgado, vacananti attho. Tatho aviparīto āgado assāti tathāgato. Da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā vutto.
atk-s0511a:154: Kathaṃ tathākāritāya tathāgato? Bhagavā hi yaṃ yaṃ vācaṃ abhāsi, taṃ taṃ eva kāyena karoti, vācāya kāyo anulometi, kāyassapi vācā. Tenevāha –
atk-s0511a:155: “Yathā vādī, bhikkhave, tathāgato tathā kārī, yathā kārī tathā vādī…pe… tasmā ‘tathāgato’ti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0511a:156: Yathā ca vācā gatā, kāyopi tathā gato, yathā kāyo gato, vācāpi tathā gatā. Evaṃ tathākāritāya tathāgato.
atk-s0511a:157: “Yathā vācā gatā tassa, tathā kāyo gato yato;
atk-s0511a:159_0: Kathaṃ abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato? Upari bhavaggaṃ heṭṭhā avīciṃ pariyantaṃ katvā
atk-s0511a:159_1: tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu sabbasatte abhibhavati sīlenapi samādhināpi paññāyapi
atk-s0511a:159_2: vimuttiyāpi vimuttiñāṇadassanenapi, na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi, atha kho atulo
atk-s0511a:160: “Sadevake, bhikkhave, loke…pe… tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthu daso vasavattī, tasmā ‘tathāgato’ti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0511a:161_0: Tatrevaṃ padasiddhi veditabbā – agado viya agado. Ko panesa? Desanāvilāso ceva puññussayo
atk-s0511a:161_1: ca. Tena hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko dibbāgadena sappe viya sabbaparappavādino sadevakañca
atk-s0511a:161_2: lokaṃ abhibhavati, iti sabbalokābhibhavanato aviparīto desanāvilāso ceva puññussayo
atk-s0511a:161_3: ca agado assāti da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā “tathāgato”ti veditabbo. Evaṃ abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato.
atk-s0511a:163: Vasavattīti so tena, hoti satthā tathāgato”.
atk-s0511a:164_0: Appaṭipuggalassāti paṭipuggalavirahitassa, añño koci “ahaṃ buddho”ti evaṃ paṭiññaṃ
atk-s0511a:164_1: dātuṃ samattho nāmassa puggalo, natthīti appaṭipuggalo, tassa appaṭipuggalassa. Uppajjīti
atk-s0511a:164_2: uppanno udapādi. Kāruññatāti karuṇāya bhāvo kāruññatā. Sabbasatteti niravasesasattapariyādānavacanaṃ,
atk-s0511a:164_3: sakale sattanikāyeti attho. Ettāvatā ayampi gāthā vuttatthā hoti.
atk-s0511a:165: Atha bhagavā brahmunā dhammadesanatthāya āyācito sattesu kāruññataṃ uppādetvā dhammaṃ desetukāmo mahābrahmānaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0511a:166: “Apārutā tesaṃ amatassa dvārā, ye sotavanto pamuñcantu saddhaṃ;
atk-s0511a:167: Vihiṃsasaññī paguṇaṃ na bhāsiṃ, dhammaṃ paṇītaṃ manujesu brahme”ti. ;
atk-s0511a:168_0: Atha kho brahmā sahampati “katāvakāso khomhi bhagavatā dhammadesanāyā”ti ñatvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ
atk-s0511a:168_1: añjaliṃ sirasi katvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā brahmagaṇaparivuto
atk-s0511a:168_2: pakkāmi. Atha satthā tassa brahmuno paṭiññaṃ datvā – “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0511a:168_3: dhammaṃ deseyya”nti cintento – “āḷāro paṇḍito so imaṃ dhammaṃ khippaṃ ājānissatī”ti
atk-s0511a:168_4: cittaṃ uppādetvā puna olokento tassa sattāhaṃ kālaṅkatabhāvaṃ ñatvā udakassa ca abhidosakālaṅkatabhāvaṃ
atk-s0511a:168_5: ñatvā puna – “kahaṃ nu kho etarahi pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū viharantī”ti pañcavaggiye
atk-s0511a:168_6: āvajjento “bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye”ti ñatvā āsāḷhiyaṃ pabhātāya rattiyā kālasseva
atk-s0511a:168_7: pattacīvaramādāya aṭṭhārasayojanikaṃ maggaṃ paṭipanno antarāmagge upakaṃ nāma ājīvakaṃ
atk-s0511a:168_8: disvā tassa attano buddhabhāvamāvikatvā taṃdivasameva sāyanhasamaye isipatanamagamāsi.
atk-s0511a:168_9: Tattha pañcavaggiyānaṃ attano buddhabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā paññattavarabuddhāsanagato pañcavaggiye
atk-s0511a:169_0: Tesu aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā suttapariyosāne aṭṭhārasahi
atk-s0511a:169_1: brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. Satthā tattheva vassaṃ upagantvā
atk-s0511a:169_2: punadivase vappattheraṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpesi. Eteneva upāyena sabbe te sotāpattiphale
atk-s0511a:169_3: patiṭṭhāpetvā puna pañcamiyaṃ pakkhassa pañcapi te there sannipātetvā anattalakkhaṇasuttantaṃ
atk-s0511a:169_4: desesi, desanāpariyosāne pañcapi therā arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:170_0: Atha satthā tattheva yasassa kulaputtassa upanissayaṃ disvā gehaṃ pahāya nikkhantaṃ
atk-s0511a:170_1: disvā – “ehi yasā”ti pakkositvā tasmiññeva rattibhāge sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0511a:170_2: punadivase arahatte ca patiṭṭhāpetvā aparepi tassa sahāyake catupaṇṇāsajane ehibhikkhupabbajjāya
atk-s0511a:170_3: pabbājetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi. Evaṃ loke ekasaṭṭhiyā arahantesu jātesu satthā
atk-s0511a:176: Santi atthāya sattānaṃ, subbatā vacanaṃ mama.
atk-s0511a:185_0: Evañca pana vatvā bhagavā te bhikkhū disāsu vissajjetvā sayaṃ uruvelaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0511a:185_1: antarāmagge kappāsikavanasaṇḍe tiṃsa bhaddavaggiyakumāre vinesi. Tesu yo sabbapacchimako,
atk-s0511a:185_2: so sotāpanno, sabbaseṭṭho anāgāmī, ekopi arahā vā puthujjano vā nāhosi. Tepi sabbe
atk-s0511a:185_3: ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā disāsu pesetvā sayaṃ uruvelaṃ gantvā aḍḍhuḍḍhāni
atk-s0511a:185_5: dametvā ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbājetvā gayāsīse nisīdāpetvā ādittapariyāyadesanāya
atk-s0511a:185_6: arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā tena arahantasahassena bhagavā parivuto “bimbisārassa rañño
atk-s0511a:185_7: paṭiññaṃ mocessāmī”ti rājagahanagarūpacāre laṭṭhivanuyyānaṃ nāma agamāsi. Tato uyyānapālako
atk-s0511a:185_8: rañño ārocesi. Rājā – “satthā āgato”ti sutvā dvādasanahutehi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi
atk-s0511a:185_9: parivuto dasabalaṃ ghanavivaragatamiva divasakaraṃ vanavivaragataṃ munivaradivasakaraṃ
atk-s0511a:185_11: makuṭamaṇijutivisaravijjotinā sirasā nipatitvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi saddhiṃ parisāya.
atk-s0511a:186_0: Atha kho tesaṃ brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ etadahosi – “kiṃ nu kho mahāsamaṇo uruvelakassape
atk-s0511a:186_1: brahmacariyaṃ carati, udāhu uruvelakassapo mahāsamaṇe”ti? Atha kho bhagavā tesaṃ
atk-s0511a:188: Pucchāmi taṃ kassapa etamatthaṃ, kathaṃ pahīnaṃ tava aggihutta”nti. ;
atk-s0511a:190: “Rūpe ca sadde ca atho rase ca, kāmitthiyo cābhivadanti yaññā;
atk-s0511a:191: Etaṃ malantī upadhīsu ñatvā, tasmā na yiṭṭhe na hute arañji”nti. –
atk-s0511a:192_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā attano sāvakabhāvappakāsanatthaṃ tathāgatassa pādesu sirasā nipatitvā
atk-s0511a:192_1: – “satthā me, bhante, bhagavā, sāvakohamasmī”ti vatvā ekatāladvitāla…pe… sattatālappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:192_2: vehāsaṃ sattakkhattuṃ abbhuggantvā pāṭihāriyaṃ katvā ākāsato oruyha bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0511a:193_0: Atha kho mahājano tassa taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā – “aho mahānubhāvā buddhā nāma, evaṃ
atk-s0511a:193_1: thāmagatadiṭṭhiko attānaṃ ‘arahā aha’nti maññamāno uruvelakassapopi diṭṭhijālaṃ bhinditvā
atk-s0511a:193_2: tathāgatena damito”ti dasabalassa guṇakathaṃ kathesi. Taṃ sutvā satthā – “nāhamidāniyeva
atk-s0511a:193_3: imaṃ uruvelakassapaṃ damemi, atītepi esa mayā damitoyevā”ti āha. Atha kho so mahājano
atk-s0511a:193_4: uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā sirasi añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamāha – “bhante, idāni
atk-s0511a:193_5: amhehi esa damito diṭṭho, kathaṃ panesa atīte bhagavatā damito”ti. Tato satthā tena
atk-s0511a:193_6: mahājanena yācito bhavantarena paṭicchannaṃ mahānāradakassapajātakaṃ kathetvā cattāri
atk-s0511a:193_7: ariyasaccāni pakāsesi. Tato satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā rājā bimbisāro ekādasanahutehi
atk-s0511a:193_8: saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi, ekanahutaṃ upāsakattaṃ paṭivedesi. Rājā saraṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:193_9: gantvā svātanāya bhagavantaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena nimantetvā bhagavantaṃ tikkhattuṃ
atk-s0511a:194_0: Punadivase bhagavā bhikkhusahassaparivuto marugaṇaparivuto viya dasasatanayano devarājā,
atk-s0511a:194_1: brahmagaṇaparivuto viya mahābrahmā rājagahaṃ pāvisi. Rājā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0511a:194_2: dānaṃ datvā bhojanapariyosāne bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – “ahaṃ, bhante, tīṇi ratanāni
atk-s0511a:194_3: vinā vasituṃ na sakkhissāmi, velāya vā avelāya vā bhagavato santikaṃ āgamissāmi,
atk-s0511a:194_4: laṭṭhivanaṃ nāma atidūre, idaṃ pana amhākaṃ veḷuvanaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ pavivekakāmānaṃ
atk-s0511a:194_5: nātidūraṃ naccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannaṃ nijjanasambādhaṃ pavivekasukhaṃ chāyūdakasampannaṃ
atk-s0511a:194_9: maṇivaṇṇaudakaṃ gahetvā veḷuvanārāmaṃ pariccajanto dasabalassa hatthe udakaṃ pātesi.
atk-s0511a:194_10: Tasmiṃ ārāmapaṭiggahaṇe “buddhasāsanassa mūlāni otiṇṇānī”ti pītivasaṃ gatā naccantī
atk-s0511a:194_11: viya ayaṃ mahāpathavī kampi. Jambudīpe pana ṭhapetvā veḷuvanamahāvihāraṃ aññaṃ pathaviṃ
atk-s0511a:194_12: kampetvā gahitasenāsanaṃ nāma natthi. Atha satthā veḷuvanārāmaṃ paṭiggahetvā rañño
atk-s0511a:195: “Āvāsadānassa panānisaṃsaṃ, ko nāma vattuṃ, puriso samattho;
atk-s0511a:196: Aññatra buddhā pana lokanāthā, yutto mukhānaṃ nahutena cāpi.
atk-s0511a:197: “Āyuñca vaṇṇañca sukhaṃ balañca, varaṃ pasatthaṃ paṭibhānameva;
atk-s0511a:198: Dadāti nāmāti pavuccate so, yo deti saṅghassa naro vihāraṃ.
atk-s0511a:200: Pāleti āyuṃ pana tassa yasmā, āyuppado hoti tamāhu santo.
atk-s0511a:201: “Accuṇhasīte vasato nivāse, balañca vaṇṇo paṭibhā na hoti;
atk-s0511a:202: Tasmā hi so deti vihāradātā, balañca vaṇṇaṃ paṭibhānameva.
atk-s0511a:204: Nivāraṇā nekavidhassa niccaṃ, sukhappado hoti vihāradātā.
atk-s0511a:206: Yasmā nivāreti vihāradātā, tasmā sukhaṃ vindati so parattha.
atk-s0511a:208: Yo deti sīlādiguṇoditānaṃ, sabbaṃ dado nāma pavuccate so.
atk-s0511a:210: Khittova so tattha parehi sagge, yathābhataṃ jāyati vītasoko.
atk-s0511a:211: “Vare cārurūpe vihāre uḷāre, naro kāraye vāsaye tattha bhikkhū;
atk-s0511a:212: Dadeyyannapānañca vatthañca nesaṃ, pasannena cittena sakkacca niccaṃ.
atk-s0511a:213: “Tasmā mahārāja bhavesu bhoge, manorame paccanubhuyya bhiyyo;
atk-s0511a:214: Vihāradānassa phalena santaṃ, sukhaṃ asokaṃ adhigaccha pacchā”ti.
atk-s0511a:215_0: Iccevaṃ munirājā nararājassa bimbisārassa vihāradānānumodanaṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0511a:215_1: paramadassanīyāya attano sarīrappabhāya suvaṇṇarasasekapiñcharāni viya nagaravanavimānādīni
atk-s0511a:215_2: kurumāno anopamāya buddhalīḷāya anantāya buddhasiriyā veḷuvanamahāvihārameva pāvisīti.
atk-s0511a:218_0: Athevaṃ bhagavati tasmiṃ viharante suddhodanamahārājā “putto me chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ
atk-s0511a:218_1: katvā paramābhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko rājagahaṃ patvā veḷuvanamahāvihāre
atk-s0511a:218_2: viharatī”ti sutvā aññataraṃ mahāmaccaṃ āmantesi – “ehi, bhaṇe, purisasahassaparivāro
atk-s0511a:218_3: rājagahaṃ gantvā mama vacanena ‘pitā vo suddhodanamahārājā taṃ daṭṭhukāmo’ti vatvā
atk-s0511a:218_4: puttaṃ me gaṇhitvā ehī”ti. So “sādhu, devā”ti rañño paṭissuṇitvā purisasahassaparivāro
atk-s0511a:218_5: saṭṭhiyojanamaggaṃ gantvā dhammadesanavelāya vihāraṃ pāvisi. So “tiṭṭhatu tāva raññā
atk-s0511a:218_6: pahitasāsana”nti parisapariyante ṭhito satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā yathāṭhitova saddhiṃ
atk-s0511a:218_7: purisasahassena arahattaṃ patvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. Bhagavā – “etha, bhikkhavo”ti hatthaṃ
atk-s0511a:218_8: pasāresi. Te sabbe taṅkhaṇaññeva iddhimayapattacīvaradharā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya
atk-s0511a:218_9: ākappasampannā hutvā bhagavantaṃ parivāresuṃ. Rājā “neva gato āgacchati, na ca sāsanaṃ
atk-s0511a:218_10: suyyatī”ti cintetvā teneva nīhārena navakkhattuṃ amacce pesesi. Tesu navasu purisasahassesu
atk-s0511a:218_11: ekopi rañño nārocesi, na sāsanaṃ vā pahiṇi. Sabbe arahattaṃ patvāva pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:219_0: Atha rājā cintesi – “ko nu kho mama vacanaṃ karissatī”ti sabbarājabalaṃ olokento
atk-s0511a:219_1: udāyiṃ addasa. So kira rañño sabbatthasādhako amacco abbhantariko ativissāsiko bodhisattena
atk-s0511a:219_2: saddhiṃ ekadivaseyeva jāto sahapaṃsukīḷito sahāyo. Atha naṃ rājā āmantesi – “tāta
atk-s0511a:219_3: udāyi, ahaṃ mama puttaṃ daṭṭhukāmo navapurisasahassāni pesesiṃ, ekapurisopi āgantvā
atk-s0511a:219_4: sāsanamattampi ārocetā natthi, dujjāno kho pana me jīvitantarāyo, ahaṃ jīvamānova
atk-s0511a:219_5: puttaṃ daṭṭhumicchāmi. Sakkhissasi me puttaṃ dassetu”nti? So “sakkhissāmi, deva,
atk-s0511a:219_6: sace pabbajituṃ labhissāmī”ti āha. “Tāta, tvaṃ pabbajitvā vā apabbajitvā vā mayhaṃ
atk-s0511a:219_7: puttaṃ dassehī”ti. So “sādhu, devā”ti rañño sāsanaṃ ādāya rājagahaṃ gantvā satthu
atk-s0511a:219_8: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saddhiṃ purisasahassena arahattaṃ patvā ehibhikkhubhāve patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0511a:219_9: phaggunīpuṇṇamāsiyaṃ cintesi – “atikkanto hemanto, vasantasamayo anuppatto, supupphitā
atk-s0511a:219_10: vanasaṇḍā, paṭipajjanakkhamo maggo, kālo dasabalassa ñātisaṅgahaṃ kātu”nti cintetvā
atk-s0511a:219_11: bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā saṭṭhimattāhi gāthāhi bhagavato kulanagaraṃ gamanatthāya
atk-s0511a:220: “Aṅgārino dāni dumā bhadante, phalesino chadanaṃ vippahāya;
atk-s0511a:221: Te accimantova pabhāsayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:225: Rukkhā virocanti ubhosu passesu, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:227: Khuddaṃ pipāsampi vinodayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:229: Rukkhā virocanti ubhosu passesu, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:233: Tosenti satte maṇimaṇḍapāva, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:234: “Latā anekā dumanissitāva, piyehi saddhiṃ sahitā vadhūva;
atk-s0511a:235: Palobhayantī hi sugandhagandhā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:237: Tosenti mañjussaratā ratīhi, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:238: “Migā ca nānā suvirājamānā, uttuṅgakaṇṇā ca manuññanettā;
atk-s0511a:239: Disā samantā mabhidhāvayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:240: “Manuññabhūtā ca mahī samantā, virājamānā haritāva saddalā;
atk-s0511a:243: Virocayanteva disā samantā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:245: Virājamānaṃ sucimañca sobhaṃ, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:247: Sugandhabhūtaṃ pavanaṃ surammaṃ, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:253: Modanti bhariyāhi samaṅgino te, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:255: Madhumhi gandho vidisaṃ pavāyati, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:256: “Abhinnanādā madavāraṇā ca, girīhi dhāvanti ca vāridhārā;
atk-s0511a:257: Savanti najjo suvirājitāva samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:259: Disā rajindāva virocayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:263: Girimhi ṭhatvā abhinādayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:265: Girī virocanti disā samantā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:267: Savanti najjo suvirājamānā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:269: Najjo virocanti susandamānā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:271: Vibhūsitaggā surasundarī ca, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:273: Manobhirāmaṃ satataṃ gatīnaṃ, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:275: Pathesu gāme sulabhā manuññā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:279: Bahūhi tattheva janā samantā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:281: Bhisehi khīraṃva rasaṃ pavāyati, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:289: Visālasālā ca sabhā ca bahū, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:292: “Vāto mudūsītalasādhurūpo, nabhā ca abbhā vigatā samantā;
atk-s0511a:293: Disā ca sabbāva virocayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:295: Nabhe ca sūro mudukova tāpo, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:297: Disā vidhāvanti ca gajjayantā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:301: Disā ca sabbā atirocayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:303: Caranti tasmiṃ pavane suramme, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:308: “Nisevitaṃ nekadijehi niccaṃ, gāmena gāmaṃ satataṃ vasantā;
atk-s0511a:309: Pure pure gāmavarā ca santi, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:311: Tahiṃ samiddhā janatā bahū ca, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:312: “Puññiddhiyā sabbayasaggapattā, janā ca tasmiṃ sukhitā samiddhā;
atk-s0511a:313: Pahūtabhogā vividhā vasanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:314: “Nabhe ca abbhā suvisuddhavaṇṇā, disā ca cando suvirājitova;
atk-s0511a:315: Rattiñca vāto mudusītalo ca, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:317: Piyehi saddhiṃ abhimodayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:318: “Candassa raṃsīhi nabhaṃ viroci, mahī ca saṃsuddhamanuññavaṇṇā;
atk-s0511a:319: Disā ca sabbā parisuddharūpā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:320: “Dūre ca disvā varacandaraṃsiṃ, pupphiṃsu pupphāni mahītalasmiṃ;
atk-s0511a:324: “Kucanti hatthīpi madena mattā, vicittapiñchā ca dijā samantā;
atk-s0511a:325: Karonti nādaṃ pavane suramme, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:326: “Pathañca sabbaṃ paṭipajjanakkhamaṃ, iddhañca raṭṭhaṃ sadhanaṃ sabhogaṃ;
atk-s0511a:329: Yatīna pītiṃ satataṃ janeti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:331: Kulanagaraṃ idha sassirikaṃ, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:333: Vicittaparikhāhi puraṃ surammaṃ, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:337: Surindaloke iva devaputtā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:339: Balena saddhiṃ mahatā muninda, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:343: Tosehi taṃ muninda guṇaseṭṭhaṃ, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:346: Yāya āsāya tiṭṭhāmi, sā me āsā samijjhatu.
atk-s0511a:348: Saddalā haritā bhūmi, esa kālo mahāmunī”ti.
atk-s0511a:349_0: Atha naṃ satthā – “kiṃ nu kho, udāyi, gamanavaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇesī”ti āha. “Bhante, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0511a:349_1: pitā suddhodanamahārājā daṭṭhukāmo, karotha ñātakānaṃ saṅgaha”nti āha. “Sādhu, udāyi,
atk-s0511a:349_2: karissāmi ñātisaṅgahaṃ, tena hi bhikkhusaṅghassa ārocehi, gamiyavattaṃ pūressantī”ti
atk-s0511a:350_0: Satthā aṅgamagadhavāsīnaṃ kulaputtānaṃ dasahi sahassehi, kapilavatthuvāsīnaṃ dasahi
atk-s0511a:350_1: sahassehīti sabbeheva vīsatiyā khīṇāsavabhikkhusahassehi parivuto rājagahā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0511a:350_2: divase divase yojanaṃ yojanaṃ gacchanto dvīhi māsehi kapilavatthupuraṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0511a:350_3: Sākiyāpi anuppatteyeva bhagavati – “amhākaṃ ñātiseṭṭhaṃ passissāmā”ti bhagavato vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0511a:350_5: kāretvā gandhapupphahatthā paccuggamanaṃ karontā sabbālaṅkārehi samalaṅkatagattā
atk-s0511a:350_6: gandhapupphacuṇṇādīhi pūjayamānā bhagavantaṃ purakkhatvā nigrodhārāmameva agamaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:351_0: Tatra bhagavā vīsatiyā khīṇāsavasahassehi parivuto paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0511a:351_1: Sākiyā pana mānajātikā mānatthaddhā, “siddhatthakumāro amhehi daharataro, amhākaṃ
atk-s0511a:351_2: kaniṭṭho bhātā, putto, bhāgineyyo, nattā”ti cintetvā daharadahare rājakumāre āhaṃsu
atk-s0511a:351_3: – “tumhe vandatha, mayaṃ tumhākaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito nisīdissāmā”ti. Tesvevaṃ nisinnesu
atk-s0511a:351_4: bhagavā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā – “ime ñātakā attano moghajiṇṇabhāvena na maṃ vandanti,
atk-s0511a:351_5: na panete jānanti ‘buddho nāma kīdiso, buddhabalaṃ nāma kīdisa’nti vā, ‘buddho nāma
atk-s0511a:351_6: ediso, buddhabalaṃ nāma edisa’nti vā, handāhaṃ attano buddhabalaṃ iddhibalañca dassento
atk-s0511a:351_7: pāṭihāriyañca kareyyaṃ, ākāse dasasahassacakkavāḷavitthataṃ sabbaratanamayaṃ caṅkamaṃ
atk-s0511a:351_8: māpetvā tattha caṅkamanto mahājanassa ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā dhammañca deseyya”nti cintesi.
atk-s0511a:353: “Na hete jānanti sadevamānusā, buddho ayaṃ kīdisako naruttamo;
atk-s0511a:354: Iddhibalaṃ paññābalañca kīdisaṃ, buddhabalaṃ lokahitassa kīdisaṃ.
atk-s0511a:356: “Na hete jānanti sadevamānusā, buddho ayaṃ edisako naruttamo;
atk-s0511a:357: Iddhibalaṃ paññābalañca edisaṃ, buddhabalaṃ lokahitassa edisaṃ.
atk-s0511a:361_0: Tattha na hete jānantīti na hi ete jānanti. Na-kāro paṭisedhattho. Hi-kāro kāraṇatthe
atk-s0511a:361_1: nipāto. Yasmā panete mama ñātiādayo devamanussā mayā buddhabale ca iddhibale ca anāvikate
atk-s0511a:361_2: na jānanti “ediso buddho, edisaṃ iddhibala”nti, tasmā ahaṃ mama buddhabalañca iddhibalañca
atk-s0511a:361_3: dasseyyanti attho. Sadevamānusāti ettha devāti upapattidevā adhippetā. Saha devehīti
atk-s0511a:361_4: sadevā. Ke te? Mānusā, sadevā eva mānusā sadevamānusā. Atha vā devoti sammutidevo,
atk-s0511a:361_5: suddhodano rājā adhippeto. Saha devena raññā suddhodanenāti sadevā. Mānusāti ñātimānusā,
atk-s0511a:361_6: sadevā sasuddhodanā mānusā sadevamānusā sarājāno vā ete mama ñātimānusā mama balaṃ
atk-s0511a:361_7: na vijānantīti attho. Sesadevāpi saṅgahaṃ gacchantiyeva. Sabbepi devā devanaṭṭhena
atk-s0511a:361_8: “devā”ti vuccanti. Devanaṃ nāma dhātuattho kīḷādi. Atha vā devā ca mānusā ca devamānusā,
atk-s0511a:361_9: saha devamānusehi sadevamānusā. Ke te? Lokāti vacanaseso daṭṭhabbo. Buddhoti catusaccadhamme
atk-s0511a:363: Pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ me, tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇā”ti. ;
atk-s0511a:364_0: Idha pana kattukārake buddhasaddasiddhi daṭṭhabbā. Adhigatavisesehi devamanussehi
atk-s0511a:364_1: “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā”ti evaṃ buddhattā ñātattā buddho. Idha kammakārake
atk-s0511a:364_2: buddhasaddasiddhi daṭṭhabbā. Buddhamassa atthīti vā buddho, buddhavantoti attho.
atk-s0511a:364_3: Taṃ sabbaṃ saddasatthānusārena veditabbaṃ. Kīdisakoti kīdiso kiṃsarikkhako kiṃsadiso
atk-s0511a:364_4: kiṃvaṇṇo kiṃsaṇṭhāno dīgho vā rasso vāti attho.
atk-s0511a:365_0: Naruttamoti narānaṃ naresu vā uttamo pavaro seṭṭhoti naruttamo. Iddhibalanti ettha
atk-s0511a:365_1: ijjhanaṃ iddhi nipphattiatthena paṭilābhaṭṭhena ca iddhi. Atha vā ijjhanti tāya sattā
atk-s0511a:365_2: iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi. Sā pana dasavidhā hoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a:366_0: “Iddhiyoti dasa iddhiyo. Katamā dasa? Adhiṭṭhānā iddhi, vikubbanā iddhi, manomayā
atk-s0511a:366_1: iddhi, ñāṇavipphārā iddhi, samādhivipphārā iddhi, ariyā iddhi, kammavipākajā iddhi,
atk-s0511a:366_2: puññavato iddhi, vijjāmayā iddhi, tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhī”ti.
atk-s0511a:367_0: Tāsaṃ idaṃ nānattaṃ – pakatiyā eko bahukaṃ āvajjeti, sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā āvajjitvā
atk-s0511a:367_1: ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti “bahuko homī”ti evaṃ vibhajitvā dassitā iddhi adhiṭṭhānavasena
atk-s0511a:367_2: nipphannattā adhiṭṭhānā iddhi nāma. Tassāyamattho – abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ
atk-s0511a:367_3: samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya sace sataṃ icchati “sataṃ homi, sataṃ homī”ti kāmāvacaraparikammacittehi
atk-s0511a:367_4: parikammaṃ katvā puna abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya puna āvajjitvā
atk-s0511a:367_5: adhiṭṭhāti, adhiṭṭhānacittena saheva sataṃ hoti. Sahassādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0511a:368_0: Tattha pādakajjhānacittaṃ nimittārammaṇaṃ parikammacittāni satārammaṇāni vā sahassādīsu
atk-s0511a:368_1: aññatarārammaṇāni vā, tāni ca kho vaṇṇavasena, no paṇṇattivasena. Adhiṭṭhānacittampi
atk-s0511a:368_2: satārammaṇameva, taṃ pana appanācittaṃ viya gotrabhuanantarameva uppajjati rūpāvacaracatutthajhānikaṃ.
atk-s0511a:368_3: So pana pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā kumāravaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti nāgavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti. Supaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:368_4: vā…pe… vividhampi senābyūhaṃ vā dassetīti evaṃ āgatā iddhi pakativaṇṇavijahanavikāravasena
atk-s0511a:369_0: “Idha bhikkhu imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimmināti rūpiṃ manomayaṃ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṃ
atk-s0511a:369_1: ahīnindriya”nti iminā nayena āgatā iddhi sarīrasseva abbhantare aññassa manomayassa
atk-s0511a:370_0: Ñāṇuppattito pubbe vā pacchā vā taṅkhaṇe vā tena attabhāvena paṭilabhitabbaarahattañāṇānubhāvena
atk-s0511a:370_1: nibbatto viseso ñāṇavipphāro iddhi nāma. Āyasmato bākulassa ca āyasmato saṃkiccassa
atk-s0511a:370_2: ca ñāṇavipphārā iddhi, tesaṃ vatthu cettha kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a:371_0: Samādhito pubbe vā pacchā vā taṅkhaṇe vā samathānubhāvena nibbatto viseso samādhivipphārā
atk-s0511a:371_1: iddhi nāma. Āyasmato sāriputtassa samādhivipphārā iddhi, āyasmato sañjīvassa samādhivipphārā
atk-s0511a:371_2: iddhi, āyasmato khāṇukoṇḍaññassa samādhivipphārā iddhi, uttarāya upāsikāya samādhivipphārā
atk-s0511a:371_3: iddhi, sāmāvatiyā upāsikāya samādhivipphārā iddhīti tesaṃ vatthūnettha kathetabbāni,
atk-s0511a:372_0: Katamā ariyā iddhi? Idha bhikkhu sace ākaṅkhati “paṭikkūle appaṭikkūlasaññī vihareyya”nti
atk-s0511a:372_1: appaṭikkūlasaññī tattha viharati, sace ākaṅkhati “appaṭikkūle paṭikkūlasaññī vihareyya”nti
atk-s0511a:372_2: paṭikkūlasaññī tattha viharati…pe… upekkhako tattha viharati sato sampajānoti. Ayañhi
atk-s0511a:372_3: cetovasippattānaṃ ariyānaṃyeva sambhavato ariyā iddhi nāma.
atk-s0511a:373_0: Katamā kammavipākajā iddhi? Sabbesaṃ pakkhīnaṃ sabbesaṃ devānaṃ paṭhamakappikānaṃ
atk-s0511a:373_1: manussānaṃ ekaccānañca vinipātikānaṃ vehāsagamanādikā kammavipākajā iddhi nāma. Katamā
atk-s0511a:373_2: puññavato iddhi? Rājā cakkavattī vehāsaṃ gacchati saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāya. Jaṭilakassa
atk-s0511a:373_3: gahapatissa asītihattho suvaṇṇapabbato nibbatti. Ayaṃ puññavato iddhi nāma. Ghosakassa
atk-s0511a:373_4: gahapatino sattasu ṭhānesu māraṇatthāya upakkame katepi arogabhāvo puññavato iddhi.
atk-s0511a:373_5: Meṇḍakaseṭṭhissa aṭṭhakarīsamatte padese sattaratanamayānaṃ meṇḍakānaṃ pātubhāvo puññavato iddhi.
atk-s0511a:374_0: Katamā vijjāmayā iddhi? Vijjādharā vijjaṃ parijappitvā vehāsaṃ gacchanti, ākāse antalikkhe
atk-s0511a:374_1: hatthimpi dassenti…pe… vividhampi senābyūhaṃ dassentīti. Ādinayappavattā vijjāmayā
atk-s0511a:374_2: iddhi nāma. Taṃ taṃ kammaṃ katvā nibbatto viseso ‘sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena
atk-s0511a:374_3: iddhī’ti ayaṃ tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi nāma. Imissā dasavidhāya
atk-s0511a:374_4: iddhiyā balaṃ iddhibalaṃ nāma, idaṃ mayhaṃ iddhibalaṃ na jānantīti attho.
atk-s0511a:375_1: tampi ete na jānanti. Keci “channaṃ asādhāraṇañāṇānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ paññābala”nti
atk-s0511a:375_2: vadanti. Buddhabalanti ettha buddhabalaṃ nāma buddhānubhāvo, dasabalañāṇāni vā. Tattha
atk-s0511a:375_6: pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ, cutūpapātañāṇaṃ, āsavakkhayañāṇanti imāni dasa. Imesaṃ dasannaṃ
atk-s0511a:375_7: ñāṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ buddhabalanti. Edisanti īdisaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho.
atk-s0511a:376_0: Handāti vavassaggatthe nipāto. Ahanti attānaṃ niddisati. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yasmā panete
atk-s0511a:376_1: mama ñātakā buddhabalaṃ vā buddhaguṇe vā na jānanti, kevalaṃ attano moghajiṇṇabhāvaṃ
atk-s0511a:376_2: nissāya mānavasena sabbalokajeṭṭhaseṭṭhaṃ maṃ na vandanti. Tasmā tesaṃ mānaketu atthi,
atk-s0511a:376_3: taṃ bhañjitvā vandanatthaṃ buddhabalaṃ dasseyyanti vuttaṃ hoti. Dassayissāmīti dasseyyaṃ.
atk-s0511a:376_4: “Dassessāmī”ti ca pāṭho, soyevattho. Buddhabalanti buddhānubhāvaṃ, buddhañāṇavisesaṃ
atk-s0511a:376_5: vā. Anuttaranti niruttaraṃ. Caṅkamanti caṅkamitabbaṭṭhānaṃ vuccati. Māpayissāmīti
atk-s0511a:376_6: māpeyyaṃ. “Caṅkamanaṃ māpessāmī”ti ca pāṭho, soyevattho. Nabheti ākāse. Sabbaratanamaṇḍitanti
atk-s0511a:376_8: dasahi dasahi maṇḍito alaṅkato sabbaratanamaṇḍito, taṃ sabbaratanamaṇḍitaṃ. “Nabhe
atk-s0511a:377: Athevaṃ bhagavatā cintitamatte dasasahassacakkavāḷavāsino bhummādayo devā pamuditahadayā sādhukāramadaṃsu. Tamatthaṃ pakāsentehi saṅgītikārakehi –
atk-s0511a:379: “Bhummā mahārājikā tāvatiṃsā, yāmā ca devā tusitā ca nimmitā;
atk-s0511a:380: Paranimmitā yepi ca brahmakāyikā, ānanditā vipulamakaṃsu ghosa”nti. –
atk-s0511a:382_0: Tattha bhummāti bhummaṭṭhā, pāsāṇapabbatavanarukkhādīsu ṭhitā. Mahārājikāti mahārājapakkhikā.
atk-s0511a:382_1: Bhummaṭṭhānaṃ devatānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā ākāsaṭṭhakadevatā, tato abbhavalāhakā devatā,
atk-s0511a:382_2: tato uṇhavalāhakā devatā, tato sītavalāhakā devatā, tato vassavalāhakā devatā, tato
atk-s0511a:382_3: vātavalāhakā devatā, tato cattāro mahārājāno, tato tāvatiṃsā, tato yāmā, tato tusitā,
atk-s0511a:382_4: tato nimmānaratī, tato paranimmitavasavattī, tato brahmakāyikā, tato brahmapurohitā,
atk-s0511a:382_5: tato mahābrahmāno, tato parittābhā, tato appamāṇābhā, tato ābhassarā, tato parittasubhā,
atk-s0511a:382_6: tato appamāṇasubhā, tato subhakiṇhā, tato vehapphalā, tato avihā, tato atappā, tato
atk-s0511a:382_7: sudassā, tato sudassī, tato akaniṭṭhā devatā saddaṃ sutvā mahantaṃ saddaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:382_8: Asaññino ca arūpāvacarasatte ca ṭhapetvā sotāyatanapavattiṭṭhāne sabbe devamanussanāgādayo
atk-s0511a:382_9: pītivasaṃ gatahadayā ukkuṭṭhisaddamakaṃsūti attho. Ānanditāti pamuditahadayā, sañjātapītisomanassā
atk-s0511a:383_0: Atha satthā cintitasamanantarameva odātakasiṇasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā – “dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu
atk-s0511a:383_1: āloko hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi. Tena adhiṭṭhānacittena saheva āloko ahosi pathavito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0511a:385: “Obhāsitā ca pathavī sadevakā, puthū ca lokantarikā asaṃvutā;
atk-s0511a:386: Tamo ca tibbo vihato tadā ahu, disvāna accherakaṃ pāṭihīra”nti.
atk-s0511a:387_0: Tattha obhāsitāti pakāsitā. Pathavīti etthāyaṃ pathavī catubbidhā – kakkhaḷapathavī,
atk-s0511a:387_1: sasambhārapathavī, nimittapathavī, sammutipathavīti. Tāsu “katamā cāvuso, ajjhattikā
atk-s0511a:387_2: pathavīdhātu? Yaṃ ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ kharigata”ntiādīsu vuttā ayaṃ kakkhaḷapathavī
atk-s0511a:387_3: nāma. “Yo pana bhikkhu pathaviṃ khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya vā”tiādīsu vuttā sasambhārapathavī,
atk-s0511a:387_4: ye ca kesādayo vīsati koṭṭhāsā, ayolohādayo ca bāhirā; sāpi vaṇṇādīhi sambhārehi
atk-s0511a:387_5: saddhiṃ pathavīti sasambhārapathavī nāma. “Pathavīkasiṇameko sañjānātī”tiādīsu nimittapathavī
atk-s0511a:387_7: “pathavīdevo”ti nāmaṃ labhati. Vuttañhetaṃ – “āpo ca devā pathavī”tiādīsu ayaṃ sammutipathavī,
atk-s0511a:387_8: paññattipathavī nāmāti veditabbā. Idha pana sasambhārapathavī adhippetā.
atk-s0511a:388_0: Sadevakāti sadevalokā. “Sadevatā”tipi pāṭho atthi ce sundarataraṃ, sadevako manussaloko
atk-s0511a:388_1: obhāsitoti attho. Puthūti bahū. Lokantarikāti asurakāyanarakānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
atk-s0511a:388_2: tā pana tiṇṇaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antarā ekā lokantarikā hoti, tiṇṇaṃ sakaṭacakkānaṃ aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0511a:388_3: āhacca ṭhitānaṃ majjhe okāso viya ekeko lokantarikanirayo, parimāṇato aṭṭhayojanasahasso
atk-s0511a:388_4: hoti. Asaṃvutāti heṭṭhā appatiṭṭhā. Tamo cāti andhakāro. Tibboti bahalo ghano. Candimasūriyālokābhāvato
atk-s0511a:388_5: niccandhakārova hoti. Vihatoti viddhasto. Tadāti yadā pana bhagavā sattesu kāruññataṃ
atk-s0511a:388_6: paṭicca pāṭihāriyakaraṇatthaṃ ālokaṃ phari, tadā so tamo tibbo lokantarikāsu ṭhito,
atk-s0511a:389_0: Accherakanti accharāpaharaṇayoggaṃ, vimhayavasena aṅgulīhi paharaṇayogganti attho.
atk-s0511a:389_1: Pāṭihīranti paṭipakkhaharaṇato pāṭihīraṃ. Paṭiharati sattānaṃ diṭṭhimānopagatāni
atk-s0511a:389_2: cittānīti vā pāṭihīraṃ, appasannānaṃ sattānaṃ pasādaṃ paṭiāharatīti vā pāṭihīraṃ.
atk-s0511a:389_3: “Pāṭihera”ntipi pāṭho, soyevattho. Ettha ālokavidhānavisesassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Disvāna
atk-s0511a:389_4: accherakaṃ pāṭihīranti ettha devā ca manussā ca lokantarikāsu nibbattasattāpi ca
atk-s0511a:389_5: taṃ bhagavato pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā paramappītisomanassaṃ agamaṃsūti idaṃ vacanaṃ āharitvā
atk-s0511a:389_6: attho daṭṭhabbo, itarathā na pubbena vā paraṃ, na parena vā pubbaṃ yujjati.
atk-s0511a:390: Idāni na kevalaṃ manussalokesuyeva āloko atthi, sabbattha tividhepi saṅkhārasattokāsasaṅkhāte loke ālokoyevāti dassanatthaṃ –
atk-s0511a:395: Adho ca uddhaṃ tiriyañca vitthata”nti. – ayaṃ gāthā vuttā;
atk-s0511a:396_0: Tattha devāti sammutidevā upapattidevā visuddhidevāti sabbepi devā idha saṅgahitā.
atk-s0511a:396_1: Devā ca gandhabbā ca manussā ca rakkhasā ca devagandhabbamanussarakkhasā. Saha devagandhabbamanussarakkhasehīti
atk-s0511a:396_2: sadevagandhabbamanussarakkhaso. Ko pana so? Loko, tasmiṃ sadevagandhabbamanussarakkhase
atk-s0511a:396_3: loke. Ābhāti āloko. Uḷārāti etthāyaṃ uḷāra-saddo madhuraseṭṭhavipulādīsu dissati.
atk-s0511a:396_4: Tathā hesa “uḷārāni khādanīyabhojanīyāni khādanti bhuñjantī”tiādīsu madhure dissati.
atk-s0511a:396_5: “Uḷārāya kho pana bhavaṃ vacchāyano pasaṃsāya samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pasaṃsatī”tiādīsu seṭṭhe.
atk-s0511a:396_6: “Atikkamma devānaṃ devānubhāvaṃ appamāṇo uḷāro obhāso”tiādīsu vipule. Svāyaṃ idha
atk-s0511a:396_7: seṭṭhe daṭṭhabbo. Vipulāti appamāṇā. Ajāyathāti uppajji udapādi pavattittha. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0511a:396_8: loke parasmiñcāti imasmiṃ manussaloke ca parasmiṃ devaloke cāti attho. Ubhayasminti
atk-s0511a:396_9: tadubhayasmiṃ, ajjhattabahiddhādīsu viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Adho cāti avīciādīsu nirayesu.
atk-s0511a:396_10: Uddhanti bhavaggatopi uddhaṃ ajaṭākāsepi. Tiriyañcāti tiriyatopi dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu.
atk-s0511a:396_11: Vitthatanti visaṭaṃ. Andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā vuttappakāraṃ lokañca padesañca ajjhottharitvā
atk-s0511a:396_12: ābhā pavattitthāti attho. Atha vā tiriyañca vitthatanti tiriyato vitthataṃ mahantaṃ,
atk-s0511a:396_13: appamāṇaṃ padesaṃ ābhā pharitvā aṭṭhāsīti attho.
atk-s0511a:397_0: Atha bhagavā dasasahassacakkavāḷesu ālokapharaṇaṃ katvā abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ
atk-s0511a:397_1: samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya āvajjitvā adhiṭṭhānacittena ākāsamabbhuggantvā tesaṃ ñātīnaṃ
atk-s0511a:397_2: sīsesu pādapaṃsuṃ okiramāno viya mahatiyā devamanussaparisāya majjhe yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0511a:397_3: dasseti. Taṃ pana pāḷito evaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-s0511a:398_0: “Katamaṃ tathāgatassa yamakapāṭihīre ñāṇaṃ? Idha tathāgato yamakapāṭihīraṃ karoti
atk-s0511a:398_1: asādhāraṇaṃ sāvakehi uparimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati, heṭṭhimakāyato udakadhārā
atk-s0511a:398_2: pavattati. Heṭṭhimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati, uparimakāyato udakadhārā pavattati…pe…
atk-s0511a:398_3: puratthimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati, pacchimakāyato udakadhārā pavattati. Pacchimakāyato
atk-s0511a:398_4: aggikkhandho pavattati, puratthimakāyato udakadhārā pavattati…pe… dakkhiṇaakkhito
atk-s0511a:398_5: aggikkhandho pavattati, vāmaakkhito udakadhārā pavattati. Vāmaakkhito aggikkhandho
atk-s0511a:398_6: pavattati, dakkhiṇaakkhito udakadhārā pavattati…pe… dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotato aggikkhandho
atk-s0511a:398_7: pavattati, vāmakaṇṇasotato udakadhārā pavattati. Vāmakaṇṇasotato aggikkhandho pavattati,
atk-s0511a:398_8: dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotato udakadhārā pavattati…pe… dakkhiṇanāsikāsotato aggikkhandho pavattati,
atk-s0511a:398_9: vāmanāsikāsotato udakadhārā pavattati. Vāmanāsikāsotato aggikkhandho pavattati, dakkhiṇanāsikāsotato
atk-s0511a:398_10: udakadhārā pavattati…pe… dakkhiṇaaṃsakūṭato aggikkhandho pavattati, vāmaaṃsakūṭato
atk-s0511a:398_11: udakadhārā pavattati. Vāmaaṃsakūṭato aggikkhandho pavattati, dakkhiṇaaṃsakūṭato udakadhārā
atk-s0511a:398_12: pavattati…pe… dakkhiṇahatthato aggikkhandho pavattati, vāmahatthato udakadhārā pavattati.
atk-s0511a:398_13: Vāmahatthato aggikkhandho pavattati, dakkhiṇahatthato udakadhārā pavattati…pe… dakkhiṇapassato
atk-s0511a:398_14: aggikkhandho pavattati, vāmapassato udakadhārā pavattati. Vāmapassato aggikkhandho
atk-s0511a:398_15: pavattati, dakkhiṇapassato udakadhārā pavattati…pe… dakkhiṇapādato aggikkhandho pavattati,
atk-s0511a:398_16: vāmapādato udakadhārā pavattati. Vāmapādato aggikkhandho pavattati, dakkhiṇapādato
atk-s0511a:398_17: udakadhārā pavattati…pe… aṅgulaṅgulehi aggikkhandho pavattati, aṅgulantarikāhi udakadhārā
atk-s0511a:398_18: pavattati. Aṅgulantarikāhi aggikkhandho pavattati, aṅgulaṅgulehi udakadhārā pavattati…pe…
atk-s0511a:398_19: ekekalomato aggikkhandho pavattati, ekekalomato udakadhārā pavattati. Lomakūpato
atk-s0511a:398_20: lomakūpato aggikkhandho pavattati, lomakūpato lomakūpato udakadhārā pavattati – channaṃ
atk-s0511a:398_21: vaṇṇānaṃ nīlānaṃ pītakānaṃ lohitakānaṃ odātānaṃ mañjiṭṭhānaṃ pabhassarānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:399_0: “Bhagavā caṅkamati, nimmito tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti. Bhagavā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0511a:399_1: nimmito caṅkamati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti. Bhagavā nisīdati, nimmito caṅkamati
atk-s0511a:399_2: vā tiṭṭhati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti. Bhagavā seyyaṃ kappeti, nimmito caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati
atk-s0511a:399_3: vā nisīdati vā. Nimmito caṅkamati, bhagavā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.
atk-s0511a:399_4: Nimmito tiṭṭhati, bhagavā caṅkamati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti. Nimmito nisīdati,
atk-s0511a:399_5: bhagavā caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti. Nimmito seyyaṃ kappeti, bhagavā
atk-s0511a:399_6: caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā, idaṃ tathāgatassa yamakapāṭihīre ñāṇanti veditabbaṃ”.
atk-s0511a:400_0: Tassa pana bhagavato tejokasiṇasamāpattivasena uparimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati.
atk-s0511a:400_1: Āpokasiṇasamāpattivasena heṭṭhimakāyato udakadhārā pavattatīti puna udakadhārāya
atk-s0511a:400_2: pavattaṭṭhānato aggikkhandho pavattati, aggikkhandhassa pavattaṭṭhānato udakadhārā
atk-s0511a:400_3: pavattatīti dassetuṃ, “heṭṭhimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati, uparimakāyato udakadhārā
atk-s0511a:400_4: pavattatī”ti vuttanti veditabbā. Eseva nayo sesapadesupi. Aggikkhandho panettha udakadhārāya
atk-s0511a:400_5: asammissova ahosi. Tathā udakadhārā aggikkhandhena. Rasmīsu pana dutiyā dutiyā rasmi
atk-s0511a:400_6: purimāya purimāya yamakā viya ekakkhaṇe pavattati. Dvinnañca cittānaṃ ekakkhaṇe pavatti
atk-s0511a:400_7: nāma natthi, buddhānaṃ pana bhavaṅgaparivāsassa lahukatāya pañcahākārehi ciṇṇavasitāya
atk-s0511a:400_8: etā rasmiyo ekakkhaṇe viya pavattanti, tassā pana rasmiyā āvajjanaparikammādhiṭṭhānāni
atk-s0511a:400_9: visuṃyeva. Nīlarasmiatthāya hi bhagavā nīlakasiṇaṃ samāpajjati. Pītarasmiādīnaṃ atthāya
atk-s0511a:401: Evaṃ bhagavato yamakapāṭihīre kayiramāne sakalassāpi dasasahassacakkavāḷassa alaṅkārakaraṇakālo viya ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:405_0: Tattha sattuttamoti attano sīlādīhi guṇehi sabbesu sattesu uttamo pavaro seṭṭhoti
atk-s0511a:405_1: sattuttamo, sattānaṃ vā uttamo sattuttamo. Sattanti hi ñāṇassa nāmaṃ, tena dasabalacatuvesārajjachaasādhāraṇañāṇasaṅkhātena
atk-s0511a:405_2: sattena seṭṭho uttamoti sattuttamo, samānādhikaraṇavasena satto uttamoti vā sattuttamo.
atk-s0511a:405_3: Yadi evaṃ “uttamasatto”ti vattabbaṃ uttama-saddassa pubbanipātapāṭhato. Na panesa
atk-s0511a:405_4: bhedo aniyamato bahulavacanato ca naruttamapurisuttamanaravarādi-saddā viya daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a:405_5: Atha vā sattaṃ uttamaṃ yassa so sattuttamo, idhāpi ca uttama-saddassa pubbanipāto
atk-s0511a:405_6: bhavati. Uttamasattoti visesanassa pubbanipātapāṭhato “cittagū paddhagū”ti ettha
atk-s0511a:405_7: viyāti nāyaṃ doso. Ubhayavisesanato vā āhitaggiādipāṭho viya daṭṭhabbo. Vināyakoti
atk-s0511a:405_8: bahūhi vinayanūpāyehi satte vineti dametīti vināyako. Satthāti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthehi
atk-s0511a:405_9: yathārahaṃ satte anusāsatīti satthā. Ahūti ahosi. Devamanussapūjitoti dibbehi pañcakāmaguṇehi
atk-s0511a:405_10: dibbanti kīḷantīti devā. Manassa ussannattā manussā, devā ca manussā ca devamanussā,
atk-s0511a:405_11: devamanussehi pūjito devamanussapūjito. Pupphādipūjāya ca paccayapūjāya ca pūjito,
atk-s0511a:405_12: apacitoti attho. Kasmā pana devamanussānameva gahaṇaṃ kataṃ, nanu bhagavā tiracchānagatehipi
atk-s0511a:405_15: cetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Mahānubhāvoti mahatā buddhānubhāvena samannāgato. Satapuññalakkhaṇoti
atk-s0511a:405_16: anantesu cakkavāḷesu sabbe sattā ekekaṃ puññakammaṃ satakkhattuṃ kareyyuṃ ettakehi
atk-s0511a:405_17: janehi katakammaṃ bodhisatto sayameva ekako sataguṇaṃ katvā nibbatto. Tasmā “satapuññalakkhaṇo”ti
atk-s0511a:405_18: vuccati. Keci pana “satena satena puññakammena nibbattaekekalakkhaṇo”ti vadanti.
atk-s0511a:405_19: “Evaṃ sante yo koci buddho bhaveyyā”ti taṃ aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhittaṃ. Dassesīti sabbesaṃ
atk-s0511a:406_0: Atha satthā ākāse pāṭihāriyaṃ katvā mahājanassa cittācāraṃ oloketvā tassa ajjhāsayānukūlaṃ
atk-s0511a:406_1: dhammakathaṃ caṅkamanto kathetukāmo ākāse dasasahassacakkavāḷavitthataṃ sabbaratanamayaṃ
atk-s0511a:408: “So yācito devavarena cakkhumā, atthaṃ samekkhitvā tadā naruttamo;
atk-s0511a:410_0: Tattha soti so satthā. Yācitoti paṭhamameva aṭṭhame sattāhe dhammadesanāya yācitoti
atk-s0511a:410_1: attho. Devavarenāti sahampatibrahmunā. Cakkhumāti ettha cakkhatīti cakkhu, samavisamaṃ
atk-s0511a:410_2: vibhāvayatīti attho. Taṃ pana cakkhu duvidhaṃ – ñāṇacakkhu, maṃsacakkhūti. Tattha
atk-s0511a:410_3: ñāṇacakkhu pañcavidhaṃ – buddhacakkhu, dhammacakkhu, samantacakkhu, dibbacakkhu,
atk-s0511a:410_4: paññācakkhūti. Tesu buddhacakkhu nāma āsayānusayañāṇañceva indriyaparopariyattañāṇañca,
atk-s0511a:410_5: yaṃ “buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento”ti āgataṃ. Dhammacakkhu nāma heṭṭhimā tayo maggā
atk-s0511a:410_6: tīṇi ca phalāni, yaṃ “virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādī”ti āgataṃ. Samantacakkhu
atk-s0511a:410_7: nāma sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, yaṃ “tathūpamaṃ dhammamayaṃ, sumedha, pāsādamāruyha samantacakkhū”ti
atk-s0511a:410_8: āgataṃ. Dibbacakkhu nāma ālokavaḍḍhanena uppannābhiññācittena sampayuttañāṇaṃ, yaṃ
atk-s0511a:410_9: “dibbena cakkhunā visuddhenā”ti āgataṃ. Paññācakkhu nāma “cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:411_0: Maṃsacakkhu nāma “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe cā”ti ettha pasādamaṃsacakkhu vuttaṃ. Taṃ
atk-s0511a:411_1: pana duvidhaṃ – sasambhāracakkhu pasādacakkhūti. Tesu yvāyaṃ akkhikūpake akkhipattakehi
atk-s0511a:411_2: parivārito maṃsapiṇḍo yattha catasso dhātuyo vaṇṇagandharasojā sambhavo jīvitaṃ bhāvo
atk-s0511a:411_3: cakkhupasādo kāyapasādoti saṅkhepato terasa sambhārā honti. Vitthārato pana sambhavamānāni
atk-s0511a:411_4: catusamuṭṭhānāni chattiṃsa jīvitaṃ bhāvo cakkhupasādo kāyapasādoti ime kammasamuṭṭhānā
atk-s0511a:411_5: cattāro cāti sasambhārā honti, idaṃ sasambhāracakkhu nāma. Yaṃ pana setamaṇḍalaparicchinnena
atk-s0511a:411_6: kaṇhamaṇḍalena parivārite diṭṭhamaṇḍale sanniviṭṭhaṃ rūpadassanasamatthaṃ pasādamattaṃ,
atk-s0511a:411_7: idaṃ pasādacakkhu nāma. Sabbāni panetāni ekavidhāni aniccato saṅkhatato, duvidhāni
atk-s0511a:411_8: sāsavānāsavato lokiyalokuttarato, tividhāni bhūmito upādiṇṇattikato, catubbidhāni
atk-s0511a:411_10: chabbidhāni honti buddhacakkhādivasena. Iccevametāni vuttappakārāni cakkhūni assa
atk-s0511a:411_11: bhagavato santīti bhagavā cakkhumāti vuccati. Atthaṃ samekkhitvāti caṅkamaṃ māpetvā,
atk-s0511a:411_12: dhammadesanānimittaṃ devamanussānaṃ hitatthaṃ upaparikkhitvā upadhāretvāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0511a:411_13: Māpayīti māpesi. Lokanāyakoti saggamokkhābhimukhaṃ lokaṃ nayatīti lokanāyako. Suniṭṭhitanti
atk-s0511a:411_14: suṭṭhu niṭṭhitaṃ, pariyositanti attho. Sabbaratananimmitanti dasavidharatanamayaṃ.
atk-s0511a:414: “Iddhī ca ādesanānusāsanī, tipāṭihīre bhagavā vasī ahu;
atk-s0511a:415: Caṅkamaṃ māpayi lokanāyako, suniṭṭhitaṃ sabbaratananimmita”nti. – vuttaṃ;
atk-s0511a:416_0: Tattha iddhīti iddhividhaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ nāma. Taṃ pana ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti,
atk-s0511a:416_1: bahudhāpi hutvā eko hotītiādinayappavattaṃ. Ādesanāti parassa cittācāraṃ ñatvā kathanaṃ
atk-s0511a:416_2: ādesanāpāṭihāriyaṃ, taṃ sāvakānañca buddhānañca satatadhammadesanā. Anusāsanīti anusāsanipāṭihāriyaṃ,
atk-s0511a:416_3: tassa tassa ajjhāsayānukūlamovādoti attho. Iti etāni tīṇi pāṭihāriyāni. Tattha iddhipāṭihāriyena
atk-s0511a:416_5: dhammasenāpatissa, anusāsanipāṭihāriyaṃ pana buddhānaṃ satatadhammadesanā. Tipāṭihīreti
atk-s0511a:416_6: etesu tīsu pāṭihāriyesūti attho. Bhagavāti idaṃ guṇavisiṭṭhasattuttamagarugāravādhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:419_0: Vasīti etasmiṃ tividhepi pāṭihāriye vasippatto, ciṇṇavasīti attho. Vasiyo nāma pañca

atk-s0511a:419_4: samāpajjati samāpajjanāya dandhāyitattaṃ natthīti sīghaṃ samāpajjanasamatthatā samāpajjanavasī
atk-s0511a:419_5: nāma. Dīghaṃ kālaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasī nāma. Tatheva lahuṃ vuṭṭhātuṃ
atk-s0511a:419_6: samatthatā vuṭṭhānavasī nāma. Paccavekkhaṇavasī pana paccavekkhaṇajavanāneva honti
atk-s0511a:419_7: tāni āvajjanānantarāneva hutvā uppajjantīti āvajjanavasiyā eva vuttāni. Iti imāsu

atk-s0511a:423: Thambheva dassesi paṭipāṭiyā, caṅkame ratanāmaye”ti. – ādigāthāyo vuttā;
atk-s0511a:424_0: Tattha dasasahassīlokadhātuyāti dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu. Sinerupabbatuttameti mahāmerusaṅkhāte
atk-s0511a:424_1: seṭṭhapabbate. Thambhevāti thambhe viya dasacakkavāḷasahassesu ye sinerupabbatā,
atk-s0511a:424_2: te paṭipāṭiyā ṭhite suvaṇṇathambhe viya katvā tesaṃ upari caṅkamaṃ māpetvā dassesīti
atk-s0511a:425_0: 13. Dasasahassī atikkammāti ratanacaṅkamaṃ pana bhagavā māpento tassa ekaṃ koṭiṃ
atk-s0511a:425_2: atikkamitvā ṭhitaṃ katvā māpesi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:428_0: Tattha jinoti kilesārijayanato jino. Sabbasoṇṇamayā passeti tassa pana evaṃ nimmitassa
atk-s0511a:428_1: caṅkamassa ubhayapassesu suvaṇṇamayā paramaramaṇīyā mariyādabhūmi ahosi, majjhe maṇimayāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0511a:429_0: 14. Tulāsaṅghāṭāti tulāyugaḷā, tā nānāratanamayāti veditabbā. Anuvaggāti anurūpā.
atk-s0511a:429_1: Sovaṇṇaphalakatthatāti sovaṇṇamayehi phalakehi atthatā, tulāsaṅghātānaṃ upari suvaṇṇamayo
atk-s0511a:429_2: padaracchadoti attho. Vedikā sabbasovaṇṇāti vedikā pana sabbāpi suvaṇṇamayā, yā panesā
atk-s0511a:429_3: caṅkamanaparikkhepavedikā, sā ekāva aññehi ratanehi asammissāti attho. Dubhato passesu
atk-s0511a:429_4: nimmitāti ubhosu passesu nimmitā. Da-kāro padasandhikaro.
atk-s0511a:430_0: 15. Maṇimuttāvālukākiṇṇāti maṇimuttāmayavālukākiṇṇā. Atha vā maṇayo ca muttā ca vālukā
atk-s0511a:430_1: ca maṇimuttāvālukā. Tāhi maṇimuttāvālukāhi ākiṇṇā santhatāti maṇimuttāvālukākiṇṇā.
atk-s0511a:430_2: Nimmitoti iminākārena nimmito kato. Ratanāmayoti sabbaratanamayo, caṅkamoti attho.
atk-s0511a:430_3: Obhāseti disā sabbāti sabbāpi dasa disā obhāseti pakāseti. Sataraṃsīvāti sahassaraṃsiādicco
atk-s0511a:430_4: viya. Uggatoti udito. Yathā pana abbhuggato sahassaraṃsi sabbāpi dasa disā obhāseti,
atk-s0511a:430_5: evameva esopi sabbaratanamayo caṅkamo obhāsetīti attho.
atk-s0511a:431: Idāni pana niṭṭhite caṅkame tattha bhagavato pavattidassanatthaṃ –
atk-s0511a:440: Namassamānā nipatanti, tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā pamoditā”ti. – gāthāyo vuttā;
atk-s0511a:441_0: Tattha dhīroti dhitiyutto. Dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇoti suppatiṭṭhitapādatalādīhi dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi
atk-s0511a:441_1: samannāgatoti attho. Dibbanti devaloke bhavaṃ jātaṃ dibbaṃ. Pārichattakanti devānaṃ
atk-s0511a:441_2: tāvatiṃsānaṃ koviḷārarukkhassa nissandena samantā yojanasataparimāṇo paramadassanīyo
atk-s0511a:441_3: pāricchattakarukkho nibbatti. Yasmiṃ pupphite sakalaṃ devanagaraṃ ekasurabhigandhavāsitaṃ
atk-s0511a:441_4: hoti, tassa kusumareṇuokiṇṇāni navakanakavimānāni piñjarāni hutvā khāyanti. Imassa
atk-s0511a:441_5: pana pāricchattakarukkhassa pupphañca pāricchattakanti vuttaṃ. Caṅkame okirantīti
atk-s0511a:441_6: tasmiṃ ratanacaṅkame avakiranti, tena vuttappakārena pupphena tasmiṃ caṅkame caṅkamamānaṃ
atk-s0511a:441_7: bhagavantaṃ pūjentīti attho. Sabbe devāti kāmāvacaradevādayo devā. Tenāha “passanti
atk-s0511a:441_8: taṃ devasaṅghā”ti. Taṃ bhagavantaṃ ratanacaṅkamane caṅkamantaṃ sakesu ālayesupi passantīti
atk-s0511a:441_9: attho. Dasasahassīti bhummatthe paccattavacanaṃ, dasasahassiyaṃ devasaṅghā taṃ passantīti
atk-s0511a:441_10: attho. Pamoditāti pamuditā. Nipatantīti sannipatanti. Tuṭṭhahaṭṭhāti pītivasena tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā.
atk-s0511a:441_11: Pamoditāti idāni vattabbehi tāvatiṃsādidevehi saddhinti sambandho daṭṭhabbo, itarathā
atk-s0511a:441_12: punaruttidosato na muccati. Atha vā pamoditā taṃ bhagavantaṃ passanti, tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā
atk-s0511a:442: Idāni ye passiṃsu ye sannipatiṃsu, te sarūpato dassetuṃ –
atk-s0511a:444: “Tāvatiṃsā ca yāmā ca, tusitā cāpi devatā;
atk-s0511a:455: Bhamenti celāni ca ambare tadā, aho jino lokahitānukampako”ti. –
atk-s0511a:457_0: Tattha udaggacittāti pītisomanassavasena udaggacittā. Sumanāti udaggacittattā eva
atk-s0511a:457_1: sumanā. Lokahitānukampakanti lokahitañca lokānukampakañca. Lokahitena vā anukampakaṃ
atk-s0511a:457_2: lokahitānukampakaṃ. Nabheva accuggatacandamaṇḍalanti ettha ākāse abhinavoditaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:457_3: sabbopaddavavinimuttaṃ saradasamaye candamaṇḍalaṃ viya buddhasiriyā virocamānaṃ nayanānandakaraṃ passantīti attho.
atk-s0511a:458_1: dutiyajjhānenābhinibbattā sabbeva gahitāti veditabbā. Subhakiṇhāti idaṃ ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavaseneva
atk-s0511a:458_3: nibbattā sabbeva gahitāti veditabbā. Vehapphalāti vipulā phalāti vehapphalā. Te catutthajjhānanibbattā
atk-s0511a:458_4: asaññasattehi ekatalavāsino. Heṭṭhā pana paṭhamajjhānanibbattā brahmakāyikādayo dassitā.
atk-s0511a:458_5: Tasmā idha na dassitā. Cakkhusotānamabhāvato asaññasattā ca arūpino ca idha na uddiṭṭhā.
atk-s0511a:458_6: Akaniṭṭhā ca devatāti idhāpi ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavaseneva vuttaṃ. Tasmā avihātappasudassāsudassiakaniṭṭhasaṅkhātā
atk-s0511a:458_7: pañcapi suddhāvāsā gahitāti veditabbā. Susuddhasukkavatthavasanāti suṭṭhu suddhāni
atk-s0511a:458_8: susuddhāni sukkāni odātāni. Susuddhāni sukkāni vatthāni nivatthāni ceva pārutāni
atk-s0511a:458_9: ca yehi te susuddhasukkavatthavasanā, paridahitaparisuddhapaṇḍaravatthāti attho.
atk-s0511a:459_0: Muñcantīti okiranti. Pupphaṃ panāti kusumaṃ pana. “Pupphāni vā”tipi pāṭho, vacanavipariyāso
atk-s0511a:459_1: daṭṭhabbo, attho panassa soyeva. Pañcavaṇṇikanti pañcavaṇṇaṃ – nīlapītalohitodātamañjiṭṭhakavaṇṇavasena
atk-s0511a:459_2: pañcavaṇṇaṃ. Candanacuṇṇamissitanti candanacuṇṇena missitaṃ. Bhamenti celānīti bhamayanti
atk-s0511a:459_3: vatthāni. Aho jino lokahitānukampakoti “aho jino lokahito aho ca lokahitānukampako
atk-s0511a:459_4: aho kāruṇiko”ti evamādīni thutivacanāni uggirantā. Muñcanti pupphaṃ bhamayanti celānīti sambandho.
atk-s0511a:460: Idāni tehi payuttāni thutivacanāni dassetuṃ imā gāthāyo vuttā –
atk-s0511a:462: “Tuvaṃ satthā ca ketū ca, dhajo yūpo ca pāṇinaṃ;
atk-s0511a:463: Parāyano patiṭṭhā ca, dīpo ca dvipaduttamo.
atk-s0511a:489: “Saṅkhā ca paṇavā ceva, athopi ḍiṇḍimā bahū;
atk-s0511a:499: Pajā ca vividhā gagane, vattanti pañjalīkatā.
atk-s0511a:501: “Gāyanti seḷenti ca vādayanti ca, bhujāni pothenti ca naccayanti ca;
atk-s0511a:502: Muñcanti pupphaṃ pana pañcavaṇṇikaṃ, mandāravaṃ candanacuṇṇamissitaṃ.
atk-s0511a:506_0: Tattha idhalokaparalokahitatthaṃ sāsatīti satthā. Ketūti ketuno apacitikātabbaṭṭhena
atk-s0511a:506_1: ketu viyāti ketu. Dhajoti indadhajo samussayaṭṭhena dassanīyaṭṭhena ca tuvaṃ dhajo
atk-s0511a:506_2: viyāti dhajoti. Atha vā yathā hi loke yassa kassaci dhajaṃ disvāva – “ayaṃ dhajo
atk-s0511a:506_3: itthannāmassā”ti dhajavā dhajīti paññāyati, evameva bhagavā paññānibbānādhigamāya
atk-s0511a:506_4: bhagavantaṃ disvāva nibbānādhigamo paññāyati. Tena vuttaṃ – “dhajo yūpo cā”ti. Kūṭadantasutte
atk-s0511a:506_5: vuttānaṃ dānādiāsavakkhayañāṇapariyosānānaṃ sabbayāgānaṃ yajanatthāya samussito yūpo
atk-s0511a:506_6: tuvanti attho. Parāyanoti paṭisaraṇaṃ. Patiṭṭhāti yathā mahāpathavī sabbapāṇīnaṃ
atk-s0511a:506_7: ādhārabhāvena patiṭṭhā nissayabhūtā, evaṃ tuvampi patiṭṭhābhūtā. Dīpo cāti padīpo.
atk-s0511a:506_8: Yathā caturaṅge tamasi vattamānānaṃ sattānaṃ āropito padīpo rūpasandassano hoti.
atk-s0511a:506_9: Evaṃ avijjandhakāre vattamānānaṃ sattānaṃ paramatthasandassano padīpo tuvanti attho.
atk-s0511a:506_10: Atha vā mahāsamudde bhinnanāvānaṃ sattānaṃ samuddadīpo yathā patiṭṭhā hoti, evaṃ
atk-s0511a:506_11: tuvampi saṃsārasāgare alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhe osīdantānaṃ pāṇīnaṃ dīpo viyāti dīpoti attho.
atk-s0511a:507_0: Dvipaduttamoti dvipadānaṃ uttamo dvipaduttamo, ettha pana niddhāraṇalakkhaṇassa abhāvato
atk-s0511a:507_1: chaṭṭhīsamāsassa paṭisedho natthi, niddhāraṇalakkhaṇāya chaṭṭhiyā samāso paṭisiddho.
atk-s0511a:507_2: Sammāsambuddho pana apadānaṃ dvipadānaṃ catuppadānaṃ bahuppadānaṃ rūpīnaṃ arūpīnaṃ
atk-s0511a:507_3: saññīnaṃ asaññīnaṃ nevasaññīnāsaññīnaṃ uttamova. Kasmā panidha “dvipaduttamo”ti vuttoti
atk-s0511a:507_4: ce? Seṭṭhataravasena. Imasmiñhi loke seṭṭho nāma uppajjamāno apadacatuppadabahuppadesupi
atk-s0511a:507_5: nuppajjati. Ayaṃ dvipadesuyeva uppajjati. Kataradvipadesūti? Manussesu ceva devesu
atk-s0511a:507_6: ca. Manussesu uppajjamāno tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātu vase kattuṃ samattho buddho
atk-s0511a:507_7: hutvā nibbattati. Devesu uppajjamāno dasasahassilokadhātu vasavattī mahābrahmā hutvā
atk-s0511a:507_8: nibbattati. So tassa kappiyakārako vā ārāmiko vā sampajjati. Iti tatopi seṭṭhataravasena
atk-s0511a:508_1: iddhiyā yuttā, mahānubhāvāti attho. Parivāretvāti bhagavantaṃ samantato parikkhipitvā.
atk-s0511a:508_2: Pasannāti sañjātasaddhā. Narāsabhanti narapuṅgavaṃ. Aho acchariyanti ettha andhassa
atk-s0511a:508_3: pabbatārohanaṃ viya niccaṃ na hotīti acchariyaṃ, accharāyogganti vā acchariyaṃ, “aho,
atk-s0511a:508_4: idaṃ vimhaya”nti accharaṃ paharituṃ yuttanti attho. Abbhutanti abhūtapubbaṃ abhūtanti
atk-s0511a:508_5: abbhutaṃ. Ubhayampetaṃ vimhayāvahassādhivacanaṃ. Lomahaṃsananti lomānaṃ uddhaggabhāvakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0511a:508_6: Na medisaṃ bhūtapubbanti na mayā īdisaṃ bhūtapubbaṃ, abbhutaṃ diṭṭhanti attho. Diṭṭhanti
atk-s0511a:509_0: Sakasakamhi bhavaneti attano attano bhavane. Nisīditvānāti upavissa. Devatāti idaṃ
atk-s0511a:509_1: pana vacanaṃ devānampi devadhītānampi sādhāraṇavacananti veditabbaṃ. Hasantitāti
atk-s0511a:509_2: tā devatā mahāhasitaṃ hasanti, pītivasaṃ gatahadayatāya mihitamattaṃ akatvā aṭṭahāsaṃ
atk-s0511a:510_0: Ākāsaṭṭhāti ākāse vimānādīsu ṭhitā, eseva nayo bhūmaṭṭhesupi. Tiṇapanthanivāsinoti
atk-s0511a:510_1: tiṇaggesu ceva panthesu ca nivāsino. Puññavantoti mahāpuññā. Mahiddhikāti mahānubhāvā.
atk-s0511a:510_2: Saṅgītiyo pavattentīti devanāṭakasaṅgītiyo pavattenti, tathāgataṃ pūjanatthāya payujjantīti
atk-s0511a:510_3: attho. Ambareti ākāse. Anilañjaseti anilapathe, ambarassa anekatthattā “anilañjase”ti
atk-s0511a:510_4: vuttaṃ, purimasseva vevacanaṃ. Cammanaddhānīti cammavinaddhāni. Ayameva vā pāṭho,
