atk-s0511a:511_0: Saṅkhāti dhamanasaṅkhā. Paṇavāti tanumajjhaturiyavisesā. Ḍiṇḍimāti tiṇavākhuddakabheriyo
atk-s0511a:511_1: vuccanti. Vajjantīti vādayanti. Abbhuto vata noti acchariyo vata nu. Uppajjīti uppanno.
atk-s0511a:511_2: Lomahaṃsanoti lomahaṃsanakaro. Dhuvanti yasmā pana abbhuto ayaṃ satthā loke uppanno,
atk-s0511a:511_3: tasmā dhuvaṃ avassaṃ atthasiddhiṃ labhāmāti adhippāyo. Labhāmāti labhissāma. Khaṇoti
atk-s0511a:511_4: aṭṭhakkhaṇavirahito navamo khaṇoti attho. Noti amhākaṃ. Paṭipāditoti paṭiladdho.
atk-s0511a:512_0: Buddhoti tesaṃ sutvānāti buddhoti idaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā tesaṃ devānaṃ pañcavaṇṇā pīti
atk-s0511a:512_1: udapādīti attho. Tāvadeti tasmiṃ kāle. Hiṅkārāti hiṅkārasaddā, hiṃhinti yakkhādayo
atk-s0511a:512_2: pahaṭṭhakāle karonti. Sādhukārāti sādhukārasaddā ca pavattanti. Ukkuṭṭhīti ukkuṭṭhisaddo
atk-s0511a:512_3: ca unnādasaddo cāti attho. Pajāti devādayo adhippetā. Keci “paṭākā vividhā gagane
atk-s0511a:512_4: vattantī”ti paṭhanti. Gāyantīti buddhaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ gītaṃ gāyanti.
atk-s0511a:513_0: Seḷentīti mukhena seḷitasaddaṃ karonti. Vādayantīti mahatī vipañcikāmakaramukhādayo
atk-s0511a:513_1: vīṇā ca turiyāni ca tathāgatassa pūjanatthāya vādenti payojenti. Bhujāni pothentīti
atk-s0511a:513_2: bhuje apphoṭenti. Liṅgavipariyāso daṭṭhabbo. Naccanti cāti aññe ca naccāpenti sayañca naccanti.
atk-s0511a:514_0: Yathā tuyhaṃ mahāvīra, pādesu cakkalakkhaṇanti ettha yena pakārena yathā. Mahāvīriyena
atk-s0511a:514_1: yogato mahāvīro. Pādesu cakkalakkhaṇanti tava ubhosu pādatalesu sahassāraṃ sanemikaṃ
atk-s0511a:514_2: sanābhikaṃ sabbākāraparipūraṃ cakkalakkhaṇaṃ sobhatīti attho. Cakka-saddo panāyaṃ
atk-s0511a:514_4: bhikkhave, cakkāni yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussāna”ntiādīsu sampattiyaṃ dissati.
atk-s0511a:514_6: “Dadaṃ bhuñja ca mā ca pamādo, cakkaṃ vattaya sabbapāṇina”nti ettha dāne. “Dibbaṃ
atk-s0511a:514_7: cakkaratanaṃ pātubhūta”nti ettha ratanacakke. “Mayā pavattitaṃ cakka”nti ettha pana
atk-s0511a:514_8: dhammacakke. “Icchāhatassa posassa, cakkaṃ bhamati matthake”ti ettha khuracakke,
atk-s0511a:514_9: paharaṇacakketi attho. “Pādatalesu cakkāni jātānī”ti ettha lakkhaṇe. Idhāpi lakkhaṇacakke
atk-s0511a:514_10: daṭṭhabbo. Dhajavajirapaṭākā, vaḍḍhamānaṅkusācitanti dhajena ca vajirena ca paṭākāya
atk-s0511a:514_11: ca vaḍḍhamānena ca aṅkusena ca ācitaṃ alaṅkataṃ parivāritaṃ pādesu cakkalakkhaṇanti
atk-s0511a:514_12: attho. Cakkalakkhaṇe pana gahite sesalakkhaṇāni gahitāneva honti. Tathā asīti anubyañjanāni
atk-s0511a:514_14: samalaṅkato bhagavato kāyo sabbaphāliphullo viya pāricchattako vikasitapadumaṃ viya
atk-s0511a:514_15: kamalavanaṃ vividharatanavicittaṃ viya navakanakatoraṇaṃ tārāmarīcivirājitamiva gaganatalaṃ
atk-s0511a:514_16: ito cito ca vidhāvamānā vipphandamānā chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo muñcamāno ativiya sobhati.
atk-s0511a:518: Vimuttiyā asamasamo, dhammacakkappavattane”ti. – ayaṃ gāthā vuttā;
atk-s0511a:519_1: Yathāha – “yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppanna”nti ettha rūpakkhandhe dissati.
atk-s0511a:519_2: “Rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetī”ti ettha rūpabhave. “Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā
atk-s0511a:519_3: rūpāni passatī”ti ettha kasiṇanimitte. “Sarūpā, bhikkhave, uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā
atk-s0511a:519_4: dhammā no arūpā”ti ettha paccaye. “Ākāso parivārito rūpantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti
atk-s0511a:519_5: ettha sarīre. “Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti ettha vaṇṇe.
atk-s0511a:519_6: “Rūpappamāṇo rūpappasanno”ti ettha saṇṭhāne. Idhāpi saṇṭhāne daṭṭhabbo. Sīleti catubbidhe
atk-s0511a:519_7: sīle. Samādhimhīti tividhepi samādhimhi. Paññāyāti lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya. Asādisoti
atk-s0511a:519_8: asadiso anupamo. Vimuttiyāti phalavimuttiyā. Asamasamoti asamā atītā buddhā tehi
atk-s0511a:519_9: asamehi buddhehi sīlādīhi samoti asamasamo. Ettāvatā bhagavato rūpakāyasampatti dassitā.
atk-s0511a:524: Tattha dasanāgabalanti dasachaddantanāgabalaṃ. Duvidhañhi tathāgatassa balaṃ – kāyabalaṃ, ñāṇabalañcāti. Tattha kāyabalaṃ hatthikulānusārena veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0511a:527_0: Imāni dasa hatthikulāni veditabbāni. Kāḷāvakoti pakatihatthikulaṃ. Yaṃ dasannaṃ purisānaṃ
atk-s0511a:527_1: kāyabalaṃ, taṃ ekassa kāḷāvakassa hatthino balaṃ. Yaṃ dasannaṃ kāḷāvakānaṃ balaṃ,
atk-s0511a:527_2: taṃ ekassa gaṅgeyyassāti eteneva upāyena yāva chaddantabalaṃ netabbanti. Yaṃ dasannaṃ
atk-s0511a:527_3: chaddantānaṃ balaṃ, taṃ ekassa tathāgatassa balaṃ, nārāyanabalaṃ vajirabalanti idameva
atk-s0511a:527_4: vuccati. Tadetaṃ pakatihatthigaṇanāya hatthikoṭisahassānaṃ balaṃ, purisagaṇanāya
atk-s0511a:527_5: dasannaṃ purisakoṭisahassānaṃ balaṃ hoti. Idaṃ tāva tathāgatassa pakatikāyabalaṃ,
atk-s0511a:527_6: ñāṇabalaṃ pana appameyyaṃ dasabalañāṇaṃ catuvesārajjañāṇaṃ aṭṭhasu parisāsu akampanañāṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:527_8: ñāṇabalaṃ. Idha pana kāyabalaṃ adhippetaṃ. Kāye, tuyhaṃ pākatikaṃ balanti tañca pana
atk-s0511a:527_9: tava kāye pākatikabalanti attho. Tasmā “dasanāgabala”nti dasachaddantanāgabalanti attho.
atk-s0511a:528_0: Idāni ñāṇabalaṃ dassento “iddhibalena asamo, dhammacakkappavattane”ti āha. Tattha
atk-s0511a:528_1: iddhibalena asamoti vikubbanādhiṭṭhānādinā iddhibalena asamo asadiso anupamo. Dhammacakkappavattaneti
atk-s0511a:529: Idāni “yo evamādiguṇasamannāgato satthā, so sabbalokekanāyako, taṃ satthāraṃ namassathā”ti tathāgatassa paṇāmane niyogadassanatthaṃ –
atk-s0511a:533_0: Tattha evanti vuttappakāranidassane nipāto. Sabbaguṇūpetanti ettha sabboti ayaṃ niravasesavācī.
atk-s0511a:533_1: Guṇoti ayaṃ guṇa-saddo anekesu atthesu dissati. Tathā hesa – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
atk-s0511a:533_2: ahatānaṃ vatthānaṃ diguṇaṃ saṅghāṭi”nti ettha paṭalatthe dissati. “Accenti kālā tarayanti
atk-s0511a:533_3: rattiyo, vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahantī”ti ettha rāsatthe. “Sataguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā”ti
atk-s0511a:533_4: ettha ānisaṃsatthe. “Antaṃ antaguṇaṃ” “kayirā mālāguṇe bahū”ti ettha bandhanatthe.
atk-s0511a:533_6: daṭṭhabbo. Tasmā sabbehi lokiyalokuttarehi guṇehi sabbasampattīhi upetaṃ samannāgatanti
atk-s0511a:533_7: attho. Sabbaṅgasamupāgatanti sabbehi buddhaguṇehi guṇaṅgehi vā samupāgataṃ samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0511a:533_8: Mahāmuninti aññehi paccekabuddhādīhi munīhi adhikabhāvato mahanto munīti vuccati
atk-s0511a:533_9: mahāmuni. Kāruṇikanti karuṇāguṇayogato kāruṇikaṃ. Lokanāthanti sabbalokekanāthaṃ,
atk-s0511a:533_10: sabbalokehi “ayaṃ no dukkhopatāpassa āhantā sametā”ti evamāsīsīyatīti attho.
atk-s0511a:539: “Ye keci loke vandaneyyā, vandanaṃ arahanti ye;
atk-s0511a:540: Sabbaseṭṭho mahāvīra, sadiso te na vijjatī”ti. – vuttaṃ;
atk-s0511a:541_0: Tattha abhivādananti aññehi attano abhivādanakārāpanaṃ. Thomananti parammukhato thuti.
atk-s0511a:541_1: Vandananti paṇāmanaṃ. Pasaṃsananti sammukhato pasaṃsanaṃ. Namassananti añjalikaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0511a:541_2: manasā namassanaṃ vā. Pūjananti mālāgandhavilepanādīhi pūjanañca. Sabbanti sabbampi
atk-s0511a:541_3: taṃ vuttappakāraṃ sakkāravisesaṃ tuvaṃ arahasi yuttoti attho. Ye keci loke vandaneyyāti
atk-s0511a:541_4: ye keci loke vanditabbā vandanīyā vandanaṃ arahanti. Yeti ye pana loke vandanaṃ arahanti.
atk-s0511a:541_5: Idaṃ pana purimapadasseva vevacanaṃ. Sabbaseṭṭhoti sabbesaṃ tesaṃ seṭṭho uttamo,
atk-s0511a:541_6: tvaṃ mahāvīra sadiso te loke koci na vijjatīti attho.
atk-s0511a:542_0: Atha bhagavati yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā ratanacaṅkamaṃ māpetvā tatra caṅkamamāne
atk-s0511a:542_1: āyasmā sāriputto rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate pañcahi parivārabhikkhusatehi.
atk-s0511a:542_2: Atha thero bhagavantaṃ olokento addasa kapilapure ākāse ratanacaṅkame caṅkamamānaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:546_0: Tattha sāriputtoti rūpasāriyā nāma brāhmaṇiyā puttoti sāriputto. Mahāpaññoti mahatiyā
atk-s0511a:546_1: soḷasavidhāya paññāya samannāgatoti mahāpañño. Samādhijjhānakovidoti ettha samādhīti
atk-s0511a:546_2: cittaṃ samaṃ ādahati ārammaṇe ṭhapetīti samādhi. So tividho hoti savitakkasavicāro
atk-s0511a:546_3: avitakkavicāramatto avitakkaavicāro samādhīti. Jhānanti paṭhamajjhānaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ
atk-s0511a:546_4: tatiyajjhānaṃ catutthajjhānanti imehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi mettājhānādīnipi saṅgahitāneva
atk-s0511a:546_5: honti, jhānampi duvidhaṃ hoti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ ārammaṇūpanijjhānanti. Tattha aniccādilakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:546_7: pana ārammaṇūpanijjhānato paccanīkajhāpanato vā jhānanti vuccati. Samādhīsu ca jhānesu
atk-s0511a:546_8: ca kovidoti samādhijjhānakovido, samādhijjhānakusaloti attho. Gijjhakūṭeti evaṃnāmake
atk-s0511a:547_1: sabbaphāliphullaṃ sālarājaṃ viya sīlamūlaṃ samādhikkhandhaṃ paññāsākhaṃ abhiññāpupphaṃ
atk-s0511a:547_2: vimuttiphalaṃ dasabalasālarājaṃ olokesīti evaṃ olokapadena sambandho. Candaṃva gagane
atk-s0511a:547_5: munivararajanikaraṃ oloketīti attho. Yathāti nipātamattaṃ. Majjhanhikeva sūriyanti
atk-s0511a:547_6: majjhanhikasamaye siriyā paṭutarakiraṇamālinaṃ aṃsumālinamiva virocamānaṃ. Narāsabhanti naravasabhaṃ.
atk-s0511a:548_2: Dīparukkhaṃ vāti āropitadīpaṃ dīparukkhamiva. Taruṇasūriyaṃva uggatanti abhinavoditādiccamiva,
atk-s0511a:548_3: sommabhāvena jalantanti attho. Sūriyassa taruṇabhāvo pana udayaṃ paṭicca vuccati.
atk-s0511a:548_4: Na hi candassa viya hānivuddhiyo atthi. Byāmappabhānurañjitanti byāmappabhāya anurañjitaṃ.
atk-s0511a:548_5: Dhīraṃ passati lokanāyakanti sabbalokekadhīraṃ passati nāyakanti attho.
atk-s0511a:549_1: paramaruciracittakūṭe gijjhakūṭe pabbate ṭhatvāva dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi āgatehi
atk-s0511a:549_2: devabrahmagaṇehi parivutaṃ bhagavantaṃ anuttarāya buddhasiriyā anopamāya buddhalīḷāya
atk-s0511a:549_3: sabbaratanamaye caṅkame caṅkamamānaṃ disvā – “handāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0511a:549_4: buddhaguṇaparidīpanaṃ buddhavaṃsadesanaṃ yāceyya”nti cintetvā attanā saddhiṃ vasamānāni
atk-s0511a:553_0: Tattha pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānanti pañca bhikkhusatāni, upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a:553_1: Katakiccānanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyabhāvanāvasena
atk-s0511a:553_3: vigatamalānaṃ, khīṇāsavattā vā vimalānaṃ paramaparisuddhacittasantānānanti attho.
atk-s0511a:554: Idāni tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sannipāte gamane ca kāraṇaṃ dassanatthaṃ –
atk-s0511a:557: Amhepi tattha gantvāna, vandissāma mayaṃ jinaṃ.
atk-s0511a:560: Kaṅkhaṃ vinodayissāma, passitvā lokanāyaka”nti. – imā gāthāyo vuttā;
atk-s0511a:561_0: Tattha lokappasādanaṃ nāmāti lokassa pasādakaraṇato lokappasādanaṃ pāṭihīraṃ vuccati.
atk-s0511a:561_1: “Ullokappasādanaṃ nāmātipi pāṭho, tassa lokavivaraṇapāṭihāriyanti attho. Taṃ pana
atk-s0511a:561_2: uddhaṃ akaniṭṭhabhavanato heṭṭhā yāva avīci etthantare ekālokaṃ katvā etthantare
atk-s0511a:561_3: sabbesampi sattānaṃ aññamaññaṃ dassanakaraṇādhiṭṭhānanti vuccati. Nidassayīti dassesi.
atk-s0511a:561_4: Amhepīti mayampi. Tatthāti yattha bhagavā, tattha gantvānāti attho. Vandissāmāti
atk-s0511a:561_5: mayaṃ bhagavato pāde sirasā vandissāma. Ettha pana amhepi, mayanti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ
atk-s0511a:561_6: saddānaṃ purimassa gamanakiriyāya sambandho daṭṭhabbo, pacchimassa vandanakiriyāya.
atk-s0511a:562: Ethāti āgacchatha. Kaṅkhaṃ vinodayissāmāti etthāha – khīṇāsavānaṃ pana kaṅkhā nāma kācipi natthi, kasmā thero evamāhāti? Saccamevetaṃ, paṭhamamaggeneva samucchedaṃ gatā. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a:563: “Katame dhammā dassanena pahātabbāti? Cattāro diṭṭhigatasampayuttacittuppādā vicikicchāsahagato cittuppādo apāyagamanīyo lobho doso moho māno tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā”ti.
atk-s0511a:564_0: Na panesā vicikicchāsaṅkhātā kaṅkhāti, kintu paññattiajānanaṃ nāma. Thero pana bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0511a:564_1: buddhavaṃsaṃ pucchitukāmo, so pana buddhānaṃyeva visayo, na paccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ,
atk-s0511a:564_2: tasmā thero avisayattā evamāhāti veditabbaṃ. Vinodayissāmāti vinodessāma.
atk-s0511a:565_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū therassa vacanaṃ sutvā attano attano pattacīvaramādāya suvammitā
atk-s0511a:565_1: viya mahānāgā pabhinnakilesā chinnabandhanā appicchā santuṭṭhā pavivittā asaṃsaṭṭhā
atk-s0511a:569_1: Tathā hesa – “sādhu me, bhante bhagavā, saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu āyācane
atk-s0511a:569_2: dissati. “Sādhu, bhanteti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā”tiādīsu
atk-s0511a:572_0: Ādīsu sundare. Idha sampaṭicchane. Tasmā sādhu suṭṭhūti therassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvāti
atk-s0511a:572_1: attho. Nipakāti paṇḍitā paññavantā. Saṃvutindriyāti indriyesu guttadvārā, indriyasaṃvarasamannāgatāti
atk-s0511a:572_2: attho. Taramānāti turitā. Upāgamunti theraṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:573_0: 50-1. Idāni dhammasenāpatissa pavattiṃ dassentehi saṅgītikārakehi “khīṇāsavehi vimalehī”tiādigāthāyo
atk-s0511a:573_1: vuttā tattha dantehīti kāyena ca cittena ca dantehi. Uttame dameti arahatte, nimittatthe
atk-s0511a:573_2: bhummaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tehi bhikkhūhīti pañcahi bhikkhusatehi. Mahāgaṇīti sīlādīhi ca
atk-s0511a:573_3: saṅkhyāvasena ca mahanto gaṇo assa atthīti mahāgaṇī, nānāpadavasena vā sīlādīhi guṇehi
atk-s0511a:573_4: mahanto gaṇoti mahāgaṇo, mahāgaṇo assa atthīti mahāgaṇī. Laḷanto devova gaganeti
atk-s0511a:573_5: iddhivilāsena vilāsento devo viya gaganatale bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamīti attho.
atk-s0511a:574_1: khipita”ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ukkāsitañcāti ukkāsitasaddañca. Khipitanti khipitasaddañca.
atk-s0511a:574_2: Ajjhupekkhiyāti upekkhitvā, taṃ ubhayaṃ akatvāti adhippāyo. Subbatāti suvimaladhutaguṇā.
atk-s0511a:575_0: 53. Sayambhunti sayameva aññāpadesaṃ vinā pāramiyo pūretvā adhigatabuddhabhāvanti
atk-s0511a:575_1: attho. Accuggatanti abhinavoditaṃ. Candaṃ vāti candaṃ viya, nabhe jalantaṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0511a:575_2: gagane candaṃ viya passantīti evaṃ padasambandho daṭṭhabbo. Idhāpi yathā-saddo nipātamattova.
atk-s0511a:576_0: 54. Vijjuṃ vāti vijjughanaṃ viya. Yadi ciraṭṭhitikā acirappabhā assa tādisanti attho.
atk-s0511a:576_1: Gagane yathāti ākāse yathā, idhāpi yathā-saddo nipātamattova. Ito parampi īdisesu
atk-s0511a:577_0: 55. Rahadamiva vippasannanti atigambhīravitthataṃ mahārahadaṃ viya anāvilaṃ vippasannaṃ
atk-s0511a:577_1: salilaṃ. Suphullaṃ padumaṃ yathāti suvikasitapadumavanaṃ rahadamivāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a:577_2: “Suphullaṃ kamalaṃ yathā”tipi pāṭho, tassa kamanīyabhāvena suphullaṃ kamalavanamivāti attho.
atk-s0511a:578_0: 56. Atha te bhikkhū dhammasenāpatippamukhā añjaliṃ sirasi katvā dasabalassa cakkālaṅkatatalesu
atk-s0511a:578_1: pādesu nipatiṃsūti attho. Tena vuttaṃ – “añjaliṃ paggahetvāna, tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā pamoditā”tiādi.
atk-s0511a:578_2: Tattha nipatantīti nipatiṃsu, vandiṃsūti attho. Cakkalakkhaṇeti cakkaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:578_3: yasmiṃ pāde so pādo cakkalakkhaṇo, tasmiṃ cakkalakkhaṇe. Jātivasena “pāde”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0511a:579_0: 57. Idāni tesaṃ kesañci therānaṃ nāmaṃ dassentehi “sāriputto mahāpañño, koraṇḍasamasādiso”tiādi
atk-s0511a:579_1: gāthāyo vuttā. Tattha koraṇḍasamasādisoti koraṇḍakusumasadisavaṇṇo, yadi evaṃ “koraṇḍasamo”ti
atk-s0511a:579_2: vā, “koraṇḍasadiso”ti vā vattabbaṃ, kiṃ dvikkhattuṃ “samasādiso”ti vuttanti ce? Nāyaṃ
atk-s0511a:579_3: doso, tādiso koraṇḍasamattā koraṇḍasadisabhāveneva koraṇḍasamasādiso. Na panādhikavacanavasenāti
atk-s0511a:579_4: adhippāyo. Samādhijjhānakusaloti ettha ayaṃ kusala-saddo tāva arogyānavajjachekasukhavipākādīsu
atk-s0511a:579_5: dissati. Ayañhi “kacci nu bhoto kusalaṃ, kacci bhoto anāmaya”ntiādīsu ārogye dissati.
atk-s0511a:579_6: “Katamo pana, bhante, kāyasamācāro kusalo? Yo kho, mahārāja, kāyasamācāro anavajjo”ti
atk-s0511a:579_7: evamādīsu anavajje. “Kusalo tvaṃ rathassa aṅgapaccaṅgāna”ntiādīsu cheke. “Kusalassa
atk-s0511a:579_8: kammassa katattā upacitattā”tiādīsu sukhavipāke. Idha pana cheke daṭṭhabbo. Vandateti vandittha.
atk-s0511a:580_0: 58. Gajjitāti gajjantīti gajjitā. Kālamegho vāti nīlasaliladharo viya gajjitā iddhivisayeti
atk-s0511a:580_2: attho veditabbo. Moggallānoti evaṃ gottavasena laddhanāmo kolito.
atk-s0511a:581_1: there upādāya ayaṃ mahā, tasmā “mahākassapo”ti vutto. Pi cāti sambhāvanasampiṇḍanattho.
atk-s0511a:581_3: dhammo dhuto nāma, dhutaguṇo nāma dhutadhammo. Katamo pana dhutadhammo nāma? Appicchatā,
atk-s0511a:581_4: santuṭṭhitā, sallekhatā, pavivekatā, idamaṭṭhikatāti ime dhutaṅgacetanāya parivārabhūtā
atk-s0511a:581_5: pañca dhammā “appicchaṃyeva nissāyā”tiādivacanato dhutadhammā nāma. Atha vā kilese
atk-s0511a:581_6: dhunanato ñāṇaṃ dhutaṃ nāma, tasmiṃ dhutaguṇe. Agganikkhittoti aggo seṭṭho koṭibhūtoti
atk-s0511a:581_7: ṭhapito. “Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākassapo”ti
atk-s0511a:581_8: ṭhānantare ṭhapitoti attho. Ayaṃ pana agga-saddo ādikoṭikoṭṭhāsaseṭṭhādīsu dissati.
atk-s0511a:581_9: Tathā hesa – “ajjatagge, samma dovārika, āvarāmi dāraṃ nigaṇṭhānaṃ nigaṇṭhīna”ntiādīsu
atk-s0511a:581_10: ādimhi dissati. “Teneva aṅgulaggena taṃ aṅgulaggaṃ parāmaseyya”, “ucchaggaṃ veḷagga”ntiādīsu
atk-s0511a:581_11: koṭiyaṃ. “Ambilaggaṃ vā madhuraggaṃ vā” “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vihāraggena vā pariveṇaggena
atk-s0511a:581_12: vā bhājetu”ntiādīsu koṭṭhāse. “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā…pe… tathāgato
atk-s0511a:581_13: tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”tiādīsu seṭṭhe. Svāyamidha seṭṭhe daṭṭhabbo. Koṭiyampi vattati.
atk-s0511a:581_14: Thero attano ṭhāne seṭṭho ceva koṭibhūto ca. Tena vuttaṃ – “agganikkhitto”ti, aggo
atk-s0511a:581_15: seṭṭho koṭibhūtoti attho. Thomitoti pasaṃsito devamanussādīhi. Satthu vaṇṇitoti satthārā
atk-s0511a:581_16: vaṇṇito thuto, “kassapo, bhikkhave, candūpamo kulāni upasaṅkamati apakasseva kāyaṃ
atk-s0511a:581_17: apakassa cittaṃ niccanavako kulesu appagabbho”ti evamādīhi anekehi suttanayehi vaṇṇito
atk-s0511a:582_0: 60. Dibbacakkhūnanti dibbaṃ cakkhu yesaṃ atthi te dibbacakkhū, tesaṃ dibbacakkhūnaṃ
atk-s0511a:582_1: bhikkhūnaṃ aggo seṭṭhoti attho. Yathāha – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0511a:582_2: dibbacakkhukānaṃ yadidaṃ anuruddho”ti. Anuruddhatthero bhagavato cūḷapituno amitodanassa
atk-s0511a:582_3: nāma sakkassa putto mahānāmassa kaniṭṭhabhātā mahāpuñño paramasukhumālo, so attasattamo
atk-s0511a:582_4: nikkhamitvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito, tassa pabbajjānukkamo saṅghabhedakakkhandhake
atk-s0511a:583_0: 61. Āpattianāpattiyāti āpattiyañca anāpattiyañca kovido. Satekicchāyāti sappaṭikammāyapi
atk-s0511a:583_1: appaṭikammāyapi cāti attho. Tattha sappaṭikammā sā chabbidhā hoti, appaṭikammā sā
atk-s0511a:583_2: pārājikāpatti. “Āpattianāpattiyā, satekicchāya kovido”tipi pāṭho, soyeva attho. Vinayeti
atk-s0511a:583_3: vinayapiṭake. Agganikkhittoti “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ
atk-s0511a:583_4: yadidaṃ, upālī”ti etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapitoti attho. Upālīti upālitthero. Satthu vaṇṇitoti
atk-s0511a:583_5: satthārā vaṇṇito pasattho. Thero kira tathāgatasseva santike vinayapiṭakaṃ uggaṇhitvā
atk-s0511a:583_6: bhārukacchakavatthuṃ, ajjukavatthuṃ, kumārakassapavatthunti imāni tīṇi vatthūni sabbaññutaññāṇena
atk-s0511a:583_7: saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā kathesi. Tasmā thero vinayadharānaṃ aggoti evamādinā nayena satthārā vaṇṇitoti vutto.
atk-s0511a:584_1: attho. Kathikānaṃ pavaroti dhammakathikānaṃ seṭṭho. “Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ
atk-s0511a:584_2: bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ puṇṇo mantāṇiputto”ti etadaggapāḷiyaṃ āropito.
atk-s0511a:584_3: Tena vuttaṃ “kathikānaṃ pavaro”ti. Gaṇīti sasaṅgho. Therassa kira santike pabbajitā
atk-s0511a:584_4: kulaputtā pañcasatā ahesuṃ. Sabbepi te dasabalassa jātabhūmikā jātaraṭṭhavāsino sabbeva
atk-s0511a:584_5: khīṇāsavā sabbeva dasakathāvatthulābhino. Tena vuttaṃ “gaṇī”ti. Isīti esati gavesati
atk-s0511a:584_6: kusale dhammeti isi. Mantāṇiyā puttoti mantāṇiyā nāma brāhmaṇiyā putto. Puṇṇoti tassa
atk-s0511a:584_7: nāmaṃ. Vissutoti attano appicchatādīhi guṇehi vissuto.
atk-s0511a:585_0: Aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero pana satthari abhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke anupubbena
atk-s0511a:585_1: āgantvā rājagahaṃ upanissāya viharante kapilavatthuṃ āgantvā attano bhāgineyyaṃ puṇṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:585_2: nāma māṇavaṃ pabbājetvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā āpucchitvā nivāsatthāya sayaṃ chaddantadahaṃ
atk-s0511a:585_3: gato. Puṇṇo pana bhagavantaṃ dassanāya therena saddhiṃ āgantvā – “mayhaṃ pabbajitakiccaṃ
atk-s0511a:585_4: matthakaṃ pāpetvāva dasabalassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti kapilapureyeva ohīno, so yonisomanasikāraṃ
atk-s0511a:585_5: karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkami. Ettha pana anuruddhatthero
atk-s0511a:585_6: ca upālitthero ca ime dve therā bhagavato kapilavatthupuraṃ pavisitvā ñātisamāgamadivase
atk-s0511a:585_7: pabbajitā viya dassitā, taṃ pana khandhakapāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca na sameti. Vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a:586: Atha satthā sāriputtattherādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ cittācāramaññāya attano guṇe kathetumārabhi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:590: Tattha opammakusaloti upamāya kusalo. Kaṅkhacchedoti sabbasattānaṃ saṃsayacchedako.
atk-s0511a:591: Idāni te attano guṇe kathesi, te dassetuṃ –
atk-s0511a:593: “Cattāro te asaṅkhyeyyā, koṭi yesaṃ na nāyati;
atk-s0511a:595: Buddhañāṇaṃ appameyyaṃ, na sakkā ete vijānitu”nti. – vuttaṃ;
atk-s0511a:596_0: Tattha cattāroti gaṇanaparicchedo. Eteti idāni vattabbe atthe nidasseti. Asaṅkhyeyyāti
atk-s0511a:596_1: saṅkhyātumasakkuṇeyyattā asaṅkhyeyyā, gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattāti attho. Koṭītiādi vā
atk-s0511a:596_2: anto vā mariyādā. Yesanti yesaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ. Na nāyatīti na paññāyati.
atk-s0511a:596_3: Idāni te vuttappakāre cattāro asaṅkhyeyye dassetuṃ “sattakāyo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sattakāyoti
atk-s0511a:596_4: sattasamūho, sattakāyo ananto aparimāṇo appameyyo. Tathā ākāso ākāsassāpi anto natthi.
atk-s0511a:596_5: Tathā cakkavāḷāni anantāni eva. Buddhañāṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ appameyyaṃ. Na sakkā
atk-s0511a:596_6: ete vijānitunti yasmā panete anantā, tasmā na sakkā vijānituṃ.
atk-s0511a:597_0: 65. Idāni satthā attano iddhivikubbane sañjātacchariyabbhutānaṃ devamanussādīnaṃ
atk-s0511a:597_1: kinnāmetaṃ acchariyaṃ, itopi visiṭṭhataraṃ acchariyaṃ abbhutaṃ atthi, mama taṃ suṇāthāti
atk-s0511a:599: Aññe bahū acchariyā, abbhutā lomahaṃsanā”ti. – ādimāha;
atk-s0511a:600_0: Tattha kinti paṭikkhepavacanaṃ.Etanti idaṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ sandhāyāha. Yanti ayaṃ
atk-s0511a:600_1: yaṃ-saddo “yaṃ taṃ apucchimha akittayī no, aññaṃ taṃ pucchāma tadiṅgha brūhī”tiādīsu
atk-s0511a:600_2: upayogavacane dissati. “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso; yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā
atk-s0511a:600_3: dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā”ti ettha kāraṇavacane. “Yaṃ vipassī bhagavā kappe udapādī”ti
atk-s0511a:600_4: ettha bhumme. “Yaṃ kho me, bhante, devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ sammukhā sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ,
atk-s0511a:600_5: ārocemi taṃ bhagavato”tiādīsu paccattavacane. Idhāpi paccattavacane daṭṭhabbo. Aññe
atk-s0511a:600_6: bahū mama acchariyā abbhutavisesā santīti dīpeti.
atk-s0511a:604: Dasasahassī samāgamma, yācanti pañjalī mama”nti. – ādimāha;
atk-s0511a:605_0: Tattha yadāti yasmiṃ kāle. Ahanti attānaṃ niddisati. Tusite kāyeti tusitasaṅkhāte
atk-s0511a:605_1: devanikāye. Yadā panāhaṃ samattiṃsapāramiyo pūretvā pañcamahāpariccāge pariccajitvā
atk-s0511a:605_3: datvā sattakkhattuṃ pathaviṃ kampetvā vessantarattabhāvato cavitvā dutiye cittavāre
atk-s0511a:605_4: tusitabhavane nibbatto tadāpi santusito nāma devarājā ahosiṃ. Dasasahassī samāgammāti
atk-s0511a:605_5: dasasahassacakkavāḷesu devatā sannipatitvāti attho. Yācanti pañjalī mamanti maṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0511a:605_6: “mārisa, tayā dasa pāramiyo pūrentena na sakkasampattiṃ na māra na brahma na cakkavattisampattiṃ
atk-s0511a:605_7: patthentena pūritā, lokanittharaṇatthāya pana buddhattaṃ patthayamānena pūritā, so
atk-s0511a:605_8: tava kālo, mārisa, buddhattāya samayo, mārisa, buddhattāyā”ti yācanti mamanti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:609_0: Tattha kālo teti kālo tava, ayameva vā pāṭho. Uppajjāti paṭisandhiṃ gaṇha, “okkamā”tipi
atk-s0511a:609_1: pāṭho. Sadevakanti sadevakaṃ lokanti attho. Tārayantoti ettha pāramiyo pūrentopi
atk-s0511a:609_2: tārayati nāma, pāramiyo matthakaṃ pāpentopi tārayati nāma, vessantarattabhāvato cavitvā
atk-s0511a:609_4: tattha tiṭṭhantopi tārayati nāma, devatāhi yācito pañcavidhaṃ mahāvilokitaṃ viloketvā
atk-s0511a:609_5: mahāmāyādeviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantopi dasamāse gabbhavāsaṃ vasantopi tārayati
atk-s0511a:609_6: nāma, ekūnatiṃsa vassāni agāramajjhe tiṭṭhantopi tārayati nāma. Rāhulabhaddassa jātadivase
atk-s0511a:609_7: channasahāyo kaṇḍakaṃ āruyha nikkhamantopi tīṇi rajjāni atikkamitvā anomāya nāma
atk-s0511a:609_8: nadiyā tīre pabbajantopi tārayati nāma, chabbassāni padhānaṃ karontopi visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ
atk-s0511a:609_9: mahābodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā
atk-s0511a:609_10: majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā pacchimayāme dvādasaṅgaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomapaṭilomato
atk-s0511a:609_11: sammasitvā sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭivijjhantopi tārayati nāma, sotāpattiphalakkhaṇepi,
atk-s0511a:609_13: arahattamaggakkhaṇepi, arahattaphalakkhaṇepi tārayati nāma, yadā aṭṭhārasadevatākoṭisahassehi
atk-s0511a:609_14: pañcavaggiyānaṃ amatapānaṃ adāsi, tato paṭṭhāya tārayi nāmāti vuccati. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:611_0: Atha mahāsatto devatāhi yāciyamānopi devatānaṃ paṭiññaṃ adatvāva kāladīpadesakulajanettiāyuparicchedavasena
atk-s0511a:611_1: pañcavidhaṃ mahāvilokanaṃ nāma vilokesi. Tattha “kālo nu kho, na kālo”ti paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0511a:611_2: kālaṃ vilokesi. Tattha vassasatasahassato uddhaṃ āyukālo kālo nāma na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0511a:611_3: Jātijarāmaraṇādīnaṃ apākaṭattā, buddhānañca dhammadesanā nāma tilakkhaṇamuttā nāma
atk-s0511a:611_4: natthi, tesaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti kathentānaṃ “kinnāmete kathentī”ti na saddahanti,
atk-s0511a:611_5: tato abhisamayo na hoti, tasmiṃ asati aniyyānikaṃ sāsanaṃ hoti. Tasmā so akālo. Vassasatato
atk-s0511a:611_6: ūno āyukālopi kālo na hoti. Kasmā? Tadā sattā ussannakilesā honti, ussannakilesānañca
atk-s0511a:611_7: dinno ovādo ovādaṭṭhāne na tiṭṭhati, tasmā sopi akālo. Vassasatasahassato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0511a:611_8: heṭṭhā vassasatato paṭṭhāya uddhaṃ āyukālo kālo nāma. Idāni vassasatāyukā manussāti
atk-s0511a:612_0: Tato dīpaṃ olokento “jambudīpeyeva buddhā nibbattantī”ti dīpaṃ passi. Tato jambudīpo
atk-s0511a:612_1: nāma mahā dasayojanasahassaparimāṇo, katarasmiṃ nu kho padese buddhā nibbattantī”ti
atk-s0511a:612_2: desaṃ vilokento majjhimadesaṃ passi. Tato kulaṃ vilokento “buddhā nāma lokasammate
atk-s0511a:612_3: kule nibbattanti, idāni khattiyakulaṃ lokasammataṃ, tattha nibbattissāmi, suddhodano
atk-s0511a:612_4: nāma me rājā pitā bhavissatī”ti kulaṃ addasa. Tato mātaraṃ vilokento “buddhamātā
atk-s0511a:612_5: nāma lolā surādhuttā na hoti, akhaṇḍapañcasīlāti ayañca mahāmāyā nāma devī edisā,
atk-s0511a:612_6: ayaṃ me mātā bhavissatīti kittakaṃ assā āyū”ti āvajjento dasannaṃ māsānaṃ upari sattadivasāni
atk-s0511a:612_7: passi. Iti imaṃ pañcavidhavilokanaṃ viloketvā – “kālo me, mārisa, buddhabhāvāyā”ti
atk-s0511a:612_8: devatānaṃ paṭiññaṃ datvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cavitvā sakyarājakule māyādeviyā
atk-s0511a:616_0: Tattha okkamīti okkamiṃ pāvisiṃ. Kucchiyanti mātukucchimhi. Dasasahassīlokadhātu,
atk-s0511a:616_1: kampitthāti sato sampajāno pana bodhisatto mātukucchiṃ okkamanto ekūnavīsatiyā paṭisandhicittesu
atk-s0511a:616_4: Tadā dasasahassīlokadhātu sakalāpi kampi saṅkampi sampakampīti attho. Dharaṇīti dhāreti
atk-s0511a:617_0: 69. Sampajānova nikkhaminti ettha yadā panāhaṃ sato sampajānova mātukucchito dhammāsanato
atk-s0511a:617_1: otaranto dhammakathiko viya nisseṇito otaranto puriso viya ca dve hatthe ca pāde
atk-s0511a:617_2: ca pasāretvā ṭhitakova mātukucchisambhavena kenaci asucinā amakkhitova nikkhamiṃ.
atk-s0511a:617_3: Sādhukāraṃ pavattentīti sādhukāraṃ pavattayanti, sādhukāraṃ dentīti attho. Pakampitthāti
atk-s0511a:617_4: kampittha, okkamanepi mātukucchito nikkhamanepi dasasahassī pakampitthāti attho.
atk-s0511a:618_0: 70. Atha bhagavā gabbhokkantiādīsu attanā samasamaṃ adisvā gabbhokkantiādīsu attano
atk-s0511a:618_1: acchariyadassanatthaṃ “okkanti me samo natthī”ti imaṃ gāthamāha. Tattha okkantīti
atk-s0511a:618_2: gabbhokkantiyaṃ, bhummatthe paccattavacanaṃ, paṭisandhiggahaṇeti attho. Meti mayā.
atk-s0511a:618_3: Samoti sadiso natthi. Jātitoti ettha jāyati etāya mātuyāti mātā “jātī”ti vuccati,
atk-s0511a:618_4: tato jātito mātuyāti attho. Abhinikkhameti mātukucchito abhinikkhamane pasave satīti
atk-s0511a:618_5: attho. Sambodhiyanti ettha pasatthā sundarā bodhi sambodhi. Ayaṃ pana bodhi-saddo
atk-s0511a:618_7: ca, “antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhi”nti ca āgataṭṭhāne hi rukkho bodhīti vuccati.
atk-s0511a:618_8: “Bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”nti āgataṭṭhāne maggo. “Patvāna bodhiṃ amataṃ
atk-s0511a:618_9: asaṅkhata”nti āgataṭṭhāne nibbānaṃ. “Pappoti bodhiṃ varabhūrimedhaso”ti āgataṭṭhāne
atk-s0511a:618_10: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. Idha pana bhagavato arahattamaggañāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ. Apare “sabbaññutaññāṇa”ntipi
atk-s0511a:618_11: vadanti, tassaṃ sambodhiyaṃ ahaṃ seṭṭhoti attho.
atk-s0511a:619_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā sambodhiṃ paṭicca attānaṃ pasaṃsatīti? Sabbaguṇadāyakattā. Bhagavato
atk-s0511a:619_1: hi sambodhi sabbaguṇadāyikā sabbepi niravasese buddhaguṇe dadāti, na pana aññesaṃ.
atk-s0511a:619_2: Aññesaṃ pana kassaci arahattamaggo arahattaphalameva deti, kassaci tisso vijjā, kassaci
atk-s0511a:619_3: cha abhiññā, kassaci catasso paṭisambhidā, kassaci sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ, paccekabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0511a:619_4: paccekabodhiñāṇameva deti. Buddhānaṃ pana sabbaguṇasampattiṃ deti. Tasmā bhagavā
atk-s0511a:619_5: sabbaguṇadāyakattā “sambodhiyaṃ ahaṃ seṭṭho”ti attānaṃ pasaṃsati. Api ca bhūmiṃ cāletvā
atk-s0511a:619_6: sambodhiṃ pāpuṇi, tasmā “sambodhiyaṃ ahaṃ seṭṭho”ti vadati. Dhammacakkappavattaneti
atk-s0511a:619_7: ettha dhammacakkaṃ pana duvidhaṃ hoti – paṭivedhañāṇañca desanāñāṇañcāti. Tattha
atk-s0511a:619_8: paññāpabhāvitaṃ attano ariyaphalāvahaṃ paṭivedhañāṇaṃ, karuṇāpabhāvitaṃ sāvakānaṃ
atk-s0511a:619_9: ariyaphalāvahaṃ desanāñāṇaṃ. Paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ kusalaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ avitakkaavicāraṃ,
atk-s0511a:619_10: desanāñāṇaṃ lokiyaṃ abyākataṃ, ubhayampi panetaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ. Idha pana desanāñāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0511a:620_0: 71. Idāni bhagavato gabbhokkamaneva pathavikampanādikaṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “aho acchariyaṃ
atk-s0511a:620_1: loke”ti devatāhi ayaṃ gāthā vuttā. Tattha buddhānaṃ guṇamahantatāti aho buddhānaṃ
atk-s0511a:620_2: guṇamahantabhāvo, aho buddhānaṃ mahānubhāvoti attho dasasahassīlokadhātu, chappakāraṃ
atk-s0511a:620_3: pakampathāti dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu mahāpathavī chappakāraṃ pakampittha calittha.
atk-s0511a:620_4: Kathaṃ? Puratthimato unnamati pacchimato onamati, pacchimato unnamati puratthimato
atk-s0511a:620_5: onamati, uttarato unnamati dakkhiṇato onamati, dakkhiṇato unnamati uttarato onamati,
atk-s0511a:620_6: majjhimato unnamati pariyantato onamati, pariyantato unnamati majjhimato onamatīti
atk-s0511a:620_8: pathavisandhārakajalapariyantā acetanāpi samānā sacetanā viya ayaṃ mahāpathavī pītiyā
atk-s0511a:620_9: naccantī viya akampitthāti attho. Obhāso ca mahā āsīti atikkammeva devānaṃ devānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0511a:620_10: uḷāro obhāso ahosīti attho. Accheraṃ lomahaṃsananti accherañca lomahaṃsanañca ahosīti attho.
atk-s0511a:621_0: 72. Idāni pathavikampanālokapātubhāvādīsu acchariyesu vattamānesu bhagavato pavattidassanatthaṃ
atk-s0511a:621_1: “bhagavā tamhi samaye”tiādigāthāyo vuttā. Tattha lokajeṭṭhoti lokaseṭṭho. Sadevakanti
atk-s0511a:621_2: sadevakassa lokassa, sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dassayantoti pāṭihāriyaṃ dassento.
atk-s0511a:622_0: 73. Caṅkamantovāti dasalokadhātusahassāni ajjhottharitvā ṭhite tasmiṃ ratanamaye
atk-s0511a:622_1: caṅkame caṅkamamānova kathesi. Lokanāyakoti atha satthā manosilātale sīhanādaṃ nadanto
atk-s0511a:622_2: sīho viya gajjanto pāvussakamegho viya ca ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya ca aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena
atk-s0511a:622_3: savanīyena kamanīyena brahmassarena nānānayavicittaṃ catusaccapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ
atk-s0511a:623_0: Antarā na nivatteti, catuhatthe caṅkame yathāti ettha satthārā pana nimmitassa tassa
atk-s0511a:623_1: caṅkamassa ekā koṭi pācīnacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ ekā pacchimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ
atk-s0511a:623_2: evaṃ ṭhite tasmiṃ ratanacaṅkame caṅkamamāno satthā ubho koṭiyo patvāva nivattati,
atk-s0511a:623_3: antarā ubho koṭiyo apatvā na nivattati. Yathā catuhatthappamāṇe caṅkame caṅkamamāno
atk-s0511a:623_4: ubho koṭiyo sīghameva patvā nivattati, evaṃ antarā na nivattatīti attho. Kiṃ pana
atk-s0511a:623_5: bhagavā dasasahassayojanappamāṇāyāmaṃ caṅkamaṃ rassamakāsi, tāvamahantaṃ vā attabhāvaṃ
atk-s0511a:623_6: nimminīti? Na panevamakāsi. Acinteyyo buddhānaṃ buddhānubhāvo. Akaniṭṭhabhavanato
atk-s0511a:623_7: paṭṭhāya yāva avīci, tāva ekaṅgaṇā ahosi. Tiriyato ca dasacakkavāḷasahassāni ekaṅgaṇāni
atk-s0511a:623_8: ahesuṃ. Devā manusse passanti, manussāpi deve passanti. Yathā sabbe devamanussā pakatiyā
atk-s0511a:623_9: caṅkamamānaṃ passanti, evaṃ bhagavantaṃ caṅkamamānaṃ passiṃsūti. Bhagavā pana caṅkamantova
atk-s0511a:624_1: asītānubyañjanavirājitaṃ varasarīraṃ saradasamaye paripuṇṇaṃ viya rajanikaraṃ sabbaphāliphullaṃ
atk-s0511a:624_2: viya ca yojanasatubbedhaṃ pāricchattakaṃ aṭṭhārasaratanubbedhaṃ byāmappabhāparikkhepasassirikaṃ
atk-s0511a:624_3: varakanakagirimiva jaṅgamaṃ anopamāya buddhalīḷāya anopamena buddhasirivilāsena caṅkamantaṃ
atk-s0511a:624_4: dasasahassidevagaṇaparivutaṃ bhagavantaṃ addasa. Disvāna ayaṃ pana sakalāpi dasasahassī
atk-s0511a:624_5: lokadhātu sannipatitā, mahatiyā panettha dhammadesanāya bhavitabbaṃ, buddhavaṃsadesanā
atk-s0511a:624_6: pana bahūpakārā bhagavati pasādāvahā, yaṃnūnāhaṃ dasabalassa abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0511a:624_7: buddhavaṃsaṃ paripuccheyya”nti cintetvā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0511a:624_8: dasanakhasamujjalaṃ jalajāmalāvikala-kamala-makulasadisaṃ añjaliṃ sirasi katvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0511a:630: Kamhi kāle tayā dhīra, patthitā bodhimuttamā”ti. –
atk-s0511a:631_0: Ādi. Kā nāmāyaṃ anusandhīti? Pucchānusandhi nāma. Tisso hi anusandhiyo – pucchānusandhi
atk-s0511a:631_1: ajjhāsayānusandhi yathānusandhīti. Tattha “evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0511a:631_2: etadavoca – “kiṃ nu kho, bhante, orimaṃ tīraṃ kiṃ pārimaṃ tīra”nti evaṃ pucchantānaṃ
atk-s0511a:632_0: “Atha kho aññatarassa bhikkhuno evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi ‘iti kira, bho, rūpaṃ
atk-s0511a:632_1: anattā, vedanā anattā, saññā anattā, saṅkhārā anattā, viññāṇaṃ anattā, anattakatāni
atk-s0511a:632_2: kammāni kamattānaṃ phusissantī’ti. Atha kho bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya
atk-s0511a:632_3: bhikkhū āmantesi – ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati, yaṃ idhekacco moghapuriso
atk-s0511a:632_4: avidvā avijjāgato taṇhādhipateyyena cetasā satthusāsanaṃ atidhāvitabbaṃ maññeyya
atk-s0511a:632_5: ‘iti kira, bho, rūpaṃ anattā, vedanā anattā, saññā anattā, saṅkhārā anattā, viññāṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:632_6: anattā, anattakatāni kammāni kamattānaṃ phusissantī’ti…pe… taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0511a:632_7: rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā bhagavatā vuttavasena
atk-s0511a:633_0: Yena pana dhammena ādimhi desanā uṭṭhitā, tassa dhammassa anurūpadhammavasena vā
atk-s0511a:633_1: paṭikkhepavasena vā yesu suttesu uparidesanā āgacchati, tesaṃ vasena yathānusandhi
atk-s0511a:634_0: Tattha paññāya pāramippattoti sāvakapāramiñāṇassa matthakaṃ patto. Pucchatīti apucchi.
atk-s0511a:634_1: Tattha pucchā nāma adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā, diṭṭhasaṃsandanāpucchā, vimaticchedanāpucchā,
atk-s0511a:634_2: anumatipucchā, kathetukamyatāpucchāti pañcavidhā hoti. Tatthāyaṃ therassa katamā
atk-s0511a:634_6: visayo, tasmā therassa adiṭṭhajotanā pucchāti veditabbā.
atk-s0511a:635_0: Kīdisoti pucchanākāro, kiṃpakāroti attho. Teti tava. Abhinīhāroti abhinīhāro nāma
atk-s0511a:635_1: buddhabhāvatthaṃ mānasaṃ bandhitvā “buddhabyākaraṇaṃ aladdhā na uṭṭhahissāmī”ti vīriyamadhiṭṭhāya
atk-s0511a:637_0: Kamhi kāleti tasmiṃ kāle. Patthitāti icchitā abhikaṅkhitā, “buddho bodheyyaṃ mutto
atk-s0511a:637_1: moceyya”ntiādinā nayena buddhabhāvāya paṇidhānaṃ kadā katanti apucchi. Bodhīti sammāsambodhi,
atk-s0511a:637_2: arahattamaggañāṇassa ca sabbaññutaññāṇassa cetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Uttamāti sāvakabodhipaccekabodhīhi
atk-s0511a:637_3: seṭṭhattā uttamāti vuttā. Ubhinnamantarā ma-kāro padasandhikaro.
atk-s0511a:644: Kathaṃ upapāramī puṇṇā, paramatthapāramī katha”nti. – āha;
atk-s0511a:645_0: Tattha dānapāramiyaṃ tāva bāhirabhaṇḍapariccāgo pāramī nāma, aṅgapariccāgo upapāramī
atk-s0511a:645_1: nāma, jīvitapariccāgo paramatthapāramī nāmāti. Esa nayo sesapāramīsupi. Evaṃ dasa
atk-s0511a:645_2: pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samattiṃsa pāramiyo honti. Tattha
atk-s0511a:645_3: bodhisattassa dānapāramitāya pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. Ekantena panassa sasapaṇḍitajātake –
atk-s0511a:647: Dānena me samo natthi, esā me dānapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0511a:648: Evaṃ paraṃ jīvitapariccāgaṃ karontassa dānapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a:649: Tathā sīlapāramitāya pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. Ekanteneva panassa saṅkhapālajātake –
atk-s0511a:651: Bhojaputte na kuppāmi, esā me sīlapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0511a:652: Evaṃ attapariccāgaṃ karontassa sīlapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a:653: Tathā mahārajjaṃ pahāya nekkhammapāramiyā pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. Ekantena panassa cūḷasutasomajātake –
atk-s0511a:655: Cajato na hoti lagganaṃ, esā me nekkhammapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0511a:656: Evaṃ nissaṅgatāya rajjaṃ chaḍḍetvā nikkhamantassa nekkhammapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a:657: Tathā mahosadhapaṇḍitakālādīsu paññāpāramiyā pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. Ekantena panassa sattubhattakapaṇḍitakāle –
atk-s0511a:659: Paññāya me samo natthi, esā me paññāpāramī”ti. –
atk-s0511a:660: Antobhastagataṃ sappaṃ dassentassa paññāpāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a:661: Tathā vīriyapāramitāya pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. Ekantena panassa mahājanakajātake –
atk-s0511a:663: Cittassa aññathā natthi, esā me vīriyapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0511a:664: Evaṃ mahāsamuddaṃ tarantassa vīriyapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a:667: Kāsirāje na kuppāmi, esā me khantipāramī”ti. –
atk-s0511a:668: Evaṃ acetanabhāvena viya mahādukkhaṃ adhivāsentassa khantipāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a:671: Mocesiṃ ekasataṃ khattiye, esā me saccapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0511a:672: Evaṃ jīvitaṃ cajitvā saccaṃ anurakkhantassa saccapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a:674: “Mātā pitā na me dessā, attā me na ca dessiyo;
atk-s0511a:675: Sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ, tasmā vataṃ adhiṭṭhahi”nti. –
atk-s0511a:676: Evaṃ jīvitampi pariccajitvā vataṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa adhiṭṭhānapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a:678: “Na maṃ koci uttasati, napi bhāyāmi kassaci;
atk-s0511a:680: Evaṃ jīvitampi anoloketvā mettāyantassa mettāpāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a:684_0: Evaṃ gāmadārakesu niṭṭhubhanādīhi ceva mālāgandhūpahārādīhi ca sukhadukkhaṃ uppādentesupi
atk-s0511a:684_1: upekkhaṃ anativattantassa upekkhāpāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā. Ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-s0511a:685: Idāni therena puṭṭhassa bhagavato byākaraṇaṃ dassentehi saṅgītikārakehi –
atk-s0511a:691: Pubbenivāsānugatāya buddhiyā, pakāsayī lokahitaṃ sadevake”ti. – vuttaṃ;
atk-s0511a:692_0: Tattha tassa puṭṭho viyākāsīti tena dhammasenāpatinā puṭṭho hutvā tassa byākāsi,
atk-s0511a:692_1: attano abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya abhisambodhipariyosānaṃ sabbaṃ buddhavaṃsaṃ kathesīti
atk-s0511a:692_2: attho. Karavīkamadhuragiroti karavīkasakuṇassa viya madhurā girā yassa so karavīkamadhuragiro,
atk-s0511a:692_3: karavīkamadhuramañjussaroti attho. Tatridaṃ karavīkānaṃ madhurassaratā – karavīkasakuṇā
atk-s0511a:692_4: kira madhurarasaṃ ambapakkaṃ mukhatuṇḍakena paharitvā paggharitaṃ phalarasaṃ pivitvā
atk-s0511a:692_5: pakkhena tāḷaṃ datvā vikūjamāne catuppadā madamattā viya laḷituṃ ārabhanti, gocarapasutāpi
atk-s0511a:692_6: catuppadagaṇā mukhagatānipi tiṇāni chaḍḍetvā taṃ nādaṃ suṇanti, vāḷamigā khuddakamige
atk-s0511a:692_7: anubandhamānā ukkhittaṃ pādaṃ anikkhipitvā cittakatā viya tiṭṭhanti, anubandhamigāpi
atk-s0511a:692_8: maraṇabhayaṃ hitvā tiṭṭhanti, ākāse pakkhandantā pakkhinopi pakkhe pasāretvā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0511a:692_9: udake macchāpi kaṇṇapaṭalaṃ acālentā taṃ saddaṃ suṇamānā tiṭṭhanti. Evaṃ madhurassarā
atk-s0511a:692_11: sītibhāvaṃ janayantoti attho. Hāsayantoti tosayanto. Sadevakanti sadevakaṃ lokaṃ.
atk-s0511a:693_0: Atītabuddhānanti atītānaṃ buddhānaṃ. Amhākaṃ bhagavato abhinīhārassa purato pana
atk-s0511a:693_1: taṇhaṅkaro medhaṅkaro saraṇaṅkaro dīpaṅkaroti cattāro buddhā ekasmiṃ kappe nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:693_2: Tesaṃ aparabhāge koṇḍaññādayo tevīsati buddhāti sabbe dīpaṅkarādayo catuvīsati buddhā
atk-s0511a:693_3: idha “atītabuddhā”ti adhippetā, tesaṃ atītabuddhānaṃ. Jinānanti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:693_4: Desitanti kathitaṃ. Catuvīsatiyā buddhānaṃ catusaccapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammakathaṃ. Nikīlitanti
atk-s0511a:693_6: nikīlitaṃ nāma. Buddhaparamparāgatanti dīpaṅkaradasabalato paṭṭhāya yāva kassapaparamparato
atk-s0511a:693_7: āgataṃ desitaṃ nikīlitaṃ vāti attho. Pubbenivāsānugatāya buddhiyāti ekampi jātiṃ
atk-s0511a:693_8: dvepi jātiyoti evaṃ vibhattaṃ pubbe nivuṭṭhakkhandhasantānasaṅkhātaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ
atk-s0511a:693_9: anugatā upagatā tāya pubbenivāsānugatāya buddhiyā, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇenāti attho.
atk-s0511a:693_10: Pakāsayīti byākāsi. Lokahitanti sabbalokahitaṃ buddhavaṃsaṃ. Sadevaketi sadevake loketi attho.
atk-s0511a:694_0: 80. Atha bhagavā karuṇāsītalena hadayena sadevakaṃ lokaṃ savane niyojento “pītipāmojjajanana”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0511a:694_1: Tattha pītipāmojjajanananti pītipāmojjakaraṃ pītiyā pubbabhāgaṃ pāmojjaṃ, pañcavaṇṇāya
atk-s0511a:694_2: pītiyā janananti attho. Sokasallavinodananti sokasaṅkhātānaṃ sallānaṃ vinodanaṃ viddhaṃsanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:694_5: attho. Cittīkatvāti citte katvā, buddhānussatiṃ purakkhatvāti attho. Suṇāthāti nisāmetha
atk-s0511a:695_0: 81. Madanimmadananti jātimadādīnaṃ sabbamadānaṃ nimmadanakaraṃ. Sokanudanti soko
atk-s0511a:695_1: nāma ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa cittasantāpo. Kiñcāpi atthato domanassameva hoti,
atk-s0511a:695_2: evaṃ santepi antonijjhānalakkhaṇo, cetaso parinijjhāyanaraso, anusocanapaccupaṭṭhāno,
atk-s0511a:695_3: taṃ sokaṃ nudatīti sokanudo, taṃ sokanudaṃ. Saṃsāraparimocananti saṃsārabandhanato
atk-s0511a:696_1: dissati. Ayañhi “dukkhassa ca pahānā”tiādīsu dukkhavedanāyaṃ dissati. “Jātipi dukkhā
atk-s0511a:696_2: jarāpi dukkhā”tiādīsu dukkhavatthusmiṃ. “Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, rūpaṃ dukkhaṃ dukkhānupatitaṃ
atk-s0511a:696_4: “Yāvañcidaṃ, bhikkhave, na sukarā akkhānena pāpuṇitaṃ yāva dukkhā nirayā”tiādīsu
atk-s0511a:696_5: dukkhaṭṭhāne. Idha panāyaṃ dukkhavatthusmiṃ dukkhapaccayepi ca daṭṭhabbo. Tasmā jātiādisabbadukkhakkhayakaranti
atk-s0511a:696_6: attho. Magganti ettha kusalatthikehi maggīyati, kilese vā mārento gacchatīti maggoti
atk-s0511a:696_7: buddhavaṃsadesanā vuccati, taṃ nibbānassa maggabhūtaṃ buddhavaṃsadesanaṃ. Sakkaccanti
atk-s0511a:696_8: sakkaccaṃ cittīkatvā, ohitasotā hutvāti attho. Paṭipajjathāti adhitiṭṭhatha, suṇāthāti
atk-s0511a:696_9: attho. Atha vā pītipāmojjajananaṃ sokasallavinodanaṃ sabbasampattipaṭilābhahetubhūtaṃ
atk-s0511a:696_10: imaṃ buddhavaṃsadesanaṃ sutvā idāni madanimmadanādiguṇavisesāvahaṃ sabbadukkhakkhayaṃ
atk-s0511a:696_11: buddhabhāvamaggaṃ paṭipajjathāti sabbesaṃ devamanussānaṃ buddhattaṃ paṇidhāya ussāhaṃ
atk-s0511a:705_0: Ādinayappavattāya buddhavaṃsavaṇṇanāya okāso anuppatto. Sā panesā buddhavaṃsavaṇṇanā
atk-s0511a:705_1: yasmā suttanikkhepaṃ vicāretvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hoti, tasmā suttanikkhepavicāraṇā
atk-s0511a:705_2: tāva veditabbā. Cattāro hi suttanikkhepā attajjhāsayo parajjhāsayo pucchāvasiko aṭṭhuppattikoti.
atk-s0511a:705_3: Tattha yāni suttāni bhagavā parehi anajjhiṭṭho kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayena kathesi.
atk-s0511a:705_4: Seyyathidaṃ – ākaṅkheyyasuttaṃ vatthasuttanti evamādīni, tesaṃ attajjhāsayo nikkhepo.
atk-s0511a:706_0: Yāni vā pana “paripakkā kho rāhulassa vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā, yaṃnūnāhaṃ rāhulaṃ
atk-s0511a:706_1: uttariṃ āsavānaṃ khaye vineyya”nti evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ khantiṃ manaṃ bujjhanakabhāvañca
atk-s0511a:706_2: oloketvā parajjhāsayavasena kathitāni. Seyyathidaṃ – rāhulovādasuttaṃ dhammacakkappavattanasuttanti
atk-s0511a:707: Bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā te te devamanussā pañhaṃ pucchanti. Evaṃ puṭṭhena pana bhagavatā yāni kathitāni devatāsaṃyutta bojjhaṅgasaṃyuttādīni tesaṃ pucchāvasiko nikkhepo.
atk-s0511a:708_0: Yāni vā pana uppannaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca desitāni dhammadāyāda- puttamaṃsūpamādīni,
atk-s0511a:708_1: tesaṃ aṭṭhuppattiko nikkhepo. Evametesu catūsu suttanikkhepesu imassa buddhavaṃsassa
atk-s0511a:708_2: pucchāvasiko nikkhepo. Pucchāvasena hi bhagavatā ayaṃ nikkhitto. Kassa pucchāvasena?
atk-s0511a:708_3: Āyasmato sāriputtattherassa. Vuttañhetaṃ asmiṃ nidānasmiṃ eva –
atk-s0511a:713_0: Tattha kappe ca satasahasseti ettha kappa-saddo panāyaṃ abhisaddahanavohārakālapaññattichedanavikappanalesasamantabhāvaāyukappamahākappādīsu
atk-s0511a:713_1: dissati. Tathā hi “okappanīyametaṃ bhoto gotamassa. Yathā taṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”tiādīsu
atk-s0511a:713_2: abhisaddahane dissati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ paribhuñjitu”nti
atk-s0511a:713_3: evamādīsu vohāre. “Yena sudaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī”tiādīsu kāle. “Iccāyasmā kappo”ti
atk-s0511a:713_4: ca, “nigrodhakappo iti tassa nāmaṃ, tayā kataṃ bhagavā brāhmaṇassā”ti ca evamādīsu
atk-s0511a:713_6: vikappe. “Atthi kappo nipajjitu”ntiādīsu lese. “Kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā”tiādīsu
atk-s0511a:713_7: samantabhāve. “Tiṭṭhatu, bhante, bhagavā kappaṃ, tiṭṭhatu sugato kappa”nti ettha
atk-s0511a:713_8: āyukappe. “Kīva dīgho nu kho, bhante, kappo”ti ettha mahākappe. Ādisaddena “satthukappena
atk-s0511a:713_9: vata kira, bho, mayaṃ sāvakena saddhiṃ mantayamānā na jānimhā”ti ettha paṭibhāge.
atk-s0511a:713_10: “Kappo naṭṭho hoti. Kappakatokāso jiṇṇo hotī”ti ettha vinayakappe. Idha pana mahākappe
atk-s0511a:713_11: daṭṭhabbo. Tasmā kappe ca satasahasseti mahākappānaṃ satasahassānanti attho. Caturo
atk-s0511a:713_12: ca asaṅkhiyeti “catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake”ti vacanaseso daṭṭhabbo. Kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ
atk-s0511a:713_13: catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthaketi attho. Amaraṃ nāma nagaranti “amara”nti ca “amaravatī”ti
atk-s0511a:713_14: ca laddhanāmaṃ nagaraṃ ahosi. Keci panettha aññenāpi pakārena vaṇṇayanti, kiṃ tehi,
atk-s0511a:713_17: chāyūdakasampannattā sulabhāhārattā sabbopakaraṇayuttattā ca samiddhattā devamanussādīnaṃ
atk-s0511a:714_0: Dasahi saddehi avivittanti hatthisaddena assasaddena rathasaddena bherisaddena saṅkhasaddena
atk-s0511a:714_1: mudiṅgasaddena vīṇāsaddena gītasaddena sammatāḷasaddena “bhuñjatha pivatha khādathā”ti
atk-s0511a:714_2: dasamena saddenāti; imehi dasahi saddehi avivittaṃ ahosi, sabbakālaṃ anupamussavasamajjanāṭakā
atk-s0511a:714_3: kīḷantīti attho. Annapānasamāyutanti annena catubbidhenāhārena ca pānena ca suṭṭhu
atk-s0511a:714_4: āyutaṃ annapānasamāyutaṃ, iminā subhikkhatā dassitā, bahuannapānasamāyutanti attho.
atk-s0511a:715: Idāni te dasa sadde vatthuto dassanatthaṃ –
atk-s0511a:717: Khādatha pivatha ceva, annapānena ghosita”nti. – vuttaṃ;
atk-s0511a:718_0: Tattha hatthisaddanti hatthīnaṃ koñcanādasaddena, karaṇatthe upayogavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a:718_1: Esa nayo sesapadesupi. Bherisaṅkharathāni cāti bherisaddena ca saṅkhasaddena ca rathasaddena
atk-s0511a:718_2: cāti attho. Liṅgavipariyāsena vuttaṃ, ‘khādatha pivathā’ti evamādinayappavattena
atk-s0511a:718_3: annapānapaṭisaṃyuttena ghositaṃ abhināditanti attho. Etthāha – tesaṃ pana saddānaṃ
atk-s0511a:718_4: ekadesova dassito, na sakaloti? Na ekadeso sakalo dasavidho dassitova. Kathaṃ? Bherisaddena
atk-s0511a:718_5: mudiṅgasaddo saṅgahito, saṅkhasaddena vīṇāgītasammatāḷasaddā saṅgahitāti daseva dassitā.
atk-s0511a:719: Evaṃ ekena pariyāyena nagarasampattiṃ vaṇṇetvā puna tameva dassetuṃ –
atk-s0511a:723_1: vā attho. Sabbakammamupāgatanti sabbakammantena upagataṃ, samupagatasabbakammantanti
atk-s0511a:723_3: vā hatthiratanādīhi sattaratanehi sampannaṃ. Nānājanasamākulanti nānāvidhadesabhāsehi
atk-s0511a:723_4: janehi samākulaṃ. Samiddhanti manussopabhogasabbopakaraṇehi samiddhaṃ phītaṃ. Devanagaraṃ
atk-s0511a:723_5: vāti devanagaraṃ viya ālakamandā viya amaravatī samiddhanti vuttaṃ hoti. Āvāsaṃ puññakamminanti
atk-s0511a:723_6: āvasanti ettha puññakammino janāti āvāso. “Āvāso”ti vattabbe “āvāsa”nti liṅgabhedaṃ
atk-s0511a:723_7: katvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Paññāyati tenāti puññaṃ, kularūpamahābhogissariyavasena
atk-s0511a:723_8: paññāyatīti attho. Punātīti vā puññaṃ. Sabbakusalamalarajāpavāhakattā puññaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0511a:723_9: yesaṃ atthi te puññakammino, tesaṃ puññakamminaṃ āvāsabhūtanti attho.
atk-s0511a:724_0: Tattha sumedho nāma brāhmaṇo paṭivasati ubhato sujāto mātito ca pitito ca, saṃsuddhagahaṇiko
atk-s0511a:724_1: yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā akkhitto anupakuṭṭho jātivādena, abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko
atk-s0511a:724_2: paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato, so tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū ahosi sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ
atk-s0511a:724_3: sākkharappabhedānaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ padako veyyākaraṇo anavayo lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu.
atk-s0511a:724_4: Tassa pana daharakāleyeva mātāpitaro kālamakaṃsu. Athassa rāsivaḍḍhako amacco āyapotthakaṃ
atk-s0511a:724_6: te, kumāra, mātu santakaṃ, etthakaṃ pitu santakaṃ, etthakaṃ ayyakapayyakāna”nti yāva
atk-s0511a:724_7: sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā dhanaṃ ācikkhitvā – “etaṃ paṭipajjāhī”ti niyyātesi. So “sādhū”ti
atk-s0511a:724_8: sampaṭicchitvā puññāni karonto agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:730: Lakkhaṇe itihāse ca, sadhamme pāramiṃ gato”ti.
atk-s0511a:731_0: Tattha nagare amaravatiyāti amaravatīsaṅkhāte nagare. Sumedho nāmāti ettha “medhā”ti
atk-s0511a:731_1: paññā vuccati. Sā tassa sundarā pasatthāti sumedhoti paññāyittha. Brāhmaṇoti brahmaṃ
atk-s0511a:731_2: aṇati sikkhatīti brāhmaṇo, mante sajjhāyatīti attho. Akkharacintakā pana “brahmuno
atk-s0511a:731_3: apaccaṃ brāhmaṇo”ti vadanti. Ariyā pana bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇāti. Anekakoṭisannicayoti
atk-s0511a:731_4: koṭīnaṃ sannicayo koṭisannicayo, aneko koṭisannicayo yassa soyaṃ anekakoṭisannicayo,
atk-s0511a:731_5: anekakoṭi dhanasannicayoti attho. Pahūtadhanadhaññavāti bahuladhanadhaññavā. Purimaṃ
atk-s0511a:732_0: Ajjhāyakoti na jhāyatīti ajjhāyako, jhānabhāvanārahitoti attho. Vuttañhetaṃ – “na
atk-s0511a:732_1: dānime jhāyantīti. Na dānime jhāyantīti kho, vāseṭṭha, ‘ajjhāyakā ajjhāyakā’ tveva
atk-s0511a:732_2: tatiyaṃ akkharaṃ upanibbatta”nti evaṃ paṭhamakappikakāle jhānavirahitānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ
atk-s0511a:732_3: garahavacanaṃ uppannaṃ. Idāni mantaṃ jhāyatīti ajjhāyako, mante parivattetīti iminā
atk-s0511a:732_4: atthena pasaṃsavacanaṃ katvā voharanti. Mante dhāretīti mantadharo. Tiṇṇaṃ vedānanti
atk-s0511a:732_5: iruvedayajuvedasāmavedānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ. Ayaṃ pana veda-saddo ñāṇasomanassaganthesu
atk-s0511a:732_6: dissati. Tathā hesa – “yaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vedagumābhijaññā, akiñcanaṃ kāmabhave asatta”ntiādīsu
atk-s0511a:732_7: ñāṇe dissati. “Ye vedajātā vicaranti loke”tiādīsu somanasse. “Tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū
atk-s0511a:732_8: sanighaṇḍukeṭubhāna”ntiādīsu ganthe. Idhāpi ganthe. Pāragūti tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ oṭṭhapahatakaraṇamattena
atk-s0511a:732_10: lakkhaṇe. Itihāseti itiha āsa, itiha āsāti īdisavacanapaṭisaṃyutte purāṇasaṅkhāte
atk-s0511a:732_11: ganthavisese. Sadhammeti brāhmaṇānaṃ sake dhamme, sake ācariyake vā. Pāramiṃ gatoti
atk-s0511a:732_12: pāraṃ gato, disāpāmokkho ācariyo ahosīti attho.
atk-s0511a:733_0: Athekadivasaṃ so dasaguṇagaṇārādhitapaṇḍito sumedhapaṇḍito uparipāsādavaratale rahogato
atk-s0511a:733_1: hutvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinno cintesi – “punabbhave paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ nāma dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0511a:733_2: tathā nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne sarīrabhedanaṃ, ahañca jātidhammo, jarādhammo, byādhidhammo,
atk-s0511a:733_3: maraṇadhammo, evaṃbhūtena mayā ajātiṃ ajaraṃ abyādhiṃ amaraṇaṃ sukhaṃ sivaṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0511a:733_4: pariyesituṃ vaṭṭati, avassaṃ bhavacārakato muccitvā nibbānagāminā ekena maggena bhavitabba”nti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:736: Dukkho punabbhavo nāma, sarīrassa ca bhedanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:744: “Atthi hehiti so maggo, na so sakkā na hetuye;
atk-s0511a:746_0: Ettha pana gāthāsambandhañca anuttānapadānamatthañca vatvāva gamissāma. Tattha rahogatoti
atk-s0511a:746_1: rahasi gato, rahasi ṭhāne nisinno. Evaṃ cintesahanti evaṃ cintesiṃ ahaṃ. Evanti iminā
atk-s0511a:746_2: cintanākāraṃ dasseti. Tadāti tasmiṃ sumedhapaṇḍitakāle. “Evaṃ cintesaha”nti bhagavā
atk-s0511a:746_3: iminā attanā saddhiṃ sumedhapaṇḍitaṃ ekattaṃ karoti. Tasmā tadā so sumedho ahamevāti
atk-s0511a:746_4: pakāsento “evaṃ cintesahaṃ tadā”ti bhagavā uttamapurisavasenāha. Jātidhammoti jātisabhāvo.
atk-s0511a:747_0: Yaṃnūnāti parivitakkanatthe nipāto, yadi panāhanti attho. Pūtikāyanti pūtibhūtaṃ
atk-s0511a:747_2: Anapekkhoti anālayo. Atthīti avassaṃ upalabbhati. Hehitīti bhavissati, parivitakkanavacanamidaṃ.
atk-s0511a:747_3: Na so sakkā na hetuyeti tena maggena na sakkā na bhavituṃ. So pana maggo hetuyeti
atk-s0511a:747_4: hetubhāvāya na na hoti, hetuyevāti attho. Bhavato parimuttiyāti bhavabandhanavimuttiyāti attho.
atk-s0511a:748_0: Idāni attanā parivitakkitamatthaṃ sampādayituṃ “yathāpī”ti ādimāha. Yathā hi loke
atk-s0511a:748_1: dukkhassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ sukhaṃ nāma atthi, evaṃ bhave sati tappaṭipakkhena vibhavenāpi
atk-s0511a:748_2: bhavitabbaṃ, yathā ca uṇhe sati tassa vūpasamabhūtaṃ sītalampi atthi, evaṃ rāgādiaggīnaṃ
atk-s0511a:748_3: vūpasamena nibbānena bhavitabbaṃ. Yathā ca pāpassa lāmakassa dhammassa paṭipakkhabhūto
atk-s0511a:748_4: kalyāṇo anavajjadhammopi atthiyeva, evameva pāpikāya jātiyā sati sabbajātikhepanato
atk-s0511a:758_0: Tattha yathāpīti opammatthe nipāto. Sukhanti kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ, suṭṭhu dukkhaṃ
atk-s0511a:758_1: khaṇatīti sukhaṃ. Bhaveti janane. Vibhavoti ajananaṃ, janane vijjamāne ajananadhammopi
atk-s0511a:758_2: icchitabbo. Tividhaggi vijjanteti tividhe rāgādike aggimhi vijjamāneti attho. Nibbānanti
atk-s0511a:758_3: tassa tividhassa rāgādiaggissa nibbāpanaṃ upasamanaṃ nibbānañca icchitabbaṃ. Pāpeti
atk-s0511a:758_4: akusale lāmake. Kalyāṇamapīti kusalamapi. Evamevāti evamevaṃ. Jāti vijjanteti jātiyā
atk-s0511a:758_5: vijjamānāyāti attho. Liṅgabhedañca vibhattilopañca katvā vuttaṃ. Ajātipīti jātikhepanaṃ
atk-s0511a:759_0: Athāhaṃ parampi cintesiṃ – “yathā nāma gūtharāsimhi nimuggena purisena dūratova kamalakuvalayapuṇḍarīkasaṇḍamaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0511a:759_1: vimalasalilaṃ taḷākaṃ disvā – ‘katarena nu kho maggena tattha gantabba’nti taḷākaṃ
atk-s0511a:759_2: gavesituṃ yuttaṃ. Yaṃ tassa agavesanaṃ, na so tassa taḷākassa doso, tassa purisasseva
atk-s0511a:759_3: doso. Evameva kilesamaladhovane amatamahātaḷāke vijjamāne yaṃ tassa agavesanaṃ, na
atk-s0511a:759_4: so amatasaṅkhātassa nibbānamahātaḷākassa doso, purisasseva doso. Yathā pana corehi
atk-s0511a:759_5: saṃparivārito puriso palāyanamagge vijjamānepi sace so na palāyati, na so tassa maggassa
atk-s0511a:759_6: doso, tassa purisasseva doso. Evameva kilesacorehi parivāretvā gahitassa purisassa
atk-s0511a:759_7: vijjamāneyeva nibbānamahānagaragāmimhi sive mahāmagge tassa maggassa agavesanaṃ nāma
atk-s0511a:759_8: na maggassa doso, purisasseva doso. Yathā byādhipīḷito puriso vijjamāne byādhitikicchake
atk-s0511a:759_9: vejje sace taṃ vejjaṃ gavesitvā taṃ byādhiṃ na tikicchāpeti, na so vejjassa doso,
atk-s0511a:759_10: tassa purisasseva doso. Evameva pana yo kilesabyādhiparipīḷito kilesavūpasamamaggakovidaṃ
atk-s0511a:759_11: vijjamānameva ācariyaṃ na gavesati, tasseva doso, na kilesabyādhivināyakassa ācariyassa
atk-s0511a:762: Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso taḷākassa so.
atk-s0511a:765: Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso amatantaḷe.
atk-s0511a:768: Na palāyati so puriso, na doso añjasassa so.
atk-s0511a:771: Na gavesati taṃ maggaṃ, na doso sivamañjase.
atk-s0511a:774: Na tikicchāpeti taṃ byādhiṃ, na doso so tikicchake.
atk-s0511a:777: Na gavesati taṃ ācariyaṃ, na doso so vināyake”ti.
atk-s0511a:778_0: Tattha gūthagatoti gūthakūpagato, gūthena gato makkhito vā. Kilesamaladhovanti kilesamalasodhane,
atk-s0511a:778_1: bhummatthe paccattavacanaṃ. Amatantaḷeti amatasaṅkhātassa taḷākassa, sāmiatthe bhummavacanaṃ
atk-s0511a:778_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ, anussaraṃ pakkhipitvā vuttaṃ. Arīhīti paccatthikehi. Pariruddhoti samantato
atk-s0511a:778_3: niruddho. Gamanampatheti gamanapathe. Chandāvināsatthaṃ anussarāgamanaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a:778_4: Na palāyatīti yadi na palāyeyya. So purisoti so corehi pariruddho puriso. Añjasassāti
atk-s0511a:780: Nāvā uttarasetu ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅkamo”ti. –
atk-s0511a:781_0: Bahūni nāmāni. Svāyamidha añjasanāmena vutto. Siveti sabbupaddavābhāvato sive. Sivamañjaseti
atk-s0511a:781_1: sivassa añjasassāti attho. Tikicchaketi vejje. Na tikicchāpetīti na tikicchāpeyya.
atk-s0511a:781_2: Na doso so tikicchaketi tikicchakassa doso natthi, byādhitasseva dosoti attho. Dukkhitoti
atk-s0511a:782_0: Evaṃ panāhaṃ cintetvā uttarimpi evaṃ cintesiṃ – “yathāpi maṇḍanakajātiko puriso kaṇṭhe
atk-s0511a:782_1: āsattaṃ kuṇapaṃ chaḍḍetvā sukhī gaccheyya, evaṃ mayāpi imaṃ pūtikāyaṃ chaḍḍetvā anapekkhena
atk-s0511a:782_2: nibbānamahānagaraṃ pavisitabbaṃ. Yathā ca naranāriyo ukkārabhūmiyaṃ uccārapassāvaṃ
atk-s0511a:782_3: katvā na taṃ ucchaṅgena vā ādāya dasante vā veṭhetvā ādāya gacchanti, atha kho jigucchamānā
atk-s0511a:782_4: oloketumpi anicchantā anapekkhā chaḍḍetvā gacchanti, evaṃ mayāpi imaṃ pūtikāyaṃ anapekkhena
atk-s0511a:782_5: chaḍḍetvā amataṃ nibbānanagaraṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭati. Yathā ca nāvikā nāma jajjaraṃ
atk-s0511a:782_6: nāvaṃ udakagāhiniṃ chaḍḍetvā anapekkhāva gacchanti, evamahampi imaṃ navahi vaṇamukhehi
atk-s0511a:782_7: paggharantaṃ kāyaṃ chaḍḍetvā anapekkho nibbānamahānagaraṃ pavisissāmi. Yathā ca koci
atk-s0511a:782_8: puriso muttāmaṇiveḷuriyādīni nānāvidhāni ratanāni ādāya corehi saddhiṃ maggaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0511a:782_9: attano ratanavināsabhayena te core chaḍḍetvā khemaṃ maggaṃ gaṇhāti, evamayampi pūtikāyo
atk-s0511a:782_10: ratanavilopakacorasadiso. Sacāhaṃ ettha taṇhaṃ karissāmi, ariyamaggakusaladhammaratanāni
atk-s0511a:782_11: me nassissanti, tasmā mayā imaṃ mahācorasadisaṃ karajakāyaṃ chaḍḍetvā nibbānamahānagaraṃ
atk-s0511a:794: Chaḍḍayitvāna gacchissaṃ, vaccaṃ katvā yathā kuṭiṃ.
atk-s0511a:807_0: Tattha yathāpi kuṇapaṃ purisoti yathāpi daharo yuvā maṇḍanakajātiko puriso ahikuṇapena
atk-s0511a:807_1: vā kukkurakuṇapena vā manussakuṇapena vā kaṇṭhe āsattena aṭṭīyitvā harāyitvā jigucchitvā
atk-s0511a:807_2: taṃ kuṇapaṃ mocetvā gaccheyya. Sukhīti sukhito. Serīti yathicchakavihārī. Nānākuṇapasañcayanti
atk-s0511a:808_0: Uccāraṭṭhānamhīti uccārenti vaccaṃ karonti etthāti uccāro, uccāro ca so ṭhānaṃ ceti
atk-s0511a:808_1: uccāraṭṭhānaṃ. Atha vā ussāsiyyatīti ussāso, vaccassetaṃ nāmaṃ, tassa ṭhānaṃ ussāsaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0511a:808_2: tasmiṃ ussāsaṭṭhānamhi, ukkāraṭṭhāneti attho. Vaccaṃ katvā yathā kuṭinti vaccaṃ katvā
atk-s0511a:809_0: Jajjaranti jiṇṇaṃ. Palugganti palujjantiṃ, vikirantinti attho. Udagāhininti udakagāhiniṃ.
atk-s0511a:809_1: Sāmīti nāvāsāmikā. Navacchiddanti cakkhusotādīhi navahi vaṇamukhehi chiddāvacchiddehi
atk-s0511a:809_2: yuttattā navacchiddaṃ. Dhuvassavanti dhuvanissandaṃ, niccaṃ paggharaṇāsucinti attho.
atk-s0511a:810_0: Bhaṇḍamādiyāti yaṃkiñci ratanādikaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ ādiya. Bhaṇḍacchedabhayaṃ disvāti bhaṇḍassa
atk-s0511a:810_1: acchindanena bhayaṃ disvāti attho. Evamevāti so bhaṇḍamādāya gacchanto puriso viya.
atk-s0511a:810_2: Ayaṃ kāyoti ayaṃ pana kucchitānaṃ paramajegucchānaṃ āyoti kāyo. Āyoti upattiṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:810_3: Āyanti tatoti āyo, kucchitā kesādayo. Iti kucchitānaṃ kesādīnaṃ āyoti kāyo. Mahācorasamo
atk-s0511a:810_4: viyāti cakkhuādīhi rūpādīsu piyarūpesu sārajjanādivasena pāṇātipātādinnādānādicoro
atk-s0511a:810_5: hutvā sabbakusalaṃ vilumpatīti mahācorasamo. Tasmā yathā so ratanabhaṇḍamādāya corehi
atk-s0511a:810_6: saddhiṃ gacchanto puriso te core pahāya gacchati, evamevāhampi imaṃ mahācorasamaṃ
atk-s0511a:810_7: kāyaṃ pahāya attano sotthibhāvakaraṃ maggaṃ gavesituṃ gamissāmīti atthasambandho
atk-s0511a:811_0: Athevaṃ sumedhapaṇḍito nānāvidhāhi upamāhi nekkhammakāraṇaṃ cintetvā punapi cintesi
atk-s0511a:811_1: – “imaṃ mahādhanarāsiṃ saṃharitvā mayhaṃ pitupitāmahādayo paralokaṃ gacchantā ekakahāpaṇampi
atk-s0511a:811_2: gahetvā na gatā, mayā pana gahetvā gamanakāraṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti gantvā rañño ārocesi
atk-s0511a:811_3: – “ahaṃ, mahārāja, jātijarādīhi upaddutahadayo agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajissāmi,
atk-s0511a:811_4: mayhaṃ anekakoṭisatasahassaṃ dhanaṃ atthi, taṃ devo paṭipajjatū”ti. Rājā āha – “na
atk-s0511a:811_5: mayhaṃ te dhanena attho, tvaṃyeva yathicchakaṃ karohī”ti.
atk-s0511a:812_0: So ca “sādhu devā”ti nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā mahājanassa dānaṃ datvā vatthukāme ca
atk-s0511a:812_1: kilesakāme ca pahāya amaravaranagarasadisato amaranagarato nikkhamitvā ekakova nānāmigagaṇavante
atk-s0511a:812_2: himavante dhammikaṃ nāma pabbataṃ nissāya assamaṃ katvā tattha paṇṇasālaṃ katvā pañcadosavivajjitaṃ
atk-s0511a:812_3: caṅkamaṃ māpetvā aṭṭhaguṇasamupetaṃ abhiññābalaṃ samāharituṃ navadosasamannāgataṃ
atk-s0511a:812_4: sāṭakaṃ pajahitvā dvādasaguṇamupāgataṃ vākacīraṃ nivāsetvā pabbaji. Evaṃ pana so
atk-s0511a:812_5: pabbajito aṭṭhadosasamākiṇṇaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ pahāya dasaguṇasamannāgataṃ rukkhamūlaṃ
atk-s0511a:812_6: upagantvā sabbadhaññavikatiṃ pahāya pavattaphalabhojano hutvā nisajjaṭṭhānacaṅkamanavasena
atk-s0511a:812_7: padhānaṃ padahanto sattāhabbhantareyeva aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ pañcannañca abhiññānaṃ
atk-s0511a:834_0: Tattha evāhanti evaṃ ahaṃ, heṭṭhā vuttappakārena cintetvāti attho. Nāthānāthānanti
atk-s0511a:834_1: sanāthānamanāthānañca aḍḍhānañceva daliddānañca “atthikā gaṇhantū”ti saha koṭṭhāgārehi
atk-s0511a:834_2: datvāti attho. Himavantassāvidūreti himavantapabbatarājassa avidūre samīpe. Dhammiko
atk-s0511a:834_3: nāma pabbatoti evaṃnāmako pabbato. Kasmā panāyaṃ dhammikoti? Yebhuyyena pana bodhisattā
atk-s0511a:834_4: isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā taṃ pabbataṃ upanissāya abhiññāyo nibbattetvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0511a:834_5: akaṃsu. Tasmā samaṇadhammassa nissayabhūtattā “dhammiko”tveva pākaṭo ahosi. Assamo
atk-s0511a:834_6: sukato mayhantiādinā sumedhapaṇḍitena assamapaṇṇasālā caṅkamā sahatthā māpitā viya
atk-s0511a:834_7: vuttā, na ca pana sahatthā māpitā, kintu sakkena devena pesite vissakammunā devaputtena
atk-s0511a:834_8: nimmitā. Bhagavā pana tadā attano puññānubhāvena nibbattaṃ taṃ sampadaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0511a:837_0: Tattha paṇṇasālāti paṇṇachadanasālā. Tatthāti tasmiṃ assamapade. Pañcadosavivajjitanti
atk-s0511a:837_1: pañcahi caṅkamadosehi vivajjitaṃ. Katame pañca caṅkamadosā nāma? Thaddhavisamatā,
atk-s0511a:837_2: antorukkhatā, gahanacchannatā, atisambādhatā, ativisālatāti imehi pañcahi dosehi
atk-s0511a:837_3: vivajjitaṃ. Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena dīghato saṭṭhiratano vitthārato diyaḍḍharatano caṅkamo
atk-s0511a:837_4: vutto. Atha vā pañcadosavivajjitanti pañcahi nīvaraṇadosehi vivajjitaṃ parihīnaṃ
atk-s0511a:837_5: abhiññābalamāharinti iminā uttarapadena sambandho daṭṭhabbo. Aṭṭhaguṇasamupetanti
atk-s0511a:837_6: “evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye
atk-s0511a:837_7: ṭhite āneñjappatte”ti evaṃ vuttehi aṭṭhaguṇehi samannāgataṃ abhiññābalaṃ āhariṃ ānesinti attho.
atk-s0511a:838_0: Keci pana “aṭṭhahi samaṇasukhehi upetaṃ, aṭṭhimāni samaṇasukhāni nāma dhanadhaññapariggahābhāvo,
atk-s0511a:838_3: coravilopane nibbhayabhāvo, rājarājamahāmattehi asaṃsaṭṭhabhāvo, catūsu disāsu appaṭihatabhāvoti
atk-s0511a:838_4: imehi aṭṭhahi samaṇasukhehi upetaṃ samupetaṃ assamaṃ māpesi”nti assamena sambandhaṃ
atk-s0511a:838_5: katvā vadanti, taṃ pāḷiyā na sameti.
atk-s0511a:839_0: Sāṭakanti vatthaṃ. Tatthāti tasmiṃ assame. Navadosamupāgatanti, sāriputta, tattha
atk-s0511a:839_1: vasanto attano nivatthapārutaṃ mahagghasāṭakaṃ pajahiṃ pariccajiṃ. Sāṭakaṃ pajahanto
atk-s0511a:839_2: ca tattha nava dose disvā pajahinti dīpeti. Tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitānañhi sāṭakasmiṃ
atk-s0511a:839_3: nava dosā pakāsitā. Katame nava? Sāṭakassa mahagghabhāvo, parapaṭibaddhabhāvo, paribhogena
atk-s0511a:839_4: lahukaṃ kilissanabhāvo, kiliṭṭho ca dhovitabbo puna rajitabbo ca hoti paribhogena
atk-s0511a:839_5: jīraṇabhāvo, jiṇṇassa puna tunnakaraṇaṃ vā aggaḷadānaṃ vā kātabbaṃ hoti puna pariyesanāya
atk-s0511a:839_7: yathā naṃ na paccatthikā gaṇhanti, evaṃ gopetabbo hoti paridahato vibhūsanaṭṭhānabhāvo,
atk-s0511a:839_8: gahetvā carantassa mahicchabhāvoti etehi navahi dosehi upagataṃ sāṭakaṃ pahāya vākacīraṃ
atk-s0511a:839_9: nivāsesinti dīpeti. Vākacīranti muñjatiṇaṃ hīrāhīraṃ katvā ganthetvā kataṃ vākamayacīraṃ
atk-s0511a:839_10: nivāsanapārupanatthāya ādiyinti attho. Dvādasaguṇamupāgatanti dvādasahi ānisaṃsehi
atk-s0511a:839_11: upetaṃ. Ettha guṇa-saddo ānisaṃsaṭṭho “sataguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā”tiādīsu
atk-s0511a:839_12: viya. Ma-kāro padasandhikaro. Vākacīrasmiṃ dvādasānisaṃsā appagghatā, aparāyattatā,
atk-s0511a:839_13: sahatthā kātuṃ sakkuṇeyyatā, paribhogena jiṇṇepi sibbitabbābhāvo, corabhayābhāvo
atk-s0511a:839_14: pariyesantassa sukhena karaṇabhāvo, tāpasapabbajjāya sāruppabhāvo, sevamānassa vibhūsanaṭṭhānābhāvo,
atk-s0511a:839_15: cīvarappaccaye appicchabhāvo, paribhogasukhabhāvo, vākuppattiyā sulabhabhāvo, vākacīre
atk-s0511a:839_16: naṭṭhepi anapekkhabhāvoti imehi dvādasahi guṇehi sampannaṃ.
atk-s0511a:840_0: Atha sumedhapaṇḍito tattha paṇṇasālāyaṃ viharanto paccūsasamaye paccuṭṭhāya attano
atk-s0511a:840_1: nikkhamanakāraṇaṃ paccavekkhamāno evaṃ kira cintesi – “ahaṃ pana navakanakakaṭakanūpurādisaṅghaṭṭanasaddasammissita-madhurahasitakathitagehajanaramaṇīyaṃ
atk-s0511a:840_2: uḷāravibhavasobhitaṃ suravarabhavanākāramagāraṃ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya pahāya vivekārāmatāya
atk-s0511a:840_3: sabbajanapāpapavāhanaṃ tapovanaṃ paviṭṭhosmi, idha pana me paṇṇasālāya vāso dutiyo
atk-s0511a:840_4: gharāvāso viya hoti, handāhaṃ rukkhamūle vaseyya”nti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:843_0: Tattha aṭṭhadosasamākiṇṇanti aṭṭhahi dosehi samākiṇṇaṃ saṃyuttaṃ. Katamehi aṭṭhahi?
atk-s0511a:843_1: Mahāsambhārehi nipphādanīyatā, tiṇapaṇṇamattikādīhi niccaṃ paṭijagganīyatā, senāsanaṃ
atk-s0511a:843_2: nāma mahallakassa pāpuṇātīti avelāya vuṭṭhāpiyamānassa cittekaggatā na hotīti vuṭṭhāpanīyabhāvo,
atk-s0511a:843_3: sītuṇhassa paṭighātena kāyassa sukhumālakaraṇabhāvo, gharaṃ paviṭṭhena yaṃ kiñci
atk-s0511a:843_5: gehassa atthibhāvo sadutiyakavāso, ūkāmaṅgulagharagoḷikādīnaṃ sādhāraṇatāya bahusādhāraṇabhāvoti
atk-s0511a:843_6: iti ime aṭṭha ādīnave disvā mahāsatto paṇṇasālaṃ pajahiṃ.
atk-s0511a:844_0: Guṇe dasahupāgatanti channaṃ paṭikkhipitvā dasahi guṇehi upetaṃ, rukkhamūlaṃ upagatosmīti
atk-s0511a:844_1: attho. Katamehi dasahi? Appasamārambhatā, upagamanamattamevettha hotīti sulabhānavajjatā,
atk-s0511a:844_3: tattha hi pāpaṃ karonto lajjatīti pāpakaraṇārahābhāvo, pariggahakaraṇābhāvo, devatāhi
atk-s0511a:844_4: saha vāso, channapaṭikkhepo, paribhogasukhatā, rukkhamūlasenāsanassa gatagataṭṭhāne
atk-s0511a:844_5: sulabhatāya anapekkhabhāvoti iti ime dasa guṇe disvā rukkhamūlaṃ upagatosmīti vadati. Āha ca –
atk-s0511a:853_0: Atha sumedhapaṇḍito paṇṇasālāya diṭṭhadoso hutvā rukkhamūlasenāsane laddhānisaṃso
atk-s0511a:853_1: viharanto uttaripi cintesi – “āhāratthāya me gāmagamanaṃ āhārapariyesanadukkhaṃ,
atk-s0511a:853_2: nāhaṃ kenaci pārijuññena nikkhamitvā āhāratthāya pabbajito, āhārapariyesanamūlassa
atk-s0511a:853_3: ca dukkhassa pamāṇaṃ natthi, yaṃnūnāhaṃ pavattaphalena yāpeyya”nti. Imaṃ pana atthavisesaṃ dīpento –
atk-s0511a:856_0: Tattha vāpitanti vapitvā nipphannaṃ. Ropitanti ropitvā nipphannaṃ, vapanaropanavasena
atk-s0511a:856_1: duvidhāva sassanipphatti, taṃ duvidhampi attano appicchatāya pahāya pavattaphalena
atk-s0511a:856_2: yāpesiṃ. Pavattaphalanti sayameva patitaphalaṃ. Ādiyinti paribhuñjiṃ.
atk-s0511a:861_0: Evaṃ pavattamāno sumedhapaṇḍito nacirasseva antosattāhe aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca abhiññāyo
atk-s0511a:861_1: ca pāpuṇi. Imamatthaṃ pakāsentena “tatthappadhānaṃ padahi”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti
atk-s0511a:861_2: tasmiṃ assame. Padhānanti vīriyaṃ, vīriyañhi padahitabbato padhānabhāvakaraṇato vā
atk-s0511a:862_0: Sumedhapaṇḍito pana seyyaṃ paṭikkhipitvā nisajjaṭṭhānacaṅkameheva rattindivaṃ vītināmetvā
atk-s0511a:862_1: sattāhabbhantareyeva abhiññābalaṃ pāpuṇi. Evaṃ pana abhiññābalaṃ patvā sumedhatāpase
atk-s0511a:862_2: samāpattisukhena vītināmente tadā sabbajanasaṅgahakaro mārabalabhayaṃkaro ñāṇadīpaṅkaro
atk-s0511a:863_0: Saṅkhepeneva tassāyamānupubbikathā – ayaṃ kira dīpaṅkaro nāma mahāsatto samattiṃsa
atk-s0511a:863_1: pāramiyo pūretvā vessantarattabhāvasadise attabhāve ṭhito pathavikampanādīni mahādānāni
atk-s0511a:863_2: datvā āyupariyosāne tusitapure nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatāhi sannipatitvā –
atk-s0511a:866_0: Vutte tato so devatānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā ca pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā tato cuto
atk-s0511a:866_1: rammavatīnagare attano yasavibhūtiyā vijitavāsudevassa naradevassa sudevassa nāma
atk-s0511a:866_2: rañño kule sumedhāya deviyā kucchismiṃ āsāḷhipuṇṇamiyā uttarāsāḷhanakkhattena paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0511a:866_3: gahetvā mahatā parivārena parihariyamāno mahādeviyā kucchimhi maṇikūṭagato viya kenaci
atk-s0511a:866_4: asucinā amakkhito dasa māse vasitvā saliladharavivaragato saradakālacando viya tassā udarato nikkhami.
atk-s0511a:868_0: Tassa pana dīpaṅkarakumārassa paṭisandhikkhaṇepi vijātakkhaṇepi dvattiṃsa pubbanimittāni
atk-s0511a:868_1: pāṭihāriyāni pāturahesuṃ. Sabbasabbaññubodhisattesu mātukucchiṃ okkamantesu nikkhamantesu
atk-s0511a:868_2: sambujjhantesu dhammacakkaṃ pavattantesūti imesu catūsu ṭhānesu dvattiṃsa pāṭihāriyāni
atk-s0511a:868_3: pavattanteva. Tasmā mayā pākaṭattā dīpaṅkarakumārassa jātiyaṃ dassitāni –
atk-s0511a:870: Pakampi saṅkampi tadā samantā, sahassasaṅkhyā dasalokadhātu.
atk-s0511a:874: Paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhiṃsu, pacchā taṃ manujā pana.
atk-s0511a:875: “Avāditā kenaci cammanaddhā, supokkharā dundubhiyo ca vīṇā;
atk-s0511a:876: Aghaṭṭitānābharaṇāni tasmiṃ, khaṇe samantā madhuraṃ raviṃsu.
atk-s0511a:877: “Chijjiṃsu sabbattha ca bandhanāni, sayaṃ vigacchiṃsu ca sabbarogā;
atk-s0511a:878: Rūpāni passiṃsu ca jātiandhā, saddaṃ samantā badhirā suṇiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:879: “Anussatiṃ jātijaḷā manussā, labhiṃsu yānaṃ padasāva paṅgulā;
atk-s0511a:881: “Ākāsaṭṭhaṃ bhūmigatañca sabbaṃ, sayaṃ samantā ratanaṃ viroci;
atk-s0511a:882: Nibbāyi ghore niraye hutāso, nadīsu toyampi ca nappavatti.
atk-s0511a:885: “Na vāyi vāto pharuso kharo vā, samphullapupphā taravo ahesuṃ;
atk-s0511a:886: Viroci cando adhikaṃ satāro, na cāpi uṇho sūriyo ahosi.
atk-s0511a:887: “Khagā nabhamhāpi ca rukkhato ca, haṭṭhāva heṭṭhā pathaviṃ bhajiṃsu;
atk-s0511a:888: Mahācatuddīpagato ca megho, pavassi toyaṃ madhuraṃ samantā.
atk-s0511a:889: “Ṭhatvāva dibbe bhavane sakasmiṃ, pasannacittā pana devatāyo;
atk-s0511a:890: Nacciṃsu gāyiṃsu ca vādayiṃsu, seḷiṃsu tā keḷimakaṃsu ceva.
atk-s0511a:891: “Sayaṃ kira dvāramahākavāṭā, khaṇeva tasmiṃ vivaṭā ahesuṃ;
atk-s0511a:892: Mahājane neva khudā pipāsā, pīḷesi lokaṃ kira kañci kañci.
atk-s0511a:893: “Ye niccaverā pana pāṇisaṅghā, te mettacittaṃ paramaṃ labhiṃsu;
atk-s0511a:894: Kākā ulūkehi cariṃsu saddhiṃ, koṇā varāhehi akaṃsu keḷiṃ.
atk-s0511a:895: “Ghorāpi sappānamukhāpi sappā, kīḷiṃsu kāmaṃ nakulehi saddhiṃ;
atk-s0511a:898: Khujjā ahesuṃ samacārukāyā, mūgā ca vācaṃ madhuraṃ lapiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:900: Assā ca hesiṃsu pahaṭṭhacittā, gajjiṃsu mattā varavāraṇāpi.
atk-s0511a:903_1: devatānaṃ ekacakkavāḷe sannipāto dhammacakkappavattanakāle ekappahāreneva sannipatitvā
atk-s0511a:903_2: dhammapaṭiggahaṇassa pubbanimittaṃ, paṭhamaṃ devatānaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ catunnaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ
atk-s0511a:903_3: paṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ, pacchā manussānaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ catunnaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ
atk-s0511a:903_4: paṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ, cammanaddhadundubhīnaṃ sayameva vajjanaṃ mahantiyā dhammabheriyā
atk-s0511a:903_5: anusāvanassa pubbanimittaṃ, vīṇābharaṇānaṃ sayameva vajjanaṃ anupubbavihārapaṭilābhassa
atk-s0511a:903_6: pubbanimittaṃ, bandhanānaṃ sayameva chedo asmimānasamucchedassa pubbanimittaṃ, mahājanassa
atk-s0511a:903_8: dibbacakkhupaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ, badhirānaṃ saddassavanaṃ dibbasotadhātupaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ.
atk-s0511a:904_1: padasā gamanaṃ caturiddhipādapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ, videsagatānaṃ nāvānaṃ sapaṭṭanāgamanaṃ
atk-s0511a:904_3: niraye agginibbāyanaṃ ekādasagginibbāyanassa, nadīsu toyassa nappavattanaṃ catuvesārajjapaṭilābhassa,
atk-s0511a:904_4: lokantare āloko avijjandhakāraṃ vidhametvā ñāṇalokadassanassa, mahāsamuddassa madhurodakatā
atk-s0511a:904_5: nibbānarasena ekarasabhāvassa, vātassa avāyanaṃ dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatabhedanassa, tarūnaṃ
atk-s0511a:905_0: Candassa ativirocanaṃ bahujanakantatāya pubbanimittaṃ, sūriyassa nātiuṇhavimalabhāvo
atk-s0511a:905_1: kāyikacetasikasukhuppattiyā, khagānaṃ nagādīhi pathavigamanaṃ ovādaṃ sutvā mahājanassa
atk-s0511a:905_2: pāṇehi saraṇagamanassa, mahato catuddīpagatameghassa pavassanaṃ mahato dhammavassassa,
atk-s0511a:905_3: devatānaṃ sakasakabhavanesveva ṭhatvā naccādīhi kīḷanaṃ buddhabhāvaṃ patvā udānudānassa,
atk-s0511a:905_5: abhāvo vimuttisukhena sukhitabhāvassa, verīnaṃ mettacittapaṭilābho catubrahmavihārapaṭilābhassa,
atk-s0511a:906_0: Atha dīpaṅkarakumāro mahatiyā sampattiyā paricāriyamāno anukkamena bhaddaṃ yobbanaṃ
atk-s0511a:906_1: patvā tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikesu tīsu pāsādesu devalokasiriṃ viya rajjasirimanubhavanto
atk-s0511a:906_2: uyyānakīḷāya gamanasamaye anukkamena jiṇṇabyādhimatasaṅkhāte tayo devadūte disvā
atk-s0511a:906_3: sañjātasaṃvego nivattitvā sudassananagarasadisavibhavasobhaṃ rammavatī nāma nagaraṃ
atk-s0511a:906_4: pāvisi. Nagaraṃ pavisitvā puna catutthavāre hatthācariyaṃ pakkosāpetvā etadavoca
atk-s0511a:906_5: – “ahaṃ, tāta, uyyānadassanatthāya nikkhamissāmi hatthiyānāni kappāpehī”ti. So “sādhu,
atk-s0511a:906_6: devā”ti paṭisuṇitvā caturāsītihatthisahassāni kappāpesi. Atha vissakammo nāma devaputto
atk-s0511a:906_9: devakumāro viya caturāsītiyā hatthisahassehi parivuto hatthikkhandhavaragato mahatā
atk-s0511a:906_10: balakāyena parivuto ratijananaṃ uyyānaṃ pavisitvā hatthikkhandhato oruyha taṃ uyyānamanusañcaritvā
atk-s0511a:906_11: paramaruciradassane sakahadayasītale silātale nisīditvā pabbajjāya cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0511a:906_12: Taṅkhaṇaññeva suddhāvāsakhīṇāsavo mahābrahmā aṭṭha samaṇaparikkhāre ādāya mahāpurisassa
atk-s0511a:907_0: Mahāpuriso taṃ disvā – “kimida”nti pucchitvā, “samaṇaparikkhāro”ti sutvā alaṅkārabhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0511a:907_1: omuñcitvā pasādhanabhaṇḍāgārikassa hatthe datvā maṅgalakhaggamādāya saddhiṃ makuṭena
atk-s0511a:907_2: kese chinditvā antalikkhe ākāse ukkhipi. Atha sakko devarājā suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakena taṃ
atk-s0511a:907_3: kesamakuṭaṃ ādāya sinerumuddhani tiyojanappamāṇaṃ indanīlamaṇimayaṃ makuṭacetiyaṃ
atk-s0511a:907_4: nāma akāsi. Atha mahāpuriso devadattiyaṃ arahattadhajaṃ kāsāvaṃ paridahitvā sāṭakayugaṃ
atk-s0511a:907_5: ākāse khipi. Taṃ brahmā paṭiggahetvā brahmaloke dvādasayojanikaṃ sabbaratanamayaṃ
atk-s0511a:907_6: cetiyamakāsi. Dīpaṅkarakumāraṃ pana pabbajantaṃ ekā purisakoṭi anupabbaji. Tāya pana
atk-s0511a:907_7: parisāya parivuto bodhisatto dasa māse padhānacariyaṃ acari. Atha visākhapuṇṇamāya
atk-s0511a:908_0: Tasmiṃ kira nagare taṃdivasaṃ devatānaṃ balikaraṇatthāya nirudakapāyāsaṃ paciṃsu.
atk-s0511a:908_1: Tassa pana mahāsattassa saparisassa piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa manussā adaṃsu. Taṃ kira
atk-s0511a:908_2: sabbesaṃ koṭisaṅkhyāyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pariyattaṃ ahosi. Mahāpurisassa pana patte devatā
atk-s0511a:908_3: dibbojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu. Taṃ paribhuñjitvā tattheva sālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā
atk-s0511a:908_4: sāyanhasamaye paṭisallānā vuṭṭhāya gaṇaṃ vissajjetvā sunandena nāmājīvakena dinnā
atk-s0511a:908_5: aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā pipphalibodhirukkhamūlaṃ gantvā tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā
atk-s0511a:908_6: navutihatthaṃ bodhikkhandhaṃ piṭṭhito katvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ
atk-s0511a:909_0: Tato mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā rattiyā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme
atk-s0511a:909_1: dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā pacchimayāme anulomapaṭilomavasena paccayākāraṃ sammasitvā
atk-s0511a:909_2: ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisitvā
atk-s0511a:909_3: udayabbayavasena samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni disvā yāva gotrabhuñāṇaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0511a:909_4: aruṇodaye ariyamaggena sakalabuddhaguṇe paṭivijjhitvā buddhasīhanādaṃ naditvā sattasattāhaṃ
atk-s0511a:909_5: bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmetvā brahmuno dhammadesanaṃ paṭiññāya sunandārāme dhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0511a:909_6: pavattetvā koṭisatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ dhammāmataṃ pāyetvā catuddīpikamahāmegho viya
atk-s0511a:909_7: dhammavassaṃ vassento mahājanassa bandhanamokkhaṃ karonto janapadacārikaṃ vicari.
atk-s0511a:910: Tadā kira sumedhapaṇḍito samāpattisukhena vītināmento neva pathavikampanamaddasa na tāni nimittāni. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:917_0: Tattha evanti idāni vattabbaṃ nidasseti. Meti mama. Siddhippattassāti pañcābhiññāsiddhippattassa.
atk-s0511a:917_1: Vasībhūtassāti bhūtavasissa, ciṇṇavasībhāvamupagatassāti attho. Sāsaneti vivekamānasānaṃ
atk-s0511a:917_2: sāsane, anādaralakkhaṇe sāmivacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Jinoti kilesārijayanena jino.
atk-s0511a:918_0: Uppajjanteti paṭisandhiggahaṇe. Jāyanteti mātukucchito nikkhamane. Bujjhanteti anuttaraṃ
atk-s0511a:918_1: sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhante. Dhammadesaneti dhammacakkappavattane. Caturo nimitteti
atk-s0511a:918_3: catūsu ṭhānesu dasasahassilokadhātukampanādīni nimittānīti attho. Etthāha – tāni
atk-s0511a:918_4: pana bahūni nimittāni, kasmā “caturo nimitte”ti vuttaṃ, ayuttaṃ nanūti? Nāyuttaṃ,
atk-s0511a:918_5: yadipi etāni bahūni nimittāni, catūsu ṭhānesu pana pavattattā “caturo nimitte”ti
atk-s0511a:918_6: vuttaṃ. Nāddasanti nāddasiṃ. Idāni tesaṃ catunnaṃ nimittānaṃ adassane kāraṇaṃ niddisanto
atk-s0511a:918_8: samappitattā samaṅgībhūtattā tāni nimittāni nāddasanti attho.
atk-s0511a:919_0: Atha tasmiṃ kāle dīpaṅkaradasabalo catūhi khīṇāsavasatasahassehi parivuto anupubbena
atk-s0511a:919_1: cārikaṃ caramāno paramarammaṃ rammaṃ nāma nagaraṃ patvā sudassanamahāvihāre paṭivasati.
atk-s0511a:919_2: Rammanagaravāsino “dīpaṅkaro kira dasabalo anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko
atk-s0511a:919_3: anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno rammanagaraṃ patvā sudassanamahāvihāre paṭivasatī”ti
atk-s0511a:919_4: sutvā sappiādīni bhesajjāni gahetvā bhuttapātarāsā suddhuttarāsaṅgā pupphadhūpagandhahatthā
atk-s0511a:919_5: yena buddho tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā pupphādīhi pūjetvā
atk-s0511a:919_6: ekamantaṃ nisīditvā atimadhuraṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā svātanāya bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā
atk-s0511a:920_0: Te punadivase asadisamahādānaṃ sajjetvā maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā vimalakomalehi nīluppalehi
atk-s0511a:920_1: chādetvā catujjātigandhena paribhaṇḍaṃ kāretvā lājapañcamāni surabhikusumāni vikiritvā
atk-s0511a:920_2: maṇḍapassa catūsu koṇesu sītalamadhuravāripuṇṇā cāṭiyo ṭhapetvā kadalipaṇṇehi pidahitvā
atk-s0511a:920_3: maṇḍapopari jayasumanakusumasadisaṃ paramaruciradassanaṃ celavitānaṃ bandhitvā suvaṇṇamaṇirajatatārakāhi
atk-s0511a:920_4: racayitvā tattha gandhadāmapupphadāmapattadāmaratanadāmāni olambetvā dhūpehi duddinaṃ
atk-s0511a:920_5: katvā sakalañca taṃ rammaṃ rammanagaraṃ sammaṭṭhaṃ saphalakadaliyo ca pupphasamalaṅkate
atk-s0511a:920_6: puṇṇaghaṭe ca ṭhapāpetvā nānāvirāgā dhajapaṭākāyo ca samussāpetvā mahāvīthiyā ubhosu
atk-s0511a:920_7: passesu sāṇipākārehi parikkhipitvā dīpaṅkaradasabalassa āgamanamaggaṃ alaṅkarontā
atk-s0511a:920_8: udakaparibhinnaṭṭhānesu paṃsuṃ pakkhipitvā cikkhallakampi pathaviṃ asamaṃ samaṃ katvā
atk-s0511a:920_9: muttāsadisāhi vālukāhi ākiranti, lājapañcamehi ca pupphehi ākiranti, saphalakadalikamuke ca patiṭṭhāpenti.
atk-s0511a:921_0: Atha tasmiṃ kāle sumedhatāpaso attano assamapadato uggantvā rammanagaravāsīnaṃ tesaṃ
atk-s0511a:921_1: manussānaṃ uparibhāgena ākāsena gacchanto te haṭṭhapahaṭṭhe maggaṃ sodhente ca alaṅkaronte
atk-s0511a:921_2: ca disvā – “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti cintetvā sabbesaṃ passantānaññeva ākāsato oruyha
atk-s0511a:921_3: ekamante ṭhatvā te manusse pucchi – “ambho! Kassatthāya tumhe imaṃ maggaṃ sodhethā”ti? Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:934_0: Tattha paccantadesavisayeti majjhimadesasseva ekapasse paccantadesasaññite janapade.
atk-s0511a:934_1: Tassa āgamanaṃ magganti tena āgantabbaṃ magganti attho. Ahaṃ tena samayenāti ahaṃ
atk-s0511a:934_2: tasmiṃ samaye, bhummatthe cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sakassamāti attano assamapadato
atk-s0511a:934_3: nikkhamitvā. Dhunantoti odhunanto. “Tena samayena” ca, “tadā” cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ
atk-s0511a:934_4: padānaṃ ekatthattā purimassa nikkhamanakiriyāya pacchimassa ca gamanakiriyāya saddhiṃ
atk-s0511a:934_5: sambandho veditabbo, itarathā punaruttidosā na muccati. Tadāti tasmiṃ samaye.
atk-s0511a:935_0: Vedajātanti sañjātasomanassaṃ. Tuṭṭhahaṭṭhaṃ pamoditanti imāni tīṇi padāni aññamaññavevacanāni
atk-s0511a:935_1: aññamaññassa atthadīpanāni. Atha vā sukhena tuṭṭhaṃ, pītiyā haṭṭhaṃ, pāmojjena pamuditaṃ.
