atk-s0511a:935_2: Orohitvānāti otaritvā. Manusse pucchīti mānuse pucchi. Ayameva vā pāṭho. Tāvadeti
atk-s0511a:935_3: tadā, taṅkhaṇeyevāti attho. Idāni pucchitamatthaṃ dassentena “tuṭṭhahaṭṭho pamudito”tiādi
atk-s0511a:935_4: vuttaṃ. Tattha ayaṃ mahājano tuṭṭhahaṭṭho pamoditahadayo hutvā maggaṃ sodheti, kiṃ
atk-s0511a:935_5: kāraṇā sodheti, kassatthāya vā sodhetīti? Evaṃ “sodheti” saddaṃ āharitvā attho daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0511a:935_6: itarathā na yujjati. Sodhīyatīti suddhabhāvo karīyati. Maggo añjasaṃ vaṭumāyananti
atk-s0511a:936_0: Evaṃ tena sumedhatāpasena puṭṭhā te manussā āhaṃsu – “bhante sumedha, kiṃ na jānātha
atk-s0511a:936_1: dīpaṅkaro nāma buddho anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko janapadacārikaṃ
atk-s0511a:936_2: caramāno anukkamena amhākaṃ nagaraṃ patvā sudassanamahāvihāre paṭivasati, mayaṃ taṃ
atk-s0511a:936_3: bhagavantaṃ nimantayitvā tasseva buddhassa bhagavato āgamanamaggaṃ sodhemā”ti. Tato
atk-s0511a:936_4: taṃ sutvā sumedhapaṇḍito cintesi – “buddhoti kho panesa ghosopi dullabho, pageva
atk-s0511a:936_5: buddhuppādo, tena hi mayāpi imehi manussehi saddhiṃ dasabalassa āgamanamaggaṃ sodhetuṃ
atk-s0511a:936_6: vaṭṭatī”ti. So te manusse āha – “sace, bho, tumhe imaṃ maggaṃ buddhassa sodhetha,
atk-s0511a:936_7: mayhampi ekaṃ okāsaṃ detha, ahampi tumhehi saddhiṃ buddhassa maggaṃ sodhessāmī”ti.
atk-s0511a:936_8: Tato te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā – “ayaṃ sumedhapaṇḍito mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo”ti
atk-s0511a:936_9: jānamānā dubbisodhanaṃ udakasambhinnaṃ ativiya visamaṃ ekaṃ okāsaṃ sallakkhetvā –
atk-s0511a:936_10: “imaṃ okāsaṃ tumhe sodhetha alaṅkarotha cā”ti adaṃsu. Tato sumedhapaṇḍito buddhārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:936_11: pītiṃ uppādetvā cintesi – “ahaṃ pana imaṃ okāsaṃ iddhiyā paramadassanīyaṃ kātuṃ pahomi,
atk-s0511a:936_12: evaṃ kate pana maṃ na paritosessati. Ajja pana mayā kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0511a:937_0: Tassa pana tasmiṃ padese asodhite vippakateyeva rammanagaravāsino manussā bhagavato
atk-s0511a:937_1: kālamārocesuṃ – “niṭṭhitaṃ, bhante, bhatta”nti. Evaṃ tehi kāle ārocite dasabalo jayasumanakusumasadisavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:937_2: dupaṭṭacīvaraṃ timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetvā nivāsetvā tassupari suvaṇṇapāmaṅgena jayasumanakusumakalāpaṃ
atk-s0511a:937_3: parikkhipanto viya vijjulatāsassirikaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā kanakagirisikharamatthake
atk-s0511a:937_4: lākhārasaṃ parisiñcanto viya suvaṇṇacetiyaṃ pavāḷajālena parikkhipanto viya ca suvaṇṇagghikaṃ
atk-s0511a:937_5: rattakambalena paṭimuñcanto viya ca saradasamayarajanikaraṃ rattavalāhakena paṭicchādento
atk-s0511a:937_6: viya ca lākhārasena tintakiṃsukakusumasadisavaṇṇaṃ rattavarapaṃsukūlacīvaraṃ pārupitvā
atk-s0511a:937_7: gandhakuṭidvārato kañcanaguhato sīho viya nikkhamitvā gandhakuṭipamukhe aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:937_8: Atha sabbe bhikkhū attano attano pattacīvaramādāya bhagavantaṃ parivārayiṃsu. Te
atk-s0511a:937_9: pana parivāretvā ṭhitā bhikkhū evarūpā ahesuṃ –
atk-s0511a:944_0: Iti bhagavā sayaṃ vītarāgo vītarāgehi vītadoso vītadosehi vītamoho vītamohehi parivuto
atk-s0511a:944_1: ativiya virocittha. Atha satthā mahānubhāvānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ chaḷabhiññānaṃ catūhi
atk-s0511a:944_2: satasahassehi parivuto marugaṇaparivuto dasasatanayano viya brahmagaṇaparivuto hāritamahābrahmā
atk-s0511a:944_4: saradasamayarajanikaro viya ca gaganatalaṃ taṃ maggaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0511a:946: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇe kusume karonto, suvaṇṇavaṇṇo paṭipajji maggaṃ”.
atk-s0511a:947_0: Sumedhatāpasopi tena alaṅkatapaṭiyattena maggena āgacchantassa dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato
atk-s0511a:947_2: parikkhepaṃ sassirikaṃ indanīlamaṇisadisaṃ ākāse nānappakārā vijjulatā viya chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo
atk-s0511a:947_3: vissajjentaṃ rūpasobhaggappattaṃ attabhāvaṃ akkhīni ummīletvā oloketvā – “ajja mayā
atk-s0511a:947_4: dasabalassa jīvitapariccāgaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti, “mā bhagavā kalale akkami, maṇimayaphalakasetuṃ
atk-s0511a:947_5: akkamanto viya saddhiṃ catūhi khīṇāsavasatasahassehi mama piṭṭhiṃ akkamanto gacchatu,
atk-s0511a:947_6: taṃ me bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti kese mocetvā ajinajaṭāvākacīrāni
atk-s0511a:947_7: kāḷavaṇṇe kalale pattharitvā tattheva kalalapiṭṭhe nipajji. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:949: “Te me puṭṭhā viyākaṃsu, buddho loke anuttaro;
atk-s0511a:957: Idha bījāni ropissaṃ, khaṇo ve mā upaccagā.
atk-s0511a:963: Buddho buddhoti cintento, maggaṃ sodhemahaṃ tadā.
atk-s0511a:991: Mā naṃ kalale akkamittha, hitāya me bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0511a:992_0: Tattha viyākaṃsūti byākariṃsu. “Dīpaṅkaro nāma jino, tassa sodhīyati patho”tipi pāṭho.
atk-s0511a:992_1: Somanassaṃ pavedayinti somanassamanubhavinti attho. Tattha ṭhatvāti yasmiṃ padese
atk-s0511a:992_2: ākāsato otari, tattheva ṭhatvā. Saṃviggamānasoti pītivimhitamānaso. Idhāti imasmiṃ
atk-s0511a:992_3: dīpaṅkare puññakkhette. Bījānīti kusalabījāni. Ropissanti ropissāmi. Khaṇoti aṭṭhakkhaṇavirahito
atk-s0511a:992_4: navamo khaṇasannipāto. Atidullabho so mayā paṭiladdho. Veti nipātamattaṃ. Mā upaccagāti
atk-s0511a:992_5: so mā accagamā, mā atikkamīti attho. Dadāthāti detha. Teti ye me puṭṭhā manussā,
atk-s0511a:992_6: teti attho. Sodhemahaṃ tadāti sodhemi ahaṃ tadā. Aniṭṭhiteti apariyosite vippakate.
atk-s0511a:992_7: Khīṇāsavehīti ettha cattāro āsavā – kāmāsavo, bhavāsavo, diṭṭhāsavo, avijjāsavoti
atk-s0511a:992_8: ime cattāro āsavā yesaṃ khīṇā pahīnā samucchinnā paṭippassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā
atk-s0511a:992_9: daḍḍhā, te khīṇāsavā, tehi khīṇāsavehi. Khīṇāsavattāyeva vimalehi.
atk-s0511a:993_0: Devā manusse passantīti ettha devānaṃ manussadassane vattabbaṃ natthi, pakatidassanavasena
atk-s0511a:993_1: pana yathā manussā idha ṭhatvā passanti, evaṃ devāpi manusse passantīti attho. Devatāti
atk-s0511a:993_2: deve. Ubhopīti ubho devamanussā. Pañjalikāti katapañjalikā, ubhopi hatthe sirasi
atk-s0511a:993_3: patiṭṭhāpetvāti attho. Anuyanti tathāgatanti tathāgatassa pacchato yanti, anuyoge
atk-s0511a:993_4: sati sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṃ hotīti lakkhaṇaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “anuyanti tathāgata”nti.
atk-s0511a:994_0: Mandāravanti mandāravapupphaṃ. Disodisanti disato disato. Okirantīti avakiranti.
atk-s0511a:994_1: Ākāsanabhagatāti ākāsasaṅkhāte nabhasi gatā. Atha vā ākāsaṃ gatā saggagatāva. “Nabho”ti
atk-s0511a:994_2: hi saggo vuccati. Marūti amarā. Saralanti saralatarukusumaṃ. Nīpanti kadambapupphaṃ.
atk-s0511a:995_0: Kese muñcitvāhanti ahaṃ kese baddhā kalāpakuṭilajaṭā muñcitvā, vippakiritvāti attho.
atk-s0511a:995_1: Tatthāti mayhaṃ dinne okāse. Cammakanti cammakkhaṇḍaṃ. Kalaleti cikkhallakaddame.
atk-s0511a:995_2: Avakujjoti adhomukho hutvā. Nipajjahanti nipajjiṃ ahaṃ. Mā nanti ettha māti paṭisedhatthe
atk-s0511a:995_3: nipāto. Nanti padapūraṇatthe nipāto, buddho kalale mā akkamitthāti attho. Hitāya
atk-s0511a:995_4: me bhavissatīti taṃ kalale anakkamanaṃ dīgharattaṃ mama hitatthāya bhavissatīti.
atk-s0511a:996_0: Tato sumedhapaṇḍito kalalapiṭṭhe nipanno evaṃ cintesi – “sacāhaṃ iccheyyaṃ sabbakilese
atk-s0511a:996_1: jhāpetvā saṅghanavako hutvā rammanagaraṃ paviseyyaṃ, aññātakavesena pana me kilese
atk-s0511a:996_2: jhāpetvā nibbānappattiyā kiccaṃ natthi, yaṃnūnāhaṃ dīpaṅkaradasabalo viya paramābhisambodhiṃ
atk-s0511a:996_3: patvā dhammanāvaṃ āropetvā mahājanaṃ saṃsārasāgarā uttāretvā pacchā parinibbāyeyyaṃ,
atk-s0511a:996_4: idaṃ me patirūpa”nti. Tato aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā buddhabhāvāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā
atk-s0511a:999: Icchamāno ahaṃ ajja, kilese jhāpaye mama.
atk-s0511a:1012_0: Tattha pathaviyaṃ nipannassāti puthaviyā nipannassa. Ayameva vā pāṭho. Cetasoti cetaso
atk-s0511a:1012_1: parivitakko ahosīti attho. “Evaṃ me āsi cetanā”tipi pāṭho. Icchamānoti ākaṅkhamāno.
atk-s0511a:1012_2: Kileseti kilissanti upatāpentīti kilesā, rāgādayo dasa. Jhāpayeti jhāpeyyaṃ, mama
atk-s0511a:1013_0: Kinti paṭikkhepavacanaṃ. Aññātavesenāti apākaṭavesena, aviññātena paṭicchannena.
atk-s0511a:1013_1: Idha pana bhikkhū viya āsavakkhayaṃ katvā kiṃ, buddhakare dhamme pūretvā paṭisandhijātibodhidhammacakkappavattanesu
atk-s0511a:1013_2: mahāpathavikampanaṃ katvā buddho bodhetā, tiṇṇo tāretā, mutto mocetā bhaveyyanti
atk-s0511a:1014_0: Thāmadassināti attano thāmabalaṃ passamānena. Santāressanti santāressāmi. Sadevakanti
atk-s0511a:1014_1: sadevakaṃ sattanikāyaṃ, sadevakaṃ lokaṃ vā. Adhikārenāti adhivisiṭṭhena kārena, buddhassa
atk-s0511a:1014_2: mama jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā kalalapiṭṭhe sayanenādhikārenāti attho.
atk-s0511a:1015: Saṃsārasotanti kammakilesavasena yonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitinavasattāvāsesu ito cito ca saṃsaraṇaṃ saṃsāro. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a:1018_0: Saṃsāro ca so sotaṃ ceti saṃsārasotaṃ, taṃ saṃsārasotaṃ. Atha vā saṃsārassa sotaṃ
atk-s0511a:1018_1: saṃsārasotaṃ, saṃsārakāraṇaṃ taṇhāsotaṃ chinditvāti attho. Tayo bhaveti kāmarūpārūpabhave.
atk-s0511a:1018_2: Tibhavanibbattakakammakilesā tayo bhavāti adhippetā. Dhammanāvanti ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ
atk-s0511a:1018_3: maggaṃ. So hi caturoghuttaraṇaṭṭhena “dhammanāvā”ti vuccati. Samāruyhāti āruyha.
atk-s0511a:1018_4: Santāressanti santāressāmi. Yasmā pana buddhattaṃ patthentassa –
atk-s0511a:1023: Tattha manussattanti manussattabhāveyeva ṭhatvā buddhattaṃ patthentassa patthanā samijjhati, na nāgajātiādīsu ṭhitānaṃ. Kasmāti ce? Ahetukabhāvato.
atk-s0511a:1024_0: Liṅgasampattīti manussattabhāve vattamānassāpi purisaliṅge ṭhitasseva patthanā samijjhati,
atk-s0511a:1024_1: na itthiyā vā paṇḍakanapuṃsakaubhatobyañjanakānaṃ vā samijjhati. Kasmāti ce? Lakkhaṇapāripūriyā
atk-s0511a:1024_2: abhāvato. Vuttañhetaṃ – “aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ itthī arahaṃ assa
atk-s0511a:1024_3: sammāsambuddho”ti vitthāro. Tasmā itthiliṅge ṭhitassa manussajātikassāpi patthanā na samijjhati.
atk-s0511a:1025: Hetūti purisassāpi tasmiṃ attabhāve arahattappattiyā hetusampannasseva patthanā samijjhati, no itarassa.
atk-s0511a:1026_0: Satthāradassananti sace jīvamānakabuddhasseva santike pattheti patthanā samijjhati.
atk-s0511a:1026_1: Parinibbute bhagavati cetiyassa santike vā bodhirukkhamūle vā paṭimāya vā paccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ
atk-s0511a:1026_2: vā santike patthanā na samijjhati. Kasmā? Bhabbābhabbake ñatvā kammavipākaparicchedakañāṇena
atk-s0511a:1026_3: paricchinditvā byākātuṃ asamatthattā. Tasmā buddhassa santikeyeva patthanā samijjhati.
atk-s0511a:1027_0: Pabbajjāti buddhassa bhagavato santike patthentassāpi kammakiriyavādīsu tāpasesu
atk-s0511a:1027_1: vā bhikkhūsu vā pabbajitasseva patthanā samijjhati, no gihiliṅge ṭhitassa. Kasmā?
atk-s0511a:1027_2: Pabbajitāyeva hi bodhisattā sambodhiṃ adhigacchanti, na gahaṭṭhā. Tasmā ādimhi paṇidhānakālepi
atk-s0511a:1028: Guṇasampattīti pabbajitassāpi aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino pañcābhiññasseva samijjhati, na pana imāya guṇasampattiyā virahitassa. Kasmā? Nigguṇassa tadabhāvato.
atk-s0511a:1029: Adhikāroti guṇasampannenāpi yena attano jīvitaṃ buddhānaṃ pariccattaṃ hoti, tassa iminā adhikārena sampannasseva samijjhati, na itarassa.
atk-s0511a:1030_0: Chandatāti abhinīhārasampannassāpi yassa buddhakārakadhammānaṃ atthāya mahanto chando
atk-s0511a:1030_1: vāyāmo ca ussāho ca pariyeṭṭhi ca, tasseva samijjhati, na itarassa. Tatridaṃ chandamahantatāya
atk-s0511a:1030_2: opammaṃ – sace hi evamassa, “yo pana sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ ekodakībhūtaṃ attano
atk-s0511a:1030_3: bāhubalena uttaritvā pāraṃ gantuṃ samattho, so buddhattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Yo panimaṃ attano
atk-s0511a:1030_4: dukkaraṃ na maññati ‘ahaṃ imaṃ uttaritvā pāraṃ gamissāmī”’ti evaṃ mahatā chandena
atk-s0511a:1030_5: ussāhena samannāgato hoti, tassa patthanā samijjhati, na itarassa.
atk-s0511a:1031_0: Sumedhapaṇḍito pana ime aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvāva buddhabhāvāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā
atk-s0511a:1031_1: nipajji. Dīpaṅkaropi bhagavā āgantvā sumedhapaṇḍitassa sīsabhāge ṭhatvā kalalapiṭṭhe
atk-s0511a:1031_2: nipannaṃ sumedhatāpasaṃ disvā – “ayaṃ tāpaso buddhattāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā nipanno,
atk-s0511a:1031_3: ijjhissati nu kho etassa patthanā, udāhu no”ti anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ pesetvā upadhārento
atk-s0511a:1031_4: – “ito kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni atikkamitvā gotamo nāma buddho
atk-s0511a:1031_5: bhavissatī”ti ñatvā ṭhitakova parisamajjhe byākāsi – “passatha no, tumhe bhikkhave,
atk-s0511a:1031_6: imaṃ uggatapaṃ tāpasaṃ kalalapiṭṭhe nipanna”nti. “Evaṃ, bhante”ti. Ayaṃ buddhattāya
atk-s0511a:1031_7: abhinīhāraṃ katvā nipanno, samijjhissati imassa tāpasassa patthanā, ayañhi ito kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ
atk-s0511a:1031_8: catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake gotamo nāma buddho loke bhavissati. Tasmiṃ panassa
atk-s0511a:1031_9: attabhāve kapilavatthu nāma nagaraṃ nivāso bhavissati, mahāmāyā nāma devī mātā, suddhodano
atk-s0511a:1031_10: nāma rājā pitā, upatisso ca kolito ca dve aggasāvakā, ānando nāma upaṭṭhāko, khemā
atk-s0511a:1031_11: ca uppalavaṇṇā ca dve aggasāvikā bhavissanti. Ayaṃ paripakkañāṇo hutvā mahābhinikkhamanaṃ
atk-s0511a:1031_12: nikkhamitvā mahāpadhānaṃ padahitvā nigrodhamūle sujātāya nāma kumāriyā dinnaṃ pāyāsaṃ
atk-s0511a:1031_13: paṭiggahetvā nerañjarāya tīre paribhuñjitvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha assattharukkhamūle
atk-s0511a:1052: Pitā suddhodano nāma, ayaṃ hessati gotamo.
atk-s0511a:1055: Kolito upatisso ca, aggā hessanti sāvakā;
atk-s0511a:1064_0: Tattha lokavidūti sabbathā viditalokattā pana lokavidū. Bhagavā hi sabhāvato samudayato
atk-s0511a:1064_1: nirodhato nirodhūpāyatoti sabbathāpi lokaṃ avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi. Tasmā lokavidūti vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a:1066: Lokassa antaṃ samitāvi ñatvā, nāsīsatī lokamimaṃ parañcā”ti. ;
atk-s0511a:1067_0: Api ca tayo lokā – saṅkhāraloko, sattaloko, okāsalokoti. Tattha saṅkhāraloko nāma
atk-s0511a:1067_1: paṭiccasamuppannā pathaviādayo dhammā. Sattaloko nāma saññino asaññino nevasaññināsaññino
atk-s0511a:1067_2: ca sattā. Okāsaloko nāma sattānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ. Ime pana tayopi lokā bhagavatā yathāsabhāvato
atk-s0511a:1067_3: viditā, tasmā lokavidūti vuccati. Āhutīnaṃ paṭiggahoti dānānaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ arahattā
atk-s0511a:1067_4: dakkhiṇeyyattā āhutīnaṃ paṭiggaho. Ussīsake maṃ ṭhatvānāti mama sīsasamīpe ṭhatvā.
atk-s0511a:1067_5: Idaṃ idāni vattabbaṃ vacanaṃ abravīti attho. Jaṭilanti jaṭā assa santīti jaṭilo,
atk-s0511a:1067_6: taṃ jaṭilaṃ. Uggatāpananti uggatāpasaṃ. Ahūti ahani, athāti attho. Ayameva vā pāṭho.
atk-s0511a:1067_7: Kapilavhayāti kapilaavhayā abhidhānā. Rammāti ramaṇīyato. Padhānanti vīriyaṃ. Ehitīti
atk-s0511a:1068_0: Tato sumedhapaṇḍito – “mayhaṃ kira patthanā samijjhissatī”ti sañjātasomanasso ahosi.
atk-s0511a:1068_1: Mahājano dīpaṅkaradasabalassa vacanaṃ sutvā – “sumedhatāpaso kira buddhabījaṅkuro”ti
atk-s0511a:1068_2: haṭṭhatuṭṭho ahosi. Evañcassa ahosi – “yathā nāma puriso nadiṃ taranto ujukena titthena
atk-s0511a:1068_3: tarituṃ asakkonto heṭṭhātitthena uttarati, evameva mayaṃ dīpaṅkaradasabalassa sāsane
atk-s0511a:1068_4: maggaphalaṃ alabhamānā anāgate yadā tvaṃ buddho bhavissasi, tadā tava sammukhā maggaphalaṃ
atk-s0511a:1068_5: sacchikātuṃ samatthā bhaveyyāmā”ti patthanaṃ akaṃsu. Dīpaṅkaradasabalo bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0511a:1068_6: mahāsattaṃ pasaṃsitvā aṭṭhahi pupphamuṭṭhīhi pūjetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi. Tepi
atk-s0511a:1068_7: catusatasahassā khīṇāsavā bodhisattaṃ pupphehi ca gandhehi ca pūjetvā padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:1068_8: katvā pakkamiṃsu. Devamanussā pana tatheva pūjetvā vanditvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:1069_0: Atha sabbalokamatidīpaṅkaro dīpaṅkaro bhagavā catūhi khīṇāsavasatasahassehi parivuto
atk-s0511a:1069_2: viya jaṅgamamāno anekesu pāṭihāriyesu vattamānesu tena alaṅkatapaṭiyattena maggena
atk-s0511a:1069_4: bhamaragaṇehi gumbagumbāyamānaṃ dhūpandhakāraṃ amarapurasadisasobhaṃ abhirammaṃ rammanagaraṃ
atk-s0511a:1069_5: pavisitvā paññatte mahārahe buddhāsane yugandharamatthake saradasamayarucirakararajanikaro
atk-s0511a:1069_7: nisīdi. Bhikkhusaṅghopi paṭipāṭiyā attano attano pattāsane nisīdi. Rammanagaravāsino
atk-s0511a:1069_8: pana upāsakā saddhādiguṇasampannā nānāvidhakhajjādīhi samalaṅkataṃ vaṇṇagandharasasampannaṃ
atk-s0511a:1069_9: asadisaṃ sukhanidānaṃ dānaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa adaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:1070_0: Atha kho bodhisatto dasabalassa byākaraṇaṃ sutvā buddhabhāvaṃ karatalagatamiva maññamāno
atk-s0511a:1070_1: pamuditahadayo sabbesu paṭikkantesu sayanā vuṭṭhāya – “pāramiyo vicinissāmī”ti puppharāsimatthake
atk-s0511a:1070_2: pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdi. Evaṃ nisinne mahāsatte sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā
atk-s0511a:1070_3: sādhukāraṃ datvā – “ayya sumedhatāpasa, porāṇakabodhisattānaṃ pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
atk-s0511a:1070_4: – ‘pāramiyo vicinissāmī’ti nisinnakāle yāni pubbanimittāni nāma paññāyanti, tāni
atk-s0511a:1070_5: sabbānipi ajja pātubhūtāni nissaṃsayena tvaṃ buddho bhavissasi, mayametaṃ jānāma
atk-s0511a:1070_6: – ‘yassetāni nimittāni paññāyanti, so ekanteneva buddho bhavissati’ tasmā tvaṃ attano
atk-s0511a:1070_7: vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā paggaṇhā”ti bodhisattaṃ nānappakārāhi thutīhi abhitthaviṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1091: Devā manussā asurā ca, abhivādetvāna pakkamuṃ.
atk-s0511a:1097: Pītiyā ca abhissanno, pallaṅkaṃ ābhujiṃ tadā.

atk-s0511a:1186: “Na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati;
atk-s0511a:1188_0: Mahesinoti mahante sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhe esi gavesīti mahesī, tassa mahesino.
atk-s0511a:1188_1: Naramarūti narā ca amarā ca, ukkaṭṭhaniddeso panāyaṃ sabbepi dasasahassilokadhātuyā
atk-s0511a:1188_2: nāgasupaṇṇayakkhādayopi āmoditāva. Buddhabījaṃ kira ayanti ayaṃ kira buddhaṅkuro
atk-s0511a:1189_0: Ukkuṭṭhisaddāti unnādasaddā vattanti. Apphoṭentīti hatthehi bāhā abhihananti. Dasasahassīti
atk-s0511a:1189_1: dasasahassilokadhātuyo. Sadevakāti saha devehi sadevakā dasasahassī namassantīti
atk-s0511a:1189_2: attho. Yadimassāti yadi imassa, ayameva vā pāṭho. Virajjhissāmāti yadi na sampāpuṇissāma.
atk-s0511a:1189_3: Anāgatamhi addhāneti anāgate kāle. Hessāmāti bhavissāma. Sammukhāti sammukhībhūtā.
atk-s0511a:1190_0: Nadiṃ tarantāti nadītaraṇakā, “naditarantā”tipi pāṭho. Paṭititthanti paṭimukhatitthaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1190_1: Virajjhiyāti virajjhitvā. Yadi muñcāmāti yadi imaṃ bhagavantaṃ muñcitvā akatakiccā
atk-s0511a:1190_2: gamissāmāti attho. Mama kammaṃ pakittetvāti mama bhāvitamatthaṃ byākaritvā. Dakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:1191_0: Jinaputtāti dīpaṅkarassa satthuno sāvakā. Devā manussā asurā ca, abhivādetvāna pakkamunti
atk-s0511a:1191_1: devādayo sabbepi ime maṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pupphādīhi pūjetvā suppatiṭṭhitapañcaṅgā
atk-s0511a:1191_2: vanditvā nivattitvā punappunaṃ oloketvā madhuratthabyañjanāhi nānappakārāhi thutīhi
atk-s0511a:1191_3: vaṇṇentā pakkamiṃsu. “Narā nāgā ca gandhabbā, abhivādetvāna pakkamu”ntipi pāṭho.
atk-s0511a:1192_0: Dassanaṃ me atikkanteti mama dassanavisayaṃ bhagavati atikkante. “Jahite dassanūpacāre”tipi
atk-s0511a:1192_1: pāṭho. Sasaṅgheti saddhiṃ saṅghena sasaṅgho, tasmiṃ sasaṅghe. Sayanā vuṭṭhahitvānāti
atk-s0511a:1192_2: nipannaṭṭhānato kalalato uṭṭhahitvā. Pallaṅkaṃ ābhujinti katapallaṅko hutvā puppharāsimhi
atk-s0511a:1192_3: nisīdinti attho. “Haṭṭho haṭṭhena cittena, āsanā vuṭṭhahiṃ tadā”tipi pāṭho, so uttānatthova.
atk-s0511a:1193_0: Pītiyā ca abhissannoti pītiparipphuṭo. Vasībhūtoti vasībhāvappatto. Jhāneti rūpāvacarārūpāvacarajhānesu.
atk-s0511a:1193_1: Sahassiyamhīti dasasahassiyaṃ. Lokamhīti lokadhātuyā. Me samāti mayā sadisā. Avisesena
atk-s0511a:1193_2: “me samā natthī”ti vatvā idāni tameva niyamento “asamo iddhidhammesū”ti āha. Tattha
atk-s0511a:1193_3: iddhidhammesūti pañcasu iddhidhammesūti attho. Alabhinti paṭilabhiṃ. Īdisaṃ sukhanti īdisaṃ somanassaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1194_0: Atha sumedhatāpaso dasabalassa byākaraṇaṃ sutvā buddhabhāvaṃ karatalagatakālamiva
atk-s0511a:1194_1: maññamāno pamuditahadayo dasasu lokadhātusahassesu suddhāvāsamahābrahmāno atītabuddhadassāvino
atk-s0511a:1194_3: pakāsento maṃ paritosayantā imā gāthāyo āhaṃsūti dassento bhagavā “pallaṅkābhujane mayha”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0511a:1195_0: Tattha pallaṅkābhujane mayhanti mama pallaṅkābhujane. Ayameva vā pāṭho. Dasasahassādhivāsinoti
atk-s0511a:1195_1: dasasahassivāsino mahābrahmāno. Yā pubbeti yāni pubbe, vibhattilopaṃ katvā vuttanti
atk-s0511a:1195_2: veditabbaṃ. Pallaṅkavaramābhujeti varapallaṅkābhujane. Nimittāni padissantīti nimittāni
atk-s0511a:1195_3: padissiṃsūti attho. Atītavacane vattabbe vattamānavacanaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi vuttaṃ,
atk-s0511a:1195_4: atītavasena attho gahetabbo. Tāni ajja padissareti pubbepi niyatabodhisattānaṃ pallaṅkābhujane
atk-s0511a:1195_5: yāni nimittāni uppajjiṃsu, tāni nimittāni ajja padissare. Tasmā tvaṃ dhuvameva buddho
atk-s0511a:1195_6: bhavissasīti attho. Na pana tāniyeva nimittāni uppajjiṃsu, taṃsadisattā “tāni ajja
atk-s0511a:1196_0: Sītanti sītattaṃ. Byapagatanti gataṃ vigataṃ. Tānīti sītavigamanauṇhupasamanānīti
atk-s0511a:1196_1: attho. Nissaddāti asaddā anigghosā. Nirākulāti anākulā, ayameva vā pāṭho. Na sandantīti
atk-s0511a:1196_2: na vahanti nappavattanti. Savantiyoti nadiyo. Tānīti avāyanaasandanāni. Thalajāti
atk-s0511a:1196_3: pathavitalapabbatarukkhesu jātāni. Dakajāti odakāni pupphāni. Pupphantīti pubbe bodhisattānaṃ
atk-s0511a:1196_4: pupphiṃsu, atītatthe vattamānavacanaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Tepajja pupphitānīti
atk-s0511a:1197_0: Phalabhārāti phaladharā. Tepajjāti tepi ajja, pulliṅgavasena “tepī”ti vuttaṃ, “latā
atk-s0511a:1197_1: vā rukkhā vā”ti vuttattā. Phalitāti sañjātaphalā. Ākāsaṭṭhā ca bhūmaṭṭhā cāti ākāsagatā
atk-s0511a:1197_2: ca bhūmigatā ca ratanānīti muttādīni ratanāni. Jotantīti obhāsanti. Mānussakāti manussānaṃ
atk-s0511a:1197_3: santakā mānussakā. Dibbāti devānaṃ santakā dibbā. Turiyāti ātataṃ vitataṃ ātatavitataṃ
atk-s0511a:1197_4: susiraṃ ghananti pañca turiyāni. Tattha ātataṃ nāma cammapariyonaddhesu bheriādīsu
atk-s0511a:1197_5: ekatalaturiyaṃ. Vitataṃ nāma ubhayatalaṃ. Ātatavitataṃ nāma sabbato pariyonaddhaṃ
atk-s0511a:1197_6: mahativallakiādikaṃ. Susiraṃ nāma vaṃsādikaṃ. Ghanaṃ nāma sammatāḷādikaṃ. Vajjantīti
atk-s0511a:1197_7: heṭṭhā vuttanayena vajjiṃsu, atītatthe vattamānavacanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Esa nayo upari
atk-s0511a:1197_8: īdisesu vacanesupi. Abhiravantīti tatra tatra kusalehi sumuñcitā suppatāḷitā suvāditā
atk-s0511a:1198_0: Vicittapupphāti vicitrāni nānāgandhavaṇṇāni pupphāni. Abhivassantīti abhivassiṃsu,
atk-s0511a:1198_1: nipatiṃsūti attho. Tepīti tānipi vicitrapupphāni abhivassantāni padissanti, devabrahmagaṇehi
atk-s0511a:1198_2: okiriyamānānīti adhippāyo. Ābhujatīti osakkati. Tepajjubhoti tepi ajja ubho mahāsamuddadasasahassiyo.
atk-s0511a:1198_3: Abhiravantīti abhinadanti. Nirayeti nirayesu. Dasasahassāti anekadasasahassā. Nibbantīti
atk-s0511a:1198_4: sammanti, santiṃ upentīti attho. Tārakāti nakkhattāni. Tepi ajja padissantīti tepi
atk-s0511a:1198_5: sūriyassa vimalabhāvā tārakā ajja divā dissanti.
atk-s0511a:1199_0: Anovaṭṭhenāti anovaṭṭhe, bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. Atha vā anovaṭṭheti anabhivaṭṭhepi.
atk-s0511a:1199_1: Nāti nipātamattaṃ “sutvā na dūtavacana”ntiādīsu viya. Tampajjubbhijjateti tampi udakaṃ
atk-s0511a:1199_2: ajja ubbhijjati, ubbhijjitvā uṭṭhahatīti attho. Mahiyāti pathaviyā, nissakkavacanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1199_3: Tārāgaṇāti gahanakkhattādayo sabbe tāragaṇā. Nakkhattāti nakkhattatārakā ca. Gaganamaṇḍaleti
atk-s0511a:1199_4: sakalagaganamaṇḍalaṃ virocantīti attho. Bilāsayāti bilāsayā ahinakulakumbhīlagodhādayo.
atk-s0511a:1199_5: Darīsayāti jharāsayā. Ayameva vā pāṭho. Nikkhamantīti nikkhamiṃsu. Sakāsayāti attano
atk-s0511a:1199_6: attano āsayato. “Tadāsayā”tipi pāṭho. Tassa tadā tasmiṃ kāle, āsayato, bilatoti attho.
atk-s0511a:1200_0: Aratīti ukkaṇṭhā. Santuṭṭhāti paramena santuṭṭhena santuṭṭhā. Vinassatīti vigacchati.
atk-s0511a:1200_1: Rāgoti kāmarāgo. Tadā tanu hotīti oramattako hoti, iminā pariyuṭṭhānābhāvaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0511a:1200_2: Vihatāti vinaṭṭhā. Tadāti pubbe, bodhisattānaṃ pallaṅkābhujaneti attho. Na bhavatīti
atk-s0511a:1200_3: na hoti. Ajjapetanti ajja tava pallaṅkābhujanepi etaṃ bhayaṃ na hotevāti attho. Tena
atk-s0511a:1200_4: liṅgena jānāmāti tena kāraṇena sabbeva mayaṃ jānāma, yaṃ tvaṃ buddho bhavissasīti attho.
atk-s0511a:1201_0: Anuddhaṃsatīti na uggacchati. Aniṭṭhagandhoti duggandho. Pakkamatīti pakkami vigacchi.
atk-s0511a:1201_1: Pavāyatīti pavāyi. Sopajjāti sopi dibbagandho ajja. Padissantīti padissiṃsu. Tepajjāti
atk-s0511a:1201_2: tepi sabbe devā ajja. Yāvatāti paricchedanatthe nipāto, yattakāti attho. Kuṭṭāti
atk-s0511a:1201_3: pākārā. Na hontāvaraṇāti āvaraṇakarā na ahesuṃ. Tadāti pubbe. Ākāsabhūtāti te kuṭṭakavāṭapabbatā
atk-s0511a:1201_4: āvaraṇaṃ tirokaraṇaṃ kātuṃ asakkontā, ajaṭākāsabhūtāti attho. Cutīti maraṇaṃ. Upapattīti
atk-s0511a:1201_5: paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ. Khaṇeti pubbe bodhisattānaṃ pallaṅkābhujanakkhaṇe. Na vijjatīti
atk-s0511a:1201_6: nāhosi. Tānipajjāti tānipi ajja cavanabhavanānīti attho. Mā nivattīti mā paṭikkami.
atk-s0511a:1202_0: Tato sumedhapaṇḍito dīpaṅkarassa dasabalassa ca dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānañca vacanaṃ
atk-s0511a:1202_1: sutvā bhiyyosomattāya sañjātussāho hutvā cintesi – “buddhā nāma amoghavacanā, natthi
atk-s0511a:1202_2: buddhānaṃ kathāya aññathattaṃ. Yathā hi ākāse khittassa leḍḍussa patanaṃ dhuvaṃ,
atk-s0511a:1202_3: jātassa maraṇaṃ, aruṇe uggate sūriyassa abbhuggamanaṃ, āsayā nikkhantassa sīhassa
atk-s0511a:1202_4: sīhanādanadanaṃ, garugabbhāya itthiyā bhāramoropanaṃ dhuvaṃ avassambhāvī, evameva
atk-s0511a:1202_5: buddhānaṃ vacanaṃ nāma dhuvaṃ amoghaṃ, addhā ahaṃ buddho bhavissāmīti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1208: Vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1210: “Yathā khittaṃ nabhe leḍḍu, dhuvaṃ patati bhūmiyaṃ;
atk-s0511a:1212: Vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1216: Vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1220: Vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1224: Vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1228: Vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmaha”nti.
atk-s0511a:1229_0: Tattha buddhassa vacanaṃ sutvā, dasasahassī na cūbhayanti dīpaṅkarasammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0511a:1229_1: ca dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānañca vacanaṃ sutvā. Ubhayanti ubhayesaṃ, sāmiatthe
atk-s0511a:1229_2: paccattavacanaṃ, ubhayavacanaṃ vā. Evaṃ cintesahanti evaṃ cintesiṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1230_1: pāṭho, tassa niddosavacanāti attho. Amoghavacanāti avitathavacanā. Vitathanti vitathavacanaṃ
atk-s0511a:1230_2: natthīti attho. Dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahanti ahaṃ ekaṃseneva buddho bhavissāmīti niyatavasena
atk-s0511a:1231_0: Sūriyuggamananti sūriyassa udayanaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Dhuvasassatanti ekaṃsabhāvī
atk-s0511a:1231_1: ceva sassatañca. Nikkhantasayanassāti sayanato nikkhantassa. Āpannasattānanti garugabbhānaṃ,
atk-s0511a:1231_2: gabbhinīnanti attho. Bhāramoropananti bhāraoropanaṃ, gabbhassa oropananti attho.
atk-s0511a:1232_0: “Svāhaṃ addhā buddho bhavissāmī”ti evaṃ katasanniṭṭhāno buddhakārake dhamme upadhāretuṃ
atk-s0511a:1232_1: – “kahaṃ nu kho buddhakārakā dhammā”ti, uddhaṃ adho disāsu vidisāsūti anukkamena
atk-s0511a:1232_2: sakalaṃ dhammadhātuṃ vicinanto pubbe porāṇakehi bodhisattehi āsevitanisevitaṃ paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0511a:1232_3: dānapāramiṃ disvā evaṃ attānaṃ ovadi – “sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0511a:1232_4: dānapāramiṃ pūreyyāsi. Yathā hi nikujjito udakakumbho nissesaṃ katvā udakaṃ vamatiyeva
atk-s0511a:1232_5: na paccāharati, evameva dhanaṃ vā yasaṃ vā puttadāraṃ vā aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ vā anoloketvā
atk-s0511a:1232_6: sabbattha yācakānaṃ sabbaṃ icchiticchitaṃ nissesaṃ katvā dadamāno bodhimūle nisīditvā
atk-s0511a:1232_7: buddho bhavissasī”ti paṭhamaṃ dānapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1235: Uddhaṃ adho dasa disā, yāvatā dhammadhātuyā.
atk-s0511a:1240: “Imaṃ tvaṃ paṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a:1243: “Yathāpi kumbho sampuṇṇo, yassa kassaci adho kato;
atk-s0511a:1247: Dadāhi dānaṃ nissesaṃ, kumbho viya adho kato”ti.
atk-s0511a:1248_0: Tattha handāti vavassaggatthe nipāto. Buddhakare dhammeti buddhattakare dhamme. Buddhattakarā
atk-s0511a:1248_1: nāma dhammā dānapāramitādayo dasa dhammā. Vicināmīti vicinissāmi, vīmaṃsissāmi upaparikkhissāmīti
atk-s0511a:1248_2: attho. Ito citoti ito ito, ayameva vā pāṭho. Tattha tattha vicināmīti attho. Uddhanti
atk-s0511a:1248_3: devaloke. Adhoti manussaloke. Dasa disāti dasasu disāsu; kattha nu kho te buddhakārakadhammā
atk-s0511a:1248_4: uddhaṃ adho tiriyaṃ disāsu vidisāsūti adhippāyo. Yāvatā dhammadhātuyāti ettha yāvatāti
atk-s0511a:1248_5: paricchedavacanaṃ. Dhammadhātuyāti sabhāvadhammassa, pavattanīti vacanaseso daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a:1248_6: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yāvatikā sabhāvadhammānaṃ kāmarūpārūpadhammānaṃ pavatti, tāvatikaṃ
atk-s0511a:1249_0: Vicinantoti vīmaṃsanto upaparikkhanto. Pubbakehīti porāṇehi bodhisattehi. Anuciṇṇanti
atk-s0511a:1249_1: ajjhāciṇṇaṃ āsevitaṃ. Samādiyāti samādiyanaṃ karohi, ajja paṭṭhāya ayaṃ paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0511a:1249_2: dānapāramī pūretabbā mayāti evaṃ samādiyāti attho. Dānapāramitaṃ gacchāti dānapāramiṃ
atk-s0511a:1249_3: gaccha, pūrayāti attho. Yadi bodhiṃ pattumicchasīti bodhimūlamupagantvā anuttaraṃ
atk-s0511a:1249_4: sammāsambodhiṃ pattuṃ icchasi ce. Yassa kassacīti udakassa vā khīrassa vā yassa kassaci
atk-s0511a:1249_5: sampuṇṇo. Sampuṇṇasaddayoge sati sāmivacanaṃ icchanti saddavidū. Karaṇatthe vā sāmivacanaṃ,
atk-s0511a:1249_6: yena kenacīti attho. Adho katoti heṭṭhāmukhīkato. Na tattha parirakkhatīti tasmiṃ
atk-s0511a:1249_7: vamane na parirakkhati, nissesaṃ udakaṃ vamatevāti attho. Hīnamukkaṭṭhamajjhimeti
atk-s0511a:1249_8: hīnamajjhimapaṇīte. Ma-kāro padasandhikaro. Kumbho viya adho katoti heṭṭhāmukhīkato
atk-s0511a:1249_9: viya kumbho. Yācake upagate disvā – “tvaṃ, sumedha, attano anavasesetvā sabbadhanapariccāgena
atk-s0511a:1249_10: dānapāramiṃ, aṅgapariccāgena upapāramiṃ, jīvitapariccāgena paramatthapāramiñca pūrehī”ti
atk-s0511a:1250_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakehi dhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato
atk-s0511a:1250_1: dutiyaṃ sīlapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi – “sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya sīlapāramiṃ
atk-s0511a:1250_2: pūreyyāsi. Yathā camarī migo nāma jīvitampi anoloketvā attano vālameva rakkhati,
atk-s0511a:1250_3: evaṃ tvampi ito paṭṭhāya jīvitampi anoloketvā sīlameva rakkhanto buddho bhavissasī”ti
atk-s0511a:1250_4: dutiyaṃ sīlapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1258: “Imaṃ tvaṃ dutiyaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a:1262: Upeti maraṇaṃ tattha, na vikopeti vāladhiṃ.
atk-s0511a:1265: Parirakkha sabbadā sīlaṃ, camarī viya vāladhi”nti.
atk-s0511a:1266_0: Tattha na heteti na hi eteyeva. Bodhipācanāti maggaparipācanā sabbaññutaññāṇaparipācanā
atk-s0511a:1266_1: vā. Dutiyaṃ sīlapāraminti sīlaṃ nāma sabbesaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ patiṭṭhā, sīle patiṭṭhito
atk-s0511a:1266_2: kusaladhammehi na parihāyati, sabbepi lokiyalokuttaraguṇe paṭilabhati. Tasmā sīlapāramī
atk-s0511a:1267_0: Āsevitanisevitanti bhāvitañceva bahulīkatañca. Camarīti camarī migo. Kismiñcīti yattha
atk-s0511a:1267_1: katthaci rukkhalatākaṇṭakādīsu aññatarasmiṃ. Paṭilaggitanti paṭivilaggitaṃ. Tatthāti
atk-s0511a:1267_2: yattha vilaggitaṃ, tattheva ṭhatvā maraṇaṃ upagacchati. Na vikopetīti na chindati.
atk-s0511a:1267_3: Vāladhinti vālaṃ chinditvā na gacchati, tattheva maraṇaṃ upetīti attho.
atk-s0511a:1268_0: Catūsu bhūmīsu sīlānīti catūsu ṭhānesu vibhattasīlāni, pātimokkhasaṃvaraindriyasaṃvaraājīvapārisuddhipaccayasannissitavasenāti
atk-s0511a:1268_1: attho. Bhūmivasena pana dvīsuyeva bhūmīsu pariyāpannaṃ tampi catusīlamevāti. Paripūrayāti
atk-s0511a:1268_2: khaṇḍachiddasabalādiabhāvena paripūraya. Sabbadāti sabbakālaṃ. Camarī viyāti camarī
atk-s0511a:1269_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakehi dhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato
atk-s0511a:1269_1: tatiyaṃ nekkhammapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi – “sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya nekkhammapāramimpi
atk-s0511a:1269_2: pūreyyāsi. Yathāpi suciraṃ bandhanāgāre vasamāno puriso na tattha sinehaṃ karoti,
atk-s0511a:1269_3: atha kho ukkaṇṭhito avasitukāmo hoti, evameva tvampi sabbabhave bandhanāgārasadise
atk-s0511a:1269_4: katvā passa, sabbabhavehi ukkaṇṭhito muccitukāmo hutvā nekkhammābhimukhova hoti,
atk-s0511a:1269_5: evaṃ buddho bhavissasī”ti tatiyaṃ nekkhammapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1277: “Imaṃ tvaṃ tatiyaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a:1281: Na tattha rāgaṃ janeti, muttiṃyeva gavesati.
atk-s0511a:1285_0: Tattha andughareti bandhanāgāre. Ciravuṭṭhoti cirakālaṃ vuṭṭho. Dukhaṭṭitoti dukkhapīḷito.
atk-s0511a:1285_1: Na tattha rāgaṃ janetīti tattha andughare rāgaṃ sinehaṃ na janeti na uppādeti. “Imaṃ
atk-s0511a:1285_2: andugharaṃ muñcitvā nāhaṃ aññattha gamissāmī”ti evaṃ tattha rāgaṃ na janeti, kintu
atk-s0511a:1285_3: muttiṃyeva mokkhameva gavesatīti adhippāyo. Nekkhammābhimukhoti nikkhamanābhimukho
atk-s0511a:1285_4: hoti. Bhavatoti sabbabhavehi. Parimuttiyāti parimocanatthāya. Nekkhammābhimukho hutvā,
atk-s0511a:1286_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato
atk-s0511a:1286_1: catutthaṃ paññāpāramiṃ disvā etadahosi – “sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya paññāpāramimpi
atk-s0511a:1286_2: pūreyyāsi. Hīnamajjhimukkaṭṭhesu kañci avajjetvā sabbepi paṇḍite upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ
atk-s0511a:1286_3: puccheyyāsi. Yathāpi piṇḍacāriko bhikkhu hīnādibhedesu kulesu kiñci kulaṃ avivajjetvā
atk-s0511a:1286_4: paṭipāṭiyā piṇḍāya caranto khippaṃ yāpanamattaṃ labhati, evameva tvampi sabbe paṇḍite
atk-s0511a:1286_5: upasaṅkamitvā pucchanto buddho bhavissasī”ti catutthaṃ paññāpāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā
atk-s0511a:1294: “Imaṃ tvaṃ catutthaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a:1298: Kulāni na vivajjento, evaṃ labhati yāpanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1302_0: Tattha bhikkhantoti piṇḍāya caranto. Hīnamukkaṭṭhamajjhimeti hīnamukkaṭṭhamajjhimāni
atk-s0511a:1302_1: kulānīti attho. Liṅgavipariyāso kato. Na vivajjentoti na pariharanto, gharapaṭipāṭiṃ
atk-s0511a:1302_2: muñcitvā caranto vivajjeti nāma, evamakatvāti attho. Yāpananti yāpanamattaṃ pāṇadhāraṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:1302_3: āhāraṃ labhatīti attho. Paripucchanti – “kiṃ, bhante, kusalaṃ, kiṃ akusalaṃ; kiṃ
atk-s0511a:1302_4: sāvajjaṃ, kiṃ anavajja”ntiādinā nayena tattha tattha abhiññāte paṇḍite jane upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0511a:1302_5: paripucchantoti attho. Budhaṃ jananti paṇḍitaṃ janaṃ. “Budhe jane”tipi pāṭho. Paññāya
atk-s0511a:1302_6: pāraminti paññāya pāraṃ. “Paññāpāramitaṃ gantvā”tipi pāṭho. Sesametthāpi uttānamevāti.
atk-s0511a:1303_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato
atk-s0511a:1303_1: pañcamaṃ vīriyapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi – “sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya vīriyapāramimpi
atk-s0511a:1303_2: pūreyyāsi. Yathāpi sīho migarājā sabbairiyāpathesu daḷhavīriyo hoti, evaṃ tvampi
atk-s0511a:1303_3: sabbabhavesu sabbairiyāpathesu daḷhavīriyo anolīnavīriyo samāno buddho bhavissasī”ti
atk-s0511a:1303_4: pañcamaṃ vīriyapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1311: “Imaṃ tvaṃ pañcamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a:1319: Tattha alīnavīriyoti anolīnavīriyo. Sabbabhaveti jātajātabhave, sabbesu bhavesūti attho. Āraddhavīriyo hutvā, sambodhiṃ pāpuṇissasītipi pāṭho. Sesametthāpi uttānamevāti.
atk-s0511a:1320_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato
atk-s0511a:1320_1: chaṭṭhamaṃ khantipāramiṃ disvā etadahosi – “sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya khantipāramiṃ
atk-s0511a:1320_2: paripūreyyāsi, sammānanepi avamānanepi khamova bhaveyyāsi. Yathā hi pathaviyaṃ nāma
atk-s0511a:1320_3: sucimpi pakkhipanti asucimpi, na ca tena pathavī sinehaṃ vā paṭighaṃ vā karoti, khamati
atk-s0511a:1320_4: sahati adhivāsetiyeva, evameva tvampi sabbesaṃ sammānanāvamānanesu khamo samāno buddho
atk-s0511a:1320_5: bhavissasī”ti chaṭṭhamaṃ khantipāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1328: “Imaṃ tvaṃ chaṭṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a:1332: Sabbaṃ sahati nikkhepaṃ, na karoti paṭighaṃ tayā.
atk-s0511a:1336_0: Tattha tatthāti tassaṃ khantipāramiyaṃ. Advejjhamānasoti ekaṃsamānaso. Sucimpīti
atk-s0511a:1336_2: Sahatīti khamati, adhivāseti. Nikkhepanti nikkhittaṃ. Paṭighanti kodhaṃ. Tayāti tāya
atk-s0511a:1336_3: vuttiyā, tāya nikkhittatāya vā. “Paṭighaṃ daya”ntipi pāṭho, tassa tena nikkhepena
atk-s0511a:1336_4: paṭighānurodhaṃ na karotīti attho. Sammānāvamānakkhamoti sabbesaṃ sammānanāvamānanasaho
atk-s0511a:1336_5: tvampi bhavāti attho. “Tatheva tvampi sabbabhave, sammānanavimānakkhamo”tipi paṭhanti.
atk-s0511a:1336_6: “Khantiyā pāramiṃ gantvā”tipi pāṭho, tassā khantiyā pāramipūraṇavasena gantvāti attho.
atk-s0511a:1336_7: Sesametthāpi uttānamevāti. Ito paraṃ ettakampi avatvā yattha yattha viseso atthi,
atk-s0511a:1336_8: taṃ tameva vatvā pāṭhantaraṃ dassetvā gamissāmāti.
atk-s0511a:1337_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato
atk-s0511a:1337_1: sattamaṃ saccapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi – “sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya saccapāramimpi
atk-s0511a:1337_2: pūreyyāsi, asaniyā matthake patamānāyapi dhanādīnaṃ atthāya chandādīnaṃ vasena sampajānamusāvādaṃ
atk-s0511a:1337_3: nāma mā bhāsi. Yathāpi osadhītārakā nāma sabbautūsu attano gamanavīthiṃ vijahitvā
atk-s0511a:1337_4: aññāya vīthiyā na gacchati, sakavīthiyāva gacchati, evameva tvampi saccaṃ pahāya
atk-s0511a:1337_5: musāvādaṃ nāma avadantoyeva buddho bhavissasī”ti sattamaṃ saccapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā
atk-s0511a:1345: “Imaṃ tvaṃ sattamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a:1349: Samaye utuvasse vā, na vokkamati vīthito.
atk-s0511a:1351: “Tatheva tvampi saccesu, mā vokkama hi vīthito;
atk-s0511a:1353_0: Tattha tatthāti saccapāramiyaṃ. Advejjhavacanoti avitathavacano. Osadhī nāmāti osadhītārakā,
atk-s0511a:1353_1: osadhagahaṇe osadhītārakaṃ uditaṃ disvā osadhaṃ gaṇhanti. Tasmā “osadhītārakā”ti
atk-s0511a:1353_2: vuccati. Tulābhūtāti pamāṇabhūtā. Sadevaketi sadevakassa lokassa. Samayeti vassasamaye.
atk-s0511a:1353_3: Utuvasseti hemantagimhesu. “Samaye utuvaṭṭe”tipi pāṭho. Tassa samayeti gimhe. Utuvaṭṭeti
atk-s0511a:1353_4: hemante ca vassāne cāti attho. Na vokkamati vīthitoti taṃ taṃ utumhi attano gamanavīthito
atk-s0511a:1353_5: na vokkamati na vigacchati, cha māse pacchimaṃ disaṃ gacchati, cha māse pubbaṃ disaṃ
atk-s0511a:1353_6: gacchatīti. Atha vā osadhī nāmāti siṅgiverapipphalimaricādikaṃ osadhaṃ. Na vokkamatīti
atk-s0511a:1353_7: yaṃ yaṃ phaladānasamatthaṃ osadhaṃ, taṃ taṃ phaladānaṃ okkamma attano phalaṃ adatvā
atk-s0511a:1353_8: na nivattati. Vīthitoti gamanavīthito, pittaharo pittaṃ harateva, vātaharo vātaṃ
atk-s0511a:1353_9: harateva, semhaharo semhaṃ haratevāti attho. Sesametthāpi uttānamevāti.
atk-s0511a:1354_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato
atk-s0511a:1354_1: aṭṭhamaṃ adhiṭṭhānapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi – “sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhānapāramimpi
atk-s0511a:1354_2: pūreyyāsi, yaṃ adhiṭṭhāsi, tasmiṃ adhiṭṭhāne niccalo bhaveyyāsi, yathā pabbato nāma
atk-s0511a:1354_3: sabbadisāsu vāte paharantepi na kampati na calati, attano ṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhati, evameva
atk-s0511a:1354_4: tvampi attano adhiṭṭhāne niccalo hontova buddho bhavissasī”ti aṭṭhamaṃ adhiṭṭhānapāramiṃ
atk-s0511a:1362: “Imaṃ tvaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a:1363: Tattha tvaṃ acalo hutvā, sambodhiṃ pāpuṇissasi.
atk-s0511a:1370_0: Tattha seloti silāmayo. Acaloti niccalo suppatiṭṭhitoti acalattāva suṭṭhu patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0511a:1370_1: “Yathāpi pabbato acalo, nikhāto suppatiṭṭhito”tipi pāṭho. Bhusavātehīti balavavātehi.
atk-s0511a:1370_2: Sakaṭṭhānevāti attano ṭhāneyeva, yathāṭhitaṭṭhāneyevāti attho. Sesametthāpi uttānamevāti.
atk-s0511a:1371_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato
atk-s0511a:1371_1: navamaṃ mettāpāramiṃ disvā etadahosi – “sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya mettāpāramiṃ
atk-s0511a:1371_2: pūreyyāsi, hitesupi ahitesupi ekacittova bhaveyyāsi. Yathāpi udakaṃ nāma pāpajanassapi
atk-s0511a:1371_3: kalyāṇajanassapi sītabhāvaṃ ekasadisaṃ katvā pharati, evameva tvampi sabbasattesu
atk-s0511a:1371_4: mettacittena ekacittova hutvā buddho bhavissasī”ti navamaṃ mettāpāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā
atk-s0511a:1379: “Imaṃ tvaṃ navamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a:1380: Mettāya asamo hoti, yadi bodhiṃ pattumicchasi.
atk-s0511a:1387_0: Tattha asamo hohīti mettābhāvanāya asadiso hohi. Tattha “tvaṃ samasamo hohī”tipi
atk-s0511a:1387_1: pāṭho, so uttānatthova. Samanti tulyaṃ. Pharatīti phusati. Pavāhetīti visodheti.
atk-s0511a:1387_2: Rajoti āgantukarajaṃ. Malanti sarīre uṭṭhitaṃ sedamalādiṃ. “Rajamala”ntipi pāṭho,
atk-s0511a:1387_3: soyevattho. Hitāhiteti hite ca ahite ca, mitte ca amitte cāti attho. Mettāya bhāvayāti
atk-s0511a:1388_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato
atk-s0511a:1388_1: dasamaṃ upekkhāpāramiṃ disvā etadahosi – “sumedhapaṇḍita, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya upekkhāpāramiṃ
atk-s0511a:1388_2: paripūreyyāsi, sukhepi dukkhepi majjhattova bhaveyyāsi. Yathāpi pathavī nāma sucimpi
atk-s0511a:1388_3: asucimpi ca pakkhipamāne majjhattāva hoti, evameva tvampi sukhadukkhesu majjhattova
atk-s0511a:1388_4: honto buddho bhavissasī”ti dasamaṃ upekkhāpāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1396: “Imaṃ tvaṃ dasamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a:1404_0: Tattha tulābhūtoti majjhattabhāve ṭhito yathā tulāya daṇḍo samaṃ tulito samaṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0511a:1404_1: na namati na unnamati, evameva tvampi sukhadukkhesu tulāsadiso hutvā sambodhiṃ pāpuṇissasi.
atk-s0511a:1405_0: Tato sumedhapaṇḍito ime dasa pāramidhamme vicinitvā tato paraṃ cintesi – “imasmiṃ
atk-s0511a:1405_1: loke bodhisattehi paripūretabbā bodhipācanā buddhattakarā dhammā ettakāyeva, na ito
atk-s0511a:1405_2: bhiyyo, imā pana pāramiyo uddhaṃ ākāsepi natthi, na heṭṭhā pathaviyampi, na puratthimādīsu
atk-s0511a:1405_3: disāsupi atthi, mayhaṃyeva pana hadayamaṃsantareyeva patiṭṭhitā”ti. Evaṃ tāsaṃ attano
atk-s0511a:1405_4: hadaye patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ disvā sabbāpi tā daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāya punappunaṃ sammasanto
atk-s0511a:1405_5: anulomapaṭilomaṃ sammasi, pariyante gahetvā ādimhi pāpesi, ādimhi gahetvā pariyante
atk-s0511a:1405_6: ṭhapesi, majjhe gahetvā ubhato osāpesi, ubhato koṭīsu gahetvā majjhe osāpesi. Bāhirabhaṇḍapariccāgo
atk-s0511a:1405_7: pāramiyo nāma, aṅgapariccāgo upapāramiyo nāma, jīvitapariccāgo paramatthapāramiyo
atk-s0511a:1405_8: nāmāti dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samattiṃsa pāramiyo
atk-s0511a:1405_9: yamakatelaṃ vinivaṭṭento viya sammasi. Tassa dasa pāramiyo sammasantassa dhammatejena
atk-s0511a:1405_10: catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalā vipulā ayaṃ mahāpathavī hatthinā akkantanaḷakalāpo
atk-s0511a:1405_11: viya uppīḷiyamānaṃ ucchuyantaṃ viya ca mahāviravaṃ viravamānā saṅkampi sampakampi
atk-s0511a:1405_12: sampavedhi. Kulālacakkaṃ viya telayantacakkaṃ viya ca paribbhami. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1408: Tatuddhaṃ natthi aññatra, daḷhaṃ tattha patiṭṭhaha.
atk-s0511a:1414: Telayante yathā cakkaṃ, evaṃ kampati medanī”ti.
atk-s0511a:1415_0: Tattha ettakāyevāti niddiṭṭhānaṃ dasannaṃ pāramitānaṃ anūnādhikabhāvassa dassanatthaṃ
atk-s0511a:1415_1: vuttaṃ. Tatuddhanti tato dasapāramīhi uddhaṃ natthi. Aññatrāti aññaṃ, lakkhaṇaṃ saddasatthato
atk-s0511a:1415_2: gahetabbaṃ. Tato dasapāramito añño buddhakārakadhammo natthīti attho. Tatthāti tāsu
atk-s0511a:1415_3: dasasu pāramīsu. Patiṭṭhahāti patiṭṭha, paripūrento tiṭṭhāti attho.
atk-s0511a:1416_0: Ime dhammeti pāramidhamme. Sammasatoti upaparikkhantassa, anādaratthe sāmivacanaṃ
atk-s0511a:1416_2: attho. Dhammatejenāti pāramipavicayañāṇatejena. Vasudhāti vasūti ratanaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0511a:1416_3: taṃ dhāreti dhīyati vā etthāti vasudhā. Kā sā? Medanī. Pakampathāti pakampittha.
atk-s0511a:1416_4: Sumedhapaṇḍite pana pāramiyo vicinante tassa ñāṇatejena dasasahassī pakampitthāti attho.
atk-s0511a:1417_0: Calatīti chappakārā kampi. Ravatīti nadati vikūjati. Ucchuyantaṃva pīḷitanti nippīḷitaṃ
atk-s0511a:1417_1: ucchuyantaṃ viya. “Guḷayantaṃva pīḷita”ntipi pāṭho, soyevattho. Telayanteti telapīḷanayante.
atk-s0511a:1417_2: Yathā cakkanti cakkikānaṃ mahācakkayantaṃ viya. Evanti yathā telapīḷanacakkayantaṃ
atk-s0511a:1417_3: paribbhamati kampati, evaṃ ayaṃ medanī kampatīti attho. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0511a:1418_0: Evaṃ mahāpathaviyā kampamānāya rammanagaravāsino manussā bhagavantaṃ parivisayamānā
atk-s0511a:1418_1: saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā yugandharavātabbhāhatā mahāsālā viya mucchitā papatiṃsu. Ghaṭādīni
atk-s0511a:1418_2: kulālabhaṇḍāni pavaṭṭentāni aññamaññaṃ paharantāni cuṇṇavicuṇṇāni ahesuṃ. Mahājano
atk-s0511a:1418_3: bhītatasito satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā – “kiṃ nu kho bhagavā ‘nāgāvaṭṭo ayaṃ, bhūtayakkhadevatāsu
atk-s0511a:1418_4: aññatarāvaṭṭo vā’ti na hi mayaṃ etaṃ jānāma. Api ca kho sabbopi ayaṃ mahājano bhayena
atk-s0511a:1418_5: upadduto, kiṃ nu kho imassa lokassa pāpakaṃ bhavissati, udāhu kalyāṇaṃ, kathetha
atk-s0511a:1419_0: Atha satthā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā – “tumhe mā bhāyittha, mā kho cintayittha, natthi
atk-s0511a:1419_1: vo itonidānaṃ bhayaṃ, yo so mayā ajja sumedhapaṇḍito ‘anāgate gotamo nāma buddho
atk-s0511a:1419_2: bhavissatī’ti byākato, so idāni pāramiyo sammasati, tassa sammasantassa dhammatejena
atk-s0511a:1419_3: sakaladasasahassī lokadhātu ekappahārena kampati ceva viravati cā”ti āha. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1422: Pavedhamānā sā tattha, mucchitā seti bhūmiyaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1431: Sabbo upadduto loko, taṃ vinodehi cakkhuma.
atk-s0511a:1434: Vissatthā hotha mā bhātha, imasmiṃ pathavikampane.
atk-s0511a:1441_0: Tattha yāvatāti yāvatikā. Āsīti ahosi. “Yā tadā parisā āsī”tipi pāṭho, tassa yā tattha
atk-s0511a:1441_1: parisā ṭhitā āsīti attho. Pavedhamānāti kampamānā. Sāti sā parisā. Tatthāti tasmiṃ
atk-s0511a:1442_0: Ghaṭāti ghaṭānaṃ, sāmiatthe paccattavacanaṃ, ghaṭānaṃ nekasahassānīti attho. Sañcuṇṇamathitāti
atk-s0511a:1442_1: cuṇṇā ceva mathitā ca, mathitasañcuṇṇāti attho. Aññamaññaṃ paghaṭṭitāti aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0511a:1442_2: pahaṭā. Ubbiggāti utrāsahadayā. Tasitāti sañjātatāsā. Bhītāti bhayabhītā. Bhantāti
atk-s0511a:1442_3: phandanamānasā, vibbhantacittāti attho. Sabbāni panetāni aññamaññavevacanāni. Samāgammāti
atk-s0511a:1443_0: Upaddutoti upahato. Taṃ vinodehīti taṃ upaddutabhayaṃ vinodehi, vināsayāti attho.
atk-s0511a:1443_1: Cakkhumāti pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhuma. Tesaṃ tadāti te jane tadā, upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1443_2: Saññāpesīti ñāpesi bodhesi. Visatthāti vissatthacittā. Mā bhāthāti mā bhāyatha. Yamahanti
atk-s0511a:1443_3: yaṃ ahaṃ sumedhapaṇḍitaṃ. Dhammanti pāramidhammaṃ. Pubbakanti porāṇaṃ. Jinasevitanti
atk-s0511a:1443_4: jinehi bodhisattakāle sevitanti attho. Buddhabhūminti pāramidhammaṃ. Tenāti tena
atk-s0511a:1443_5: sammasanakāraṇena. Kampitāti calitā. Sadevaketi sadevake loke.
atk-s0511a:1444_0: Tato mahājano tathāgatassa vacanaṃ sutvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho mālāgandhavilepanādīni ādāya
atk-s0511a:1444_1: rammanagarato nikkhamitvā bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mālāgandhādīhi pūjetvā vanditvā
atk-s0511a:1444_2: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā rammanagarameva pāvisi. Atha kho bodhisatto dasa pāramiyo sammasitvā
atk-s0511a:1444_3: vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāya nisinnāsanā vuṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1447: Sabbe maṃ upasaṅkamma, punāpi maṃ abhivandisuṃ.
atk-s0511a:1451_0: Tattha mano nibbāyīti mahājanassa pathavikampane ubbiggahadayassa tattha kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:1451_1: sutvā mano nibbāyi, santiṃ agamāsīti attho. “Jano nibbāyī”tipi pāṭho, so uttānoyeva.
atk-s0511a:1451_2: Samādiyitvāti sammā ādiyitvā, samādāyāti attho. Buddhaguṇanti pāramiyo. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0511a:1452_0: Atha kho bodhisattaṃ dayitasabbasattaṃ āsanā vuṭṭhahantaṃ sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā
atk-s0511a:1452_1: sannipatitvā dibbehi mālāgandhādīhi pūjetvā – “ayya sumedhatāpasa, tayā ajja dīpaṅkaradasabalassa
atk-s0511a:1452_2: pādamūle mahati patthanā patthitā, sā te anantarāyena samijjhatu, mā te tattha bhayaṃ
atk-s0511a:1452_3: vā chambhitattaṃ vā ahosi. Sarīre te appamattakopi rogo mā uppajjatu, khippaṃ pāramiyo
atk-s0511a:1452_4: pūretvā sammāsambodhiṃ paṭivijjha. Yathā pupphūpagaphalūpagā rukkhā samaye pupphanti
atk-s0511a:1452_5: ceva phalanti ca, tatheva tvampi taṃ samayaṃ anatikkamitvā khippaṃ sambodhiṃ phusassū”tiādīni
atk-s0511a:1452_6: thutimaṅgalāni payirudāhaṃsu, evaṃ payirudāhitvā bodhisattaṃ abhivādetvā attano attano
atk-s0511a:1452_7: devaṭṭhānameva agamaṃsu. Bodhisattopi devatāhi abhitthuto – “ahaṃ dasa pāramiyo pūretvā
atk-s0511a:1452_8: kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake buddho bhavissāmī”ti vīriyaṃ
atk-s0511a:1452_9: daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāya ākāsamabbhuggantvā isigaṇavantaṃ himavantaṃ agamāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1457: “Vedayanti ca te sotthiṃ, devā mānusakā ubho;
atk-s0511a:1458: Mahantaṃ patthitaṃ tuyhaṃ, taṃ labhassu yathicchitaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1461: Mā te bhavantvantarāyā, phusa khippaṃ bodhimuttamaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1479: Tatheva lokā muccitvā, viroca siriyā tuvaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1485: Te dhamme paripūrento, pavanaṃ pāvisī tadā”ti.
atk-s0511a:1486_1: ca mānusapupphaṃ gahetvāti attho. Samokirantīti mamopari samokiriṃsūti attho. Vuṭṭhahantassāti
atk-s0511a:1486_2: vuṭṭhahato. Vedayantīti nivedayiṃsu saññāpesuṃ. Sotthinti sotthibhāvaṃ. Idāni vedayitākāradassanatthaṃ
atk-s0511a:1486_3: “mahantaṃ patthitaṃ tuyha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tayā pana, sumedhapaṇḍita, mahantaṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0511a:1487_0: Sabbītiyoti entīti ītiyo, sabbā ītiyo sabbītiyo, upaddavā. Vivajjantūti mā hontu.
atk-s0511a:1487_1: Soko rogo vinassatūti socanasaṅkhāto soko rujanasaṅkhāto rogo ca vinassatu. Teti
atk-s0511a:1487_2: tava. Mā bhavantvantarāyāti mā bhavantu antarāyā. Phusāti adhigaccha pāpuṇāhi. Bodhinti
atk-s0511a:1487_3: arahattamaggañāṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇampi vaṭṭati. Uttamanti seṭṭhaṃ sabbabuddhaguṇadāyakattā
atk-s0511a:1488_0: Samayeti tassa tassa rukkhassa pupphanasamaye sampatteti attho. Pupphinoti pupphanakā.
atk-s0511a:1488_1: Buddhañāṇehīti aṭṭhārasahi buddhañāṇehi. Pupphasūti pupphassu. Pūrayunti pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:1488_2: Pūrayāti paripūraya. Bujjhareti bujjhiṃsu. Jinabodhiyanti jinānaṃ buddhānaṃ bodhiyā,
atk-s0511a:1488_3: sabbaññubodhimūleti attho. Puṇṇamāyeti puṇṇamāsiyaṃ. Puṇṇamanoti paripuṇṇamanoratho.
atk-s0511a:1489_0: Rāhumuttoti rāhunā sobbhānunā mutto. Tāpenāti patāpena, ālokena. Lokā muccitvāti
atk-s0511a:1489_1: lokadhammehi alitto hutvāti attho. Virocāti virāja. Siriyāti buddhasiriyā. Osarantīti
atk-s0511a:1489_2: mahāsamuddaṃ pavisanti. Osarantūti upagacchantu. Tavantiketi tava santikaṃ. Tehīti
atk-s0511a:1489_3: devehi. Thutappasatthoti thuto ceva pasattho ca, thutehi vā dīpaṅkarādīhi pasatthoti
atk-s0511a:1489_4: thutappasattho. Dasa dhammeti dasa pāramidhamme. Pavananti mahāvanaṃ, dhammikapabbate
atk-s0511a:1489_5: mahāvanaṃ pāvisīti attho. Sesagāthā suuttānā evāti.
atk-s0511a:1493_0: Rammanagaravāsinopi te upāsakā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā
atk-s0511a:1493_1: puna bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ mālāgandhādīhi pūjetvā vanditvā dānānumodanaṃ
atk-s0511a:1493_2: sotukāmā upanisīdiṃsu. Atha satthā tesaṃ paramamadhuraṃ hadayaṅgamaṃ dānānumodanamakāsi –
atk-s0511a:1505: Ko hi nāma naro loke, na dadeyya hite rato.
atk-s0511a:1507: Na dajjā sukhappadaṃ dānaṃ, dānaṃ cittappamodanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1511: Kittimanantaṃ yāti ca dātā, vissasanīyo hoti ca dātā.
atk-s0511a:1512: “Datvā dānaṃ yāti naro so, bhogasamiddhiṃ dīghañcāyu;
atk-s0511a:1513: Sussaratampi ca vindati rūpaṃ, sagge saddhiṃ kīḷati devehi;
atk-s0511a:1516: Dadāti taṃ sāvakañāṇabhūmiṃ, paccekabhūmiṃ pana buddhabhūmi”nti. –
atk-s0511a:1517: Evamādinā nayena dānānumodanaṃ katvā dānānisaṃsaṃ pakāsetvā tadanantaraṃ sīlakathaṃ kathesi. Sīlaṃ nāmetaṃ idhalokaparalokasampattīnaṃ mūlaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1518: “Sīlaṃ sukhānaṃ paramaṃ nidānaṃ, sīlena sīlī tidivaṃ payāti;
atk-s0511a:1520: “Avassayo sīlasamo janānaṃ, kuto panañño idha vā parattha;
atk-s0511a:1521: Sīlaṃ guṇānaṃ paramā patiṭṭhā, yathā dharā thāvarajaṅgamānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1524_0: Sīlālaṅkārasamo alaṅkāro natthi, sīlagandhasamo gandho natthi, sīlasamaṃ kilesamalavisodhanaṃ
atk-s0511a:1524_1: natthi, sīlasamaṃ pariḷāhūpasamaṃ natthi, sīlasamaṃ kittijananaṃ natthi, sīlasamaṃ
atk-s0511a:1524_2: saggārohaṇasopānaṃ natthi, nibbānanagarappavesane ca sīlasamaṃ dvāraṃ natthi. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a:1528: Yo samaṃ anuvāte ca, paṭivāte ca vāyati. ;
atk-s0511a:1529: “Na pupphagandho paṭivātameti, na candanaṃ taggaramallikā vā;
atk-s0511a:1530: Satañca gandho paṭivātameti, sabbā disā sappuriso pavāyati.
atk-s0511a:1533: “Na gaṅgā yamunā cāpi, sarabhū vā sarasvatī;
atk-s0511a:1536: Visodhayati sattānaṃ, yaṃ ve sīlajalaṃ malaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1537: “Na taṃ sajaladā vātā, na cāpi haricandanaṃ;
atk-s0511a:1538: Neva hārā na maṇayo, na candakiraṇaṅkurā.
atk-s0511a:1540: Yaṃ sameti idaṃ ariyaṃ, sīlaṃ accantasītalaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1544: Dvāraṃ vā pana nibbāna, nagarassa pavesane.
atk-s0511a:1547_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sīlānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā – “idaṃ pana sīlaṃ nissāya ayaṃ saggo labhatī”ti
atk-s0511a:1547_1: dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ saggakathaṃ kathesi. Ayaṃ saggo nāma iṭṭho kanto manāpo
atk-s0511a:1547_2: ekantasukho niccamettha kīḷā niccaṃ sampattiyo labhanti. Cātumahārājikā devā navutivassasatasahassāni
atk-s0511a:1547_3: dibbasukhaṃ dibbasampattiṃ paṭilabhanti. Tāvatiṃsā tisso vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassānīti
atk-s0511a:1547_4: evamādisaggaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttakathaṃ kathesi. Evaṃ saggakathāya palobhetvā puna – “ayampi
atk-s0511a:1547_5: saggo anicco adhuvo na tattha chandarāgo kātabbo”ti kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ
atk-s0511a:1547_6: nekkhamme ānisaṃsañca pakāsetvā amatapariyosānaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi. Evaṃ tassa
atk-s0511a:1547_7: mahājanassa dhammaṃ desetvā ekacce saraṇesu ca ekacce pañcasīlesu ca ekacce sotāpattiphale
atk-s0511a:1547_8: ca ekacce sakadāgāmiphale ekacce anāgāmiphale ekacce catūsupi phalesu ekacce tīsu
atk-s0511a:1547_9: vijjāsu ekacce chasu abhiññāsu ekacce aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu patiṭṭhāpetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0511a:1547_10: rammanagarato nikkhamitvā sudassanamahāvihārameva pāvisi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1553: Kañci pañcasu sīlesu, sīle dasavidhe paraṃ.
atk-s0511a:1556: Kassaci asame dhamme, deti so paṭisambhidā.
atk-s0511a:1569_0: Tattha teti rammanagaravāsino upāsakā. Saraṇanti ettha saraṇaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ saraṇassa
atk-s0511a:1569_1: gantā ca veditabbā. Sarati hiṃsati vināsetīti saraṇaṃ, kiṃ taṃ? Ratanattayaṃ. Taṃ
atk-s0511a:1569_2: pana saraṇagatānaṃ teneva saraṇagamanena bhayaṃ santāsaṃ dukkhaṃ duggatiṃ parikkilesaṃ
atk-s0511a:1569_3: hanati hiṃsati vināsetīti saraṇanti vuccatīti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1570: “Ye keci buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ;
atk-s0511a:1572: “Ye keci dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ;
atk-s0511a:1574: “Ye keci saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ;
atk-s0511a:1576: Saraṇagamanaṃ nāma ratanattayaparāyanākārappavatto cittuppādo. Saraṇassa gantā nāma taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo. Evaṃ tāva saraṇaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ saraṇassa gantā cāti idaṃ tayaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1577_0: Tassāti taṃ dīpaṅkaraṃ, upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Upagacchuṃ saraṇaṃ tatthā”tipi
atk-s0511a:1577_1: pāṭho. Satthunoti satthāraṃ. Saraṇāgamane kañcīti kañci puggalaṃ saraṇagamane nivesetīti
atk-s0511a:1577_2: attho. Kiñcāpi paccuppannavasena vuttaṃ, atītakālavasena pana attho gahetabbo. Esa
atk-s0511a:1577_3: nayo sesesupi. “Kassaci saraṇāgamane”tipi pāṭho, tassapi soyevattho. Kañci pañcasu
atk-s0511a:1577_4: sīlesūti kañci puggalaṃ pañcasu viratisīlesu nivesesīti attho. “Kassaci pañcasu sīlesū”tipi
atk-s0511a:1577_5: pāṭho, soyevattho. Sīle dasavidhe paranti aparaṃ puggalaṃ dasavidhe sīle nivesesīti
atk-s0511a:1577_6: attho. “Kassaci kusale dasā”tipi pāṭho, tassa kañci puggalaṃ dasa kusaladhamme samādapesīti
atk-s0511a:1577_7: attho. Kassaci deti sāmaññanti ettha paramatthato sāmaññanti maggo vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a:1578: “Katamañca, bhikkhave, sāmaññaṃ? Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṃ – sammādiṭṭhi…pe… sammāsamādhi. Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sāmañña”nti.
atk-s0511a:1579_0: Caturo phalamuttameti cattāri uttamāni phalānīti attho. Ma-kāro padasandhikaro. Liṅgavipariyāsena
atk-s0511a:1579_1: vuttaṃ. Yathopanissayaṃ cattāro magge cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni kassaci adāsīti attho.
atk-s0511a:1579_2: Kassaci asame dhammeti kassaci asadise cattāro paṭisambhidādhamme adāsi.
atk-s0511a:1580_0: Kassaci varasamāpattiyoti kassaci pana nīvaraṇavigamena padhānabhūtā aṭṭha samāpattiyo
atk-s0511a:1580_1: adāsi. Tisso kassaci vijjāyoti kassaci puggalassa upanissayavasena dibbacakkhuñāṇapubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaāsavakkhayañāṇānaṃ
atk-s0511a:1580_2: vasena tisso vijjāyo. Chaḷabhiññā pavecchatīti cha abhiññāyo kassaci adāsi.
atk-s0511a:1581_0: Tena yogenāti tena nayena tenānukkamena ca. Janakāyanti janasamūhaṃ. Ovadatīti ovadi.
atk-s0511a:1581_1: Kālavipariyāsena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Ito uparipi īdisesu vacanesu atītakālavaseneva
atk-s0511a:1581_2: attho gahetabbo. Tena vitthārikaṃ āsīti tena dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato ovādena anusāsaniyā
atk-s0511a:1582_0: Mahāhanūti mahāpurisānaṃ kira dvepi hanūni paripuṇṇāni dvādasiyā pakkhassa candasadisākārāni
atk-s0511a:1582_1: hontīti mahantāni hanūni yassa so mahāhanu, sīhahanūti vuttaṃ hoti. Usabhakkhandhoti
atk-s0511a:1582_2: usabhasseva khandho yassa bhavati, so usabhakkhandho. Suvaṭṭitasuvaṇṇāliṅgasadisarucirakkhandho
atk-s0511a:1582_3: samavaṭṭacārukkhandhoti attho. Dīpaṅkarasanāmakoti dīpaṅkarasanāmo. Bahū jane tārayatīti
atk-s0511a:1582_4: bahū buddhaveneyye jane tāresi. Parimocetīti parimocesi. Duggatinti duggatito. Nissakkatthe upayogavacanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1583_0: Idāni tāraṇaparimocanakaraṇākāradassanatthaṃ “bodhaneyyaṃ jana”nti gāthā vuttā. Tattha
atk-s0511a:1583_1: bodhaneyyaṃ jananti bodhaneyyaṃ pajaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Disvāti buddhacakkhunā vā
atk-s0511a:1583_2: samantacakkhunā vā disvā. Satasahassepi yojaneti anekasatasahassepi yojane ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1583_3: Idaṃ pana dasasahassiyaṃyeva sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1584_0: Dīpaṅkaro kira satthā buddhattaṃ patvā bodhimūle sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā aṭṭhame

atk-s0511a:1584_2: koṭisataṃ devamanussānaṃ dhammāmataṃ pāyesi. Ayaṃ paṭhamo abhisamayo ahosi.

atk-s0511a:1585_1: ñatvā taṃ atrajaṃ pamukhaṃ katvā rāhulovādasadisaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā devamanussānaṃ
