atk-s0511a:1597_0: Athāparena samayena dasabalo catūhi bhikkhusatasahassehi parivuto gāmanigamanagarapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0511a:1597_1: mahājanānuggahaṃ karonto cārikaṃ caramāno anukkamena ekasmiṃ padese mahājanakatasakkāraṃ
atk-s0511a:1597_4: pabbataṃ sampāpuṇi. So kira pabbato nāradena nāma yakkhena pariggahito ahosi. Tattha
atk-s0511a:1597_5: pana tassa yakkhassa anusaṃvaccharaṃ mahājano manussabaliṃ upasaṃharati.
atk-s0511a:1598_0: Atha dīpaṅkaro kira bhagavā tassa mahājanassa upanissayasampattiṃ disvā tato bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-s0511a:1598_1: cātuddisaṃ pesetvā adutiyo asahāyo mahākaruṇābalavasaṅgatahadayo tañca yakkhaṃ vinetuṃ
atk-s0511a:1598_2: taṃ nāradapabbataṃ abhiruhi. Atha so manussabhakkho sakahitanirapekkho paravadhadakkho
atk-s0511a:1598_3: yakkho makkhaṃ asahamāno kodhaparetamānaso dasabalaṃ bhiṃsāpetvā palāpetukāmo taṃ
atk-s0511a:1598_4: pabbataṃ cālesi. So kira pabbato tena cāliyamāno bhagavato ānubhāvena tasseva matthake
atk-s0511a:1599_0: Tato so bhīto – “handa naṃ agginā jhāpessāmī”ti mahantaṃ atibhīmadassanaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ
atk-s0511a:1599_1: nibbattesi. So aggikkhandho paṭivāte khitto viya attanova dukkhaṃ janesi, na pana
atk-s0511a:1599_2: bhagavato cīvare aṃsumattampi daḍḍhuṃ samattho ahosi. Yakkho pana “samaṇo daḍḍho,
atk-s0511a:1599_3: na daḍḍho”ti olokento dasabalaṃ saradasamayavimalakaranikaraṃ sabbajanaratikaraṃ
atk-s0511a:1599_4: rajanikaramiva sītalajalatalagatakamalakaṇṇikāya nisinnaṃ viya bhagavantaṃ disvā
atk-s0511a:1599_5: cintesi – “aho ayaṃ samaṇo mahānubhāvo, yaṃ yaṃ imassāhaṃ anatthaṃ karomi, so so
atk-s0511a:1599_6: mamūpariyeva patati, imaṃ pana samaṇaṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ me paṭisaraṇaṃ parāyanaṃ natthi,
atk-s0511a:1599_7: pathaviyaṃ upakkhalitā pathaviṃyeva nissāya uṭṭhahanti, handāhaṃ imaṃyeva samaṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:1600_0: Athevaṃ pana so cintetvā bhagavato cakkālaṅkatatalesu pādesu sirasā nipatitvā – “accayo
atk-s0511a:1600_1: maṃ, bhante, accagamā”ti vatvā bhagavantaṃ saraṇamagamāsi. Athassa bhagavā anupubbikathaṃ
atk-s0511a:1600_2: kathesi. So desanāpariyosāne dasahi yakkhasahassehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0511a:1600_3: Tasmiṃ kira divase sakalajambudīpatalavāsino manussā tassa balikammatthaṃ ekekagāmato
atk-s0511a:1600_4: ekekaṃ purisaṃ āhariṃsu. Aññañca bahutilataṇḍulakulatthamuggamāsādiṃ sappinavanītatelamadhuphāṇitādiñca
atk-s0511a:1600_5: āhariṃsu. Atha so yakkho taṃ divasaṃ ābhatataṇḍulādikaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃyeva datvā te
atk-s0511a:1601_0: Atha satthā te manusse ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā antosattāheyeva sabbe arahatte
atk-s0511a:1601_2: pātimokkhamuddisi. Caturaṅgāni nāma sabbeva ehibhikkhū honti, sabbe chaḷabhiññā honti,
atk-s0511a:1601_3: sabbe anāmantitāva āgatā, pannarasūposathadivaso cāti imāni cattāri aṅgāni nāma.
atk-s0511a:1601_4: Ayaṃ dutiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1605: Tattha pavivekagateti gaṇaṃ pahāya gate. Samiṃsūti sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:1606_0: Yadā pana dīpaṅkaro lokanāyako sudassananāmake pabbate vassāvāsamupagañchi, tadā
atk-s0511a:1606_1: kira jambudīpavāsino manussā anusaṃvaccharaṃ giraggasamajjaṃ karonti. Tasmiṃ kira
atk-s0511a:1606_2: samajje sannipatitā manussā dasabalaṃ disvā dhammakathaṃ sutvā tatra pasīditvā pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:1606_3: Mahāpavāraṇadivase satthā tesaṃ ajjhāsayānukūlaṃ vipassanākathaṃ kathesi. Taṃ sutvā
atk-s0511a:1606_4: te sabbe saṅkhāre sammasitvā vipassanānupubbena maggānupubbena ca arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:1606_5: Atha satthā navutikoṭisahassehi saddhiṃ pavāresi. Ayaṃ tatiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1612_0: Ayaṃ gāthā aṭṭhasāliniyā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāya nidānavaṇṇanāya dīpaṅkarabuddhavaṃse
atk-s0511a:1612_1: likhitā. Imasmiṃ pana buddhavaṃse natthi. Natthibhāvoyeva panassā yuttataro. Kasmāti
atk-s0511a:1613_0: Dīpaṅkare kira bhagavati dhammaṃ desente dasasahassānañca vīsatisahassānañca dhammābhisamayo
atk-s0511a:1613_1: ahosiyeva. Ekassa pana dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ catunnanti ca ādivasena abhisamayānaṃ anto
atk-s0511a:1613_2: natthi. Tasmā dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1617_1: catusaccadhammappaṭivedho. Ekadvinnanti ekassa ceva dvinnañca, tiṇṇaṃ catunnaṃ…pe…
atk-s0511a:1617_2: dasannantiādinā nayena asaṅkhyeyyāti attho. Evaṃ asaṅkhyeyyābhisamayattā ca vitthārikaṃ
atk-s0511a:1617_3: mahantappattaṃ bahūhi paṇḍitehi devamanussehi niyyānikanti jaññaṃ jānitabbaṃ adhisīlasikkhādīhi
atk-s0511a:1617_4: iddhañca samādhiādīhi phītañca ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1621_0: Tattha suvisodhitanti suṭṭhu bhagavatā sodhitaṃ visuddhaṃ kataṃ. Dīpaṅkaraṃ kira
atk-s0511a:1621_1: satthāraṃ sabbakālaṃ chaḷabhiññānaṃ mahiddhikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cattāri satasahassāni
atk-s0511a:1621_2: parivārenti. Tena ca samayena ye sekkhā kālakiriyaṃ karonti, te garahitā bhavanti,
atk-s0511a:1621_3: sabbe khīṇāsavā hutvāva parinibbāyantīti adhippāyo. Tasmā hi tassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ
atk-s0511a:1621_4: supupphitaṃ susamiddhaṃ khīṇāsavehi bhikkhūhi ativiya sobhittha. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1626: “Ye keci tena samayena, jahanti mānusaṃ bhavaṃ;
atk-s0511a:1631_0: Tattha cattāri satasahassānīti gaṇanāya dassitā evaṃ dassitagaṇanā ime bhikkhūti
atk-s0511a:1631_1: dassanatthaṃ “chaḷabhiññā mahiddhikā”ti vuttanti evamattho gahetabbo. Atha vā chaḷabhiññā
atk-s0511a:1631_2: mahiddhikāti chaḷabhiññānaṃ mahiddhikānanti sāmiatthe paccattavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1631_3: Parivārenti sabbadāti niccakālaṃ dasabalaṃ parivārenti, bhagavantaṃ muñcitvā katthaci
atk-s0511a:1631_4: na gacchantīti adhippāyo. Tena samayenāti tasmiṃ samaye. Ayaṃ pana samaya-saddo samavāyādīsu
atk-s0511a:1633: Paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissatī”ti. ;
atk-s0511a:1634_0: Idha so kāle daṭṭhabbo; tasmiṃ kāleti attho. Mānusaṃ bhavanti manussabhāvaṃ. Appattamānasāti
atk-s0511a:1634_1: appattaṃ anadhigataṃ mānasaṃ yehi te appattamānasā. Mānasanti rāgassa ca cittassa
atk-s0511a:1634_2: ca arahattassa ca adhivacanaṃ. “Antalikkhacaro pāso, yvāyaṃ carati mānaso”ti hi ettha
atk-s0511a:1634_3: pana rāgo “mānaso”ti vutto. “Cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍara”nti ettha cittaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1634_4: “Appattamānaso sekho, kālaṃ kayirā janesutā”ti ettha arahattaṃ. Idhāpi arahattameva
atk-s0511a:1634_5: adhippetaṃ. Tasmā appattaarahattaphalāti attho. Sekhāti kenaṭṭhena sekhā? Sekhadhammapaṭilābhaṭṭhena
atk-s0511a:1634_6: sekhā. Vuttañhetaṃ – “kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sekho hotīti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu
atk-s0511a:1634_7: sekhāya sammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato hoti…pe… sekhena sammāsamādhinā samannāgato hoti.
atk-s0511a:1634_8: Ettāvatā kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sekho hotī”ti. Api ca sikkhantīti sekhā. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-s0511a:1634_9: – “sikkhati, sikkhatīti kho, bhikkhu, tasmā sekhoti vuccati. Kiñca sikkhati? Adhisīlampi
atk-s0511a:1634_10: sikkhati adhicittampi adhipaññampi sikkhatīti kho, bhikkhu, tasmā sekhoti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0511a:1635_0: Supupphitanti suṭṭhu vikasitaṃ. Pāvacananti pasatthaṃ vacanaṃ, vuddhippattaṃ vā vacanaṃ
atk-s0511a:1635_1: pavacanaṃ, pavacanameva pāvacanaṃ, sāsananti attho. Upasobhatīti abhirājati ativirocati.
atk-s0511a:1636_0: Tassa dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato rammavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, sudevo nāma khattiyo pitā,
atk-s0511a:1636_1: sumedhā nāma devī mātā, sumaṅgalo ca tisso cāti dve aggasāvakā, sāgato nāma upaṭṭhāko,
atk-s0511a:1636_2: nandā ca sunandā cāti dve aggasāvikā, bodhi tassa bhagavato pipphalirukkho ahosi,
atk-s0511a:1636_3: asītihatthubbedho, satasahassavassāni āyūti. Kiṃ panimesaṃ jātanagarādīnaṃ dassane
atk-s0511a:1636_4: payojananti ce? Vuccate – yassa yadi neva jātanagaraṃ na pitā na mātā paññāyeyya,
atk-s0511a:1636_5: imassa pana neva jātanagaraṃ na pitā na mātā paññāyati, devo vā sakko vā yakkho vā
atk-s0511a:1636_6: māro vā brahmā vā esa maññe, devānampi īdisaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ anacchariyanti maññamānā
atk-s0511a:1636_7: na sotabbaṃ na saddahitabbaṃ maññeyyuṃ, tato abhisamayo na bhaveyya, asati abhisamaye
atk-s0511a:1636_8: niratthako buddhuppādo bhaveyya, aniyyānikaṃ sāsanaṃ. Tasmā sabbabuddhānaṃ jātanagarādiko
atk-s0511a:1651: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:1656: “Sā ca iddhi so ca yaso, tāni ca pādesu cakkaratanāni;
atk-s0511a:1658_0: Tattha sudevo nāma khattiyoti sudevo nāmassa khattiyo pitā ahosīti attho. Janikāti
atk-s0511a:1658_1: janetti. Pipphalīti pilakkhakapītanarukkho bodhi. Asītihatthamubbedhoti asītihatthaṃ
atk-s0511a:1658_2: uccaggato. Dīparukkho vāti sampajjalitadīpamālākulo dīparukkho viya ārohapariṇāhasaṇṭhānapāripūrisampanno
atk-s0511a:1658_4: gaganatalaṃ bhagavā dharamānakāle sobhatīti sobhittha. Sālarājāva phullitoti pupphito
atk-s0511a:1658_5: sabbaphāliphullo sālarājarukkho viya ca sabbaphāliphullo yojanasatubbedho pāricchatto
atk-s0511a:1658_6: viya ca asītihatthubbedho bhagavā ativiya sobhati.
atk-s0511a:1659_0: Satasahassavassānīti vassasatasahassāni tassa āyūti attho. Tāvatā tiṭṭhamānoti tāvatakaṃ
atk-s0511a:1659_1: kālaṃ tiṭṭhamāno. Janatanti janasamūhaṃ. Santāretvā mahājananti tārayitvā mahājanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1659_2: “Santāretvā sadevaka”ntipi pāṭho, tassa sadevakaṃ lokanti attho. Sā ca iddhīti sā
atk-s0511a:1659_3: ca sampatti ānubhāvo. So ca yasoti so ca parivāro. Sabbaṃ tamantarahitanti taṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0511a:1659_4: vuttappakāraṃ sampattijātaṃ antarahitaṃ apagatanti attho. Nanu rittā sabbasaṅkhārāti
atk-s0511a:1659_5: sabbe pana saṅkhatadhammā nanu rittā tucchā, niccasārādirahitāti attho.
atk-s0511a:1660_0: Ettha pana nagarādiparicchedo pāḷiyamāgatova. Sambahulavāro pana nāgato, so ānetvā
atk-s0511a:1660_1: dīpetabbo. Seyyathidaṃ – puttaparicchedo, bhariyāparicchedo, pāsādaparicchedo, agāravāsaparicchedo,
atk-s0511a:1660_3: upaṭṭhākaparicchedoti. Etesampi dīpane kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Tassa pana dīpaṅkarassa
atk-s0511a:1660_4: bhariyānaṃ tisatasahassaṃ ahosi. Tassa aggamahesī padumā nāma, tassa pana putto usabhakkhandho nāma. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1667_0: Sabbabuddhānaṃ pana pañca vemattāni honti āyuvemattaṃ pamāṇavemattaṃ kulavemattaṃ
atk-s0511a:1667_1: padhānavemattaṃ rasmivemattanti. Tattha āyuvemattaṃ nāma keci dīghāyukā honti keci
atk-s0511a:1667_2: appāyukā. Tathā hi dīpaṅkarassa pana bhagavato vassasatasahassaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0511a:1668: Pamāṇavemattaṃ nāma keci dīghā honti keci rassā. Tathā hi dīpaṅkaro asītihatthappamāṇo ahosi, amhākaṃ pana bhagavā aṭṭhārasahatthappamāṇo.
atk-s0511a:1669: Kulavemattaṃ nāma keci khattiyakule nibbattanti keci brāhmaṇakule. Tathā hi dīpaṅkarādayo khattiyakule nibbattiṃsu, kakusandhakoṇāgamanādayo brāhmaṇakule.
atk-s0511a:1670: Padhānavemattaṃ nāma kesañci padhānaṃ ittarameva hoti yathā kassapassa bhagavato, kesañci addhaniyaṃ amhākaṃ bhagavato viya.
atk-s0511a:1671_0: Rasmivemattaṃ nāma maṅgalassa bhagavato sarīrasmi dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā
atk-s0511a:1671_1: aṭṭhāsi, amhākaṃ bhagavato byāmamattaṃ. Tatra rasmivemattaṃ ajjhāsayapaṭibaddhaṃ
atk-s0511a:1671_2: hoti. Yo yattakaṃ icchasi, tassa tattakaṃ sarīrappabhā pharati. Maṅgalassa pana “dasasahassilokadhātuṃ
atk-s0511a:1671_3: pharatū”ti ajjhāsayo ahosi. Paṭividdhaguṇesu pana kassaci vemattaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0511a:1672_0: Tathā sabbabuddhānaṃ cattāri avijahitaṭṭhānāni nāma honti. Bodhipallaṅko avijahito
atk-s0511a:1672_1: ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne hoti. Dhammacakkappavattanaṭṭhānaṃ isipatane migadāye avijahitameva
atk-s0511a:1672_2: hoti. Devorohaṇakāle saṅkassanagaradvāre paṭhamapādakkamo avijahitova hoti. Jetavane
atk-s0511a:1672_3: gandhakuṭiyā cattāri mañcapādaṭṭhānāni avijahitāneva honti. Vihāropi avijahitova.
atk-s0511a:1672_4: So pana khuddako vā mahanto vā hoti.
atk-s0511a:1673_0: Aparaṃ pana amhākaṃyeva bhagavato sahajātaparicchedañca nakkhattaparicchedañca visesaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1673_1: Amhākaṃ sabbaññubodhisattena kira saddhiṃ rāhulamātā ānandatthero channo kaṇḍako
atk-s0511a:1673_2: assarājā nidhikumbhā mahābodhirukkho kāḷudāyīti imāni sata sahajātāni. Mahāpuriso
atk-s0511a:1673_3: kira uttarāsāḷhanakkhatteneva mātukucchiṃ okkami, mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhami, dhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0511a:1673_4: pavattesi, yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ akāsi. Visākhanakkhattena jāto ca abhisambuddho ca parinibbuto
atk-s0511a:1673_5: ca, māghanakkhattena tassa sāvakasannipāto ceva āyusaṅkhāravosajjanañca ahosi, assayujanakkhattena
atk-s0511a:1673_6: devorohaṇanti ettakaṃ āharitvā dīpetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ sambahulavāraparicchedo. Sesagāthā sauttānā evāti.
atk-s0511a:1674: Iti bhagavā dīpaṅkaro yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā sabbabuddhakiccaṃ katvā anukkamena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0511a:1675_0: Yasmiṃ kira kappe dīpaṅkaradasabalo udapādi, tasmiṃ aññepi taṇhaṅkaro, medhaṅkaro,
atk-s0511a:1675_1: saraṇaṅkaroti tayo buddhā ahesuṃ. Tesaṃ santike bodhisattassa byākaraṇaṃ natthi.
atk-s0511a:1675_2: Tasmā te idha na dassitā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tamhā kappā ādito paṭṭhāyuppannuppanne
atk-s0511a:1678: “Maṅgalo ca sumano ca, revato sobhito muni;
atk-s0511a:1682: “Tisso phusso ca sambuddho, vipassī sikhi vessabhū;
atk-s0511a:1692_0: Dīpaṅkare kira bhagavati parinibbute tassa sāsanaṃ vassasatasahassaṃ pavattittha.
atk-s0511a:1692_1: Atha buddhānubuddhānaṃ sāvakānaṃ antaradhānena sāsanampissa antaradhāyi. Athassa
atk-s0511a:1692_2: aparabhāge ekamasaṅkhyeyyamatikkamitvā ekasmiṃ kappe koṇḍañño nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-s0511a:1692_3: So pana bhagavā soḷasaasaṅkhyeyyaṃ kappānañca satasahassaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā bodhiñāṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:1692_4: paripācetvā vessantarattabhāvasadise attabhāve ṭhatvā tato cavitvā tusitapure nibbattitvā
atk-s0511a:1692_5: tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā devatānaṃ paṭiññaṃ datvā tusitapurato cavitvā rammavatīnagare
atk-s0511a:1692_6: sunandassa nāma rañño kule sujātāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a:1692_7: Tassapi paṭisandhikkhaṇe dīpaṅkarabuddhavaṃse vuttappakārāni dvattiṃsa pāṭihāriyāni
atk-s0511a:1692_8: nibbattiṃsu. So devatāhi katārakkhasaṃvidhāno dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena mātukucchito
atk-s0511a:1692_9: nikkhamitvā sabbasattuttaro uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gantvā sabbā ca disā
atk-s0511a:1692_10: viloketvā āsabhiṃ vācaṃ nicchāresi – “aggohamasmi lokassa, jeṭṭhohamasmi lokassa,
atk-s0511a:1692_11: seṭṭhohamasmi lokassa, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti.
atk-s0511a:1693_0: Tato kumārassa nāmakaraṇadivase nāmaṃ karontā “koṇḍañño”ti nāmamakaṃsu. So hi bhagavā
atk-s0511a:1693_1: koṇḍaññagotto ahosi. Tassa kira tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ – rāma, surāma, subhanāmakā paramaramaṇīyā.
atk-s0511a:1693_2: Tesu tīṇi satasahassāni nāṭakitthīnaṃ naccagītavāditakusalānaṃ sabbakālaṃ paccupaṭṭhitāni
atk-s0511a:1693_3: ahesuṃ. Tassa rucidevī nāma aggamahesī ahosi. Vijitaseno nāmassa putto ahosi. So
atk-s0511a:1694_0: So pana jiṇṇabyādhimatapabbajite disvā ājaññarathena nikkhamitvā pabbajitvā dasa
atk-s0511a:1694_1: māse padhānacariyaṃ cari. Koṇḍaññakumāraṃ pana pabbajantaṃ dasa janakoṭiyo anupabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:1694_2: So tehi parivuto dasa māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya sunandagāme samasahitaghanapayodharāya
atk-s0511a:1694_3: yasodharāya nāma seṭṭhidhītāya dinnaṃ paramamadhuraṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā phalapallavaṅkurasamalaṅkate
atk-s0511a:1694_4: sālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye gaṇaṃ pahāya sunandakājīvakena dinnā
atk-s0511a:1694_5: aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā sālakalyāṇirukkhaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pubbadisābhāgaṃ
atk-s0511a:1694_6: oloketvā bodhirukkhaṃ piṭṭhito katvā aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā
atk-s0511a:1694_7: pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā rattiyā paṭhamayāme
atk-s0511a:1694_8: pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ visodhetvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā pacchimayāme
atk-s0511a:1694_9: paccayākāraṃ sammasitvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānato vuṭṭhāya pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisitvā
atk-s0511a:1694_10: udayabbayavasena samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni disvā yāva gotrabhuñāṇaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0511a:1694_11: cattāri maggañāṇāni cattāri ca phalañāṇāni catasso paṭisambhidā catuyoniparicchedakañāṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:1694_12: pañcagatiparicchedakañāṇaṃ cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni sakale ca buddhaguṇe paṭivijjhitvā
atk-s0511a:1698: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-s0511a:1703: Paññāpetuṃ gatī natthi, pattānaṃ acalaṃ sukha”nti. –
atk-s0511a:1704_0: Evaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhimūleyeva phalasamāpattisukhena vītināmetvā
atk-s0511a:1704_1: aṭṭhame sattāhe brahmuno ajjhesanaṃ paṭicca – “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0511a:1704_2: deseyya”nti upadhārento attanā saddhiṃ pabbajitā dasa bhikkhukoṭiyo addasa. “Ime
atk-s0511a:1704_3: pana kulaputtā samupacitakusalamūlā maṃ pabbajantaṃ anupabbajitā mayā saddhiṃ padhānaṃ
atk-s0511a:1704_4: caritvā maṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsu, handāhaṃ imesaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti evaṃ
atk-s0511a:1704_5: upadhāretvā – “idāni pana te kattha vasantī”ti olokento – “ito aṭṭhārasayojanike
atk-s0511a:1704_6: arundhavatīnagare devavane viharantī”ti disvā – “tesaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ gamissāmī”ti
atk-s0511a:1704_7: pattacīvaramādāya seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ
atk-s0511a:1704_8: vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya, evameva bodhimūle antarahito devavane pāturahosi.
atk-s0511a:1705_0: Tasmiñca samaye tā dasa bhikkhukoṭiyo arundhavatīnagaraṃ upanissāya devavane viharanti.
atk-s0511a:1705_1: Te pana bhikkhū dasabalaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānasā paccuggantvā,
atk-s0511a:1705_2: bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā, buddhāsanaṃ paññāpetvā, satthu gāravaṃ katvā,
atk-s0511a:1705_3: bhagavantaṃ vanditvā, parivāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Tatra koṇḍañño dasabalo munigaṇaparivuto
atk-s0511a:1705_4: buddhāsane nisinno tidasagaṇaparivuto dasasatanayano viya vimalagaganatalagato saradasamayarajanikaro
atk-s0511a:1705_5: viya tārāgaṇaparivuto puṇṇacando viya virocittha. Atha satthā tesaṃ sabbabuddhanisevitaṃ
atk-s0511a:1705_6: anuttaraṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ dhammacakkappavattanasuttantaṃ kathetvā dasabhikkhukoṭippamukhā
atk-s0511a:1718_0: Tattha dīpaṅkarassa aparenāti dīpaṅkarassa satthuno aparabhāgeti attho. Koṇḍañño
atk-s0511a:1718_1: nāmāti attano gottavasena samadhigatanāmadheyyo. Nāyakoti vināyako. Anantatejoti
atk-s0511a:1718_2: attano sīlaguṇañāṇapuññatejena anantatejo. Heṭṭhato avīci upari bhavaggaṃ tiriyato
atk-s0511a:1718_3: anantā lokadhātuyo etthantare ekapuggalopi tassa mukhaṃ oloketvā ṭhātuṃ samattho
atk-s0511a:1718_4: nāma natthi. Tena vuttaṃ “anantatejo”ti. Amitayasoti anantaparivāro. Tassa hi bhagavato
atk-s0511a:1718_5: vassasatasahassāni yāva parinibbānasamayaṃ etthantare bhikkhuparisāya gaṇanaparicchedo
atk-s0511a:1718_6: nāma nāhosi. Tasmā “amitayaso”ti vuccati. Amitaguṇakittipi “amitayaso”ti vuccati.
atk-s0511a:1719: “Buddhopi buddhassa bhaṇeyya vaṇṇaṃ, kappampi ce aññamabhāsamāno;
atk-s0511a:1720: Khīyetha kappo ciradīghamantare, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassā”ti. ;
atk-s0511a:1721: Tasmā appameyyaguṇagaṇattā “appameyyo”ti vuccati. Durāsadoti durupasaṅkamanīyo, āsajja ghaṭṭetvā upasaṅkamitumasakkuṇeyyabhāvato durāsado, durabhibhavanīyoti attho.
atk-s0511a:1722_2: vuccati. Sīlena sāgarūpamoti sīlasaṃvarena velānātikkamanabhāvena sāgarasamo. “Mahāsamuddo,
atk-s0511a:1722_3: bhikkhave, ṭhitadhammo velaṃ nātivattatī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1723_1: samo, sadisoti attho. Merugirivaro viya thiratarasarīroti vā. Ñāṇena gaganūpamoti
atk-s0511a:1723_2: ettha bhagavato ñāṇassa anantabhāvena anantākāsena upamā katā. Cattāri anantāni vuttāni
atk-s0511a:1725: Buddhañāṇaṃ appameyyaṃ, na sakkā ete vijānitu”nti. ;
atk-s0511a:1726: Tasmā anantassa ñāṇassa anantena ākāsena upamā katāti.
atk-s0511a:1727_1: gahaṇena satipaṭṭhānasammappadhāniddhipādāpi gahitāva honti. Tasmā indriyādīnaṃ catusaṅkhepānaṃ
atk-s0511a:1727_2: vasena sattattiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ pakāsanadhammaṃ pakāsesi, desesīti attho.
atk-s0511a:1727_3: Hitāyāti hitatthaṃ. Dhammacakkaṃ pavattenteti desanāñāṇe pavattiyamāne.
atk-s0511a:1728_0: Tato aparabhāge mahāmaṅgalasamāgame dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu devatāyo sukhume attabhāve
atk-s0511a:1728_1: māpetvā imasmiññeva cakkavāḷe sannipatiṃsu. Tattha kira aññataro devaputto koṇḍaññadasabalaṃ
atk-s0511a:1728_2: maṅgalapañhaṃ pucchi. Tassa bhagavā maṅgalāni kathesi. Tattha navutikoṭisahassāni
atk-s0511a:1728_3: arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Sotāpannādīnaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo nāma nāhosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1732_0: Tattha tato parampīti tato aparabhāgepi. Desenteti bhagavati dhammaṃ desente. Naramarūnanti
atk-s0511a:1732_1: narānañceva amarānañca, yadā pana bhagavā gaganatale titthiyamānamaddanaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0511a:1732_2: karonto dhammaṃ desesi tadā asītikoṭisahassāni arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Tīsu phalesu
atk-s0511a:1736: Tattha tadā-saddaṃ ānetvā attho daṭṭhabbo. Yadā bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi, tadā asītikoṭisahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahūti.
atk-s0511a:1737_0: Koṇḍañño kira satthā abhisambodhiṃ patvā paṭhamavassaṃ candavatīnagaraṃ upanissāya
atk-s0511a:1737_1: candārāme vihāsi. Tattha sucindharassa nāma brāhmaṇamahāsālassa putto bhaddamāṇavo
atk-s0511a:1737_2: nāma yasodharabrāhmaṇassa putto subhaddamāṇavo ca koṇḍaññassa buddhassa sammukhā
atk-s0511a:1737_3: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānasā dasahi māṇavakasahassehi saddhiṃ tassa santike
atk-s0511a:1738_0: Atha koṇḍañño satthā jeṭṭhamāsapuṇṇamāya subhaddattherappamukhena koṭisatasahassena
atk-s0511a:1738_1: parivuto pātimokkhamuddisi, so paṭhamo sannipāto ahosi. Tato aparabhāge koṇḍaññasatthuno
atk-s0511a:1738_2: putte vijitasene nāma arahattaṃ patte taṃpamukhassa koṭisahassassa majjhe bhagavā
atk-s0511a:1738_3: pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so dutiyo sannipāto ahosi. Athāparena samayena dasabalo janapadacārikaṃ
atk-s0511a:1738_4: caranto udenarājānaṃ nāma navutikoṭijanaparivāraṃ pabbājesi saddhiṃ tāya parisāya.
atk-s0511a:1738_5: Tasmiṃ pana arahattaṃ patte taṃpamukhehi navutiyā arahantakoṭīhi bhagavā parivuto
atk-s0511a:1738_6: pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so tatiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1745_0: Tadā kira amhākaṃ bodhisatto vijitāvī nāma cakkavattī hutvā candavatīnagare paṭivasati.
atk-s0511a:1745_1: So kira anekanaravaraparivuto salilanidhinivasanaṃ sameruyugandharaṃ aparimitavasudharaṃ
atk-s0511a:1745_2: vasundharaṃ adaṇḍena asatthena dhammena paripāleti. Atha koṇḍañño buddhopi koṭisatasahassakhīṇāsavaparivuto
atk-s0511a:1746_0: So vijitāvī kira rājā – “sammāsambuddho kira amhākaṃ nagaraṃ anuppatto”ti sutvā paccuggantvā
atk-s0511a:1746_1: bhagavato vasanaṭṭhānaṃ saṃvidahitvā svātanāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena nimantetvā
atk-s0511a:1746_2: punadivase bhattavidhiṃ suṭṭhu paṭiyādetvā koṭisatasahassasaṅkhassa buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0511a:1746_3: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ adāsi. Bodhisatto bhagavantaṃ bhojetvā anumodanāvasāne
atk-s0511a:1746_4: – “bhante, temāsaṃ mahājanasaṅgahaṃ karonto idheva vasathā”ti yācitvā tayo māse nirantaraṃ
atk-s0511a:1747_0: Atha satthā bodhisattaṃ – “anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākaritvā dhammamassa
atk-s0511a:1747_1: desesi. So satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā rajjaṃ niyyātetvā pabbajitvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā
atk-s0511a:1747_2: aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca ca abhiññāyo uppādetvā aparihīnajjhāno brahmaloke nibbatti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1762: Pitā suddhodano nāma, ayaṃ hessati gotamo.
atk-s0511a:1790: Tameva atthaṃ sādhento, mahārajjaṃ jine adaṃ;
atk-s0511a:1798_0: Tattha ahaṃ tena samayenāti ahaṃ tasmiṃ samaye. Vijitāvī nāmāti evaṃnāmako cakkavattirājā
atk-s0511a:1798_1: ahosiṃ. Samuddaṃ antamantenāti ettha cakkavāḷapabbataṃ sīmaṃ mariyādaṃ katvā ṭhitaṃ
atk-s0511a:1798_2: samuddaṃ antaṃ katvā issariyaṃ vattayāmīti attho. Ettāvatā na pākaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-s0511a:1799_0: Rājā kira cakkavattī cakkaratanānubhāvena vāmapassena sineruṃ katvā samuddassa uparibhāgena
atk-s0511a:1799_1: aṭṭhayojanasahassappamāṇaṃ pubbavidehaṃ gacchati. Tattha rājā cakkavattī – “pāṇo
atk-s0511a:1799_2: na hantabbo, adinnaṃ nādātabbaṃ, kāmesumicchā na caritabbā, musā na bhāsitabbā, majjaṃ
atk-s0511a:1799_3: na pātabbaṃ, yathābhuttañca bhuñjathā”ti ovādaṃ deti. Evaṃ ovāde dinne taṃ cakkaratanaṃ
atk-s0511a:1799_4: vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā puratthimaṃ samuddaṃ ajjhogāhati. Yathā yathā ca taṃ ajjhogāhati,
atk-s0511a:1799_5: tathā tathā saṃkhittaūmivipphāraṃ hutvā ogacchamānaṃ mahāsamuddasalilaṃ yojanamattaṃ
atk-s0511a:1799_6: oggantvā antosamuddaṃ ubhosu passesu veḷuriyamaṇibhitti viya paramadassanīyaṃ hutvā
atk-s0511a:1799_7: tiṭṭhati, evaṃ puratthimasāgarapariyantaṃ gantvā taṃ cakkaratanaṃ paṭinivattati.
atk-s0511a:1799_8: Paṭinivattamāne ca tasmiṃ sā parisā aggato hoti, majjhe rājā cakkavattī ante cakkaratanaṃ
atk-s0511a:1799_9: hoti. Tampi jalaṃ jalantena viyogaṃ asahamānamiva nemimaṇḍalapariyantaṃ abhihanantameva tīramupagacchati.
atk-s0511a:1800_0: Evaṃ rājā cakkavattī puratthimasamuddapariyantaṃ pubbavidehaṃ abhivijinitvā dakkhiṇasamuddapariyantaṃ
atk-s0511a:1800_1: jambudīpaṃ vijetukāmo cakkaratanadesitena maggena dakkhiṇasamuddābhimukho gacchati.
atk-s0511a:1800_2: Taṃ dasasahassayojanappamāṇaṃ jambudīpaṃ abhivijinitvā dakkhiṇasamuddato paccuttaritvā
atk-s0511a:1800_3: sattayojanasahassappamāṇaṃ aparagoyānaṃ vijetuṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva gantvā tampi
atk-s0511a:1800_5: uttarakuruṃ vijetuṃ tatheva gantvā taṃ samuddapariyantaṃ katvā tatheva abhivijiya
atk-s0511a:1800_6: uttarasamuddatopi paccuttarati. Ettāvatā raññā cakkavattinā sāgarapariyantāya pathaviyā
atk-s0511a:1800_7: issariyaṃ adhigataṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ samuddaṃ antamantena, issariyaṃ vattayāmaha”nti.
atk-s0511a:1801_0: Koṭisatasahassānanti koṭisatasahassāni. Ayameva vā pāṭho. Vimalānanti khīṇāsavānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1801_1: Saha lokagganāthenāti saddhiṃ dasabalena koṭisatasahassānanti attho. Paramannenāti
atk-s0511a:1801_2: paṇītena annena. Tappayinti tappesiṃ. Aparimeyyito kappeti ito paṭṭhāya satasahassakappādhikāni
atk-s0511a:1801_3: tīṇi asaṅkhyeyyāni atikkamitvā ekasmiṃ bhaddakappeti attho.
atk-s0511a:1802_0: Padhānanti vīriyaṃ. Tameva atthaṃ sādhentoti tameva buddhakārakamatthaṃ dānapāramiṃ
atk-s0511a:1802_1: pūrento sādhento nipphādentoti attho. Mahārajjanti cakkavattirajjaṃ. Jineti bhagavati,
atk-s0511a:1802_2: sampadānatthe vā bhummaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Adanti adāsiṃ. Evamatthaṃ sādhentoti iminā sambandho
atk-s0511a:1802_3: daṭṭhabbo. “Mahārajjaṃ jine dadi”nti paṭhanti keci. Daditvānāti cajitvā. Suttantanti
atk-s0511a:1802_4: suttantapiṭakaṃ. Vinayanti vinayapiṭakaṃ. Navaṅganti suttageyyādinavaṅgaṃ. Sobhayiṃ
atk-s0511a:1802_5: jinasāsananti āgamādhigamehi lokiyehi samalaṅkariṃ. Tatthāti tassa bhagavato sāsane.
atk-s0511a:1802_6: Appamattoti satisampanno. Brahmalokamagañchahanti brahmalokaṃ agañchiṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1803_0: Imassa pana koṇḍaññabuddhassa rammavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, sunando nāma rājā pitā,
atk-s0511a:1803_1: sujātā nāma devī mātā, bhaddo ca subhaddo ca dve aggasāvakā, anuruddho nāmupaṭṭhāko,
atk-s0511a:1803_2: tissā ca upatissā ca dve aggasāvikā, sālakalyāṇirukkho bodhi, aṭṭhāsītihatthubbedhaṃ
atk-s0511a:1803_3: sarīraṃ, vassasatasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṃ ahosi, tassa rucidevī nāma aggamahesī ahosi,
atk-s0511a:1803_4: vijitaseno nāmassa putto, cando nāmupaṭṭhāko rājā. Candārāme kira vasīti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:1818: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:1821: Yathā hi gaganamuḷūbhi, evaṃ so upasobhatha.
atk-s0511a:1826: “Sā ca atuliyā jinassa iddhi, ñāṇaparibhāvito ca samādhi;
atk-s0511a:1828_0: Tattha sālakalyāṇikoti sālakalyāṇirukkho, so buddhakāle ceva cakkavattikāle ca nibbattati,
atk-s0511a:1828_1: nāññadā. So ekāheneva uṭṭhāti kira. Khīṇāsavehi vimalehi, vicittā āsi medanīti ayaṃ
atk-s0511a:1828_2: medanī khīṇāsavehi ekakāsāvapajjotā vicittā paramadassanīyā ahosi. Yathā hīti opammatthe
atk-s0511a:1828_3: nipāto. Uḷūbhīti nakkhattehi, tārāgaṇehi gaganatalaṃ viya khīṇāsavehi vicittā ayaṃ
atk-s0511a:1829_0: Asaṅkhobhāti aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi akkhobhā avikārā. Vijjupātaṃva dassetvāti vijjupātaṃ
atk-s0511a:1829_1: viya dassayitvā, “vijjuppātaṃvā”tipi pāṭho. Koṇḍaññabuddhassa kira kāle parinibbāyamānā
atk-s0511a:1829_3: samantato vijjotamānā tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nirupādānā dahanā viya parinibbāyiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:1829_4: Tena vuttaṃ “vijjupātaṃva dassetvā”ti. Atuliyāti atulyā asadisā. Ñāṇaparibhāvitoti
atk-s0511a:1829_5: ñāṇena vaḍḍhito. Sesagāthā heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānā evāti.
atk-s0511a:1832: “Na heva dhātuyo tassa, satthuno, vikiriṃsu tā;
atk-s0511a:1834: Sakalajambudīpavāsino manussā samāgantvā sattayojanikaṃ sattaratanamayaṃ haritālamanosilāya mattikākiccaṃ telasappīhi udakakiccaṃ katvā niṭṭhāpesunti.
atk-s0511a:1838_0: Koṇḍaññe kira satthari parinibbute tassa sāsanaṃ vassasatasahassaṃ pavattittha. Buddhānubuddhānaṃ
atk-s0511a:1838_1: sāvakānaṃ antaradhānena sāsanamassa antaradhāyi. Koṇḍaññassa pana aparabhāge ekamasaṅkhyeyyamatikkamitvā
atk-s0511a:1838_2: ekasmiṃyeva kappe cattāro buddhā nibbattiṃsu maṅgalo, sumano, revato, sobhitoti.
atk-s0511a:1838_3: Tattha maṅgalo pana lokanāyako kappasatasahassādhikāni soḷasa asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo
atk-s0511a:1838_4: pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā pañcasu pubbanimittesu uppannesu
atk-s0511a:1838_5: buddhakolāhalaṃ nāma udapādi, tadā dasasahassacakkavāḷe devatāyo ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷe
atk-s0511a:1841_0: Evaṃ devehi āyācito katapañcavilokano tusitā kāyā cavitvā sabbanagaruttame uttaranagare
atk-s0511a:1841_1: anuttarassa uttarassa nāma rañño kule uttarāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0511a:1841_2: gaṇhi. Tadā anekāni pāṭihāriyāni pāturahuṃ. Tāni dīpaṅkarabuddhavaṃse vuttanayeneva
atk-s0511a:1841_3: veditabbāni. Tassā uttarāya kira mahādeviyā kucchismiṃ sabbalokamaṅgalassa maṅgalassa
atk-s0511a:1841_4: mahāsattassa paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya sarīrappabhā rattindivaṃ asītihatthappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:1841_5: padesaṃ pharitvā candālokasūriyālokehi anabhibhavanīyā hutvā aṭṭhāsi. Sā ca aññenālokena
atk-s0511a:1841_6: vinā attano sarīrappabhāsamudayeneva andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyā dhātīhi
atk-s0511a:1842_0: Sā kira devatāhi katārakkhā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena paramasurabhikusumaphaladharasākhāviṭape
atk-s0511a:1842_2: paramaramaṇīye uttaramadhuruyyāne nāma maṅgaluyyāne maṅgalamahāpurisaṃ vijāyi. So
atk-s0511a:1842_3: jātamattova mahāsatto sabbā disā viloketvā uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gantvā
atk-s0511a:1842_4: āsabhiṃ vācaṃ nicchāresi. Tasmiñca khaṇe sakaladasasahassilokadhātūsu devatā dissamānasarīrā
atk-s0511a:1842_5: dibbamālādīhi samalaṅkatagattā tattha tattha ṭhatvā jayamaṅgalathutivacanāni sampavattesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:1842_6: Pāṭihāriyāni vuttanayāneva. Nāmaggahaṇadivase panassa lakkhaṇapāṭhakā sabbamaṅgalasampattiyā
atk-s0511a:1843_0: Tassa kira yasavā rucimā sirimāti tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ. Yasavatīdevippamukhāni tiṃsanāṭakitthisahassāni
atk-s0511a:1843_1: ahesuṃ. Tattha mahāsatto navavassasahassāni dibbasukhasadisaṃ sukhaṃ anubhavitvā
atk-s0511a:1843_2: yasavatiyā aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ sīlavaṃ nāma puttaṃ labhitvā cattāri nimittāni
atk-s0511a:1843_3: disvā alaṅkataṃ paṇḍaraṃ nāma sundaraturaṅgavaramāruyha mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā
atk-s0511a:1843_4: pabbaji. Taṃ pana pabbajantaṃ tisso manussakoṭiyo anupabbajiṃsu. Tehi parivuto mahāpuriso
atk-s0511a:1844_0: Tato visākhapuṇṇamāya uttaragāme uttaraseṭṭhino dhītāya uttarāya nāma dinnaṃ pakkhittadibbojaṃ

atk-s0511a:1898_0: Mahāsatto disvā “kiṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissasī”ti āha. “Mama ajānanasippaṃ nāma natthi,

atk-s0511a:2001_4: brahmāno ca dveḷhakajātā dvidhā ahesuṃ. Tato narasundarena arindamena nāma raññā
atk-s0511a:2001_5: saddhiṃ sāyanhasamaye sumanadasabalaṃ sabbalokanāthaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0511a:2001_6: arindamo rājā bhagavantaṃ nirodhapañhaṃ pucchi. Tato bhagavatā nirodhapañhe vissajjite
atk-s0511a:2001_7: navutipāṇakoṭisahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Ayaṃ tatiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2008_0: Tassa pana sumanassa bhagavato tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ. Tattha paṭhamasannipāte
atk-s0511a:2008_1: mekhalanagaraṃ upanissāya vassaṃ vasitvā paṭhamapavāraṇāya arahantānaṃ koṭisahassena
atk-s0511a:2008_2: ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitena saddhiṃ bhagavā pavāresi, ayaṃ paṭhamo sannipāto
atk-s0511a:2008_4: yojanappamāṇe kanakapabbate nisinno saradasamayarucirakaranikaro divasakaro viya
atk-s0511a:2008_5: yugandharapabbate munivaradivasakaro arindamarājānaṃ parivāretvā āgatānaṃ purisānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2008_6: navutikoṭisahassāni dametvā sabbe ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā tasmiṃyeva divase
atk-s0511a:2008_7: arahattaṃ pattehi bhikkhūhi parivuto caturaṅgasamannāgate sannipāte pātimokkhaṃ uddisi.
atk-s0511a:2008_8: Ayaṃ dutiyo sannipāto ahosi. Yadā pana sakko devarājā sugatadassanatthāya upasaṅkami,
atk-s0511a:2008_9: tadā sumano bhagavā asītiyā arahantakoṭisahassehi parivuto pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, ayaṃ
atk-s0511a:2021_0: Tattha abhighuṭṭhe pavāraṇeti liṅgavipallāso daṭṭhabbo, abhighuṭṭhāya pavāraṇāyāti
atk-s0511a:2021_1: attho. Tatoparanti tato aparabhāge. Kañcanapabbateti kanakamaye pabbate. Buddhadassanupāgamīti
atk-s0511a:2021_2: buddhadassanatthamupāgami. Tadā kira amhākaṃ bodhisatto atulo nāma nāgarājā ahosi
atk-s0511a:2021_3: mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo. So “loke buddho uppanno”ti sutvā ñātigaṇaparivuto sakabhavanā
atk-s0511a:2021_4: nikkhamitvā koṭisatasahassabhikkhuparivārassa sumanassa bhagavato dibbehi turiyehi
atk-s0511a:2021_5: upahāraṃ kāretvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā paccekadussayugāni datvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:2021_6: Sopi naṃ satthā “anāgate buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2036: Yathā koṇḍaññabuddhavaṃse, evaṃ aṭṭha gāthā vitthāretabbāti.
atk-s0511a:2040_0: Tassa pana sumanassa bhagavato mekhalaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, sudatto nāma rājā pitā,
atk-s0511a:2040_1: sirimā nāma devī mātā, saraṇo ca bhāvitatto ca dve aggasāvakā, udeno nāmupaṭṭhāko,
atk-s0511a:2040_2: soṇā ca upasoṇā ca dve aggasāvikā, nāgarukkho bodhi, navutihatthubbedhaṃ sarīraṃ,
atk-s0511a:2040_3: navutiyeva vassasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṃ ahosi, vaṭaṃsikā nāmassa mahesī devī, anūpamo
atk-s0511a:2040_4: nāma putto ahosi, hatthiyānena nikkhami. Upaṭṭhāko aṅgarājā. Aṅgārāme vasīti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2046: Cando sucando vaṭaṃso ca, tayo pāsādamuttamā.
atk-s0511a:2049: Vaṭaṃsikā nāma nārī, anūpamo nāma atrajo.
atk-s0511a:2064: Cālā ca upacālā ca, ahesuṃ aggupaṭṭhikā.
atk-s0511a:2070: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2075: “Te ca khīṇāsavā bhikkhū, so ca buddho asādiso;
atk-s0511a:2078: “Tañca ñāṇaṃ atuliyaṃ, tāni ca atulāni ratanāni;
atk-s0511a:2083_1: Dasasahassī virocatīti tassa pabhāya dasasahassīpi lokadhātu virocatīti attho. Tāraṇīyeti
atk-s0511a:2083_2: tārayitabbe, tārayituṃ vutte sabbe buddhaveneyyeti attho. Uḷurājāvāti cando viya.
atk-s0511a:2083_3: Atthamīti atthaṅgato. Keci “atthaṃ gato”ti paṭhanti. Asādisoti asadiso. Mahāyasāti
atk-s0511a:2083_4: mahākittisaddā mahāparivārā ca. Tañca ñāṇanti taṃ sabbaññutaññāṇañca. Atuliyanti
atk-s0511a:2087_0: Sumanassa pana bhagavato aparabhāge sāsane cassa antarahite navutivassasahassāyukā
atk-s0511a:2087_1: manussā anukkamena parihāyitvā dasavassāyukā hutvā puna anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā asaṅkhyeyyāyukā
atk-s0511a:2087_2: hutvā puna parihāyamānā saṭṭhivassasahassāyukā ahesuṃ. Tadā revato nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-s0511a:2087_3: Sopi pāramiyo pūretvā anekaratanasamujjalitabhavane tusitabhavane nibbattitvā tato
atk-s0511a:2087_5: sirivibhavasamudayenākulassa sabbasamiddhivipulassa vipulassa nāma rañño kule sabbajananayanālipālisamākulāya
atk-s0511a:2087_7: vipulāya nāma aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena
atk-s0511a:2088_0: Tassa paṭisandhiyaṃ jātiyañca pāṭihāriyāni pubbe vuttanayāneva ahesuṃ. Sudassanaratanagghiāveḷanāmakā
atk-s0511a:2088_1: tayo cassa pāsādā ahesuṃ. Sudassanādevippamukhāni tettiṃsa itthisahassāni paccupaṭṭhitāni
atk-s0511a:2088_2: ahesuṃ. Tāhi parivuto so surayuvatīhi parivuto devakumāro viya chabbassasahassāni
atk-s0511a:2088_3: visayasukhamanubhavamāno agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. So sudassanāya nāma deviyā varuṇe nāma
atk-s0511a:2088_4: tanaye jāte cattāri nimittāni disvā nānāvirāgatanuvaravasananivasano āmukkamuttāhāramaṇikuṇḍalo
atk-s0511a:2088_6: saradasamayarajanikaro viya tārāgaṇaparivuto viya cando tidasagaṇaparivuto viya dasasatanayano
atk-s0511a:2088_7: brahmagaṇaparivuto viya ca hāritamahābrahmā caturaṅginiyā mahatiyā senāya parivuto
atk-s0511a:2088_8: ājaññarathena mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā sabbābharaṇāni omuñcitvā bhaṇḍāgārikassa
atk-s0511a:2088_10: chinditvā ākāse khipi. Taṃ sakko devarājā suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakena paṭiggahetvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ
atk-s0511a:2089_0: Mahāpuriso pana devadattāni kāsāyāni paridahitvā pabbaji, ekā ca naṃ purisakoṭi anupabbaji.
atk-s0511a:2089_1: So tehi parivuto sattamāse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya aññatarāya sādhudeviyā
atk-s0511a:2089_2: nāma seṭṭhidhītāya dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā
atk-s0511a:2089_3: sāyanhasamaye aññatarenājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā mattavaranāgagāmī
atk-s0511a:2089_4: nāgabodhiṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tepaṇṇāsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ
atk-s0511a:2089_5: adhiṭṭhāya nisīditvā mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā – “anekajātisaṃsāraṃ…pe…
atk-s0511a:2089_6: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānesi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2093_0: Revato kira satthā bodhisamīpeyeva sattasattāhāni vītināmetvā dhammadesanatthaṃ brahmāyācanaṃ
atk-s0511a:2093_1: sampaṭicchitvā – “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti upadhārento attanā
atk-s0511a:2093_2: saha pabbajitabhikkhukoṭiyo aññe ca bahū devamanusse upanissayasampanne disvā ākāsena
atk-s0511a:2093_3: gantvā varuṇārāme otaritvā tehi parivuto gambhīraṃ nipuṇaṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ
atk-s0511a:2093_4: aññena anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā bhikkhūnaṃ koṭi arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi. Tīsu
atk-s0511a:2093_5: maggaphalesu patiṭṭhitānaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo natthi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2097_0: Tattha khandhadhātuvavatthānanti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ nāmarūpavavatthānādivasena
atk-s0511a:2097_2: nāma. Atha vā pheṇapiṇḍūpamaṃ rūpaṃ parimaddanāsahanato chiddāvachiddādibhāvato ca
atk-s0511a:2097_3: udakapubbuḷakaṃ viya vedanā muhuttaramaṇīyabhāvato, marīcikā viya saññā vippalambhanato,
atk-s0511a:2097_4: kadalikkhandho viya saṅkhārā asārakato, māyā viya viññāṇaṃ vañcanakato”ti evamādināpi
atk-s0511a:2097_5: nayena aniccānupassanādivasenapi khandhadhātuvavatthānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Appavattaṃ bhavābhaveti
atk-s0511a:2097_6: ettha bhavoti vaḍḍhi, abhavoti hāni. Bhavoti sassatadiṭṭhi, abhavoti ucchedadiṭṭhi.
atk-s0511a:2097_7: Bhavoti khuddakabhavo, abhavoti mahābhavo. Bhavoti kāmabhavo, abhavoti rūpārūpabhavoti
atk-s0511a:2097_8: evamādinā nayena bhavābhavānaṃ attho veditabbo. Tesaṃ bhavābhavānaṃ appavattihetubhūtaṃ
atk-s0511a:2097_9: dhammaṃ pakāsesīti attho. Atha vā bhavati anenāti bhavo, tīsu bhavesu uppattinimittaṃ
atk-s0511a:2097_10: kammādikaṃ. Upapattibhavo abhavo nāma. Ubhayattha nikantiyā pahānakaraṃ appavattaṃ
atk-s0511a:2097_11: dhammaṃ desesīti attho. Tassa pana revatabuddhassa tayova abhisamayā ahesuṃ. Paṭhamo
atk-s0511a:2101: Tattha tīṇīti tayo, liṅgavipallāso kato, ayaṃ paṭhamo abhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a:2102_0: Athāparena samayena nagaruttare uttare nagare sabbārindamo arindamo nāma rājā ahosi.
atk-s0511a:2102_1: So kira bhagavantaṃ attano nagaramanuppattaṃ sutvā tīhi janakoṭīhi parivuto bhagavato
atk-s0511a:2102_2: paccuggamanaṃ katvā svātanāya nimantetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sattāhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2102_3: mahādānaṃ pavattetvā tigāvutavitthataṃ dīpapūjaṃ katvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0511a:2102_4: nisīdi. Atha bhagavā tassa manonukūlaṃ vicittanayaṃ dhammaṃ desesi. Tattha devamanussānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2107_0: Athāparena samayena revato satthā uttaranigamaṃ nāma upanissāya viharanto sattāhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2107_1: nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdi. Tadā kira uttaranigamavāsino manussā yāgubhattakhajjakabhesajjapānakādīni
atk-s0511a:2107_2: āharitvā bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā bhikkhū paripucchiṃsu – “kuhiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0511a:2107_3: bhagavā”ti? Tato tesaṃ bhikkhū āhaṃsu – “bhagavā, āvuso, nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpanno”ti.
atk-s0511a:2107_4: Athātīte tasmiṃ sattāhe bhagavantaṃ nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhitaṃ saradasamaye sūriyo
atk-s0511a:2107_5: viya attano anūpamāya buddhasiriyā virocamānaṃ disvā nirodhasamāpattiyā guṇānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0511a:2107_6: pucchiṃsu. Bhagavā ca tesaṃ nirodhasamāpattiyā guṇānisaṃsaṃ kathesi. Tadā devamanussānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2107_7: koṭisataṃ arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Ayaṃ tatiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2111_1: gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattānaṃ paṭhamo sannipāto ahosi. Mekhalanagare koṭisatasahassasaṅkhātānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2111_2: ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṃ arahantānaṃ dutiyo sannipāto ahosi. Revatassa pana
atk-s0511a:2111_3: bhagavato dhammacakkānuvattako varuṇo nāma aggasāvako paññavantānaṃ aggo ābādhiko
atk-s0511a:2111_4: ahosi. Tattha gilānapucchanatthāya sampattamahājanassa lakkhaṇattayaparidīpakaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0511a:2111_5: desetvā koṭisatasahassaṃ purisānaṃ ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0511a:2111_6: caturaṅginike sannipāte pātimokkhaṃ uddisi. Ayaṃ tatiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2120: So tadā byādhito āsi, patto jīvitasaṃsayaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2124_0: Tattha cakkānuvattakoti dhammacakkānuvattako. Patto jīvitasaṃsayanti ettha jīvite
atk-s0511a:2124_1: saṃsayaṃ jīvitasaṃsayaṃ, jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇāti vā, na vā pāpuṇātīti evaṃ jīvitasaṃsayaṃ
atk-s0511a:2124_2: patto, byādhitassa balavabhāvena marati, na maratīti jīvite saṃsayaṃ pattoti attho.
atk-s0511a:2124_3: Ye tadā upagatā munīti iti dīghabhāve sati bhikkhūnaṃ upari hoti, rasse anussarena
atk-s0511a:2125_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto rammavatīnagare atidevo nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā brāhmaṇadhamme
atk-s0511a:2125_1: pāraṃ gato revataṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ disvā tassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0511a:2125_2: silokasahassena dasabalaṃ kittetvā sahassagghanikena uttarāsaṅgena bhagavantaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0511a:2125_3: Sopi naṃ buddho byākāsi – “ito kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake
atk-s0511a:2125_4: gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2128: Upagantvā revataṃ buddhaṃ, saraṇaṃ tassa gañchahaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2143: Āharissāmi taṃ dhammaṃ, yaṃ mayhaṃ abhipatthita”nti.
atk-s0511a:2144_0: Tattha saraṇaṃ tassa gañchahanti taṃ saraṇaṃ agañchiṃ ahaṃ, upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2144_2: pāṭho, so uttānova. Thomayitvāti thometvā vaṇṇayitvā. Yathāthāmanti yathābalaṃ. Uttarīyanti
atk-s0511a:2144_3: uttarāsaṅgaṃ. Adāsahanti adāsiṃ ahaṃ. Buddhadhammanti buddhabhāvakaraṃ dhammaṃ, pāramīdhammanti
atk-s0511a:2144_4: attho. Saritvāti anussaritvā. Anubrūhayinti abhivaḍḍhesiṃ. Āharissāmīti ānayissāmi.
atk-s0511a:2144_5: Taṃ dhammanti taṃ buddhattaṃ. Yaṃ mayhaṃ abhipatthitanti yaṃ mayā abhipatthitaṃ buddhattaṃ,
atk-s0511a:2145_0: Tassa pana revatassa bhagavato nagaraṃ sudhaññavatī nāma ahosi, pitā vipulo nāma
atk-s0511a:2145_1: khattiyo, mātā vipulā nāma, varuṇo ca brahmadevo ca dve aggasāvakā, sambhavo nāma
atk-s0511a:2145_2: upaṭṭhāko, bhaddā ca subhaddā ca dve aggasāvikā, nāgarukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ asītihatthubbedhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2145_3: ahosi, āyu saṭṭhivassasahassāni, sudassanā nāma aggamahesī, varuṇo nāma putto, ājaññarathena nikkhami.
atk-s0511a:2147: Divā ceva tadā rattiṃ, niccaṃ pharati yojanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2170: Divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ, samantā pharati yojanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2173: Tāvatā diṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2178: “So ca kāyo ratananibho, so ca dhammo asādiso;
atk-s0511a:2180_0: Tattha obhāsetīti pakāsayati. Uggatoti ussito. Pabhāmālāti pabhāvelā. Yathaggīti
atk-s0511a:2180_1: aggi viya. Upādānasaṅkhayāti indhanakkhayā. So ca kāyo ratananibhoti so ca tassa
atk-s0511a:2180_2: bhagavato kāyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo. “Tañca kāyaṃ ratananibha”ntipi pāṭho, liṅgavipallāsena
atk-s0511a:2180_3: vuttaṃ. Soyeva panassattho. Sesagāthāsu sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0511a:2184_0: Tassa pana aparabhāge tassa sāsanepi antarahite sobhito nāma bodhisatto kappasatasahassādhikāni
atk-s0511a:2184_1: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0511a:2184_2: ṭhatvā devehi āyācito tusitapurato cavitvā sudhammanagare sudhammarājassa kule sudhammāya
atk-s0511a:2184_3: nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. So dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena sudhammuyyāne
atk-s0511a:2184_4: mātukucchito parisuddhavirājitaghanameghapaṭalato puṇṇacando viya nikkhami. Tassa
atk-s0511a:2185_0: So dasavassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasitvā sattattiṃsanāṭakitthisahassānaṃ aggāya
atk-s0511a:2185_1: aggamahesiyā makhiladeviyā kucchismiṃ sīhakumāre nāma putte uppanne cattāri nimittāni
atk-s0511a:2185_2: disvā sañjātasaṃvego pāsādeyeva pabbajitvā tattheva ānāpānassatisamādhiṃ bhāvetvā
atk-s0511a:2185_3: cattāri jhānāni paṭilabhitvā sattāhaṃ tattheva padhānacariyamacari. Tato makhilamahādeviyā
atk-s0511a:2185_4: dinnaṃ paramamadhuraṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā abhinikkhamanatthāya cittamuppādesi
atk-s0511a:2185_5: – “ayaṃ pāsādo alaṅkatapaṭiyatto mahājanassa passantasseva ākāsena gantvā bodhirukkhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2185_6: majjhekatvā pathaviyaṃ otaratu, imā ca itthiyo mayi bodhimūle nisinne avuttā sayameva
atk-s0511a:2185_7: pāsādato nikkhamantū”ti. Sahacittuppādā pāsādo ca sudhammarājabhavanato uppatitvā
atk-s0511a:2185_10: divasakaro viya ca saradasamayarajanikaro viya ca virocamāno vilambamānavividhavicittakiṅkiṇikajālo
atk-s0511a:2185_11: yassa kira vāteritassa sukusalajanavāditassa pañcaṅgikassa turiyassa viya saddo vaggu
atk-s0511a:2185_12: ca rajanīyo ca kamanīyo ca ahosi.
atk-s0511a:2186_0: Dūrato paṭṭhāya suyyamānena madhurena sarena sattānaṃ sotāni odahamāno gharacaccaracatukkavīthiādīsu
atk-s0511a:2186_1: ṭhatvā pavattitakathāsallāpesu manussesu nātinīcena nātiuccena taruvaravanamatthakāvidūrenākāsena
atk-s0511a:2186_3: ākaḍḍhento viya ca puññānubhāvaṃ samugghosayanto viya ca gaganatalaṃ paṭipajji. Tattha
atk-s0511a:2186_4: nāṭakitthiyopi pañcaṅgikassa varaturiyassa madhurena sarena upagāyiṃsu ceva vilapiṃsu
atk-s0511a:2186_6: amaravarasenā viya paramaruciradassanā dharaṇī viya gaganatalena pāsādaṃ parivāretvā agamāsi.
atk-s0511a:2187_0: Tato pāsādo gantvā aṭṭhāsītihatthubbedhaṃ ujuvipulavaṭṭakkhandhaṃ kusumapallavamakulasamalaṅkataṃ
atk-s0511a:2187_1: nāgarukkhaṃ majjhekatvā otaritvā bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhahi. Nāṭakitthiyo ca kenaci avuttāva
atk-s0511a:2187_2: tato pāsādato otaritvā pakkamiṃsu. Anekaguṇasobhito kira sobhitopi mahāpuriso mahājanakataparivāroyeva
atk-s0511a:2187_3: rattiyā tīsu yāmesu tisso vijjāyo uppādesi. Mārabalaṃ panassa dhammatābaleneva yathāgatamagamāsi.
atk-s0511a:2187_4: Pāsādo pana tattheva aṭṭhāsi. Sobhito pana bhagavatā sambodhiṃ patvā – “anekajātisaṃsāraṃ…pe…
atk-s0511a:2187_5: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā bodhisamīpeyeva sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā
atk-s0511a:2187_6: brahmuno dhammajjhesanaṃ paṭijānitvā – “kassa nu kho paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti
atk-s0511a:2187_7: buddhacakkhunā olokento attano vemātike kaniṭṭhabhātike asamakumārañca sunettakumārañca
atk-s0511a:2187_8: disvā – “ime dve kumārā upanissayasampannā gambhīraṃ nipuṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ
atk-s0511a:2187_9: samatthā, handāhaṃ imesaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti ākāsenāgantvā sudhammuyyāne otaritvā
atk-s0511a:2187_10: dvepi kumāre uyyānapālena pakkosāpetvā tehi saparivārehi parivuto mahājanamajjhe
atk-s0511a:2200_0: Tattha sakagehamhīti attano bhavaneyeva, antopāsādataleyevāti attho. Mānasaṃ vinivattayīti
atk-s0511a:2200_1: cittaṃ parivattesi, sakagehe ṭhatvā sattadivasabbhantareyeva puthujjanabhāvato cittaṃ
atk-s0511a:2200_2: vinivattetvā buddhattaṃ pāpuṇīti attho. Heṭṭhāti heṭṭhato. Bhavaggāti akaniṭṭhabhavanato.
atk-s0511a:2200_3: Tāya parisāyāti tassā parisāya majjhe. Gaṇanāya na vattabboti gaṇanapathamatītāti
atk-s0511a:2200_4: attho. Paṭhamābhisamayoti paṭhamo dhammābhisamayo. Ahūti gaṇanāya na vattabbā parisā
atk-s0511a:2200_5: ahosīti attho. “Paṭhame abhisamiṃsuyevā”tipi pāṭho, tassa paṭhamadhammadesane abhisamiṃsu
atk-s0511a:2200_6: ye janā, te gaṇanāya na vattabbāti attho.
atk-s0511a:2201_0: Athāparena samayena sudassananagaradvāre cittapāṭaliyā mūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā
atk-s0511a:2201_2: nisīditvā abhidhammaṃ desesi. Desanāpariyosāne navutikoṭisahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo
atk-s0511a:2201_3: ahosi. Ayaṃ dutiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2205_0: Athāparena samayena sudassananagare jayaseno nāma rājakumāro yojanappamāṇaṃ vihāraṃ
atk-s0511a:2205_2: ārāmaṃ ropetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa niyyātesi. Dānānumodanaṃ katvā
atk-s0511a:2205_3: yāgaṃ vaṇṇetvā bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi. Tadā koṭisatasahassasattanikāyassa dhammābhisamayo
atk-s0511a:2205_4: ahosi. Ayaṃ tatiyābhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2212_0: Puna uggato nāma rājā sunandanagare sunandaṃ nāma vihāraṃ kāretvā buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0511a:2212_1: bhikkhusaṅghassa adāsi. Tasmiṃ dāne ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṃ koṭisataṃ arahantānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2212_2: sannipāto, tesaṃ majjhe sobhito bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi. Ayaṃ paṭhamo sannipāto
atk-s0511a:2212_3: ahosi. Puna mekhalānagare dhammagaṇo dhammagaṇārāmaṃ nāma pavarārāmaṃ mahāvihāraṃ
atk-s0511a:2212_4: kāretvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa datvā saha sabbaparikkhārehi dānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0511a:2212_5: Tasmiṃ samāgame ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbajitānaṃ navutiyā arahantakoṭīnaṃ sannipāte
atk-s0511a:2212_6: pātimokkhaṃ uddisi. Ayaṃ dutiyo sannipāto ahosi. Yadā pana bhagavā dasasatanayanapure
atk-s0511a:2212_7: vassaṃ vasitvā pavāraṇāya suravaraparivuto otari, tadā asītiyā arahantakoṭīhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0511a:2212_8: caturaṅgike sannipāte pavāresi. Ayaṃ tatiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2217: “Uggato nāma so rājā, dānaṃ deti naruttame;
atk-s0511a:2225_0: Tadā kira amhākaṃ bodhisatto rammavatīnagare ubhato sujāto ‘sujāto’ nāma brāhmaṇo
atk-s0511a:2225_1: hutvā sobhitassa bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0511a:2225_2: bhikkhusaṅghassa temāsaṃ mahādānamadāsi. Sopi naṃ “anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0511a:2237_0: Tattha tamevatthamanuppattiyāti tassa buddhattassa anuppattiatthaṃ, tassa pana sobhitabuddhassa
atk-s0511a:2237_1: – “anāgate ayaṃ gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti vacanaṃ sutvā “avitathavacanā hi
atk-s0511a:2237_2: buddhā”ti buddhattappattiatthanti attho. Ugganti tibbaṃ ghoraṃ. Dhitinti vīriyaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2238_0: Tassa pana sobhitassa bhagavato sudhammaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, pitā sudhammo nāma
atk-s0511a:2238_1: rājā, mātā sudhammā nāma devī, asamo ca sunetto ca dve aggasāvakā, anomo nāmupaṭṭhāko,
atk-s0511a:2238_2: nakulā ca sujātā ca dve aggasāvikā, nāgarukkho bodhi, aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthubbedhaṃ sarīraṃ
atk-s0511a:2238_3: ahosi, navutivassasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṃ, makhilā nāmassa mahādevī, sīhakumāro nāma
atk-s0511a:2238_4: atrajo, nāṭakitthīnaṃ sattattiṃsasahassāni navavassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. Pāsādena
atk-s0511a:2238_5: abhinikkhami. Jayaseno nāma rājā upaṭṭhāko. Setārāme kira vasīti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2247: Bujjhamāno ca so buddho, nāgamūle abujjhatha.
atk-s0511a:2259: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2264: “So ca buddho asamasamo, tepi sāvakā balappattā;
atk-s0511a:2266_0: Tattha sataraṃsīvātiādicco viya, sabbā disā obhāsetīti attho. Pavananti mahāvanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2266_1: Dhūpitanti vāsitaṃ gandhitaṃ. Atappiyoti atittikaro, atittijanano vā. Tāvadeti tasmiṃ
atk-s0511a:2266_2: kāle, tāvatakaṃ kālanti attho. Tāresīti tārayī. Ovādanti sakiṃ vādo ovādo nāma. Anusiṭṭhinti
atk-s0511a:2266_3: punappunaṃ vacanaṃ anusiṭṭhi nāma. Sesake janeti saccappaṭivedhaṃ appattassa sesajanassa,
atk-s0511a:2266_4: sāmiatthe bhummavacanaṃ. Hutāsanova tāpetvāti aggi viya tappetvā. Ayameva vā pāṭho,
atk-s0511a:2266_5: upādānakkhayā bhagavā parinibbutoti attho. Sesagāthāsu sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0511a:2270_0: Sobhitabuddhe pana parinibbute tassa aparabhāge ekamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ buddhuppādarahitaṃ
atk-s0511a:2270_1: ahosi. Atīte pana tasmiṃ asaṅkhyeyye ekasmiṃ kappe tayo buddhā nibbattiṃsu anomadassī,
atk-s0511a:2270_2: padumo, nāradoti. Tattha anomadassī bhagavā soḷasa asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca
atk-s0511a:2270_3: pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā devehi abhiyācito tato cavitvā candavatiyaṃ
atk-s0511a:2270_4: nāma rājadhāniyaṃ yasavā nāmassa rañño kule samussitacārupayodharāya yasodharāya
atk-s0511a:2270_5: nāma aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. Anomadassikumāre kira yasodharāya
atk-s0511a:2270_6: deviyā kucchigate tassa puññappabhāvena pabhā asītihatthappamāṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ pharitvā
atk-s0511a:2270_7: aṭṭhāsi. Candasūriyappabhāhi anabhibhavanīyāva ahosi. Sā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena
atk-s0511a:2270_8: bodhisattaṃ sucandanuyyāne vijāyi. Pāṭihāriyāni heṭṭhā vuttanayāneva.
atk-s0511a:2271_0: Nāmaggahaṇadivase panassa nāmaṃ gaṇhantā, yasmā jātiyaṃ ākāsato satta ratanāni patiṃsu,
atk-s0511a:2271_1: tasmā anomānaṃ ratanānaṃ uppattihetubhūtattā “anomadassī”ti nāmamakaṃsu. So anukkamena
atk-s0511a:2271_2: vuddhippatto dibbehi kāmaguṇehi paricāriyamāno dasavassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi.
atk-s0511a:2271_3: Tassa kira siri upasiri sirivaḍḍhoti tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ. Sirimādevippamukhāni tevīsati
atk-s0511a:2271_4: itthisahassāni paccupaṭṭhitāni ahesuṃ. So sirimāya deviyā upavāṇe nāma putte jāte
atk-s0511a:2271_5: cattāri nimittāni disvā sivikāyānena mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji. Taṃ
atk-s0511a:2272_0: Tehi parivuto mahāpuriso dasa māse padhānacariyaṃ cari. Tato visākhapuṇṇamāya anupamabrāhmaṇagāme
atk-s0511a:2272_1: piṇḍāya caritvā anupamaseṭṭhidhītāya dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṃ
atk-s0511a:2272_2: vītināmetvā anomanāmājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā ajjunarukkhabodhiṃ
atk-s0511a:2272_3: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhattiṃsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ
atk-s0511a:2272_4: adhiṭṭhāya pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā samāraṃ mārabalaṃ viddhaṃsetvā tīsu yāmesu tisso vijjā
atk-s0511a:2272_5: uppādetvā – “anekajātisaṃsāraṃ…pe… taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānesi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2277: “So chetvā bandhanaṃ sabbaṃ, viddhaṃsetvā tayo bhave;
atk-s0511a:2284: Byāharantaṃ giraṃ sutvā, amataṃ pāpuṇanti te”ti.
atk-s0511a:2285_0: Tattha anomadassīti anupamadassano, amitadassano vā. Amitayasoti amitaparivāro, amitakitti
atk-s0511a:2285_1: vā. Tejassīti sīlasamādhipaññātejena samannāgato. Duratikkamoti duppadhaṃsiyo, aññena
atk-s0511a:2285_2: devena vā mārena vā kenaci vā atikkamituṃ asakkuṇeyyoti attho. So chetvā bandhanaṃ
atk-s0511a:2285_3: sabbanti sabbaṃ dasavidhaṃ saṃyojanaṃ chinditvā. Viddhaṃsetvā tayo bhaveti tibhavūpagaṃ
atk-s0511a:2285_4: kammaṃ kammakkhayakarañāṇena viddhaṃsetvā, abhāvaṃ katvāti attho. Anivattigamanaṃ
atk-s0511a:2285_5: magganti nivattiyā pavattiyā paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ anivattīti vuccati, taṃ anivattiṃ
atk-s0511a:2285_6: gacchati anenāti anivattigamano. Taṃ anivattigamanaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ desesīti
atk-s0511a:2285_7: attho. “Dassetī”tipi pāṭho, soyevattho. Devamānuseti devamanussānaṃ, sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2286_0: Asaṅkhobhoti khobhetuṃ cāletuṃ asakkuṇeyyoti akkhobhiyo. Yathā hi samuddo caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro
atk-s0511a:2286_1: anekayojanasahassabhūtāvāso akkhobhiyo, evaṃ akkhobhiyoti attho. Ākāsova anantoti
atk-s0511a:2286_2: yathā pana ākāsassa anto natthi, atha kho ananto appameyyo apāro, evaṃ bhagavāpi
atk-s0511a:2286_3: buddhaguṇehi ananto appameyyo apāro. Soti so bhagavā. Sālarājāva phullitoti sabbalakkhaṇānubyañjanasamalaṅkatasarīrattā
atk-s0511a:2286_4: suphullitasālarājā viya sobhatīti attho. Dassanenapi taṃ buddhanti tassa buddhassa
atk-s0511a:2286_5: dassanenāpīti attho. Īdisesupi sāmivacanaṃ payujjanti saddasatthavidū. Tositāti paritositā
atk-s0511a:2286_6: pīṇitā. Byāharantanti byāharantassa, sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṃ. Amatanti nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2286_7: Pāpuṇantīti adhigacchanti. Teti ye tassa giraṃ dhammadesanaṃ suṇanti, te amataṃ pāpuṇantīti attho.
atk-s0511a:2287_0: Bhagavā pana bodhimūle sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā brahmunā āyācito dhammadesanāya
atk-s0511a:2287_1: buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ olokento attanā saha pabbajite tikoṭisaṅkhe jane upanissayasampanne
atk-s0511a:2287_2: disvā – “kattha nu kho te etarahi viharantī”ti upadhārento subhavatīnagare sudassanuyyāne
atk-s0511a:2287_3: viharante disvā ākāsena gantvā sudassanuyyāne otari. So tehi parivuto sadevamanussāya
atk-s0511a:2287_4: parisāya majjhe dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi. Tattha koṭisatānaṃ paṭhamābhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2291: Tattha phītoti phātippatto bāhujaññavasena. Koṭisatānīti koṭīnaṃ satāni koṭisatāni. “Koṭisatayo”tipi pāṭho, tassa satakoṭiyoti attho.
atk-s0511a:2292_0: Athāparena samayena osadhīnagaradvāre asanarukkhamūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā asurehi
atk-s0511a:2292_1: durabhibhavane tāvatiṃsabhavane paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ nisinno temāsaṃ abhidhammavassaṃ
atk-s0511a:2292_2: vassāpayi. Tadā asītidevatākoṭiyo abhisamiṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2296: Tattha vassanteti buddhamahāmeghe vassante. Dhammavuṭṭhiyoti dhammakathāvassavuṭṭhiyo.
atk-s0511a:2297: Tato aparena samayena maṅgalapañhāniddese aṭṭhasattati koṭiyo abhisamiṃsu. So tatiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2301: Tattha vassanteti dhammakathāsaliladhāraṃ vassante. Tappayanteti dhammāmatavassena tappayante, tappanaṃ karonte bhagavatīti attho.
atk-s0511a:2302_0: Anomadassissapi bhagavato tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ. Tattha soreyyanagare isidattassa
atk-s0511a:2302_1: rañño dhamme desiyamāne pasīditvā ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ arahantasatasahassānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2302_2: majjhe pātimokkhaṃ uddisi. Ayaṃ paṭhamo sannipāto ahosi. Rādhavatīnagare sundarindharassa
atk-s0511a:2302_3: nāma rañño dhamme desiyamāne ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṃ sattannaṃ arahantasatasahassānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2302_4: majjhe pātimokkhaṃ uddisi. Ayaṃ dutiyo sannipāto ahosi. Puna soreyyanagareyeva soreyyaraññā
atk-s0511a:2302_5: saha ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṃ channaṃ arahantasatasahassānaṃ majjhe pātimokkhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2302_6: uddisi. Ayaṃ tatiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2315_0: Tattha tassāpi ca mahesinoti tassa mahesino anomadassissāpi. “Tassāpi dvipaduttamo”tipi
atk-s0511a:2315_1: pāṭho, tassapi dvipaduttamassāti attho. Lakkhaṇaṃ saddasatthato gahetabbaṃ. Abhiññābalappattānanti
atk-s0511a:2315_2: abhiññānaṃ balappattānaṃ, ciṇṇavasitāya khippanisantibhāvena abhiññāsu thirabhāvappattānanti
atk-s0511a:2315_3: attho. Pupphitānanti sabbaphāliphullabhāvena ativiya sobhaggappattānaṃ. Vimuttiyāti
atk-s0511a:2316_0: Anaṅgaṇānanti ettha ayaṃ aṅgaṇa-saddo katthaci kilesesu dissati. Yathāha – “tattha
atk-s0511a:2316_1: katamāni tīṇi aṅgaṇāni? Rāgo aṅgaṇaṃ doso aṅgaṇaṃ moho aṅgaṇa”nti. “Pāpakānaṃ kho
atk-s0511a:2316_2: etaṃ, āvuso, akusalānaṃ icchāvacarānaṃ adhivacanaṃ yadidaṃ aṅgaṇa”nti. Katthaci kismiñci
atk-s0511a:2316_3: male? Yathāha – “tasseva rajassa vā aṅgaṇassa vā pahānāya vāyamatī”ti. Katthaci tathārūpe
atk-s0511a:2316_4: bhūmibhāge “cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ bodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ rājaṅgaṇa”nti. Idha pana kilesesu daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a:2316_5: Tasmā nikkilesānanti attho. Virajānanti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Tapassinanti kilesakkhayakaro
atk-s0511a:2316_6: ariyamaggasaṅkhāto tapo yesaṃ atthi te tapassino, tesaṃ tapassīnaṃ, khīṇāsavānanti attho.
atk-s0511a:2317_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto eko mahesakkho yakkhasenāpati ahosi mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo
atk-s0511a:2317_1: anekakoṭisatasahassānaṃ yakkhānaṃ adhipati. So “buddho loke uppanno”ti sutvā āgantvā
atk-s0511a:2317_3: nimminitvā tattha sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa adāsi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0511a:2317_4: bhagavā bhattānumodanasamaye “anāgate kappasatasahassādhike ekasmiṃ asaṅkhyeyye atikkante
atk-s0511a:2317_5: gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2332: Tattha uttariṃ vatamadhiṭṭhāsinti pāramipūraṇatthāya bhiyyopi daḷhataraṃ parakkamamakāsīti attho.
atk-s0511a:2333_0: Tassa pana anomadassissa bhagavato candavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, yasavā nāma rājā
atk-s0511a:2333_1: pitā, yasodharā nāma mātā, nisabho ca anomo ca dve aggasāvakā, varuṇo nāmupaṭṭhāko,
atk-s0511a:2333_2: sundarī ca sumanā ca dve aggasāvikā, ajjunarukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthubbedhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2333_3: ahosi, vassasatasahassaṃ āyu, sirimā nāma aggamahesī, upavāṇo nāmassa putto, dasavassasahassāni
atk-s0511a:2333_4: agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. So sivikāyānena nikkhami. Sivikāyānena gamanaṃ pana sobhitabuddhavaṃsavaṇṇanāya
atk-s0511a:2333_5: pāsādagamane vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Dhammako nāma rājā upaṭṭhāko. Dhammārāme kira
atk-s0511a:2348: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2353: “So ca satthā amitayaso, yugāni tāni atuliyāni;
atk-s0511a:2355_0: Tattha pabhā niddhāvatīti tassa sarīrato pabhā nikkhamati. Sarīrappabhā panassa niccakālaṃ
atk-s0511a:2355_1: dvādasayojanappamāṇaṃ padesaṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhati. Yugāni tānīti aggasāvakayugādīni
atk-s0511a:2355_2: yugaḷāni. Sabbaṃ tamantarahitanti vuttappakāraṃ sabbampi aniccamukhaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ vinaṭṭhanti
atk-s0511a:2355_3: attho. “Nanu rittakameva saṅkhārā”tipi pāṭho, tassa nanu rittakā tucchakāyeva sabbe
atk-s0511a:2355_4: saṅkhārāti attho. Ma-kāro padasandhikaro. Sesagāthāsu sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0511a:2356_0: Imassa pana anomadassissa bhagavato santike sāriputto ca mahāmoggallāno cāti ime
atk-s0511a:2356_1: dve aggasāvakā aggasāvakabhāvatthāya paṇidhānamakaṃsu. Imesaṃ pana therānaṃ vatthu
atk-s0511a:2356_2: cettha kathetabbaṃ. Mayā ganthavitthārabhayena na uddhaṭanti.
atk-s0511a:2360_0: Anomadassissa pana bhagavato aparabhāge vassasatasahassāyukā manussā anukkamena parihāyitvā
atk-s0511a:2360_1: dasavassāyukā hutvā puna anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā asaṅkhyeyyāyukā hutvā puna parihāyamānā
atk-s0511a:2360_2: vassasatasahassāyukā ahesuṃ. Tathā padumo nāma satthā loke uppajji. Sopi pāramiyo
atk-s0511a:2360_3: pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā campakanagare asamassa nāma rañño kule
atk-s0511a:2360_4: rūpādīhi asamāya asamāya nāma aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. So dasannaṃ
atk-s0511a:2360_5: māsānaṃ accayena campakuyyāne mātukucchito nikkhami. Jāte pana kumāre ākāsato sakalajambudīpe
atk-s0511a:2360_6: samuddapariyante padumavassaṃ nipati. Tenassa nāmaggahaṇadivase nāmaṃ gaṇhantā nemittakā
atk-s0511a:2360_7: ca ñātakā ca “mahāpadumakumāro”tveva nāmamakaṃsu. So dasavassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi.
atk-s0511a:2360_8: Nanduttara-vasuttara-yasuttarānāmakā tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ. Uttarādevippamukhāni tettiṃsa
atk-s0511a:2361_0: Atha mahāsatto uttarāya nāma mahādeviyā rammakumāre nāma uppanne cattāri nimittāni
atk-s0511a:2361_1: disvā ājaññarathena mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhami. Taṃ pabbajantaṃ ekā purisakoṭi anupabbaji.
atk-s0511a:2361_2: So tehi parivuto aṭṭha māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya dhaññavatīnagare
atk-s0511a:2361_3: sudhaññaseṭṭhissa dhītāya dhaññavatiyā nāma dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā mahāsālavane
atk-s0511a:2361_4: divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye titthakājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā
atk-s0511a:2361_6: pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā tīsu yāmesu
atk-s0511a:2361_7: tisso vijjā sacchikatvā – “anekajātisaṃsāraṃ…pe… taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2361_8: udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmetvā brahmuno āyācanaṃ adhivāsetvā
atk-s0511a:2361_9: dhammadesanāya bhājanabhūte puggale upaparikkhanto attanā saha pabbajite koṭisaṅkhe
atk-s0511a:2361_10: bhikkhū disvā taṅkhaṇeyeva anilapathena gantvā dhaññavatīnagarasamīpe dhanañjayuyyāne
atk-s0511a:2361_11: otaritvā tehi parivuto tesaṃ majjhe dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi. Tadā koṭisatānaṃ abhisamayo
atk-s0511a:2371_0: Tattha asamaṃ sīlanti aññesaṃ sīlena asadisaṃ, uttamaṃ seṭṭhanti attho. Samādhipi
atk-s0511a:2371_1: anantakoti samādhipi appameyyo, tassa anantabhāvo lokavivaraṇayamakapāṭihāriyādīsu
atk-s0511a:2371_2: daṭṭhabbo. Ñāṇavaranti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, asādhāraṇañāṇāni vā. Vimuttipīti arahattaphalavimuttipi
atk-s0511a:2371_4: pāṭho. Tassa “tayo abhisamayā”ti iminā uttarapadena sambandho daṭṭhabbo. Mahātamapavāhanāti
atk-s0511a:2372_0: Athāparena samayena padumo bhagavā attano kaniṭṭhabhātaraṃ sālakumārañca upasālakumārañca
atk-s0511a:2372_1: ñātisamāgame saparivāre pabbājetvā tesaṃ dhammaṃ desento navuti koṭiyo dhammāmataṃ
atk-s0511a:2372_2: pāyesi. Yadā pana rammattherassa dhammaṃ desesi, tadā asītikoṭīnaṃ tatiyo abhisamayo
atk-s0511a:2379_0: Yadā pana subhāvitatto nāma rājā padumassa buddhassa buddhapadumavadanassa santike
atk-s0511a:2379_1: koṭisatasahassaparivāro ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajito, tasmiṃ sannipāte bhagavā
atk-s0511a:2379_2: pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so pana paṭhamo sannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0511a:2380_0: Athāparena samayena mahāpadumo munivasabho usabhasamagatī usabhavatīnagaraṃ upanissāya
atk-s0511a:2380_1: vassaṃ upagañchi. Nagaravāsino manussā bhagavantaṃ dassanakāmā upasaṅkamiṃsu. Tesaṃ
atk-s0511a:2380_2: bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi. Tattha ca bahavo manussā pasannacittā pabbajiṃsu. Tato dasabalo
atk-s0511a:2380_3: tehi ca aññehi ca tīhi bhikkhusatasahassehi saddhiṃ visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāresi. So
atk-s0511a:2380_4: dutiyo sannipāto ahosi. Ye pana tattha na pabbajiṃsu, te kathinānisaṃsaṃ sutvā pāṭipade
atk-s0511a:2380_5: pañcasu māsesu pañcānisaṃsadāyakaṃ kathinacīvaramadaṃsu. Tato taṃ bhikkhū dhammasenāpatiṃ
atk-s0511a:2380_6: aggasāvakaṃ visālamatiṃ sālattheraṃ kathinatthāratthaṃ yācitvā kathinacīvaraṃ tassādaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2380_7: Therassa kathinacīvare kayiramāne bhikkhū sibbane sahāyakā ahesuṃ. Padumo pana sammāsambuddho
atk-s0511a:2380_8: sūcicchidde suttāni āvunitvā adāsi. Niṭṭhite pana cīvare bhagavā tīhi bhikkhusatasahassehi cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
atk-s0511a:2381_0: Athāparena samayena sīhavikkantagāmī purisasīho viya buddhasīho gosiṅgasālavanasadise
atk-s0511a:2381_5: kokilavadhūhi upagīyamāne paramaramaṇīye vivitte vijane yogānukūle pavane vassāvāsamupagañchi.
atk-s0511a:2381_6: Tasmiṃ viharantaṃ saparivārakaṃ dasabalaṃ tathāgataṃ dhammarājaṃ buddhasiriyā virocamānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2381_7: disvā manussā tassa dhammaṃ sutvā pasīditvā ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajiṃsu. Tadā
atk-s0511a:2381_8: dvīhi bhikkhusatasahassehi parivuto pavāresi. So tatiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2394_1: dhammasenāpatisālattheratthaṃ. Aparājitāti na parājitā, vibhattilopo daṭṭhabbo. Soti
atk-s0511a:2394_2: so mahāpadumo. Pavaneti mahāvane. Vāsanti vassāvāsaṃ. Upāgamīti upāgato. Dvinnaṃ
atk-s0511a:2394_3: satasahassinanti dvinnaṃ satasahassānaṃ. “Tadā āsi samāgamo”tipi pāṭho yadi atthi sundaro bhaveyya.
atk-s0511a:2395_0: Tadā tathāgate tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe vasante amhākaṃ bodhisatto sīho hutvā sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0511a:2395_1: samāpajjitvā nisinnaṃ disvā pasannacitto hutvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā sañjātapītisomanasso
atk-s0511a:2395_2: tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā sattāhaṃ buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ avijahitvā pītisukheneva
atk-s0511a:2395_3: gocarāya apakkamitvā jīvitapariccāgaṃ katvā payirupāsamāno aṭṭhāsi. Atha satthā tassa
atk-s0511a:2395_4: sattāhassa accayena nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya narasīho sīhaṃ oloketvā – “bhikkhusaṅghepissa
atk-s0511a:2395_5: cittappasādo hotūti saṅgho āgacchatū”ti cintesi. Anekakoṭibhikkhū tāvadeva āgañchiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2395_6: Sīho saṅghepi cittaṃ pasādesi. Atha satthā tassa cittaṃ oloketvā – “anāgate gotamo
atk-s0511a:2395_7: nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2413_0: Tattha pavivekamanubrūhantanti nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannanti attho. Padakkhiṇanti
atk-s0511a:2413_1: tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā. Abhināditvāti tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā. Upaṭṭhahanti
atk-s0511a:2413_2: upaṭṭhahiṃ. Ayameva vā pāṭho. Varasamāpattiyāti nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhahitvā. Manasā
atk-s0511a:2413_3: cintayitvānāti “sabbepi bhikkhū idha āgacchantū”ti manasāva cintetvā. Samānayīti samāhari.
atk-s0511a:2414_0: Tassa pana padumassa bhagavato campakaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi. Asamo nāma rājā pitā
atk-s0511a:2414_1: ahosi, mātāpi tassa asamā nāma, sālo ca upasālo ca dve aggasāvakā, varuṇo nāmupaṭṭhāko,
atk-s0511a:2414_2: rādhā ca surādhā ca dve aggasāvikā, mahāsoṇarukkho bodhi, aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthubbedhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2414_3: sarīraṃ, āyu vassasatasahassaṃ ahosi, rūpādīhi guṇehi anuttarā uttarā nāmassa aggamahesī,
atk-s0511a:2414_4: rammakumāro nāmassa atirammo tanayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2426: Pabhā niddhāvatī tassa, asamā sabbato disā.
atk-s0511a:2429: Sabbāpi tā hatā honti, patvā jinapabhuttamaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2432: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2438: Jahitvā sabbasaṅkhāre, nibbuto so yathā sikhī”ti.
atk-s0511a:2439_0: Tattha ratanaggimaṇippabhāti ratanappabhā ca aggippabhā ca maṇippabhā ca. Hatāti
atk-s0511a:2439_1: abhibhūtā. Jinapabhuttamanti jinassa sarīrappabhaṃ uttamaṃ patvā hatāti attho. Paripakkamānaseti
atk-s0511a:2439_2: paripakkindriye veneyyasatte. Vaddhapattanti purāṇapattaṃ. Pādapo vāti pādapo viya.
atk-s0511a:2439_3: Sabbasaṅkhāreti sabbepi ajjhattikabāhire saṅkhāre. “Hitvā sabbasaṅkhāra”ntipi pāṭho,
atk-s0511a:2439_4: soyevattho. Yathā sikhīti aggi viya nirupādāno nibbutiṃ sugato gatoti. Sesamettha
atk-s0511a:2443_0: Padumabuddhe pana parinibbute tassa sāsane ca antarahite vassasatasahassāyukā manussā
atk-s0511a:2443_1: anukkamena parihāyamānā dasavassāyukā ahesuṃ. Puna vaḍḍhitvā asaṅkhyeyyāyukā hutvā
atk-s0511a:2443_2: parihāyamānā navutivassasahassāyukā ahesuṃ. Tadā dasabaladharo tevijjo catuvesārajjavisārado
atk-s0511a:2443_3: vimuttisārado nārado nāma narasattuttamo satthā loke udapādi. So cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0511a:2443_4: kappasatasahassañca pāramiyo pūretvā tusitabhavane nibbattitvā tato cavitvā dhaññavatī
atk-s0511a:2443_5: nāma nagare sakavīriyavijitavāsudevassa sudevassa nāma rañño kule aggamahesiyā nirūpamāya
atk-s0511a:2443_6: anomāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. So dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena
atk-s0511a:2443_7: dhanañjayuyyāne mātukucchito nikkhami. Nāmaggahaṇadivase pana nāmakaraṇe kayiramāne
atk-s0511a:2443_8: sakalajambudīpe manussānaṃ upabhogakkhamāni anurūpāni ābharaṇāni ākāsato kapparukkhādīhi
atk-s0511a:2443_9: patiṃsu. Tenassa narānaṃ arahāni ābharaṇāni adāsīti “nārado”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2444_0: So navavassasahassāni agāramajjhe vasi. Vijito vijitāvī vijitābhirāmoti tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ
atk-s0511a:2444_1: anucchavikā tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ. Tassa nāradakumārassa kulasīlācārarūpasampannaṃ manonukūlaṃ
atk-s0511a:2444_2: vijitasenaṃ nāma ativiya dhaññaṃ khattiyakaññaṃ aggamahesiṃ akaṃsu. Taṃ ādiṃ katvā
atk-s0511a:2444_3: vīsatisahassādhikaṃ itthīnaṃ satasahassaṃ ahosi. Tassā vijitasenāya deviyā sabbalokānandakare
atk-s0511a:2444_4: nanduttarakumāre nāma jāte so cattāri nimittāni disvā caturaṅginiyā mahatiyā senāya
atk-s0511a:2444_6: paramasurabhigandhakusumasamalaṅkato padasāva uyyānaṃ gantvā sabbābharaṇāni omuñcitvā
atk-s0511a:2444_8: paramaruciraratanavicittaṃ sakesamakuṭaṃ chinditvā gaganatale khipi. Taṃ sakko devarājā
atk-s0511a:2444_9: suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakena paṭiggahetvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ netvā tiyojanubbedhaṃ sinerumuddhani
atk-s0511a:2445_0: Mahāpuriso pana devadattāni kāsāyāni vatthāni paridahitvā tattheva uyyāne pabbaji.
atk-s0511a:2445_1: Purisasatasahassā ca taṃ anupabbajiṃsu. So sattāhaṃ tattheva padhānacariyaṃ caritvā
atk-s0511a:2445_2: visākhapuṇṇamāya vijitasenāya aggamahesiyā dinnaṃ pāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā tattheva
atk-s0511a:2445_3: uyyāne divāvihāraṃ katvā sudassanuyyānapālena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā mahāsoṇabodhiṃ
atk-s0511a:2445_4: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā nisīditvā
atk-s0511a:2445_5: mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā tīsu yāmesu tisso vijjā uppādetvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā
atk-s0511a:2445_7: vītināmetvā brahmuno yācito paṭiññaṃ datvā dhanañjayuyyāne attanā saha pabbajitehi
atk-s0511a:2445_8: satasahassabhikkhūhi parivuto tattha dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi. Tadā koṭisatasahassānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2460: Pāpuṇī kevalaṃ bodhiṃ, buddhañāṇe ca cuddasa.
atk-s0511a:2464_0: Tattha cakkavattissāti cakkavattirañño. Jeṭṭhoti pubbajo. Dayitaorasoti dayito piyo
atk-s0511a:2464_1: oraso putto, dayito orasi gahetvā lālito putto dayitaoraso nāma. Āmukkamālābharaṇoti
atk-s0511a:2465_0: Tatthāsi rukkhoti tasmiṃ uyyāne eko kira rukkho rattasoṇo nāma ahosi. So kira navutihatthubbedho
atk-s0511a:2465_2: vigatavividhavihagagaṇasañcāro dharaṇītalatilakabhūto tarurajjaṃ viya kurumāno paramaramaṇīyadassano
atk-s0511a:2465_4: vipulayaso, sabbalokavikhyāto attano sampattiyā sabbattha pākaṭo vissutoti attho.
atk-s0511a:2465_5: Keci “tatthāsi rukkho vipulo”ti paṭhanti. Brahāti mahanto, devānaṃ pāricchattakasadisoti
atk-s0511a:2465_6: attho. Tamajjhappatvāti taṃ soṇarukkhaṃ patvā adhipatvā upagammāti attho. Heṭṭhatoti
atk-s0511a:2466_0: Ñāṇavaruppajjīti ñāṇavaraṃ udapādi. Anantanti appameyyaṃ appamāṇaṃ. Vajirūpamanti
atk-s0511a:2466_1: vajirasadisaṃ tikhiṇaṃ, aniccānupassanādikassa vipassanāñāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tena
atk-s0511a:2466_2: vicini saṅkhāreti tena vipassanāñāṇena rūpādike saṅkhāre vicini. Ukkujjamavakujjakanti
atk-s0511a:2466_3: saṅkhārānaṃ udayañca vayañca vicinīti attho. Tasmā paccayākāraṃ sammasitvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānato
atk-s0511a:2466_4: vuṭṭhāya pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisitvā udayabbayavasena samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni
atk-s0511a:2466_5: disvā yāva gotrabhuñāṇaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyamaggānukkamena sakale buddhaguṇe paṭilabhīti attho.
atk-s0511a:2467_0: Tatthāti soṇarukkhe. Sabbakilesānīti sabbepi kilese, liṅgavipariyāsaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2467_1: Keci “tattha sabbakilesehī”ti paṭhanti. Asesanti niravasesaṃ. Abhivāhayīti maggodhinā
atk-s0511a:2467_2: ca kilesodhinā ca sabbe kilese abhivāhayi, vināsamupanesīti attho. Bodhīti arahattamaggañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2467_3: Buddhañāṇe ca cuddasāti buddhañāṇāni cuddasa. Tāni katamānīti? Maggaphalañāṇāni aṭṭha,
atk-s0511a:2467_4: cha asādhāraṇañāṇānīti evamimāni cuddasa buddhañāṇāni nāma, ca-saddo sampiṇḍanattho,
atk-s0511a:2467_5: tena aparānipi catasso paṭisambhidāñāṇāni catuvesārajjañāṇāni catuyoniparicchedakañāṇāni
atk-s0511a:2467_6: pañcagatiparicchedakañāṇāni dasabalañāṇāni sakale ca buddhaguṇe pāpuṇīti attho.
atk-s0511a:2468_0: Evaṃ buddhattaṃ patvā brahmāyācanaṃ adhivāsetvā dhanañjayuyyāne attanā saha pabbajite
atk-s0511a:2468_1: satasahassabhikkhū sammukhe katvā dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi. Tadā koṭisatasahassassa
atk-s0511a:2468_2: paṭhamābhisamayo ahosi. Tadā kira mahādoṇanagare doṇo nāma nāgarājā gaṅgātīre paṭivasati
atk-s0511a:2468_3: mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo mahājanena sakkato garukato mānito pūjito. So yasmiṃ visaye
atk-s0511a:2468_4: janapadavāsino manussā tassa balikammaṃ na karonti, tesaṃ visayaṃ avassena vā ativassena
atk-s0511a:2469_0: Atha tīradassano nārado satthā doṇassa nāgarājassa vinayane bahūnaṃ pāṇīnaṃ upanissayaṃ
atk-s0511a:2469_1: disvā mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena parivārito tassa nāgarājassa nivāsaṭṭhānamagamāsi. Tato
atk-s0511a:2469_2: taṃ manussā disvā evamāhaṃsu – “bhagavā, ettha ghoraviso uggatejo mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo
atk-s0511a:2469_3: nāgarājā paṭivasati, so taṃ mā viheṭhessati na gantabba”nti. Bhagavā pana tesaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0511a:2469_4: asuṇanto viya agamāsi. Gantvā ca tatthassa nāgarājassa sakkāratthāya kate paramasurabhigandhe
atk-s0511a:2469_5: pupphasanthare nisīdi. Mahājano kira “nāradassa ca munirājassa doṇassa ca nāgarājassa
atk-s0511a:2470_0: Atha ahināgo munināgaṃ tathā nisinnaṃ disvā makkhaṃ asahamāno sandissamānakāyo hutvā
atk-s0511a:2470_1: padhūpāyi. Dasabalopi padhūpāyi. Puna nāgarājā pajjali. Munirājāpi pajjali. Atha
atk-s0511a:2470_2: so nāgarājā dasabalassa sarīrato nikkhantāhi dhūmajālāhi ativiya kilantasarīro dukkhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2470_3: asahamāno “visavegena naṃ māressāmī”ti visaṃ vissajjesi. Visassa vegena sakalopi
atk-s0511a:2470_4: jambudīpo vinasseyya. Taṃ pana visaṃ dasabalassa sarīre ekalomampi kampetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0511a:2470_5: Atha so nāgarājā – “kā nu kho samaṇassa pavattī”ti olokento saradasamaye sūriyaṃ
atk-s0511a:2470_6: viya candaṃ viya ca paripuṇṇaṃ chabbaṇṇāhi buddharasmīhi virocamānaṃ vippasannavadanasobhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2470_7: bhagavantaṃ disvā – “aho! Mahiddhiko vatāyaṃ samaṇo, mayā pana attano balaṃ ajānantena
atk-s0511a:2470_8: aparaddha”nti cintetvā tāṇaṃ gavesī bhagavantaṃyeva saraṇamupagañchi. Atha nārado
atk-s0511a:2470_9: munirājā taṃ nāgarājaṃ vinetvā tattha sannipatitassa mahājanassa cittappasādanatthaṃ
atk-s0511a:2470_10: yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ akāsi. Tadā pāṇīnaṃ navutikoṭisahassāni arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2470_11: So dutiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2477_0: Tattha pāṭiheraṃ tadākāsīti akāsi yamakapāṭihāriyanti attho. Ayameva vā pāṭho. “Tadā
atk-s0511a:2477_1: devamanussā vā”tipi pāṭho. Tattha devamanussānanti sāmiatthe paccattaṃ. Tasmā devānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2478: Yadā pana attano puttaṃ nanduttarakumāraṃ ovadi, tadā asītiyā koṭisahassānaṃ tatiyābhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2482_0: Yadā pana thullakoṭṭhitanagare bhaddasālo ca vijitamitto ca dve brāhmaṇasahāyakā
atk-s0511a:2482_1: amatarahadaṃ gavesamānā parisati nisinnaṃ ativisāradaṃ nāradasammāsambuddhaṃ addasaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2482_2: Te bhagavato kāye dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni disvā – “ayaṃ loke vivaṭacchado sammāsambuddho”ti
atk-s0511a:2482_3: niṭṭhaṃ gantvā bhagavati sañjātasaddhā saparivārā bhagavato santike pabbajiṃsu. Tesu
atk-s0511a:2482_4: pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pattesu bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ koṭisatasahassamajjhe pātimokkhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2482_5: uddisi, so paṭhamo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2486: Yasmiṃ samaye nārado sammāsambuddho ñātisamāgame attano paṇidhānato paṭṭhāya buddhavaṃsaṃ kathesi, tadā navutikoṭibhikkhusahassānaṃ dutiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2491_0: Yadā pana mahādoṇanāgarājassa vinayane pasanno verocano nāma nāgarājā gaṅgāya nadiyā
atk-s0511a:2491_1: tigāvutappamāṇaṃ sattaratanamayaṃ maṇḍapaṃ nimminitvā saparivāraṃ bhagavantaṃ tattha
atk-s0511a:2491_2: nisīdāpetvā saparivāro sajanapade attano dānaggadassanatthāya nimantetvā nāganāṭakāni
atk-s0511a:2491_3: ca tāḷāvacare vividhavesālaṅkāradhare sannipātetvā mahāsakkārena bhagavato saparivārassa
atk-s0511a:2491_4: mahādānaṃ adāsi. Bhojanāvasāne bhagavā mahāgaṅgaṃ otārento viya anumodanamakāsi.
atk-s0511a:2491_5: Tadā bhattānumodane dhammaṃ sutvā pasannānaṃ ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṃ asītibhikkhusatasahassānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2491_6: majjhe pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so tatiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2496_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantapasse assamaṃ māpetvā pañcasu
atk-s0511a:2496_1: abhiññāsu aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu ca ciṇṇavasī hutvā paṭivasati. Atha tasmiṃ anukampāya
atk-s0511a:2496_2: nārado bhagavā asītiyā arahantakoṭīhi dasahi ca anāgāmiphalaṭṭhehi upāsakasahassehi
atk-s0511a:2496_3: parivuto taṃ assamapadaṃ agamāsi. Tāpaso bhagavantaṃ disvāva pamuditahadayo saparivārassa
atk-s0511a:2496_4: bhagavato nivāsatthāya assamaṃ māpetvā sakalarattiṃ satthuguṇaṃ kittetvā bhagavato
atk-s0511a:2496_5: dhammakathaṃ sutvā punadivase uttarakuruṃ gantvā tato āhāraṃ āharitvā saparivārassa
atk-s0511a:2496_6: buddhassa mahādānaṃ adāsi. Evaṃ sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā himavantato anagghaṃ lohitacandanaṃ
atk-s0511a:2496_7: āharitvā tena lohitacandanena bhagavantaṃ pūjesi. Tadā naṃ dasabalo amaranaraparivuto
atk-s0511a:2496_8: dhammakathaṃ kathetvā – “anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2511_0: Tattha tadāpāhanti tadāpi ahaṃ. Asamasamanti asamā nāma atītā buddhā, tehi asamehi
atk-s0511a:2511_1: samaṃ tulyaṃ asamasamaṃ. Atha vā asamā visamā, samā avisamā sādhavo, tesu asamasamesu
atk-s0511a:2511_2: samo “asamasamasamo”ti vattabbe ekassa samasaddassa lopaṃ katvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0511a:2511_3: asamāvisamasamanti attho. Saparijjananti saupāsakajanaṃ. “Sopi maṃ tadā naramarūnaṃ,
atk-s0511a:2511_4: majjhe byākāsi cakkhumā”tipi pāṭho, so uttānatthova. Bhiyyo hāsetva mānasanti uttarimpi
atk-s0511a:2511_5: hāsetvā tosetvā hadayaṃ. Adhiṭṭhahiṃ vataṃ ugganti uggaṃ vataṃ adhiṭṭhāsiṃ. “Uttariṃ
atk-s0511a:2512_0: Tassa pana bhagavato nāradassa dhaññavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, sudevo nāma khattiyo
atk-s0511a:2512_1: pitā, anomā nāma mātā, bhaddasālo ca jitamitto ca dve aggasāvakā, vāseṭṭho nāma upaṭṭhāko,
atk-s0511a:2512_2: uttarā ca phaggunī ca dve aggasāvikā, mahāsoṇarukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ aṭṭhāsītihatthubbedhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2512_3: ahosi. Tassa sarīrappabhā niccaṃ yojanaṃ pharati, navutivassasahassāni āyu, tassa
atk-s0511a:2512_4: pana vijitasenā nāma aggamahesī, nanduttarakumāro nāmassa putto ahosi, vijito vijitāvī
atk-s0511a:2512_5: vijitābhirāmoti tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ. So navavassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. So padasāva
atk-s0511a:2529: “Na keci tena samayena, samantā yojane janā;
atk-s0511a:2533: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2539: Dhammasetuṃ daḷhaṃ katvā, nibbuto so narāsabho.
atk-s0511a:2543_1: Dasasahassī virocatīti tassa pabhāya dasasahassīpi lokadhātu virocati, virājatīti
atk-s0511a:2543_2: attho. Tamevatthaṃ pakāsento bhagavā “tassa byāmappabhā kāyā, niddhāvati disodisa”nti
atk-s0511a:2543_3: āha. Tattha byāmappabhā kāyāti byāmappabhā viyāti byāmappabhā, amhākaṃ bhagavato
