atk-s0511a:2544_0: Na kecīti ettha na-kāro paṭisedhattho, tassa ujjālenti-saddena sambandho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a:2544_1: Ukkāti daṇḍadīpikā. Ukkā vā padīpe vā kecipi janā na ujjālenti na pajjālenti. Kasmāti
atk-s0511a:2544_2: ce? Buddhasarīrappabhāya obhāsitattā. Buddharaṃsīhīti buddharasmīhi. Otthaṭāti adhigatā.
atk-s0511a:2545_0: Uḷūhīti tārāhi, yathā tārāhi gaganatalaṃ vicittaṃ sobhati, tatheva tassa sāsanaṃ
atk-s0511a:2545_1: arahantehi vicittaṃ upasobhatīti attho. Saṃsārasotaṃ taraṇāyāti saṃsārasāgarassa
atk-s0511a:2545_2: taraṇatthaṃ. Sesake paṭipannaketi arahante ṭhapetvā kalyāṇaputhujjanehi saddhiṃ sese
atk-s0511a:2545_3: sekkhapuggaleti attho. Dhammasetunti maggasetuṃ, sesapuggale saṃsārato tāretuṃ dhammasetuṃ
atk-s0511a:2545_4: ṭhapetvā katasabbakicco hutvā parinibbāyīti attho. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttattā sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0511a:2549_0: Nāradabuddhassa sāsanaṃ navutivassasahassāni pavattitvā antaradhāyi. So ca kappo
atk-s0511a:2549_1: vinassittha. Tato paraṃ kappānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ buddhā loke na uppajjiṃsu. Buddhasuñño
atk-s0511a:2549_2: vigatabuddhāloko ahosi. Tato kappesu ca asaṅkhyeyyesu vītivattesu ito kappasatasahassamatthake
atk-s0511a:2549_3: ekasmiṃ kappe eko vijitamāro ohitabhāro merusāro asaṃsāro sattasāro sabbalokuttaro
atk-s0511a:2549_4: padumuttaro nāma buddho loke udapādi. Sopi pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā
atk-s0511a:2549_5: tato cavitvā haṃsavatīnagare sabbajanānandakarassānandassa nāma rañño aggamahesiyā
atk-s0511a:2549_6: uditoditakule jātāya sujātāya deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. Sā devatāhi
atk-s0511a:2549_7: katārakkhā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena haṃsavatuyyāne padumuttarakumāraṃ vijāyi. Paṭisandhiyañcassa
atk-s0511a:2550_0: Tassa kira jātiyaṃ padumavassaṃ vassi. Tenassa nāmaggahaṇadivase ñātakā “padumuttarakumāro”tveva
atk-s0511a:2550_1: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So dasavassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. Naravāhana-yasavāhana-vasavattināmakā
atk-s0511a:2550_2: tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikā tayo cassa pāsādā ahesuṃ. Vasudattādevippamukhānaṃ itthīnaṃ
atk-s0511a:2550_3: satasahassāni vīsatisahassāni ca paccupaṭṭhitāni ahesuṃ. So vasudattāya deviyā putte
atk-s0511a:2550_4: sabbaguṇānuttare uttarakumāre nāma uppanne cattāri nimittāni disvā – “mahābhinikkhamanaṃ
atk-s0511a:2550_5: nikkhamissāmī”ti cintesi. Tassa cintitamatteva vasavattināmako pāsādo kumbhakāracakkaṃ
atk-s0511a:2550_6: viya ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā devavimānamiva puṇṇacando viya ca gaganatalena gantvā bodhirukkhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2550_7: majjhekaronto sobhitabuddhavaṃsavaṇṇanāya āgatapāsādo viya bhūmiyaṃ otari.
atk-s0511a:2551_0: Mahāpuriso kira tato pāsādato otaritvā arahattaddhajabhūtāni kāsāyāni vatthāni devadattiyāni
atk-s0511a:2551_1: pārupitvā tattheva pabbaji. Pāsādo panāgantvā sakaṭṭhāneyeva aṭṭhāsi. Mahāsattena
atk-s0511a:2551_2: sahagatāya parisāya ṭhapetvā itthiyo sabbe pabbajiṃsu. Mahāpuriso tehi saha sattāhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2551_3: padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya ujjeninigame rucānandaseṭṭhidhītāya dinnaṃ
atk-s0511a:2551_4: madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṃ katvā sāyanhasamaye sumittājīvakena
atk-s0511a:2551_5: dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā salalabodhiṃ upagantvā taṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhattiṃsahatthavitthataṃ
atk-s0511a:2551_6: tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya samāraṃ
atk-s0511a:2551_7: mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā paṭhame yāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā dutiye yāme dibbacakkhuṃ
atk-s0511a:2551_8: visodhetvā tatiye yāme paccayākāraṃ sammasitvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānato vuṭṭhāya pañcasu
atk-s0511a:2551_9: khandhesu abhinivisitvā udayabbayavasena samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni disvā yāva gotrabhuñāṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:2551_10: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyamaggena sakalabuddhaguṇe paṭivijjhitvā sabbabuddhāciṇṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:2551_11: “anekajātisaṃsāraṃ…pe… taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānesi. Tadā kira dasasahassacakkavāḷabbhantaraṃ
atk-s0511a:2551_12: sakalampi alaṅkarontaṃ viya padumavassaṃ vassi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2556: “Maṇḍakappo vā so āsi, yamhi buddho ajāyatha;
atk-s0511a:2558_0: Tattha sāgarūpamoti sāgarasadisagambhīrabhāvo. Maṇḍakappo vā so āsīti ettha yasmiṃ
atk-s0511a:2558_1: kappe dve sammāsambuddhā uppajjanti, ayaṃ maṇḍakappo nāma. Duvidho hi kappo suññakappo
atk-s0511a:2558_2: asuññakappo cāti. Tattha suññakappe buddhapaccekabuddhacakkavattino na uppajjanti.
atk-s0511a:2559_0: Asuññakappo pañcavidho – sārakappo maṇḍakappo varakappo sāramaṇḍakappo bhaddakappoti.
atk-s0511a:2559_1: Tattha guṇasārarahite kappe guṇasāruppādakassa guṇasārajananassa ekassa sammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0511a:2559_2: pātubhāvena “sārakappo”ti vuccati. Yasmiṃ pana kappe dve lokanāyakā uppajjanti, so
atk-s0511a:2559_3: “maṇḍakappo”ti vuccati. Yasmiṃ kappe tayo buddhā uppajjanti, tesu paṭhamo dutiyaṃ
atk-s0511a:2559_4: byākaroti, dutiyo tatiyanti, tattha manussā pamuditahadayā attanā patthitapaṇidhānavasena
atk-s0511a:2559_5: varayanti. Tasmā “varakappo”ti vuccati. Yattha pana kappe cattāro buddhā uppajjanti,
atk-s0511a:2559_6: so purimakappato visiṭṭhatarattā sāratarattā “sāramaṇḍakappo”ti vuccati. Yasmiṃ kappe
atk-s0511a:2559_7: pañca buddhā uppajjanti, so “bhaddakappo”ti vuccati. So pana atidullabho. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0511a:2559_8: pana kappe yebhuyyena sattā kalyāṇasukhabahulā honti. Yebhuyyena tihetukā kilesakkhayaṃ
atk-s0511a:2559_9: karonti, duhetukā sugatigāmino honti, ahetukā hetuṃ paṭilabhanti. Tasmā so kappo
atk-s0511a:2559_10: “bhaddakappo”ti vuccati. Tena vuttaṃ – “asuññakappo pañcavidho”tiādi. Vuttañhetaṃ porāṇehi –
atk-s0511a:2561: Varakappe tayo buddhā, sāramaṇḍe caturo buddhā;
atk-s0511a:2562: Pañca buddhā bhaddakappe, tato natthādhikā jinā”ti.
atk-s0511a:2563_0: Yasmiṃ pana kappe padumuttaradasabalo uppajji, so sārakappopi samāno guṇasampattiyā
atk-s0511a:2563_1: maṇḍakappasadisattā “maṇḍakappo”ti vutto. Opammatthe vā-saddo daṭṭhabbo. Ussannakusalāti
atk-s0511a:2564_0: Padumuttaro pana parisuttaro bhagavā sattāhaṃ bodhipallaṅke vītināmetvā – “pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0511a:2564_1: pādaṃ nikkhipissāmī”ti dakkhiṇaṃ pādaṃ abhinīhari. Atha pathaviṃ bhinditvā vimalakomalakesarakaṇṇikāni
atk-s0511a:2564_2: jalajāmalāvikalavipulapalāsāni thalajāni jalajāni uṭṭhahiṃsu. Tesaṃ kira dhurapattāni
atk-s0511a:2564_3: navutihatthāni kesarāni tiṃsahatthāni kaṇṇikā dvādasahatthā ekekassa navaghaṭappamāṇā
atk-s0511a:2564_4: reṇavo ahesuṃ. Satthā pana ubbedhato aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahattho ahosi. Tassa ubhinnaṃ bāhānamantaraṃ
atk-s0511a:2564_5: aṭṭhārasahatthaṃ nalāṭaṃ pañcahatthaṃ hatthapādā ekādasahatthā ahesuṃ. Tassa ekādasahatthena
atk-s0511a:2564_6: pādena dvādasahatthāya kaṇṇikāya akkantamattāya navaghaṭappamāṇā reṇavo uṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0511a:2564_7: aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthaṃ sarīrappadesaṃ uggantvā manosilācuṇṇavicuṇṇitaṃ viya katvā paccottharanti.
atk-s0511a:2564_8: Tadupādāya satthā padumuttarotveva loke paññāyitthāti saṃyuttabhāṇakā vadanti.
atk-s0511a:2565_0: Atha sabbalokuttaro padumuttaro bhagavā brahmāyācanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā dhammadesanāya
atk-s0511a:2565_1: bhājanabhūte satte olokento mithilanagare devalaṃ sujātañcāti dve rājaputte upanissayasampanne
atk-s0511a:2565_2: disvā taṅkhaṇaññeva anilapathena gantvā mithiluyyāne otaritvā uyyānapālena dvepi
atk-s0511a:2565_3: rājakumāre pakkosāpesi. Tepi ca “amhākaṃ pitucchāputto padumuttarakumāro pabbajitvā
atk-s0511a:2565_4: sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇitvā amhākaṃ nagaraṃ sampatto, handa naṃ mayaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamissāmā”ti
atk-s0511a:2565_5: saparivārā padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu. Tadā dasabalo
atk-s0511a:2565_6: tehi parivuto tārāgaṇaparivuto puṇṇacando viya virocamāno tattha dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi,
atk-s0511a:2565_7: tadā koṭisatasahassānaṃ paṭhamo dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2569_0: Athāparena samayena saradatāpasasamāgame mahājanaṃ nirayasantāpena santāpetvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0511a:2569_1: desento sattatiṃsasatasahassasaṅkhe sattakāye dhammāmataṃ pāyesi, so dutiyo dhammābhisamayo
atk-s0511a:2573_0: Yadā pana ānandamahārājā vīsatiyā purisasahassehi vīsatiyā amaccehi ca saddhiṃ padumuttarassa
atk-s0511a:2573_1: sammāsambuddhassa santike mithilanagare pāturahosi. Padumuttaro ca bhagavā te sabbe
atk-s0511a:2573_2: ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā tehi parivuto gantvā pitusaṅgahaṃ kurumāno haṃsavatiyā
atk-s0511a:2573_3: rājadhāniyā vasati. Tattha so amhākaṃ bhagavā viya kapilapure gaganatale ratanacaṅkame
atk-s0511a:2573_4: caṅkamanto buddhavaṃsaṃ kathesi, tadā paññāsasatasahassānaṃ tatiyo dhammābhisamayo
atk-s0511a:2580_0: Tattha ānandaṃ upasaṅkamīti pitaraṃ ānandarājānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Āhanīti abhihani.
atk-s0511a:2580_1: Āhateti āhatāya. Amatabherimhīti amatabheriyā, liṅgavipallāso daṭṭhabbo. “Āsevite”tipi
atk-s0511a:2580_2: pāṭho, tassa āsevitāyāti attho. Vassante dhammavuṭṭhiyāti dhammavassaṃ vassanteti
atk-s0511a:2583: Desanākusalo buddho, tāresi janataṃ bahu”nti. – āha;
atk-s0511a:2584: Tattha ovādakoti saraṇasīladhutaṅgasamādānaguṇānisaṃsavaṇṇanāya ovadatīti ovādako. Viññāpakoti catusaccaṃ viññāpetīti viññāpako, bodhako. Tārakoti caturoghatārako.
atk-s0511a:2585: Yadā pana satthā mithilanagare mithiluyyāne koṭisatasahassabhikkhugaṇamajjhe māghapuṇṇamāya puṇṇacandasadisavadano pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so paṭhamo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2589_0: Yadā pana bhagavā vebhārapabbatakūṭe vassāvāsaṃ vasitvā pabbatasandassanatthaṃ āgatassa
atk-s0511a:2589_1: mahājanassa dhammaṃ desetvā navutikoṭisahassāni ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbājetvā tehi
atk-s0511a:2589_2: parivuto pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so dutiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2593: Puna bhagavati guṇavati tilokanāthe mahājanassa bandhanamokkhaṃ kurumāne janapadacārikaṃ caramāne asītikoṭisahassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2597: Tattha gāmanigamaraṭṭhatoti gāmanigamaraṭṭhehi. Ayameva vā pāṭho, tassa gāmanigamaraṭṭhehi nikkhamitvā pabbajitānanti attho.
atk-s0511a:2598_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto anekadhanakoṭiko jaṭilo nāma mahāraṭṭhiko hutvā buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0511a:2598_1: saṅghassa sacīvaraṃ varadānamadāsi. Sopi taṃ bhattānumodanāvasāne “anāgate kappasatasahassamatthake
atk-s0511a:2598_2: gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2604: Satasahasse ito kappe, ayaṃ buddho bhavissati.
atk-s0511a:2610_0: Tattha sambuddhappamukhaṃ saṅghanti buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa, sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2610_1: Sabhattaṃ dussamadāsahanti sacīvaraṃ bhattaṃ adāsiṃ ahanti attho. Uggadaḷahanti atidaḷhaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2611: Padumuttarassa pana bhagavato kāle titthiyā nāma nāhesuṃ. Sabbe devamanussā buddhameva saraṇamagamaṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2614: Na tesaṃ keci paricaranti, raṭṭhato nicchubhanti te.
atk-s0511a:2617: Tuvaṃ nātho mahāvīra, saraṇaṃ hohi cakkhuma.
atk-s0511a:2624_0: Tattha byāhatāti vihatamānadappā. Titthiyāti ettha titthaṃ veditabbaṃ, titthakaro
atk-s0511a:2624_1: veditabbo, titthiyā veditabbā. Tattha sassatādidiṭṭhivasena taranti etthāti titthaṃ,
atk-s0511a:2624_2: laddhi. Tassā laddhiyā uppādako titthakaro, titthe bhavā titthiyāti. Padumuttarassa
atk-s0511a:2624_3: kira bhagavato kāle titthiyā nāhesuṃ. Ye pana santi, tepi īdisā ahesunti dassanatthaṃ
atk-s0511a:2624_4: “byāhatā titthiyā”tiādi vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Vimanāti virūpamānasā. Dummanāti tasseva
atk-s0511a:2624_5: vevacanaṃ. Na tesaṃ keci paricarantīti tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ kecipi purisā parikammaṃ
atk-s0511a:2624_6: na karonti, na bhikkhaṃ denti, na sakkaronti, na garuṃ karonti, na mānenti, na pūjenti,
atk-s0511a:2624_7: na āsanā vuṭṭhahanti, na añjalikammaṃ karontīti attho. Raṭṭhatoti sakalaraṭṭhatopi.
atk-s0511a:2624_8: Nicchubhantīti nīharanti, ussādenti tesaṃ nivāsaṃ na dentīti attho. Teti titthiyā.
atk-s0511a:2625_0: Upagañchuṃ buddhasantiketi evaṃ tehi raṭṭhavāsīhi manussehi ussādiyamānā sabbepi
atk-s0511a:2625_1: aññatitthiyā samāgantvā padumuttaradasabalameva saraṇamagamaṃsu. “Tvaṃ amhākaṃ satthā
atk-s0511a:2625_2: nātho gati parāyanaṃ saraṇa”nti evaṃ vatvā saraṇamagamaṃsūti attho. Anukampatīti
atk-s0511a:2625_3: anukampako. Karuṇāya caratīti kāruṇiko. Sampatteti samāgate saraṇamupagate titthiye.
atk-s0511a:2625_4: Pañcasīle patiṭṭhahīti pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesīti attho. Nirākulanti anākulaṃ,
atk-s0511a:2625_5: aññehi laddhikehi asammissanti attho. Suññakanti suññaṃ rittaṃ tehi titthiyehi. Tanti
atk-s0511a:2625_6: taṃ bhagavato sāsananti vacanaseso daṭṭhabbo. Vicittanti vicittavicittaṃ. Vasībhūtehīti vasībhāvappattehi.
atk-s0511a:2626_0: Tassa pana padumuttarassa bhagavato haṃsavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi. Pitā panassa ānando
atk-s0511a:2626_1: nāma khattiyo, mātā sujātā nāma devī, devalo ca sujāto ca dve aggasāvakā, sumano
atk-s0511a:2626_2: nāmupaṭṭhāko, amitā ca asamā ca dve aggasāvikā, salalarukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthubbedhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2626_3: ahosi, sarīrappabhā cassa samantā dvādasa yojanāni gaṇhi, vassasatasahassaṃ āyu ahosi,
atk-s0511a:2626_4: vasudattā nāma aggamahesī, uttaro nāma putto ahosi. Padumuttaro pana bhagavā paramābhirāme
atk-s0511a:2626_5: nandārāme kira parinibbuto. Dhātuyo panassa na vikiriṃsu. Sakalajambudīpavāsino manussā
atk-s0511a:2626_6: samāgamma dvādasayojanubbedhaṃ sattaratanamayaṃ cetiyamakaṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2644: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2648_0: Tattha nagasiluccayāti nagasaṅkhātā siluccayā. Āvaraṇanti paṭicchādanaṃ tirokaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2648_1: Dvādasayojaneti samantato dvādasayojane ṭhāne bhagavato sarīrappabhā pharitvā rattindivaṃ
atk-s0511a:2649: Ito paṭṭhāya pāramipūraṇādipunappunāgatamatthaṃ saṅkhipitvā visesatthameva vatvā gamissāma. Yadi pana vuttameva punappunaṃ vakkhāma, kadā antaṃ gamissati ayaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāti.
atk-s0511a:2653_0: Padumuttare pana sammāsambuddhe parinibbute sāsanepissa antarahite sattatikappasahassāni
atk-s0511a:2653_1: buddhā nuppajjiṃsu, buddhasuññāni ahesuṃ. Ito paṭṭhāya tiṃsakappasahassānaṃ matthake
atk-s0511a:2653_2: ekasmiṃ kappe sumedho sujāto cāti dve sammāsambuddhā nibbattiṃsu. Tattha adhigatamedho
atk-s0511a:2653_3: sumedho nāma bodhisatto pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā sudassananagare
atk-s0511a:2653_4: sudattassa nāma rañño aggamahesiyā sudattāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā
atk-s0511a:2653_5: dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena sudassanuyyāne taruṇadivasakaro viya saliladharavivaragato
atk-s0511a:2653_6: mātukucchito nikkhami. So navavassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. Tassa kira sucandana-kañcana-sirivaḍḍhananāmakā
atk-s0511a:2653_7: tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ. Sumanamahādevippamukhāni aṭṭhacattālīsaitthisahassāni paccupaṭṭhitāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2654_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā sumanadeviyā punabbasumitte nāma putte jāte hatthiyānena
atk-s0511a:2654_1: mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji. Manussānañca koṭisatamanupabbaji. So tehi
atk-s0511a:2654_2: parivuto aḍḍhamāsaṃ padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya nakulanigame nakulaseṭṭhidhītāya
atk-s0511a:2654_3: dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sirivaḍḍhājīvakena
atk-s0511a:2654_4: dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā nīpabodhimūle vīsatihatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ
atk-s0511a:2654_5: santharitvā samāraṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā abhisambodhiṃ pāpuṇitvā “anekajātisaṃsāraṃ…pe…
atk-s0511a:2654_6: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmetvā
atk-s0511a:2654_7: aṭṭhame sattāhe brahmuno dhammadesanāyācanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā bhabbapuggale olokento
atk-s0511a:2654_8: attano kaniṭṭhabhātikaṃ saraṇakumārañca sabbakāmikumārañca attanā saddhiṃ pabbajitānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2654_9: bhikkhūnañca koṭisataṃ catusaccadhammapaṭivedhasamatthe disvā ākāsena gantvā sudassananagarasamīpe
atk-s0511a:2654_10: sudassanuyyāne otaritvā uyyānapālena attano bhātike pakkosāpetvā tesaṃ parivārānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2654_11: majjhe dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi. Tadā koṭisatasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi, ayaṃ
atk-s0511a:2667_0: Tattha uggatejoti uggatatejo. Pasannanettoti suṭṭhu pasannanayano, dhovitvā majjitvā
atk-s0511a:2667_1: ṭhapitamaṇiguḷikā viya pasannāni nettāni honti. Tasmā so “pasannanetto”ti vutto.
atk-s0511a:2667_3: vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Sumukhoti paripuṇṇasaradasamayacandasadisavadano. Brahāti aṭṭhāsītihatthappamāṇasarīrattā
atk-s0511a:2667_4: brahā mahanto, aññehi asādhāraṇasarīrappamāṇoti attho. Ujūti brahmujugatto ujumeva
atk-s0511a:2667_6: vijjotamānasarīro. Hitesīti hitagavesī. Abhisamayā tīṇīti abhisamayā tayo, liṅgavipallāso katoti.
atk-s0511a:2668_0: Yadā pana bhagavā kumbhakaṇṇasadisānubhāvaṃ kumbhakaṇṇaṃ nāma manussabhakkhaṃ yakkhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2668_2: paccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ olokento disvā
atk-s0511a:2668_3: ekakova asahāyo tassa yakkhassa bhavanaṃ gantvā anto pavisitvā paññatte sirisayane
atk-s0511a:2668_4: nisīdi. Atha kho so yakkho makkhaṃ asahamāno daṇḍāhato ghoraviso āsiviso viya saṃkuddho
atk-s0511a:2668_5: dasabalaṃ bhiṃsāpetukāmo attano attabhāvaṃ ghorataraṃ katvā pabbatasadisaṃ sīsaṃ
atk-s0511a:2668_8: thūlapiṅgalakharapharusakeso atibhayānakadassano hutvā āgantvā sumedhassa bhagavato
atk-s0511a:2668_10: navavidhā vassavuṭṭhiyo vassetvāpi bhagavato lomaggamattampi cāletuṃ asakkonto “bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0511a:2668_11: pañhaṃ pucchitvā māressāmī”ti āḷavako viya pañhaṃ pucchi. Ayaṃ bhagavā pañhābyākaraṇena
atk-s0511a:2668_12: taṃ yakkhaṃ vinayamupanesi. Tato dutiyadivase kirassa raṭṭhavāsino manussā sakaṭabharitena
atk-s0511a:2668_13: bhattena saha rājakumāraṃ āharitvā yakkhassa adaṃsu. Atha yakkho rājakumāraṃ buddhassa
atk-s0511a:2668_14: adāsi. Aṭavidvāre ṭhitamanussā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu. Tadā tasmiṃ samāgame dasabalo
atk-s0511a:2668_15: yakkhassa manonukūlaṃ dhammaṃ desento. Navutikoṭisahassānaṃ pāṇīnaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ
atk-s0511a:2668_16: uppādesi, so dutiyo dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2672: Yadā pana upakārinagare sirinandanuyyāne cattāri saccāni pakāsayi, tadā asītikoṭisatasahassānaṃ tatiyo dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2676_0: Sumedhassāpi bhagavato tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ. Paṭhamasannipāte sudassananagare
atk-s0511a:2676_1: koṭisatakhīṇāsavā ahesuṃ. Puna devakūṭe pabbate kathinatthate dutiye navutikoṭiyo.
atk-s0511a:2676_2: Puna tatiye bhagavati cārikaṃ caramāne asītikoṭiyo ahesuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2689_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto uttaro nāma sabbajanuttaro māṇavo hutvā nidahitvā ṭhapitaṃyeva
atk-s0511a:2689_1: asītikoṭidhanaṃ vissajjetvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā tadā dasabalassa
atk-s0511a:2689_2: dhammaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya nikkhamitvā pabbaji. Sopi naṃ satthā bhojanānumodanaṃ
atk-s0511a:2689_3: karonto – “anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2711_0: Tattha sannicitanti nidahitaṃ nidhānavasena. Kevalanti sakalanti attho. Sabbanti
atk-s0511a:2711_1: asesato datvā. Sasaṅgheti sasaṅghassa. Tassūpagañchinti taṃ upagañchiṃ, upayogatthe
atk-s0511a:2711_2: sāmivacanaṃ. Abhirocayinti pabbajiṃ. Tiṃsakappasahassamhīti tiṃsakappasahassesu atikkantesūti attho.
atk-s0511a:2712_0: Tassa pana sumedhassa bhagavato sudassanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, sudatto nāma rājā
atk-s0511a:2712_1: pitā, mātā sudattā nāma, saraṇo ca sabbakāmo ca dve aggasāvakā, sāgaro nāmupaṭṭhāko,
atk-s0511a:2712_2: rāmā ca surāmā ca dve aggasāvikā, mahānīparukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ aṭṭhāsītihatthubbedhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2712_3: ahosi, āyu navutivassasahassāni, navavassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi, sumanā nāmassa
atk-s0511a:2712_4: aggamahesī, punabbasumitto nāma putto, hatthiyānena nikkhami. Sesaṃ gāthāsu dissati. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2724: Obhāseti disā sabbā, cando tāragaṇe yathā.
atk-s0511a:2727: Tatheva tassa ratanaṃ, samantā pharati yojanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2730: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2737_0: Tattha cando tāragaṇe yathāti yathā nāma gagane paripuṇṇacando tārāgaṇe obhāseti
atk-s0511a:2737_1: pakāseti, evameva sabbāpi disā obhāsetīti attho. Keci “cando pannaraso yathā”ti paṭhanti, so uttānatthova.
atk-s0511a:2738_0: Cakkavattimaṇī nāmāti yathā nāma cakkavattirañño maṇiratanaṃ catuhatthāyāmaṃ sakaṭanābhisamapariṇāhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2738_3: tassevaṃ āgacchantassa samantato yojanappamāṇaṃ okāsaṃ ābhā pharati, evameva tassa
atk-s0511a:2738_4: sumedhassāpi bhagavato sarīrato ābhāratanaṃ samantato yojanaṃ pharatīti attho.
atk-s0511a:2739_0: Tevijjachaḷabhiññehīti tevijjehi chaḷabhiññehi cāti attho. Balappattehīti iddhibalappattehi.
atk-s0511a:2739_1: Tādihīti tādibhāvappattehi. Samākulanti saṅkiṇṇaṃ ekakāsāvapajjotaṃ. Idanti sāsanaṃ
atk-s0511a:2739_2: sandhāyāha, mahītalaṃ vā. Amitayasāti amitaparivārā, atulakittighoso vā. Nirūpadhīti
atk-s0511a:2743_0: Tato tassāparabhāge tasmiṃyeva maṇḍakappe anupubbena aparimitāyukesu sattesu anukkamena
atk-s0511a:2743_1: parihāyitvā navutivassasahassāyukesu jātesu sujātarūpakāyo parisuddhajāto sujāto
atk-s0511a:2743_2: nāma satthā loke udapādi. Sopi pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā
atk-s0511a:2743_3: sumaṅgalanagare uggatassa nāma rañño kule pabhāvatiyā nāma aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ
atk-s0511a:2743_4: paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena mātukucchito nikkhami. Nāmaggahaṇadivase
atk-s0511a:2743_5: cassa nāmaṃ karonto sakalajambudīpe sabbasattānaṃ sukhaṃ janayanto jātoti “sujāto”
atk-s0511a:2743_6: tvevassa nāmamakaṃsu. So navavassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. Sirī upasirī sirinando
atk-s0511a:2743_7: cāti tassa tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ. Sirīnandādevippamukhāni tevīsati itthisahassāni paccupaṭṭhitāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2744_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā sirīnandādeviyā upasene nāma putte uppanne haṃsavahaṃ
atk-s0511a:2744_1: nāma varaturaṅgamāruyha mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji. Taṃ pana pabbajantaṃ
atk-s0511a:2744_2: manussānaṃ koṭi anupabbaji. Atha so tehi parivuto nava māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā
atk-s0511a:2744_3: visākhapuṇṇamāya sirīnandananagare sirīnandanaseṭṭhissa dhītāya dinnaṃ paramamadhuraṃ
atk-s0511a:2744_4: madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye sunandājīvakena
atk-s0511a:2744_5: dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā veḷubodhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā tettiṃsahatthavitthataṃ
atk-s0511a:2744_6: tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā sūriye dharamāneyeva samāraṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā sammāsambodhiṃ
atk-s0511a:2744_7: paṭivijjhitvā sabbabuddhānuciṇṇaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmetvā
atk-s0511a:2744_8: brahmunā āyācito attano kaniṭṭhabhātikaṃ sudassanakumāraṃ purohitaputtaṃ devakumārañca
atk-s0511a:2744_9: catusaccadhammapaṭivedhasamatthe disvā ākāsena gantvā sumaṅgalanagarasamīpe sumaṅgaluyyāne
atk-s0511a:2744_10: otaritvā uyyānapālena attano bhātikaṃ sudassanakumāraṃ purohitaputtaṃ devakumārañca
atk-s0511a:2744_11: pakkosāpetvā tesaṃ saparivārānaṃ majjhe nisinno dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi. Tattha asītiyā
atk-s0511a:2744_12: koṭīnaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Ayaṃ paṭhamābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a:2745_0: Yadā pana bhagavā sudassanuyyānadvāre mahāsālamūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā devesu
atk-s0511a:2745_1: tāvatiṃsesu vassāvāsaṃ upāgami, tadā sattattiṃsasatasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a:2745_2: Ayaṃ dutiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Yadā pana sujāto dasabalo pitusantikaṃ agamāsi, tadā
atk-s0511a:2745_3: saṭṭhisatasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Ayaṃ tatiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2751: Evaṃ sobhati sambuddho, jalanto siriyā sadā.
atk-s0511a:2764_0: Tattha tattheva maṇḍakappamhīti yasmiṃ maṇḍakappe sumedho bhagavā uppanno, tattheva
atk-s0511a:2764_1: kappe sujātopi bhagavā uppannoti attho. Sīhahanūti sīhassa viya hanu assāti sīhahanu.
atk-s0511a:2764_2: Sīhassa pana heṭṭhimahanumeva puṇṇaṃ hoti, na uparimaṃ. Assa pana mahāpurisassa sīhassa
atk-s0511a:2764_3: heṭṭhimahanu viya dvepi paripuṇṇāni dvādasiyaṃ pakkhassa candasadisāni honti. Tena
atk-s0511a:2764_5: attho. Sataraṃsīvāti divasakaro viya. Siriyāti buddhasiriyā. Bodhimuttamanti uttamaṃ sambodhiṃ.
atk-s0511a:2765_0: Sudhammavatīnagare sudhammuyyāne āgatānaṃ manussānaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā saṭṭhisatasahassāni
atk-s0511a:2765_1: ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbājetvā tesaṃ majjhe pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so paṭhamo sannipāto
atk-s0511a:2765_2: ahosi. Tato paraṃ tidivorohaṇe bhagavato paññāsasatasahassānaṃ dutiyo sannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0511a:2765_3: Puna “sudassanakumāro bhagavato santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patto”ti sutvā “mayampi
atk-s0511a:2765_4: pabbajissāmā”ti āgatāni cattāri purisasatasahassāni gahetvā sudassanatthero sujātaṃ
atk-s0511a:2765_5: narāsabhaṃ upasaṅkami. Tesaṃ bhagavā dhammaṃ desetvā ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā
atk-s0511a:2765_6: caturaṅgasamannāgate sannipāte pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so tatiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2778_0: Tattha appattānanti bhavābhave asampattānanti attho. “Appavattā bhavābhave”tipi pāṭho,
atk-s0511a:2778_1: soyevattho. Tidivorohaṇeti saggalokato otarante kattukārake daṭṭhabbo. Kārakavipallāsena
atk-s0511a:2778_2: vuttaṃ. Atha vā tidivorohaṇeti tidivato otaraṇe. Jineti jinassa, sāmiatthe bhummaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2779_0: Tadā kira amhākaṃ bodhisatto cakkavattirājā hutvā “buddho loke uppanno”ti sutvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0511a:2779_1: upasaṅkamitvā dhammakathaṃ sutvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sattahi ratanehi
atk-s0511a:2779_2: saddhiṃ catumahādīparajjaṃ datvā satthu santike pabbaji. Sakaladīpavāsino janā raṭṭhuppādaṃ
atk-s0511a:2779_3: gahetvā ārāmikakiccaṃ sādhetvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa niccaṃ mahādānamadaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2779_4: Sopi naṃ satthā – “anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2803_0: Tattha catudīpamhīti saparivāradīpānaṃ catunnaṃ mahādīpānanti attho. Antalikkhacaroti
atk-s0511a:2803_1: cakkaratanaṃ purakkhatvā ākāsacaro. Ratane sattāti hatthiratanādīni satta ratanāni.
atk-s0511a:2803_2: Uttameti uttamāni. Atha vā uttame buddheti attho daṭṭhabbo. Niyyātayitvānāti datvāna.
atk-s0511a:2803_3: Uṭṭhānanti raṭṭhuppādaṃ, āyanti attho. Paṭipiṇḍiyāti rāsiṃ katvā saṃkaḍḍhitvā. Paccayanti
atk-s0511a:2803_4: cīvarādivividhaṃ paccayaṃ. Dasasahassimhi issaroti dasasahassilokadhātuyaṃ issaro,
atk-s0511a:2803_5: tadetaṃ jātikkhettaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Anantānaṃ lokadhātūnaṃ issaro
atk-s0511a:2803_6: bhagavā. Tiṃsakappasahassamhīti ito paṭṭhāya tiṃsakappasahassānaṃ matthaketi attho.
atk-s0511a:2804_0: Tassa pana sujātassa bhagavato sumaṅgalaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, uggato nāma rājā pitā,
atk-s0511a:2804_1: pabhāvatī nāma mātā, sudassano ca sudevo ca dve aggasāvakā, nārado nāmupaṭṭhāko,
atk-s0511a:2804_2: nāgā ca nāgasamālā ca dve aggasāvikā, mahāveḷurukkho bodhi, so kira mandacchiddo
atk-s0511a:2804_3: ghanakkhandho paramaramaṇīyo veḷuriyamaṇivaṇṇehi vimalehi pattehi sañchannavipulasākho
atk-s0511a:2804_4: mayūrapiñchakalāpo viya virocittha. Tassa pana bhagavato sarīraṃ paṇṇāsahatthubbedhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2804_5: ahosi, āyu navutivassasahassāni, sirīnandā nāmassa aggamahesī, upaseno nāma putto.
atk-s0511a:2804_6: Turaṅgavarayānena nikkhami. So pana candavatīnagare silārāme parinibbāyi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2815: “So ca rukkho ghanakkhandho, acchiddo hoti pattiko;
atk-s0511a:2816: Uju vaṃso brahā hoti, dassanīyo manoramo.
atk-s0511a:2819: Yathā subaddho morahattho, evaṃ sobhati so dumo.
atk-s0511a:2821: “Na tassa kaṇṭakā honti, nāpi chiddaṃ mahā ahu;
atk-s0511a:2831: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2836: “So ca buddho asamasamo, guṇāni ca tāni atuliyāni;
atk-s0511a:2838_0: Tattha acchiddoti appacchiddo. “Anudarā kaññā”tiādīsu viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Keci “chiddaṃ
atk-s0511a:2838_1: hoti parittaka”nti paṭhanti. Pattikoti bahupatto, kācamaṇivaṇṇehi pattehi sañchannoti
atk-s0511a:2838_2: attho. Ujūti avaṅko akuṭilo. Vaṃsoti veḷu. Brahāti samantato mahā. Ekakkhandhoti
atk-s0511a:2838_3: avaniruho eko adutiyo cāti attho. Pavaḍḍhitvāti vaḍḍhitvā. Tato sākhā pabhijjatīti
atk-s0511a:2838_4: tato vaṃsaggato pañcavidhā sākhā nikkhamitvā pabhijjittha. “Tato sākhā pabhijjathā”tipi
atk-s0511a:2838_5: pāṭho. Subaddhoti suṭṭhu pañcabandhanākārena baddho. Morahatthoti ātapasannivāraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0511a:2839_0: Na tassa kaṇṭakā hontīti tassa vaṃsassa kaṇṭakinopi rukkhassa kaṇṭakā nāhesuṃ. Aviraloti
atk-s0511a:2839_1: aviralasākhāsañchanno. Sandacchāyoti ghanacchāyo, aviralattāva sandacchāyoti vutto.
atk-s0511a:2839_2: Paññāsaratano āsīti paññāsahattho ahosi. Sabbākāravarūpetoti sabbena ākārena varehiyeva
atk-s0511a:2839_3: upeto sabbākāravarūpeto nāma. Sabbaguṇamupāgatoti anantarapadasseva vevacanamattaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2840_0: Appamāṇoti pamāṇarahito, pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā vā appamāṇo. Atuliyoti atulo,
atk-s0511a:2840_1: kenaci asadisoti attho. Opammehīti upamitabbehi. Anūpamoti upamārahito, “iminā ca
atk-s0511a:2840_2: iminā ca sadiso”ti vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvato anūpamoti attho. Guṇāni ca tānīti guṇā
atk-s0511a:2840_3: ca te, sabbaññutaññāṇādayo guṇāti attho. Liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0511a:2844_0: Sujātassa pana aparabhāge ito aṭṭhakappasatādhikasahassakappamatthake ekasmiṃ kappe
atk-s0511a:2844_1: piyadassī, atthadassī, dhammadassīti tayo buddhā nibbattiṃsu. Tattha piyadassī nāma
atk-s0511a:2844_2: bhagavā pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā sudhaññavatīnagare sudattassa
atk-s0511a:2844_3: nāma rañño aggamahesiyā candasadisavadanāya candādeviyā nāma kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0511a:2844_4: gahetvā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena varuṇuyyāne mātukucchito nikkhami. Tassa pana nāmaggahaṇadivase
atk-s0511a:2844_5: lokassa piyānaṃ pāṭihāriyavisesānaṃ dassitattā “piyadassī”tveva nāmamakaṃsu. So navavassasahassāni
atk-s0511a:2844_6: agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. Tassa kira sunimmalavimalagiribrahānāmakā tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ. Vimalāmahādevippamukhāni
atk-s0511a:2845_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā vimalādeviyā kañcanaveḷe nāma putte uppanne ājaññarathena
atk-s0511a:2845_1: mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji. Ekā ca naṃ purisakoṭi anupabbaji. So tehi
atk-s0511a:2845_2: parivuto mahāpuriso cha māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya varuṇabrāhmaṇagāme
atk-s0511a:2845_3: vasabhabrāhmaṇassa dhītāya dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṃ
atk-s0511a:2845_4: vītināmetvā sujātājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā kakudhabodhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0511a:2845_5: tepaññāsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:2845_6: paṭivijjhitvā “anekajātisaṃsāra”nti udānaṃ udānetvā tattheva sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā
atk-s0511a:2845_7: attanā saha pabbajitānaṃ ariyadhammapaṭivedhasamatthataṃ ñatvā ākāsena tattha gantvā
atk-s0511a:2845_9: pavattesi. Tadā koṭisatasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Ayaṃ paṭhamo abhisamayo.
atk-s0511a:2846_0: Puna usabhavatiyā nāma nagarassa avidūre sudassanapabbate sudassano nāma devarājā
atk-s0511a:2846_1: paṭivasati. So micchādiṭṭhiko ahosi. Sakalajambudīpe pana manussā tassa anusaṃvaccharaṃ
atk-s0511a:2846_2: satasahassagghanikaṃ baliṃ upasaṃharanti. So sudassano devarājā nararājena saddhiṃ
atk-s0511a:2846_3: ekāsane nisīditvā baliṃ sampaṭicchati. Atha piyadassī bhagavā “tassa sudassanassa
atk-s0511a:2846_4: devarājassa taṃ diṭṭhigataṃ vinodessāmī”ti tasmiṃ devarāje yakkhasamāgamaṃ gate tassa
atk-s0511a:2846_5: bhavanaṃ pavisitvā sirisayanaṃ āruhitvā chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo muñcanto yugandharapabbate
atk-s0511a:2846_6: saradasamaye sūriyo viya nisīdi. Tassa parivāraparicārikā devatāyo mālāgandhavilepanādīhi
atk-s0511a:2847_0: Sudassanopi devarājā yakkhasamāgamato āgacchanto attano bhavanato chabbaṇṇarasmiyo
atk-s0511a:2847_1: niccharante disvā cintesi – “aññesu pana divasesu mama bhavanassa edisī anekaraṃsijālasamujjalavibhūti
atk-s0511a:2847_2: na diṭṭhapubbā. Ko nu kho idha paviṭṭho devo vā manusso vā”ti olokento udayagirisikharamatthake
atk-s0511a:2847_4: disvā cintesi – “ayaṃ muṇḍakasamaṇo mama parivārena parijanena parivuto varasayane
atk-s0511a:2847_5: nisinno”ti kodhābhibhūtamānaso – “handāhaṃ imassa attano balaṃ dassessāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0511a:2847_6: sakalaṃ taṃ pabbataṃ ekajālamakāsi. “Iminā aggijālena chārikābhūto muṇḍakasamaṇo”ti
atk-s0511a:2847_8: dasabalamabhijjalantaṃ disvā cintesi – “ayaṃ samaṇo aggidāhaṃ sahati, handāhaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0511a:2847_9: samaṇaṃ udakoghena osādetvā māressāmī”ti atigambhīraṃ udakoghaṃ vimānābhimukhaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0511a:2848_0: Tato udakoghena puṇṇe tasmiṃ vimāne nisinnassa tassa bhagavato cīvare aṃsumattaṃ
atk-s0511a:2848_1: vā sarīre lomamattaṃ vā na temittha. Tato sudassano devarājā – “iminā samaṇo nirassāso
atk-s0511a:2848_2: mato bhavissatī”ti mantvā udakaṃ saṅkhipitvā olokento bhagavantaṃ asitajaladharavivaragataṃ
atk-s0511a:2848_4: nisinnaṃ disvā attano makkhaṃ asahamāno – “handa māressāmi na”nti kodhena navavidhaāvudhavassaṃ
atk-s0511a:2848_5: vassesi. Athassa bhagavato ānubhāvena sabbāvudhāni nānāvidhaparamaruciradassanā surabhikusumamālā
atk-s0511a:2849_0: Tato taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā sudassano devarājā paramakupitamānaso bhagavantaṃ ubhohi
atk-s0511a:2849_1: hatthehi pādesu gahetvā attano bhavanato nīharitukāmo ukkhipitvā mahāsamuddaṃ atikkamitvā
atk-s0511a:2849_2: cakkavāḷapabbataṃ gantvā – “kiṃ nu kho samaṇo jīvati vā mato vā”ti olokento tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0511a:2849_3: āsane nisinnaṃ disvā – “aho mahānubhāvo ayaṃ samaṇo, nāhaṃ imaṃ samaṇaṃ ito nikkaḍḍhituṃ
atk-s0511a:2849_4: sakkomi. Yadi hi maṃ koci jānissati, anappako me ayaso bhavissati. Yāvimaṃ koci na
atk-s0511a:2849_5: passati, tāva naṃ vissajjetvā gamissāmī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0511a:2850_0: Atha dasabalo tassa cittācāraṃ ñatvā tathā adhiṭṭhāsi, yathā naṃ sabbe devamanussā
atk-s0511a:2850_1: passanti. Tasmiñca divase sakalajambudīpe ekasatarājāno tasseva upahāradānatthāya
atk-s0511a:2850_2: sannipatiṃsu. Te bhagavato pāde gahetvā nisinnaṃ sudassanaṃ devarājānaṃ nararājāno
atk-s0511a:2850_3: disvā – “amhākaṃ devarājā munirājassa piyadassissa satthuno pādaparicariyaṃ karoti,
atk-s0511a:2850_4: aho buddhā nāma acchariyā, aho buddhaguṇā visiṭṭhā”ti bhagavati, pasannacittā sabbe
atk-s0511a:2850_5: bhagavantaṃ namassamānā sirasmiṃ añjaliṃ katvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Tattha piyadassī bhagavā
atk-s0511a:2850_6: taṃ sudassanaṃ devarājānaṃ pamukhaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desesi. Tadā devamanussānaṃ navutikoṭisahassāni
atk-s0511a:2850_7: arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. So dutiyo abhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a:2851_0: Yadā pana navayojanappamāṇe kumudanagare buddhapaccatthiko devadatto viya soṇatthero
atk-s0511a:2851_1: nāma mahāpadumakumārena saddhiṃ mantetvā tassa pitaraṃ ghātetvā puna piyadassībuddhassa
atk-s0511a:2851_2: vadhāya nānappakāraṃ payogaṃ katvāpi ghātetuṃ asakkonto so doṇamukhanāgarājārohaṃ
atk-s0511a:2851_3: pakkosāpetvā taṃ palobhetvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi – “yadā panāyaṃ samaṇo piyadassī imaṃ
atk-s0511a:2851_4: nagaraṃ piṇḍāya pavisati, tadā doṇamukhaṃ nāma gajavaraṃ vissajjetvā piyadassīsamaṇaṃ mārehī”ti.
atk-s0511a:2852_0: Atha so āroho hitāhitavicāraṇarahito rājavallabho – “ayaṃ samaṇo ṭhānantarāpi maṃ
atk-s0511a:2852_1: cāveyyā”ti mantvā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā dutiyadivase dasabalassa nagarappavesanasamayaṃ
atk-s0511a:2852_5: sīhavikkantalalitagāminaṃ jaṅgamamiva dharādharaṃ sattappatiṭṭhaṃ sattadhā pabhinnaṃ
atk-s0511a:2852_6: sabbaso vissavantaṃ viggahavantamiva antakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā piṇḍakabaḷañjanadhūpalepādivisesehi
atk-s0511a:2852_7: bhiyyopi mattappamattaṃ katvā arivāraṇavāraṇaṃ erāvaṇavāraṇamiva arijanavāraṇaṃ munivāraṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:2852_8: māraṇatthāya pesesi. Atha so dviradavaro muttamattova gajamahiṃsaturaṅganaranāriyo
atk-s0511a:2852_11: aṅgāni ālumpitvā manussabhakkho yakkho viya bhakkhayanto dūratova dasabalaṃ sissagaṇaparivutaṃ
atk-s0511a:2853_0: Atha puravāsino pana janā bhayasantāpaparipūritamānasā pāsādapākāracayatarūpagatā
atk-s0511a:2853_1: tathāgatābhimukhamabhidhāvantaṃ disvā hāhākārasaddamakaṃsu. Keci pana upāsakā taṃ
atk-s0511a:2853_2: nānappakārehi nayehi nivārayitumārabhiṃsu. Atha so buddhanāgo hatthināgamāyantamoloketvā
atk-s0511a:2853_3: karuṇāvipphārasītalahadayo mettāya taṃ phari. Tato so hatthināgo mettāpharaṇena mudukatahadayasantāno
atk-s0511a:2853_4: attano dosāparādhaṃ ñatvā lajjāya bhagavato purato ṭhātuṃ asakkonto pathaviyaṃ pavisanto
atk-s0511a:2853_5: viya sirasā bhagavato pādesu nipati. Evaṃ nipanno pana so timiranikarasadisasarīro
atk-s0511a:2854_0: Athevaṃ munirājapādamūle karirājānaṃ sirasā nipatantaṃ disvā nāgarajanā paramapītipūritahadayā
atk-s0511a:2854_2: taṃ anekappakāraṃ pūjesuṃ. Samantato celukkhepā pavattiṃsu. Gaganatale suradundubhiyo
atk-s0511a:2854_3: abhinadiṃsu. Atha bhagavā tamasitagirisikharamiva pādamūle nipannaṃ diradavaraṃ oloketvā
atk-s0511a:2855: “Gajavara vadato suṇohi vācaṃ, mama hitamatthayutañca taṃ bhajāhi;
atk-s0511a:2856: Tava vadhanirataṃ paduṭṭhabhāvaṃ, apanaya santamupehi cārudanti.
atk-s0511a:2857: “Lobhena dosena ca mohato vā, yo pāṇino hiṃsati vāraṇinda;
atk-s0511a:2858: So pāṇaghātī sucirampi kālaṃ, dukkhaṃ sughoraṃ narakenubhoti.
atk-s0511a:2859: “Mākāsi mātaṅga punevarūpaṃ, kammaṃ pamādena madena vāpi;
atk-s0511a:2860: Avīciyaṃ dukkhamasayha kappaṃ, pappoti pāṇaṃ atipātayanto.
atk-s0511a:2861: “Dukkhaṃ sughoraṃ narakenubhotvā, manussalokaṃ yadi yāti bhiyyo;
atk-s0511a:2863: “Yathā ca pāṇā paramaṃ piyā te, mahājane kuñjara mandanāga;
atk-s0511a:2864: Tathā parassāpi piyāti ñatvā, pāṇātipāto parivajjanīyo.
atk-s0511a:2865: “Dose ca hiṃsānirate viditvā, pāṇātipātā virate guṇe ca;
atk-s0511a:2866: Pāṇātipātaṃ parivajjaya tvaṃ, sagge sukhaṃ icchasi ce parattha.
atk-s0511a:2867: “Pāṇātipātā virato sudanto, piyo manāpo bhavatīdha loke;
atk-s0511a:2868: Kāyassa bhedā ca paraṃ panassa, saggādhivāsaṃ kathayanti buddhā.
atk-s0511a:2869: “Dukkhāgamaṃ nicchati koci loke, sabbopi jāto sukhamesateva;
atk-s0511a:2870: Tasmā mahānāga vihāya hiṃsaṃ, bhāvehi mettaṃ karuṇañca kāle”ti.
atk-s0511a:2871_0: Athevaṃ dasabalenānusāsiyamāno dantivaro saññaṃ paṭilabhitvā paramavinīto vinayācārasampanno
atk-s0511a:2871_1: sisso viya ahosi. Evaṃ so piyadassī bhagavā amhākaṃ satthā viya dhanapālaṃ doṇamukhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2871_2: karivaraṃ damitvā tattha mahājanasamāgame dhammaṃ desesi. Tadā asītikoṭisahassānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2871_3: dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Ayaṃ tatiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2890_0: Sumaṅgalanagare pālito nāma rājaputto ca purohitaputto sabbadassikumāro cāti dve
atk-s0511a:2890_1: sahāyakā ahesuṃ. Te piyadassimhi sammāsambuddhe cārikaṃ carante “attano nagaraṃ sampatto”ti
atk-s0511a:2890_2: sutvā koṭisatasahassaparivārā paccuggamanaṃ katvā tassa dhammaṃ sutvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2890_3: datvā sattame divase bhagavato bhattānumodanāvasāne koṭisatasahassehi saddhiṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0511a:2890_4: arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Tesaṃ pana majjhe bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so paṭhamo sannipāto
atk-s0511a:2890_5: ahosi. Athāparena samayena sudassanadevarājassa samāgame navutikoṭiyo arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2890_6: Tehi parivuto satthā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, ayaṃ dutiyo sannipāto ahosi. Puna doṇamukhavinayane
atk-s0511a:2890_7: asītikoṭiyo pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Tesaṃ majjhe bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a:2890_8: ayaṃ tatiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2897_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto kassapo nāma brāhmaṇamāṇavo itihāsapañcamānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2897_1: pāragū hutvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā koṭisatasahassapariccāgena paramārāmaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ
atk-s0511a:2897_2: kāretvā saraṇesu ca pañcasīlesu ca patiṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ satthā – “ito aṭṭhārasakappasataccayena
atk-s0511a:2897_3: gotamo nāma buddho loke bhavissatī”ti byākāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:2906: Saraṇe pañcasīle ca, daḷahaṃ katvā samādiyiṃ.
atk-s0511a:2915: Tattha saraṇe pañcasīle cāti tīṇi saraṇāni pañca sīlāni cāti attho. Aṭṭhārase kappasateti ito aṭṭhasatādhikassa kappasahassassa accayenāti attho.
atk-s0511a:2916_0: Tassa pana bhagavato sudhaññaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi. Pitā sudatto nāma rājā, mātā sucandā
atk-s0511a:2916_1: nāma devī, pālito ca sabbadassī ca dve aggasāvakā, sobhito nāmupaṭṭhāko, sujātā ca
atk-s0511a:2916_2: dhammadinnā ca dve aggasāvikā, kakudharukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ asītihatthubbedhaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0511a:2916_3: navutivassasahassāni āyu, vimalā nāmassa aggamahesī ahosi, kañcanāveḷo nāma putto,
atk-s0511a:2931: Yathā ahu pabhā tassa, asamassa mahesino.
atk-s0511a:2938_0: Tattha sālarājā vāti sabbaphāliphullo paramaramaṇīyadassano samavaṭṭakkhandho sālarājā
atk-s0511a:2938_1: viya dissati. Yugānipi tānīti aggasāvakayugādīni yugaḷāni. Sesagāthāsu sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0511a:2942_0: Piyadassimhi sammāsambuddhe parinibbute tassa sāsane ca antarahite parihāyitvā vaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0511a:2942_1: aparimitāyukesu manussesu anukkamena parihāyitvā vassasatasahassāyukesu jātesu paramatthadassī
atk-s0511a:2942_2: atthadassī nāma buddho loke uppajji. So pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato
atk-s0511a:2942_3: cavitvā paramasobhane sobhane nāma nagare sāgarassa nāma rañño kule aggamahesiyā
atk-s0511a:2942_4: sudassanadeviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasa māse gabbhe vasitvā sucindhanuyyāne
atk-s0511a:2942_5: mātukucchito nikkhami. Mātukucchito mahāpurise nikkhantamatte sucirakālanihitāni
atk-s0511a:2942_6: kulaparamparāgatāni mahānidhānāni dhanasāmikā paṭilabhiṃsūti tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase
atk-s0511a:2942_7: “atthadassī”ti nāmamakaṃsu. So dasavassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. Amaragiri-suragiri-girivāhananāmakā
atk-s0511a:2942_8: paramasurabhijanakā tayo cassa pāsādā ahesuṃ. Visākhādevippamukhāni tettiṃsa itthisahassāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2943_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā visākhādeviyā selakumāre nāma putte uppanne sudassanaṃ
atk-s0511a:2943_1: nāma assarājaṃ abhiruhitvā mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji. Taṃ nava manussakoṭiyo
atk-s0511a:2943_2: anupabbajiṃsu. Tehi parivuto so mahāpuriso aṭṭha māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya
atk-s0511a:2943_3: sucindharanāgiyā upahāratthāya ānītaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ mahājanena sandissamānasabbasarīrāya
atk-s0511a:2943_4: nāgiyā saha suvaṇṇapātiyā dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā taruṇatarusatasamalaṅkate
atk-s0511a:2943_5: taruṇasālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye dhammarucinā mahārucinā nāma
atk-s0511a:2943_6: nāgarājena dinnā aṭṭha kusatiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā campakabodhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā tepaññāsahatthāyāmavitthataṃ
atk-s0511a:2943_7: kusatiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā sambodhiṃ patvā sabbabuddhāciṇṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:2943_9: bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmetvā brahmuno dhammadesanāyācanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā attanā saha
atk-s0511a:2943_10: pabbajitanavabhikkhukoṭiyo ariyadhammapaṭivedhasamatthe disvā ākāsena gantvā anomanagarasamīpe
atk-s0511a:2943_11: anomuyyāne otaritvā tehi parivuto tattha dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi. Tadā koṭisatasahassānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2944_0: Puna bhagavati lokanāyake devalokacārikaṃ caritvā tattha dhammaṃ desente koṭisatasahassānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2944_1: dutiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Yadā pana bhagavā atthadassī amhākaṃ bhagavā viya kapilavatthupuraṃ
atk-s0511a:2944_2: sobhanapuraṃ pavisitvā dhammaṃ desesi, tadā koṭisatasahassānaṃ tatiyo dhammābhisamayo
atk-s0511a:2960_0: Tattha tatthevāti tasmiññeva kappeti attho. Ettha pana varakappo “maṇḍakappo”ti adhippeto.
atk-s0511a:2960_1: “Yasmiṃ kappe tayo buddhā nibbattanti, so kappo varakappo”ti heṭṭhā padumuttarabuddhavaṃsavaṇṇanāyaṃ
atk-s0511a:2960_2: vutto. Tasmā varakappo idha “maṇḍakappo”ti vutto. Nihantvānāti nihanitvā. Ayameva
atk-s0511a:2960_3: vā pāṭho. Santoti samāno. Amatenāti maggaphalādhigamāmatapānena. Tappayīti atappayi,
atk-s0511a:2960_4: pīṇesīti attho. Dasasahassīti dasasahassilokadhātuṃ. Devacārikanti devānaṃ vinayanatthaṃ
atk-s0511a:2961_0: Sucandakanagare kira santo ca rājaputto upasanto ca purohitaputto tīsu vedesu sabbasamayantaresu
atk-s0511a:2961_1: ca sāramadisvā nagarassa catūsu dvāresu cattāro paṇḍite visārade ca manusse ṭhapesuṃ
atk-s0511a:2961_2: – “yaṃ pana tumhe paṇḍitaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā passatha suṇātha vā, taṃ amhākaṃ
atk-s0511a:2961_3: āgantvā ārocethā”ti. Tena ca samayena atthadassī lokanātho sucandakanagaraṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0511a:2961_4: Atha tehi niveditā purisā gantvā tesaṃ dasabalassa tatthāgamanaṃ paṭivedesuṃ. Tato
atk-s0511a:2961_5: te santopasantā tathāgatāgamanaṃ sutvā pahaṭṭhamānasā sahassaparivārā dasabalaṃ asamaṃ
atk-s0511a:2961_6: paccuggantvā abhivādetvā nimantetvā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa asadisaṃ
atk-s0511a:2961_7: mahādānaṃ datvā sattame divase sakalanagaravāsīhi manussehi saddhiṃ dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0511a:2961_8: suṇiṃsu. Tasmiṃ kira divase aṭṭhanavutisahassāni ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitvā
atk-s0511a:2961_9: arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Tāya parisāya majjhe bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so paṭhamo sannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0511a:2962_0: Yadā pana bhagavā attano puttassa selattherassa dhammaṃ desento aṭṭhāsītisahassāni
atk-s0511a:2962_1: pasādetvā ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbājetvā arahattaṃ pāpetvā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so dutiyo
atk-s0511a:2962_2: sannipāto ahosi. Puna mahāmaṅgalasamāgame māghapuṇṇamāyaṃ devamanussānaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0511a:2962_3: desento aṭṭhasattatisahassāni arahattaṃ pāpetvā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so tatiyo sannipāto
atk-s0511a:2972_0: Tadā kira amhākaṃ bodhisatto campakanagare susīmo nāma brāhmaṇamahāsālo lokasammato
atk-s0511a:2972_1: ahosi. So sabbavibhavajātaṃ dīnānāthakapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ vissajjetvā himavantasamīpaṃ
atk-s0511a:2972_2: gantvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca abhiññāyo ca nibbattetvā
atk-s0511a:2972_3: mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo hutvā mahājanassa kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anavajjasāvajjabhāvañca
atk-s0511a:2973_0: Athāparena samayena atthadassimhi lokanāyake loke uppajjitvā sudassanamahānagare
atk-s0511a:2973_1: aṭṭhannaṃ parisānaṃ majjhe dhammāmatavassaṃ vassente tassa dhammaṃ sutvā saggalokaṃ
atk-s0511a:2973_2: gantvā dibbāni mandāravapadumapāricchattakādīni pupphāni devalokato āharitvā attano
atk-s0511a:2973_3: ānubhāvaṃ dassento dissamānasarīro catūsu disāsu catuddīpikamahāmegho viya pupphavassaṃ
atk-s0511a:2973_4: vassetvā samantato pupphamaṇḍapaṃ pupphamayagghitoraṇahemajālādīni pupphamayāni katvā
atk-s0511a:2973_5: mandāravapupphacchattena dasabalaṃ pūjesi. Sopi naṃ bhagavā – “anāgate gotamo nāma
atk-s0511a:2988: Tattha jaṭiloti jaṭā assa atthīti jaṭilo. Mahiyā seṭṭhasammatoti sakalenapi lokena seṭṭho uttamo pavaroti evaṃ sammato sambhāvitoti attho.
atk-s0511a:2989_0: Tassa pana bhagavato sobhanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi. Sāgaro nāma rājā pitā, sudassanā
atk-s0511a:2989_1: nāma mātā, santo upasanto ca dve aggasāvakā, abhayo nāmupaṭṭhāko, dhammā ca sudhammā
atk-s0511a:2989_2: ca dve aggasāvikā, campakarukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ asītihatthubbedhaṃ ahosi. Sarīrappabhā
atk-s0511a:2989_3: samantato sabbakālaṃ yojanamattaṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi, āyu vassasatasahassaṃ, visākhā
atk-s0511a:2989_4: nāmassa aggamahesī, selo nāma putto, assayānena nikkhami. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3004: Uddhaṃ adho dasa disā, pharanti yojanaṃ sadā.
atk-s0511a:3011_0: Tattha uḷurājāva pūritoti saradasamayaparipuṇṇavimalasakalamaṇḍalo tārakarājā viyāti
atk-s0511a:3011_1: attho. Pākatikāti pakativasena uppajjamānā, na adhiṭṭhānavasena. Yadā icchati bhagavā,
atk-s0511a:3011_2: tadā anekakoṭisatasahassepi cakkavāḷe ābhāya phareyya. Raṃsīti rasmiyo. Upādānasaṅkhayāti
atk-s0511a:3011_3: upādānakkhayā indhanakkhayā aggi viya. Sopi bhagavā catunnaṃ upādānānaṃ khayena anupādisesāya
atk-s0511a:3011_4: nibbānadhātuyā anupamanagare anomārāme parinibbāyi. Dhātuyo panassa adhiṭṭhānena
atk-s0511a:3015_0: Atthadassimhi sammāsambuddhe parinibbute antarakappe ca vītivatte aparimitāyukesu
atk-s0511a:3015_1: sattesu anupubbena parihāyitvā vassasatasahassāyukesu jātesu dhammadassī nāma satthā
atk-s0511a:3015_2: lokālokakaro lobhādilokamalavinayakaro lokekanāyako loke udapādi. Sopi bhagavā pāramiyo
atk-s0511a:3015_3: pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā saraṇanagare sabbalokasaraṇassa saraṇassa
atk-s0511a:3015_4: nāma rañño aggamahesiyā sunandāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. So
atk-s0511a:3015_5: dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena saraṇuyyāne mātukucchito pāvussakāle saliladharavivaragato
atk-s0511a:3015_6: puṇṇacando viya nikkhami. Mahāpurise pana mātukucchito nikkhantamatteyeva adhikaraṇavohārasatthapotthakesu
atk-s0511a:3015_7: adhammiyā vohārā sayameva antaradhāyiṃsu. Dhammikavohārāyeva aṭṭhaṃsu. Tenassa nāmaggahaṇadivase
atk-s0511a:3015_8: “dhammadassī”ti nāmamakaṃsu. So aṭṭhavassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. Tassa kira
atk-s0511a:3015_9: araja-viraja-sudassananāmakā tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ. Vicikoḷidevippamukhānaṃ itthīnaṃ
atk-s0511a:3016_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā vicikoḷideviyā puññavaḍḍhane nāma putte uppanne devakumāro
atk-s0511a:3016_1: viya ativiya sukhumālo devasampattimiva sampattimanubhavamāno majjhimayāme vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0511a:3016_2: sirisayane nisinno niddopagatānaṃ itthīnaṃ vippakāraṃ disvā sañjātasaṃvego mahābhinikkhamanāya
atk-s0511a:3016_4: caturaṅginiyā senāya parivuto dutiyo divasakaro viya dibbavimānaṃ viya ca gantvā
atk-s0511a:3016_5: rattakuravakatarubodhisamīpeyeva otaritvā aṭṭhāsi. Mahāpuriso kira brahmunā upanītāni
atk-s0511a:3016_6: kāsāyāni gahetvā pabbajitvā pāsādato otaritvā avidūre aṭṭhāsi. Pāsādo puna ākāsena
atk-s0511a:3016_7: gantvā bodhirukkhaṃ antokatvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi. Itthiyopi saparivārā pāsādato
atk-s0511a:3016_8: otaritvā aḍḍhagāvutamattaṃ gantvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Tattha itthiyo ca tāsaṃ paricārikā ceṭikāyo
atk-s0511a:3016_9: ca ṭhapetvā sabbe manussā taṃ anupabbajiṃsu. Bhikkhūnaṃ koṭisatasahassaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a:3017_0: Atha dhammadassī bodhisatto sattāhaṃ padhānacariyaṃ caritvā vicikoḷideviyā dinnaṃ
atk-s0511a:3017_1: madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā badaravane divāvihāraṃ katvā sāyanhasamaye sirivaḍḍhanena
atk-s0511a:3017_2: nāma yavapālakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā bimbijālabodhiṃ upagantvā tepaṇṇāsahatthavitthataṃ
atk-s0511a:3017_4: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvāva bodhisamīpe sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā
atk-s0511a:3017_5: katabrahmayācano attanā saddhiṃ pabbajitassa bhikkhūnaṃ koṭisatasahassassa saddhammappaṭivedhasamatthataṃ
atk-s0511a:3017_6: ñatvā aṭṭhārasayojanikamaggaṃ ekāheneva isipatanaṃ gantvā tehi parivuto tattha dhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0511a:3017_7: pavattesi, tadā koṭisatasahassānaṃ paṭhamābhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3025_0: Yadā pana tagaranāmake nagare sañjayo nāma rājā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhammaṃ khemato
atk-s0511a:3025_1: ca disvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji. Taṃ navutikoṭiyo anupabbajiṃsu. Te sabbeyeva pañcābhiññāaṭṭhasamāpattilābhino
atk-s0511a:3025_2: ahesuṃ. Atha satthā dhammadassī tesaṃ upanissayasampattiṃ disvā ākāsena gantvā sañjayassa
atk-s0511a:3025_3: tāpasassa assamapadaṃ gantvā ākāse ṭhatvā tesaṃ tāpasānaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0511a:3025_4: desetvā dhammacakkhuṃ uppādesi, so dutiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3029: Yadā pana sakko devānamindo dasabalassa dhammaṃ sotukāmo taṃ upasaṅkami, tadā asītiyā koṭīnaṃ tatiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3033_0: Yadā pana saraṇanagare vemātikabhātikaṃ padumakumāraṃ phussadevakumārañca saparivāre
atk-s0511a:3033_1: pabbājesi, tasmiṃ antovasse pabbajitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ koṭisatasahassānaṃ majjhe visuddhipavāraṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:3033_2: pavāresi, so paṭhamo sannipāto ahosi. Puna bhagavato devalokato orohaṇe satakoṭīnaṃ
atk-s0511a:3033_3: dutiyo sannipāto ahosi. Yadā pana sudassanārāme terasannaṃ dhutaguṇānaṃ guṇe ānisaṃse
atk-s0511a:3033_4: pakāsetvā hāritaṃ nāma mahāsāvakaṃ etadagge ṭhapesi, tadā asītiyā koṭīnaṃ majjhe
atk-s0511a:3033_5: bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so tatiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3046_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto sakko devarājā hutvā dvīsu devalokesu devehi parivuto āgantvā
atk-s0511a:3046_1: dibbehi gandhapupphādīhi dibbaturiyehi ca tathāgataṃ pūjesi. Sopi naṃ satthā – “anāgate
atk-s0511a:3046_2: gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3058_0: Tassa pana bhagavato saraṇaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi. Saraṇo nāma rājā pitā, sunandā nāma
atk-s0511a:3058_1: mātā, padumo ca phussadevo ca dve aggasāvakā, sunetto nāma upaṭṭhāko, khemā ca sabbanāmā
atk-s0511a:3058_2: ca dve aggasāvikā, bimbijālarukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ panassa asītihatthubbedhaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0511a:3058_3: āyu vassasatasahassaṃ, vicikoḷidevī nāmassa aggamahesī, puññavaḍḍhano nāmassa putto,
atk-s0511a:3079: Cavi candova gagane, nibbuto so sasāvako”ti.
atk-s0511a:3080_0: Tattha bimbijāloti rattakuravakarukkho. Dasasahassimhi dhātuyāti dasasahassiyā lokadhātuyā.
atk-s0511a:3080_1: Vijjūvāti vijjulatā viya. Upasobhathāti yathā gagane vijju ca majjanhike sūriyo ca
atk-s0511a:3080_2: upasobhati, evaṃ so bhagavā upasobhitthāti attho. Samakanti sabbehi narasattehi samameva
atk-s0511a:3080_3: tassa āyu ahosīti attho. Cavīti cuto. Candovāti gaganato candimā viya cavīti attho.
atk-s0511a:3080_4: Dhammadassī kira bhagavā sālavatīnagare kesārāme parinibbāyi sesamettha gāthāsu pākaṭamevāti.
atk-s0511a:3084_0: Dhammadassimhi bhagavati parinibbute antarahite cassa sāsane tasmiṃ kappe atīte kappasahasse
atk-s0511a:3084_1: ca sattasu kappasatesu ca chasu kappesu ca atikkantesu ito catunavutikappamatthake
atk-s0511a:3084_2: ekasmiṃ kappe ekova lokatthacaro adhigataparamattho siddhattho nāma satthā loke pāturahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3087: Nihanitvā tamaṃ sabbaṃ, sūriyo abbhuggato yathā”ti.
atk-s0511a:3088_0: Siddhattho bodhisattopi pāramiyo pūretvā tusitabhavane nibbattitvā tato cavitvā vebhāranagare
atk-s0511a:3088_1: udenassa nāma rañño aggamahesiyā suphassāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā
atk-s0511a:3088_2: dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena vīriyuyyāne mātukucchito nikkhami. Jāte pana mahāpurise
atk-s0511a:3088_3: sabbesaṃ āraddhakammantā ca icchitā ca atthā siddhimagamaṃsu. Tasmā panassa ñātakā
atk-s0511a:3088_4: “siddhattho”ti nāmamakaṃsu. So dasavassasahassāni agāramajjhe vasi. Tassa kokā-suppala-padumanāmakā
atk-s0511a:3088_5: tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ. Somanassādevippamukhāni aṭṭhacattālīsa itthisahassāni paccupaṭṭhitāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3089_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā somanassādeviyā putte anupamakumāre uppanne āsāḷhipuṇṇamiyaṃ
atk-s0511a:3089_1: suvaṇṇasivikāya nikkhamitvā vīriyuyyānaṃ gantvā pabbaji. Taṃ koṭisatasahassamanussā
atk-s0511a:3089_2: anupabbajiṃsu. Mahāpuriso kira tehi saddhiṃ dasa māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ
atk-s0511a:3089_3: asadisabrāhmaṇagāme sunettāya nāma brāhmaṇakaññāya dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0511a:3089_4: badaravane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye varuṇena nāma yavapālena dinnā aṭṭha
atk-s0511a:3089_5: tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā kaṇikārabodhiṃ upagantvā cattālīsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ
atk-s0511a:3089_6: santharitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā sabbaññutaṃ pāpuṇitvā – “anekajātisaṃsāraṃ…pe… taṇhānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3089_7: khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā attanā saha pabbajitānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3089_8: bhikkhūnaṃ koṭisatasahassānaṃ catusaccapaṭivedhasamatthataṃ disvā anilapathena gantvā
atk-s0511a:3089_9: gayāmigadāye otaritvā tesaṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi, tadā koṭisatasahassānaṃ paṭhamo
atk-s0511a:3096_0: Tattha sadevakanti sadevakaṃ lokaṃ. Dhammameghenāti dhammakathāmeghavassena. Puna
atk-s0511a:3096_1: bhīmarathanagare bhīmarathena nāma raññā nimantito nagaramajjhe kate santhāgāre nisinno
atk-s0511a:3096_3: brahmassarena dasa disā paripūrento dhammāmatadundubhimāhani, tadā navutikoṭīnaṃ
atk-s0511a:3100: Yadā pana vebhāranagare ñātisamāgame buddhavaṃsaṃ desento navutikoṭīnaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ uppādesi, so tatiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3102: “Yadā buddho dhammaṃ desesi, vebhāre so puruttame;
atk-s0511a:3104_0: Amararuciradassane amaranagare nāma sambalo ca sumitto ca dve bhātaro rajjaṃ kāresuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3104_1: Atha siddhattho satthā tesaṃ rājūnaṃ upanissayasampattiṃ disvā gaganatalena gantvā
atk-s0511a:3104_2: amaranagaramajjhe otaritvā cakkālaṅkatatalehi caraṇehi pathavitalaṃ maddanto viya
atk-s0511a:3104_3: padacetiyāni dassetvā amaruyyānaṃ gantvā paramaramaṇīye attano karuṇāsītale silātale
atk-s0511a:3104_4: nisīdi. Tato dvepi bhātikarājāno dasabalassa padacetiyāni disvā padāni anugantvā
atk-s0511a:3104_5: siddhatthaṃ adhigataparamatthaṃ satthāraṃ sabbalokanetāraṃ saparivāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0511a:3104_6: abhivādetvā bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu. Tesaṃ bhagavā ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0511a:3104_7: desesi. Tassa te dhammakathaṃ sutvā sañjātasaddhā hutvā sabbeva pabbajitvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0511a:3104_8: pāpuṇiṃsu. Tesaṃ koṭisatānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ majjhe bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so paṭhamo
atk-s0511a:3104_9: sannipāto ahosi. Vebhāranagare ñātisamāgame pabbajitānaṃ navutikoṭīnaṃ majjhe pātimokkhaṃ
atk-s0511a:3104_10: uddisi, so dutiyo sannipāto ahosi. Sudassanavihāre sannipatitānaṃ asītikoṭīnaṃ majjhe
atk-s0511a:3104_11: pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so tatiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3110: Ete āsuṃ tayo ṭhānā, vimalānaṃ samāgame”ti.
atk-s0511a:3111_0: Tattha navutīnaṃ, asītiyāpi ca koṭinanti navutīnaṃ koṭīnaṃ asītiyāpi ca koṭīnaṃ sannipātā
atk-s0511a:3111_1: ahesunti attho. Ete āsuṃ tayo ṭhānāti etāni tīṇi sannipātaṭṭhānāni ahesunti attho.
atk-s0511a:3112_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto surasenanagare maṅgalo nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā vedavedaṅgānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3112_1: pāraṃ gantvā anekakoṭisaṅkhaṃ dhanasannicayaṃ dīnānāthādīnaṃ pariccajitvā vivekārāmo
atk-s0511a:3112_2: hutvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā jhānābhiññāyo nibbattetvā viharanto – “siddhattho
atk-s0511a:3112_3: nāma buddho loke uppanno”ti sutvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā tassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā
atk-s0511a:3112_4: yāya jambuyā ayaṃ jambudīpo paññāyati, iddhiyā taṃ jambuṃ upasaṅkamitvā tato phalaṃ
atk-s0511a:3112_5: āharitvā navutikoṭibhikkhuparivāraṃ siddhatthaṃ satthāraṃ surasenavihāre nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0511a:3112_6: jambuphalehi santappesi sampavāresi. Atha satthā taṃ phalaṃ paribhuñjitvā – “ito
atk-s0511a:3112_7: catunavutikappamatthake gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3127_0: Tattha duppasahoti durāsado. Ayameva vā pāṭho. Tassa pana bhagavato nagaraṃ vebhāraṃ
atk-s0511a:3127_1: nāma ahosi. Udeno nāma rājā pitā, jayasenotipi tasseva nāmaṃ, suphassā nāma mātā,
atk-s0511a:3127_2: sambalo ca sumitto ca dve aggasāvakā, revato nāmupaṭṭhāko, sīvalā ca surāmā ca dve
atk-s0511a:3127_3: aggasāvikā, kaṇikārarukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ saṭṭhihatthubbedhaṃ ahosi. Vassasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0511a:3127_4: āyu, somanassā nāma aggamahesī ahosi, anupamo nāma putto, suvaṇṇasivikāya nikkhami. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3146_0: Tattha saṭṭhiratananti saṭṭhiratanappamāṇaṃ nabhaṃ uggatoti attho. Kañcanagghiyasaṅkāsoti
atk-s0511a:3146_2: virocati. Vipulanti uḷāraṃ obhāsaṃ. Pupphāpetvānāti jhānābhiññāmaggaphalasamāpattipupphehi
atk-s0511a:3146_3: pupphite paramasobhaggappatte katvāti attho. Vilāsetvāti vilāsayitvā kīḷitvā. Samāpatyāti
atk-s0511a:3146_4: lokiyalokuttarāhi samāpattīhi abhiññāhi ca. Nibbutoti anupādāparinibbānena nibbuto.
atk-s0511a:3147: Siddhattho kira satthā kañcanaveḷunagare anomuyyāne parinibbāyi. Tatthevassa ratanamayaṃ catuyojanubbedhaṃ cetiyamakaṃsūti. Sesagāthāsu sabbattha pākaṭamevāti.
atk-s0511a:3151_0: Tassa pana siddhatthassa bhagavato aparabhāge eko kappo buddhasuñño ahosi. Ito dvānavutikappamatthake
atk-s0511a:3151_1: tisso, phussoti ekasmiṃ kappe dve buddhā nibbattiṃsu. Tattha tisso nāma mahāpuriso
atk-s0511a:3151_2: pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā khemakanagare janasandhassa
atk-s0511a:3151_3: nāma rañño aggamahesiyā padumadalasadisanayanāya padumānāmāya deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0511a:3151_4: gahetvā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena anomuyyāne mātukucchito nikkhami. Sattavassasahassāni
atk-s0511a:3151_5: agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. Tassa guhāsela-nārisaya-nisabhanāmakā tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ. Subhaddādevippamukhāni
atk-s0511a:3152_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā subhaddādeviyā putte ānandakumāre uppanne sonuttaraṃ nāma
atk-s0511a:3152_1: anuttaraṃ turaṅgavaramāruyha mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji. Taṃ manussānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3152_2: koṭi anupabbaji. So tehi parivuto aṭṭha māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya
atk-s0511a:3152_3: vīranigame vīraseṭṭhissa dhītāya dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā salalavane divāvihāraṃ
atk-s0511a:3152_4: vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye vijitasaṅgāmakena nāma yavapālena upanītā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo
atk-s0511a:3152_5: gahetvā asanabodhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā cattālīsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā
atk-s0511a:3152_6: tattha pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā samāraṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā adhigatasabbaññutaññāṇo –
atk-s0511a:3152_7: “anekajātisaṃsāraṃ…pe… taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva
atk-s0511a:3152_8: vītināmetvā yasavatī nagare brahmadevaṃ udayañca dve rājaputte saparivāre upanissayasampanne
atk-s0511a:3152_9: ākāsena gantvā yasavatīmigadāye otaritvā uyyānapālena rājaputte pakkosāpetvā tesaṃ
atk-s0511a:3152_10: saparivārānaṃ avisārinā byāpinā madhurena brahmassarena dasasahassilokadhātuṃ viññāpentova
atk-s0511a:3152_11: dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi, tadā koṭisatānaṃ paṭhamo dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3160: “Tassāpi atulā iddhi, atulaṃ sīlaṃ samādhi ca;
atk-s0511a:3165_0: Tattha sabbatthāti sabbesu dhammesu pāraṃ gantvā. Dasasahassimhīti dasasahassiyaṃ
atk-s0511a:3165_1: athāparena samayena tissena satthārā saddhiṃ pabbajitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ koṭi mahāpurisassa
atk-s0511a:3165_2: gaṇavāsaṃ pahāya bodhimūlamupagamanasamaye aññatra gatā. Sā tissena sammāsambuddhena
atk-s0511a:3165_3: dhammacakkaṃ pavattita”nti sutvā yasavatīmigadāyaṃ āgantvā dasabalamabhivādetvā taṃ
atk-s0511a:3165_4: parivāretvā nisīdi. Tesaṃ bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi, tadā navutiyā koṭīnaṃ dutiyābhisamayo
atk-s0511a:3165_5: ahosi. Puna mahāmaṅgalasamāgame maṅgalapariyosāne saṭṭhiyā koṭīnaṃ tatiyo abhisamayo
atk-s0511a:3169_0: Tattha dutiyo navutikoṭīnanti dutiyo abhisamayo ahosi navutikoṭipāṇīnanti attho.
atk-s0511a:3169_1: Bandhanātoti bandhanato, dasahi saṃyojanehi parimocesīti attho. Idāni parimocite
atk-s0511a:3169_2: satte sarūpato dassento “naramarū”ti āha. Naramarūti narāmare.
atk-s0511a:3170_0: Yasavatīnagare kira antovassaṃ pabbajitānaṃ arahantānaṃ satasahassehi parivuto pavāresi,
atk-s0511a:3170_1: so paṭhamo sannipāto ahosi. Ubhato sujātassa sujātassa nāma rañño nārivāhanakumāro
atk-s0511a:3170_2: nārivāhananagaraṃ anuppatte bhagavati lokanāthe saparivāro paccuggantvā dasabalaṃ
atk-s0511a:3170_3: sabhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ asadisadānaṃ datvā attano rajjaṃ puttassa niyyātetvā
atk-s0511a:3170_5: pabbaji. Tassa kira sā pabbajjā sabbadisāsu pākaṭā ahosi. Tasmā tato tato āgantvā
atk-s0511a:3170_6: nārivāhanakumāraṃ mahājano anupabbaji. Tadā tathāgato navutiyā bhikkhusatasahassassa
atk-s0511a:3170_7: majjhagato pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so dutiyo sannipāto ahosi. Puna khemavatīnagare ñātisamāgame
atk-s0511a:3170_8: buddhavaṃsadhammakathaṃ sutvā asītisatasahassāni tassa santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0511a:3170_9: pāpuṇiṃsu, tehi parivuto sugato pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so tatiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3180_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto yasavatīnagare sujāto nāma rājā hutvā iddhaṃ phītaṃ janapadaṃ
atk-s0511a:3180_2: jātiādīsu saṃviggahadayo nikkhamitvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo
atk-s0511a:3180_3: hutvā “buddho loke uppanno”ti sutvā pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā phuṭasarīro hutvā sapatisso
atk-s0511a:3180_4: tissaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā cintesi – “handāhaṃ mandāravapāricchattakādīhi
atk-s0511a:3180_5: dibbakusumehi bhagavantaṃ pūjessāmī”ti. Atha so evaṃ cintetvā iddhiyā saggalokaṃ
atk-s0511a:3180_6: gantvā cittalatāvanaṃ pavisitvā padumapāricchattakamandāravādīhi dibbakusumehi ratanamayaṃ
atk-s0511a:3180_7: caṅkoṭakaṃ gāvutappamāṇaṃ pūretvā gahetvā gaganatalena āgantvā dibbehi surabhikusumehi
atk-s0511a:3180_8: bhagavantaṃ pūjesi. Ekañca maṇidaṇḍakaṃ suvaṇṇamayakaṇṇikaṃ padumarāgamaṇimayapaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:3180_9: sugandhakesaracchattaṃ viya padumacchattaṃ bhagavato sirasi dhārayanto catuparisamajjhe
atk-s0511a:3180_10: aṭṭhāsi. Atha bhagavā naṃ – “ito dvenavute kappe gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0511a:3186: Buddhoti saddaṃ sutvāna, pīti me upapajjatha.
atk-s0511a:3192: Tamahaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā, matthake dhārayiṃ jinaṃ.
atk-s0511a:3195: Dvenavute ito kappe, ayaṃ buddho bhavissati.
atk-s0511a:3201_0: Tattha mayi pabbajiteti mayi pabbajitabhāvaṃ upagate. “Mama pabbajitaṃ santa”nti
atk-s0511a:3201_1: potthakesu likhanti, so pamādalekhoti veditabbo. Upapajjathāti uppajjittha. Ubho
atk-s0511a:3201_2: hatthehīti ubhehi hatthehi. Paggayhāti gahetvāna. Dhunamānoti vākacīrāni vidhunamānova.
atk-s0511a:3202_0: Tassa pana bhagavato khemaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi. Janasandho nāma khattiyo pitā, padumā
atk-s0511a:3202_1: nāma janikā, brahmadevo ca udayo ca dve aggasāvakā, samaṅgo nāmupaṭṭhāko, phussā
atk-s0511a:3202_2: ca sudattā ca dve aggasāvikā, asanarukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ saṭṭhihatthubbedhaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0511a:3202_3: vassasatasahassaṃ āyu, subhaddā nāma aggamahesī, ānando nāma putto, turaṅgayānena
atk-s0511a:3205: Padumā nāma janikā, tissassa ca mahesino.
atk-s0511a:3224_0: Tattha uccattaneti uccabhāvena. Himavā viya dissatīti himavāva padissati. Ayameva
atk-s0511a:3224_1: vā pāṭho. Yathā yojanānaṃ satānucco himavā pañcapabbato sudūre ṭhitānampi uccabhāvena
atk-s0511a:3224_2: ca sommabhāvena ca atiramaṇīyo hutvā dissati, evaṃ bhagavāpi dissatīti attho. Anuttaroti
atk-s0511a:3224_3: nātidīgho nātirasso. Āyu vassasatasahassanti attho. Uttamaṃ pavaraṃ seṭṭhanti aññamaññavevacanāni.
atk-s0511a:3224_4: Ussavoti himabindu valāhakaussavaandhakārā viya anilasūriyadīpehi aniccatānilasūriyadīpehi
atk-s0511a:3225: Tisso kira bhagavā sunandavatīnagare sunandārāme parinibbāyi. Sesamettha gāthāsu pākaṭamevāti.
atk-s0511a:3229_0: Tassa tissassa bhagavato aparabhāge anukkamena parihāyitvā puna vaḍḍhitvā aparimitāyukā
atk-s0511a:3229_1: hutvā anupubbena hāyitvā navutivassasahassāyukesu jātesu tasmiṃyeva kappe phusso
atk-s0511a:3229_2: nāma satthā loke uppajji. Sopi bhagavā pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato
atk-s0511a:3229_3: cavitvā kāsikanagare jayasenarañño aggamahesiyā sirimāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0511a:3229_4: gahetvā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena sirimuyyāne mātukucchito nikkhami. So navavassasahassāni
atk-s0511a:3229_5: agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. Tassa kira garuḷapakkha-haṃsa-suvaṇṇabhārāti tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3230_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā kisāgotamiyā anupame nāma putte uppanne alaṅkatagajavarakkhandhagato
atk-s0511a:3230_1: mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji. Taṃ pabbajitaṃ janakoṭi anupabbaji. So tehi
atk-s0511a:3230_2: parivuto cha māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā tato gaṇaṃ pahāya sattāhaṃ ekacariyaṃ anubrūhayamāno
atk-s0511a:3230_3: vasitvā visākhapuṇṇamāya aññatare nagare aññatarassa seṭṭhino dhītāya sirivaḍḍhāya
atk-s0511a:3230_4: nāma dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā siṃsapāvane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0511a:3230_5: sirivaḍḍhena nāma upāsakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā āmalakabodhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0511a:3230_6: samāraṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ patvā – “anekajātisaṃsāraṃ…pe… taṇhānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3230_7: khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmetvā attanā
atk-s0511a:3230_8: saddhiṃ pabbajitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ koṭīnaṃ dhammapaṭivedhasamatthataṃ disvā ākāsena
atk-s0511a:3230_9: gantvā saṅkassanagare isipatane migadāye otaritvā tesaṃ majjhe dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0511a:3230_10: Tadā koṭisatasahassānaṃ paṭhamo abhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3240_0: Tattha tattheva maṇḍakappamhīti yasmiṃ kappe dve buddhā uppajjanti, so “maṇḍakappo”ti
atk-s0511a:3240_1: heṭṭhā vutto. Vijaṭetvāti paṭivissajjetvā. Mahājaṭanti ettha jaṭāti taṇhāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:3240_2: Sā hi rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu heṭṭhupariyavasena punappunaṃ uppajjanato saṃsibbanato
atk-s0511a:3240_3: suttagumbajālapūvasaṅkhātā jaṭā viyāti jaṭāti vuttaṃ, taṃ mahājaṭaṃ. Sadevakanti
atk-s0511a:3240_4: sadevakaṃ lokaṃ. Abhivassīti pāvassi. Amatambunāti amatasaṅkhātena dhammakathāsalilena
atk-s0511a:3241_0: Yadā pana bārāṇasīnagare sirivaḍḍho nāma rājā mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0511a:3241_1: pabbaji. Tena saha pabbajitānaṃ tāpasānaṃ navutisatasahassāni ahesuṃ. Tesaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0511a:3241_2: dhammaṃ desesi. Tadā navutiyā satasahassānaṃ dutiyābhisamayo ahosi. Yadā pana attano
atk-s0511a:3241_3: puttassa anupamakumārassa dhammaṃ desesi, tadā asītiyā satasahassānaṃ tatiyo abhisamayo
atk-s0511a:3245_0: Tato aparena samayena kaṇṇakujjanagare surakkhito rājaputto ca purohitaputto dhammasenakumāro
atk-s0511a:3245_1: ca phusse sammāsambuddhe attano nagaraṃ sampatte saṭṭhiyā purisasatasahassehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0511a:3245_2: paccuggantvā vanditvā nimantetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā dasabalassa dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0511a:3245_3: sutvā bhagavati pasīditvā te saparivārā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Tesaṃ saṭṭhiyā
atk-s0511a:3245_4: bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ majjhe bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so paṭhamo sannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0511a:3245_5: Puna kāsinagare jayasenarañño saṭṭhimattānaṃ ñātīnaṃ samāgame buddhavaṃsaṃ desesi,
atk-s0511a:3245_6: taṃ sutvā paññāsasatasahassāni ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3245_7: Tesaṃ majjhagato bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so dutiyo sannipāto ahosi. Puna mahāmaṅgalasamāgame
atk-s0511a:3245_8: maṅgalakathaṃ sutvā cattālīsapurisasatasahassāni pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3245_9: Tesaṃ majjhagato sugato pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so tatiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3255_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto arindamanagare vijitāvī nāma khattiyo hutvā tassa dhammaṃ
atk-s0511a:3255_1: sutvā bhagavati pasīditvā tassa mahādānaṃ datvā mahārajjaṃ pahāya bhagavato santike
atk-s0511a:3255_2: pabbajitvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā tepiṭakadharo mahājanassa dhammakathaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0511a:3255_3: sīlapāramiñca pūresi. Sopi naṃ “buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3261: Dvenavute ito kappe, ayaṃ buddho bhavissati.
atk-s0511a:3270_0: Tassa pana bhagavato kāsikaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi. Jayaseno nāma rājā pitā, sirimā
atk-s0511a:3270_1: nāma mātā, surakkhito ca dhammaseno ca dve aggasāvakā, sabhiyo nāmupaṭṭhāko, cālā
atk-s0511a:3270_2: ca upacālā ca dve aggasāvikā, āmalakarukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthubbedhaṃ
atk-s0511a:3270_3: ahosi, āyu navutivassasahassāni, kisāgotamī nāma aggamahesī, anupamo nāmassa putto,
atk-s0511a:3280: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3283: Sopi satthā atulayaso, nibbuto so sasāvako”ti.
atk-s0511a:3284_0: Tattha āmaṇḍoti āmalakarukkho. Ovaditvāti ovādaṃ datvā, anusāsitvāti attho. Sopi
atk-s0511a:3284_1: satthā atulayasoti sopi satthā amitayasoti attho. “So jahitvā amitayaso”tipi pāṭho,
atk-s0511a:3284_2: tassa so sabbameva vuttappakāraṃ visesaṃ hitvāti attho.
atk-s0511a:3285: Phusso kira sammāsambuddho kusinārāyaṃ senārāme parinibbāyi. Dhātuyo kirassa vitthārikā ahesuṃ. Sesagāthāsu sabbattha pākaṭamevāti.
atk-s0511a:3289_0: Phussassa buddhassa aparabhāge sāntarakappe tasmiñca kappe vītivatte ito ekanavutikappe
atk-s0511a:3289_1: vijitasabbakappo parahitaniratasaṅkappo sabbattha vipassī vipassī nāma satthā loke
atk-s0511a:3289_2: udapādi. So pāramiyo pūretvā anekaratanamaṇivisarasamujjotitabhavane tusitabhavane
atk-s0511a:3289_3: nibbattitvā tato cavitvā bandhumatīnagare anekabandhumato bandhumato rañño bandhumatiyā
atk-s0511a:3289_4: nāma aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. So dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena kheme
atk-s0511a:3289_5: migadāye mātudarato asitanīradarājito puṇṇacando viya nikkhami. Nāmaggahaṇadivase
atk-s0511a:3289_6: panassa lakkhaṇapāṭhakā ñātakā ca divā ca rattiñca antarantarā nimmisasañjanitandhakāravirahena
atk-s0511a:3289_7: visuddhaṃ passanti, vivaṭehi vā akkhīhi passatīti “vipassī”ti nāmamakaṃsu. “Viceyya
atk-s0511a:3289_8: viceyya passatīti vipassī”ti vadanti. So aṭṭhavassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. Nanda-sunanda-sirimānāmakā
atk-s0511a:3290_0: Sudassanādevippamukhānaṃ itthīnaṃ satasahassaṃ vīsati ca sahassāni ahesuṃ. “Sutanū”tipi
atk-s0511a:3290_1: sudassanā vuccati. So aṭṭhavassasahassānaṃ accayena cattāri nimittāni disvā sutanudeviyā
atk-s0511a:3290_2: samavaṭṭakkhandhe nāma tanaye jāte ājaññarathena mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0511a:3290_3: Taṃ purisānaṃ caturāsītisatasahassāni anupabbajiṃsu. So tehi parivuto mahāpuriso
atk-s0511a:3290_4: aṭṭhamāsaṃ padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya sudassanaseṭṭhidhītāya dinnaṃ
atk-s0511a:3290_5: madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā kusumasamalaṅkate sālavane divāvihāraṃ katvā sujātena
atk-s0511a:3290_6: nāma yavapālakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā pāṭalibodhiṃ samalaṅkataṃ disvā
atk-s0511a:3291_0: Tassā pana pāṭaliyā samavaṭṭakkhandho taṃ divasaṃ paṇṇāsaratano hutvā abbhuggato
atk-s0511a:3291_1: sākhā paṇṇāsaratanā ubbedhena ratanasataṃ ahosi. Taṃdivasameva sā pāṭalī kaṇṇikābaddhehi
atk-s0511a:3291_2: viya pupphehi paramasurabhigandhehi mūlato paṭṭhāya sabbasañchannā ahosi. Dibbagandho
atk-s0511a:3291_3: vāyati, na kevalaṃ tadā ayameva pupphito, dasasahassi cakkavāḷesu sabbe pāṭaliyo
atk-s0511a:3291_4: pupphitāva. Na kevalaṃ pāṭaliyova, dasasahassicakkavāḷesu sabbarukkhagumbalatāyopi
atk-s0511a:3291_5: pupphiṃsu. Mahāsamuddopi pañcavaṇṇehi padumehi kuvalayuppalakumudehi sañchanno sītalamadhurasalilo
atk-s0511a:3291_6: ahosi. Sabbampi ca dasasahassi cakkavāḷabbhantaraṃ dhajamālākulaṃ ahosi. Tattha tattha
atk-s0511a:3291_8: ahosi. Taṃ upagantvā tepaṇṇāsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ
atk-s0511a:3291_9: vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya – “yāva buddho na homi, tāva ito na uṭṭhahāmī”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā
atk-s0511a:3291_10: nisīdi. Evaṃ nisīditvā samāraṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā maggānukkamena cattāri maggañāṇāni
atk-s0511a:3291_11: maggānantaraṃ cattāri phalañāṇāni catasso paṭisambhidā catuyoniparicchedakañāṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:3291_12: pañcagatiparicchedakañāṇaṃ catuvesārajjañāṇāni cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni ca sakale ca
atk-s0511a:3291_13: buddhaguṇe hatthagate katvā paripuṇṇasaṅkappo bodhipallaṅke nisinnova –
atk-s0511a:3296: Paññāpetuṃ gatī natthi, pattānaṃ acalaṃ sukha”nti. –
atk-s0511a:3297_0: Evaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā bodhisamīpeyeva sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā brahmāyācanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0511a:3297_1: attano vemātikassa bhātikassa khaṇḍakumārassa ca purohitaputtassa tissakumārassa
atk-s0511a:3297_2: ca upanissayasampattiṃ oloketvā ākāsena gantvā kheme migadāye otaritvā ubhopi te
atk-s0511a:3297_3: uyyānapālena pakkosāpetvā tesaṃ parivārānaṃ majjhe dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi. Tadā aparimitānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3300: Vipassī nāma nāmena, loke uppajji cakkhumā.
atk-s0511a:3307_0: Tattha padāletvāti bhinditvā, avijjandhakāraṃ bhinditvāti attho. “Vattetvā cakkamārāme”tipi
atk-s0511a:3307_1: pāṭho, tassa ārāmeti kheme migadāyeti attho. Ubho bodhesīti attano kaniṭṭhabhātikaṃ
atk-s0511a:3307_2: khaṇḍaṃ rājaputtaṃ tissañca purohitaputtanti ubho bodhesi. Gaṇanāya na vattabboti
atk-s0511a:3308: Athāparena samayena khaṇḍaṃ rājaputtaṃ tissañca purohitaputtaṃ anupabbajitāni caturāsītibhikkhusahassāni dhammāmataṃ pāyesi. So dutiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3312_0: Tattha tatthāti kheme migadāyeti attho. “Caturāsītisahassāni, sambuddhamanupabbaju”nti
atk-s0511a:3312_1: ettha ete pana caturāsītisahassasaṅkhātā purisā vipassissa kumārassa upaṭṭhākapurisāyeva.
atk-s0511a:3312_2: Te pātova vipassikumārassa upaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā kumāramadisvā pātarāsatthāya gantvā
atk-s0511a:3312_3: bhuttapātarāsā “kuhiṃ kumāro”ti pucchitvā tato “uyyānabhūmiṃ gato”ti sutvā “tattheva
atk-s0511a:3312_4: naṃ dakkhissāmā”ti nikkhantā nivattamānaṃ tassa sārathiṃ disvā “kumāro pabbajito”ti
atk-s0511a:3312_5: sutvā sutaṭṭhāneyeva sabbābharaṇāni muñcitvā antarāpaṇato kāsāyāni vatthāni āharāpetvā
atk-s0511a:3312_6: kesamassuṃ ohāretvā pabbajiṃsu. Pabbajitvā ca te gantvā mahāpurisaṃ parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3313_0: Tato vipassī bodhisatto “padhānacariyaṃ caranto ākiṇṇo viharāmi, na kho panametaṃ
atk-s0511a:3313_1: pātirūpaṃ yatheva maṃ ime gihibhūtā pubbe parivāretvā caranti, idānipi tatheva kiṃ
atk-s0511a:3313_2: iminā gaṇenā”ti gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya ukkaṇṭhitvā “ajjeva gacchāmī”ti cintetvā puna – “ajja
atk-s0511a:3313_3: avelā, sace panāhaṃ ajja gamissāmi, sabbepime jānissanti, sveva gamissāmī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0511a:3313_4: Taṃdivasañca uruvelagāmasadise ekasmiṃ gāme gāmavāsino manussā svātanāya saddhiṃ
atk-s0511a:3313_5: parisāya mahāpurisaṃ nimantayiṃsu. Te tesaṃ caturāsītisahassānaṃ mahāpurisassa ca
atk-s0511a:3313_6: pāyāsameva paṭiyādayiṃsu. Atha vipassī mahāpuriso punadivase visākhapuṇṇamāya tasmiṃ
atk-s0511a:3313_7: gāme tehi pabbajitajanehi saddhiṃ bhattakiccaṃ katvā vasanaṭṭhānameva agamāsi. Tatra
atk-s0511a:3313_8: te pabbajitā mahāpurisassa vattaṃ dassetvā attano attano rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3314_0: Bodhisattopi paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā nisinno cintesi – “ayaṃ kālo nikkhamitu”nti nikkhamitvā
atk-s0511a:3314_1: paṇṇasāladvāraṃ pidahitvā bodhimaṇḍābhimukho pāyāsi. Te kira pabbajitā sāyaṃ bodhisattassa
atk-s0511a:3314_2: upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā paṇṇasālaṃ parivāretvā nisinnā – “ativikālo jāto upadhārethā”ti
atk-s0511a:3314_3: vatvā paṇṇasāladvāraṃ vivaritvā taṃ apassantāpi “kuhiṃ nu gato mahāpuriso”ti nānubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3314_4: “Gaṇavāse nibbinno eko viharitukāmo maññe mahāpuriso buddhabhūtaṃyeva taṃ passissāmā”ti
atk-s0511a:3314_5: antojambudīpābhimukhā cārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu. Atha te – “vipassinā kira buddhattaṃ patvā
atk-s0511a:3314_6: dhammacakkaṃ pavattita”nti sutvā anukkamena sabbe te pabbajitā bandhumatiyā rājadhāniyā
atk-s0511a:3314_7: kheme migadāye sannipatiṃsu. Tato tesaṃ bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi, tadā caturāsītiyā
atk-s0511a:3314_8: bhikkhusahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. So tatiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3321_0: Tattha caturāsītisahassāni, sambuddhaṃ anupabbajunti ettha anunā yogato sambuddhanti
atk-s0511a:3321_1: upayogavacanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ, sambuddhassa pacchā pabbajiṃsūti attho. Lakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:3321_2: saddasatthato gahetabbaṃ. “Tattha ārāmapattāna”ntipi pāṭho. Bhāsatoti vadato. Upanisādinoti
atk-s0511a:3321_3: gantvā upanissāya dhammadānaṃ dadatoti attho. Tepīti te caturāsītisahassasaṅkhātā
atk-s0511a:3321_4: pabbajitā vipassissa upaṭṭhākabhūtā. Gantvāti tassa dhammaṃ ñatvā. Evaṃ tesaṃ tatiyo
atk-s0511a:3321_5: abhisamayo ahosi. Kheme migadāye vipassīsammāsambuddhaṃ dve ca aggasāvake anupabbajitānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3321_6: bhikkhūnaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhisatasahassānaṃ majjhe nisinno vipassī bhagavā –
atk-s0511a:3322: “Khantīparamaṃ tapo titikkhā, nibbānaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhā;
atk-s0511a:3323: Na hi pabbajito parūpaghātī, na samaṇo hoti paraṃ viheṭhayanto.
atk-s0511a:3328: Adhicitte ca āyogo, etaṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0511a:3329_0: Imaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisi. Imā pana sabbabuddhānaṃ pātimokkhuddesagāthāyo hontīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a:3329_1: So paṭhamo sannipāto ahosi. Puna yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā pabbajitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0511a:3329_2: satasahassānaṃ dutiyo sannipāto ahosi. Yadā pana vipassissa vemātikā tayo bhātaro
atk-s0511a:3329_3: paccantaṃ vūpasametvā bhagavato upaṭṭhānakiriyāya laddhavarā hutvā attano nagaraṃ
atk-s0511a:3329_4: netvā upaṭṭhahantā tassa dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajiṃsu. Tesaṃ asītisatasahassānaṃ majjhe
atk-s0511a:3329_5: nisīditvā bhagavā kheme migadāye pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so tatiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3339_1: attho. Tatthāti tattha kheme migadāye. Bhikkhugaṇamajjheti bhikkhugaṇassa majjhe.
atk-s0511a:3339_2: “Tassa bhikkhugaṇamajjhe”tipi pāṭho, tassa bhikkhugaṇassa majjheti attho.
atk-s0511a:3340_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo atulo nāma nāgarājā hutvā anekanāgakoṭisatasahassaparivāro
atk-s0511a:3340_1: hutvā saparivārassa dasabalassa asamabalasīlassa karuṇāsītalahadayassa sakkārakaraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0511a:3340_2: sattaratanamayaṃ candamaṇḍalasaṅkāsaṃ daṭṭhabbasāramaṇḍaṃ maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā tattha
atk-s0511a:3340_3: nisīdāpetvā sattāhaṃ dibbavibhavānurūpaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā sattaratanakhacitaṃ mahārahaṃ
atk-s0511a:3340_4: suvaṇṇamayaṃ nānāmaṇijutivisarasamujjalaṃ pīṭhaṃ bhagavato adāsi. Tadā naṃ pīṭhānumodanāvasāne
atk-s0511a:3340_5: “ito ayaṃ ekanavutikappe buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3368: Pitā suddhodano nāma, ayaṃ hessati gotamo.
atk-s0511a:3371: Kolito upatisso ca, aggā hessanti sāvakā;
atk-s0511a:3380_0: Tattha puññavantoti puññavā, samupacitapuññasañcayoti attho. Jutindharoti pabhāyutto.
atk-s0511a:3380_1: Nekānaṃ nāgakoṭīnanti anekāhi nāgakoṭīhi, karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Parivāretvānāti
atk-s0511a:3380_2: bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā. Ahanti attānaṃ niddisati. Vajjantoti vādento tāḷento. Maṇimuttaratanakhacitanti
atk-s0511a:3380_3: maṇimuttādīhi vividhehi ratanehi khacitanti attho. Sabbābharaṇabhūsitanti sabbābharaṇehi
atk-s0511a:3380_4: vāḷarūpādīhi ratanamayehi maṇḍitanti attho. Suvaṇṇapīṭhanti suvaṇṇamayaṃ pīṭhaṃ.
atk-s0511a:3381_0: Tassa pana vipassissa bhagavato bandhumatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi. Bandhumā nāma rājā
atk-s0511a:3381_1: pitā, bandhumatī nāma mātā, khaṇḍo ca tisso ca dve aggasāvakā, asoko nāmupaṭṭhāko,
atk-s0511a:3381_2: candā ca candamittā ca dve aggasāvikā, pāṭalirukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ asītihatthubbedhaṃ
atk-s0511a:3381_3: ahosi, sarīrappabhā sabbakālaṃ satta yojanāni pharitvā aṭṭhāsi asītivassasahassāni
