atk-s0511a:3381_4: āyu, sutanu nāmassa aggamahesī, samavaṭṭakkhandho nāmassa putto, ājaññarathena nikkhami. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3396: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3406_0: Tattha bandhanāti devamanusse kāmarāgasaṃyojanādibandhanā mocesi, vikāsesīti attho.
atk-s0511a:3406_1: Maggāmaggañca ācikkhīti “amatādhigamāya ayaṃ maggo ucchedasassatadiṭṭhivirahitā majjhimā
atk-s0511a:3406_2: paṭipadā maggo kāyakilamathādiko nāyaṃ maggo”ti sesaputhujjane ācikkhīti attho. Ālokaṃ
atk-s0511a:3406_3: dassayitvānāti maggañāṇālokaṃ vipassanāñāṇālokañca dassayitvā. Lakkhaṇañca kusumitanti
atk-s0511a:3406_4: cittalakkhaṇādīhi phullitaṃ maṇḍitaṃ bhagavato sarīranti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha gāthāsu uttānamevāti.
atk-s0511a:3410_0: Vipassissa aparabhāge antarahite ca tasmiṃ kappe tato paraṃ ekūnasaṭṭhiyā kappesu
atk-s0511a:3410_1: buddhā loke na uppajjiṃsu. Apagatabuddhāloko ahosi. Kilesadevaputtamārānaṃ ekarajjaṃ
atk-s0511a:3410_2: apagatakaṇṭakaṃ ahosi. Ito pana ekattiṃsakappe siniddhasukkhasāradārupacito pahūtasappisitto
atk-s0511a:3410_3: nidhūmo sikhī viya sikhī ca vessabhū cāti dve sammāsambuddhā loke uppajjiṃsu. Tattha
atk-s0511a:3410_4: sikhī pana bhagavā pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā kusalakaraṇavatī
atk-s0511a:3410_5: aruṇavatīnagare paramaguṇavato aruṇavato nāma rañño aggamahesiyā rattakanakapaṭibimbarucirappabhāya
atk-s0511a:3410_6: pabhāvatiyā nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasa māse vītināmetvā nisabhuyyāne
atk-s0511a:3410_7: mātukucchito nikkhami. Nemittikā panassa nāmaṃ karontā uṇhīsassa sikhā viya uggatattā
atk-s0511a:3410_8: “sikhī”ti nāmamakaṃsu. So sattavassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. Sucandakasirīgiriyasanārivasabha
atk-s0511a:3410_9: nāmakā tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ. Sabbakāmādevippamukhāni catuvīsati itthisahassāni paccupaṭṭhitāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3411_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā sabbakāmādeviyā guṇagaṇātule atule nāma putte uppanne
atk-s0511a:3411_1: hatthiyānena hatthikkhandhavaragato mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji. Taṃ sattatipurisasatasahassāni
atk-s0511a:3411_2: anupabbajiṃsu. So tehi parivuto aṭṭhamāsaṃ padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya
atk-s0511a:3411_3: gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya sudassananigame piyadassīseṭṭhino dhītuyā dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ
atk-s0511a:3411_4: paribhuñjitvā taruṇakhadiravane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā anomadassinā nāma tāpasena
atk-s0511a:3411_5: dinnā aṭṭha kusatiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā puṇḍarīkabodhiṃ upasaṅkami. Tassā kira puṇḍarīkabodhiyāpi
atk-s0511a:3411_6: pāṭaliyā pamāṇameva pamāṇaṃ ahosi. Taṃdivasameva so paṇṇāsaratanakkhandho hutvā abbhuggato,
atk-s0511a:3411_7: sākhāpissa paṇṇāsaratanamattāva. So dibbehi gandhehi pupphehi sañchanno ahosi. Na
atk-s0511a:3411_8: kevalaṃ puppheheva, phalehipi sañchanno ahosi. Tassa ekapassato taruṇāni phalāni
atk-s0511a:3411_9: ekato majjhimāni ekato nātipakkāni ekato pakkhittadibbojāni viya surasāni vaṇṇagandharasasampannāni
atk-s0511a:3411_10: tato tato olambanti. Yathā ca so, evaṃ dasasahassicakkavāḷesu pupphūpagā rukkhā pupphehi
atk-s0511a:3412_0: So tattha catuvīsatihatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
atk-s0511a:3412_1: caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya nisīdi. Evaṃ nisīditvā chattiṃsa yojanavitthataṃ samāraṃ
atk-s0511a:3412_2: mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā sambodhiṃ pāpuṇitvā – “anekajātisaṃsāraṃ…pe… taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti
atk-s0511a:3412_3: udānaṃ udānetvā bodhisamīpeyeva sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā brahmāyācanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0511a:3412_4: attanā saha pabbajitānaṃ sattatiyā bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ upanissayasampattiṃ disvā
atk-s0511a:3412_5: surapathena gantvā vividhāvaraṇavatiyā aruṇavatiyā rājadhāniyā samīpe migājinuyyāne
atk-s0511a:3412_6: otaritvā tehi munigaṇehi parivuto tesaṃ majjhe dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi. Tadā koṭisatasahassānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3422_0: Punapi aruṇavatiyā rājadhāniyā samīpeyeva abhibhūrājaputtassa ca sambhavarājaputtassa
atk-s0511a:3422_1: cāti dvinnaṃ saparivārānaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā navutikoṭisahassāni dhammāmataṃ pāyesi.
atk-s0511a:3422_2: So dutiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3426_0: Yadā pana sūriyavatīnagaradvāre campakarukkhamūle titthiyamadamānabhañjanatthaṃ sabbajanabandhanamokkhatthañca
atk-s0511a:3426_1: yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karonto bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi, tadā asītikoṭisahassānaṃ tatiyo
atk-s0511a:3430_0: Abhibhunā ca sambhavena ca rājaputtena saddhiṃ pabbajitānaṃ arahantānaṃ satasahassānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3430_1: majjhe nisīditvā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so paṭhamo sannipāto ahosi, aruṇavatīnagare
atk-s0511a:3430_2: ñātisamāgame pabbajitānaṃ asītiyā bhikkhusahassānaṃ majjhe nisīditvā pātimokkhaṃ
atk-s0511a:3430_3: uddisi, so dutiyo sannipāto ahosi. Dhanañjayanagare dhanapālakanāgavinayanasamaye
atk-s0511a:3430_4: pabbajitānaṃ sattatiyā bhikkhusahassānaṃ majjhe bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so tatiyo
atk-s0511a:3440: Tattha anupalitto padumaṃvāti toye jātaṃ toyeva vaḍḍhitaṃ padumaṃ viya toyena anupalittaṃ, sopi bhikkhusannipāto loke jātopi lokadhammehi anupalitto ahosīti attho.
atk-s0511a:3441_0: Tadā kira amhākaṃ bodhisatto katthaci asaṃsaṭṭho paribhuttanagare arindamo nāma rājā
atk-s0511a:3441_1: hutvā sikhimhi satthari paribhuttanagaramanuppatte saparivāro rājā bhagavato paccuggantvā
atk-s0511a:3441_3: abhivanditvā dasabalaṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ issariyakulavibhavasaddhānurūpaṃ mahādānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3441_4: datvā dussabhaṇḍāgāradvārāni vivarāpetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahagghāni
atk-s0511a:3441_7: datvā vāraṇappamāṇameva katvā kappiyabhaṇḍañca adāsi. Sopi naṃ satthā – “ito ekattiṃsakappe
atk-s0511a:3453: Ekattiṃse ito kappe, ayaṃ buddho bhavissati.
atk-s0511a:3459_0: Tattha nimminitvāti tassa hatthino pamāṇena tulayitvā. Kappiyanti kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ,
atk-s0511a:3459_1: bhikkhūnaṃ yaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ kappati gahetuṃ, taṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ nāma. Pūrayiṃ mānasaṃ
atk-s0511a:3459_2: mayhanti mama cittaṃ dānapītiyā pūrayiṃ, mayhaṃ hāsuppādanasamatthaṃ akāsinti attho.
atk-s0511a:3459_3: Niccaṃ daḷhamupaṭṭhitanti niccakālaṃ dānaṃ dassāmī”ti dānavasena daḷhaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ cittanti attho.
atk-s0511a:3460_0: Tassa pana bhagavato nagaraṃ aruṇavatī nāma ahosi. Aruṇavā nāma rājā pitā, pabhāvatī
atk-s0511a:3460_1: nāma mātā, abhibhū ca sambhavo ca dve aggasāvakā, khemaṅkaro nāmupaṭṭhāko, sakhilā
atk-s0511a:3460_2: ca madumā ca dve aggasāvikā, puṇḍarīkarukkho bodhi, sarīrañcassa sattatihatthubbedhaṃ
atk-s0511a:3460_3: ahosi. Sarīrappabhā niccakālaṃ yojanattayaṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi. Sattativassasahassāni
atk-s0511a:3460_4: āyu, sabbakāmā nāmassa aggamahesī, atulo nāmassa putto, hatthiyānena nikkhami. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3472: Cittā ceva suguttā ca, ahesuṃ aggupaṭṭhikā.
atk-s0511a:3481: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3488_0: Tattha puṇḍarīkoti setambarukkho. Tīṇi yojanaso pabhāti tīṇi yojanāni pabhā niccharantīti
atk-s0511a:3488_1: attho. Dhammameghanti dhammavassaṃ, dhammavassanako buddhamegho. Temayitvāti dhammakathāsalilena
atk-s0511a:3488_2: temetvā, siñcitvāti attho. Sadevaketi sadevake satte. Khemantanti khemantaṃ nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:3488_4: sampannaṃ, dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ bhagavato sarīranti attho. Sikhī
atk-s0511a:3489: “Sikhīva loke tapasā jalitvā, sikhīva meghāgamane naditvā;
atk-s0511a:3490: Sikhī mahesindhanavippahīno, sikhīva santiṃ sugato gato so”.
atk-s0511a:3491_0: Sikhissa kira bhagavato dhātuyo ekagghanāva hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu na vippakiriṃsu. Sakalajambudīpavāsino
atk-s0511a:3491_1: pana manussā tiyojanubbedhaṃ sattaratanamayaṃ himagirisadisasobhaṃ thūpamakaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3495_0: Sikhissa pana sammāsambuddhassa aparabhāge antarahite tassa sāsane sattativassasahassāyukā
atk-s0511a:3495_1: manussā anukkamena parihāyitvā dasavassāyukā ahesuṃ. Puna vaḍḍhitvā aparimitāyukā
atk-s0511a:3495_2: hutvā anukkamena parihāyitvā saṭṭhivassasahassāyukā ahesuṃ. Tadā vijitamanobhū sabbalokābhibhū
atk-s0511a:3495_3: sayambhū vessabhū nāma satthā loke udapādi. So pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā
atk-s0511a:3495_4: tato cavitvā anomanagare suppatītassa suppatītassa nāma rañño aggamahesiyā sīlavatiyā
atk-s0511a:3495_5: yasavatiyā nāma kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. So dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena anupamuyyāne
atk-s0511a:3495_6: mātukucchito nikkhami. Jāyamānova janaṃ tosento vasabhanādaṃ nadi. Tasmā vasabhanādahetuttā
atk-s0511a:3495_7: tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase “vessabhū”ti nāmamakaṃsu. So chabbassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi.
atk-s0511a:3495_8: Ruci-suruci-rativaḍḍhananāmakā tayo pāsādā tassa ahesuṃ. Sucittādevippamukhāni tiṃsa
atk-s0511a:3496_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā sucittāya nāma deviyā suppabuddhe nāma kumāre uppanne
atk-s0511a:3496_1: suvaṇṇasivikāya uyyānadassanatthāya gantvā devadattāni kāsāyāni gahetvā pabbaji.
atk-s0511a:3496_2: Taṃ sattattiṃsasahassāni anupabbajiṃsu. Atha so tehi parivuto cha māse padhānacariyaṃ
atk-s0511a:3496_3: caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya sucittanigame sandissamānasarīrāya sirivaḍḍhanāya nāma dinnaṃ
atk-s0511a:3496_4: madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye narindanāgarājena
atk-s0511a:3496_5: dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā sālabodhiṃ padakkhiṇato upāgami. Tassāpi sālassa
atk-s0511a:3496_6: tadeva pāṭaliyā pamāṇameva pamāṇaṃ ahosi. Tatheva pupphaphalasirivibhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0511a:3496_7: So sālamūlamupagantvā cattālīsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā pallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0511a:3496_9: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ tattheva vītināmetvā attano
atk-s0511a:3496_10: kaniṭṭhabhātikassa soṇakumārassa uttarakumārassa ca upanissayasampattiṃ disvā devapathena
atk-s0511a:3496_11: gantvā anomanagarasamīpe aruṇuyyāne otaritvā uyyānapālena kumāre pakkosāpetvā tesaṃ
atk-s0511a:3496_12: saparivārānaṃ majjhe dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi. Tadā asītiyā koṭisahassānaṃ paṭhamo abhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a:3497_0: Puna janapadacārikaṃ caranto bhagavā tattha tattha dhammaṃ desento sattatiyā koṭisahassānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3497_1: dhammābhisamayo ahosi, so dutiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Anomanagareyeva diṭṭhijālaṃ bhindanto
atk-s0511a:3497_2: titthiyamānaddhajaṃ pātento mānamadaṃ viddhaṃsento dhammaddhajaṃ samussayanto navutiyojanavitthatāya
atk-s0511a:3497_3: manussaparisāya parimāṇarahitāya devaparisāya yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā devamanusse
atk-s0511a:3497_4: pasādetvā saṭṭhikoṭiyo dhammāmatena tappesi, so tatiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3500: Vessabhū nāma nāmena, loke uppajji nāyako.
atk-s0511a:3515: Devā ceva manussā ca, bujjhare saṭṭhikoṭiyo”ti.
atk-s0511a:3516_0: Tattha ādittanti sakalamidaṃ lokattayaṃ sampadittaṃ. Rāgaggīti rāgena. Taṇhānaṃ vijitanti
atk-s0511a:3516_1: taṇhānaṃ vijitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ vasavattiṭṭhānanti evaṃ ñatvāti attho. Nāgova bandhanaṃ
atk-s0511a:3516_2: chetvāti hatthī viya pūtilatābandhanaṃ chinditvā sambodhiṃ patto adhigato. Dasasahassīti
atk-s0511a:3516_3: dasasahassiyaṃ. Sadevaketi sadevake loke. Bujjhareti bujjhiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3517_0: Soṇuttarānaṃ pana dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ samāgame pabbajitānaṃ asītiyā arahantasahassānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3517_1: majjhe māghapuṇṇamāyaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so paṭhamo sannipāto ahosi. Yadā pana
atk-s0511a:3517_2: vessabhunā sabbalokābhibhunā saha pabbajitā sattattiṃsasahassasaṅkhā bhikkhū gaṇato
atk-s0511a:3517_3: ohīnasamaye pakkantā, te vessabhussa sammāsambuddhassa dhammacakkappavattiṃ sutvā
atk-s0511a:3517_4: soreyyaṃ nāma nagaraṃ āgantvā bhagavantaṃ addasaṃsu. Tesaṃ bhagavā dhammaṃ desetvā
atk-s0511a:3517_5: sabbeva te ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā caturaṅgasamannāgatāya parisāya pātimokkhaṃ
atk-s0511a:3518_0: Yadā pana nārivāhananagare upasanto nāma rājaputto rajjaṃ kāresi, tassānukampāya
atk-s0511a:3518_1: bhagavā tattha agamāsi, sopi bhagavato āgamanaṃ sutvā saparivāro bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ
atk-s0511a:3518_2: katvā nimantetvā mahādānaṃ datvā tassa dhammaṃ sutvā pasannahadayo pabbaji. Taṃ saṭṭhisahassasaṅkhā
atk-s0511a:3518_3: purisā anupabbajiṃsu. Te tena saddhiṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. So tehi parivuto vessabhū
atk-s0511a:3518_4: bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi, so tatiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3528_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto sarabhavatīnagare paramapiyadassano sudassano nāma rājā hutvā
atk-s0511a:3528_1: vessabhumhi lokanāyake sarabhanagaramupagate tassa dhammaṃ sutvā pasannahadayo dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ
atk-s0511a:3528_3: sacīvaraṃ mahādānaṃ datvā tattheva bhagavato nivāsatthāya gandhakuṭiṃ katvā taṃ parikkhipitvā
atk-s0511a:3528_4: vihārasahassaṃ kāretvā sabbañca vibhavajātaṃ bhagavato sāsane pariccajitvā tassa
atk-s0511a:3528_5: santike pabbajitvā ācāraguṇasampanno terasadhutaguṇesu nirato bodhisambhārapariyesanāya
atk-s0511a:3528_6: rato buddhasāsanābhirato vihāsi. Sopi taṃ bhagavā byākāsi – “anāgate ito ekattiṃsakappe
atk-s0511a:3528_7: ayaṃ gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3547: Ekattiṃse ito kappe, ayaṃ buddho bhavissati.
atk-s0511a:3553_0: Tattha cakkaṃ vattitanti dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ. Paṇītaṃ dhammanti uttarimanussadhammaṃ.
atk-s0511a:3553_1: Pabbajjaṃ guṇasampannanti ñatvā pabbajinti attho. Vattasīlasamāhitoti vattesu ca
atk-s0511a:3553_2: sīlesu ca samāhito. Tesaṃ tesaṃ pūraṇe samāhitoti attho. Ramāmīti abhiramiṃ. Saddhāpītinti
atk-s0511a:3553_3: saddhañca pītiñca upagantvā. Vandāmīti abhivandiṃ, atītatthe vattamānavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a:3554_0: Tassa pana bhagavato anomaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi. Suppatīto nāmassa pitā khattiyo,
atk-s0511a:3554_1: yasavatī nāma mātā, soṇo ca uttaro ca dve aggasāvakā, upasanto nāmupaṭṭhāko, rāmā
atk-s0511a:3554_2: ca samālā ca dve aggasāvikā, sālarukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ saṭṭhihatthubbedhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a:3554_3: Saṭṭhivassasahassāni āyu, sucittā nāmassa bhariyā, suppabuddho nāmassa putto, suvaṇṇasivikāya
atk-s0511a:3569: Kāyā niccharatī rasmi, rattiṃva pabbate sikhī.
atk-s0511a:3572: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi, janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3579_0: Tattha hemayūpasamūpamoti suvaṇṇatthambhasadisoti attho. Niccharatīti ito cito ca
atk-s0511a:3579_1: sandhāvati. Rasmīti pabhārasmi. Rattiṃva pabbate sikhīti rattiyaṃ pabbatamatthake
atk-s0511a:3579_2: aggi viya. Raṃsivijjotā tassa kāyeti attho. Vibhajitvāti vibhāgaṃ katvā, ugghaṭitādivasena
atk-s0511a:3579_3: sotāpannādivasena cāti attho. Dhammanāvanti aṭṭhaṅgamaggasaṅkhātaṃ dhammanāvaṃ, caturoghanittharaṇatthāya
atk-s0511a:3579_4: ṭhapetvāti attho. Dassaneyyanti dassanīyo. Sabbajananti sabbo jano, sasāvakasaṅgho
atk-s0511a:3579_5: sammāsambuddhoti attho. Vihāranti vihāro, sabbattha paccatte upayogavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a:3580: Vessabhū kira bhagavā usabhavatīnagare kheme migadāye parinibbāyi. Dhātuyo panassa vippakiriṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3587_0: Vessabhumhi sayambhumhi parinibbute tasmiṃ pana kappe atikkante ekūnattiṃsakappesu
atk-s0511a:3587_1: jinadivasakarā nuppajjiṃsu. Imasmiṃ pana bhaddakappe cattāro buddhā nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3587_2: Katame cattāro? Kakusandho koṇāgamano kassapo amhākaṃ buddhoti. Metteyyo pana bhagavā
atk-s0511a:3587_3: uppajjissati. Evamayaṃ kappo pañcahi buddhuppādehi paṭimaṇḍitattā bhaddakappoti bhagavatā
atk-s0511a:3587_4: vaṇṇito. Tattha kakusandho nāma bhagavā pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato
atk-s0511a:3587_5: cavitvā khemavatīnagare khemaṅkarassa nāma rañño atthadhammānusāsakassa aggidattassa
atk-s0511a:3587_6: nāma purohitassa aggamahesiyā visākhāya nāma brāhmaṇiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a:3587_7: Yadā pana khattiyā brāhmaṇe sakkaronti garukaronti mānenti pūjenti, tadā bodhisattā
atk-s0511a:3588_0: Yadā pana brāhmaṇā khattiye sakkaronti garukaronti mānenti pūjenti, tadā khattiyakule
atk-s0511a:3588_1: uppajjanti. Tadā kira brāhmaṇā khattiyehi sakkarīyanti garukarīyanti, tasmā saccasandho
atk-s0511a:3588_2: kakusandho bodhisatto vibhavasirisamudayenākule anākule brāhmaṇakule dasasahassilokadhātuṃ
atk-s0511a:3588_3: unnādento kampayanto udapādi. Heṭṭhā vuttappakārāni pāṭihāriyāni nibbattiṃsu. Tato
atk-s0511a:3588_4: dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena khemavatuyyāne mātukucchito suvaṇṇalatāto aggijālo viya
atk-s0511a:3588_5: nikkhami. So cattāri vassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. Tassa kira kāmakāmavaṇṇakāmasuddhināmakā
atk-s0511a:3588_6: tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ. Rocinībrāhmaṇīpamukhāni tiṃsa itthisahassāni paccupaṭṭhitāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3589_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā rociniyā brāhmaṇiyā anuttare uttare nāma kumāre uppanne
atk-s0511a:3589_1: payuttena ājaññarathena mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji. Taṃ cattālīsasahassāni
atk-s0511a:3589_2: anupabbajiṃsu. So tehi parivuto aṭṭha māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya
atk-s0511a:3589_3: sucirindhanigame vajirindhabrāhmaṇassa dhītāya dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0511a:3589_4: khadiravane divāvihāraṃ katvā sāyanhasamaye subhaddena nāma yavapālakena upanītā
atk-s0511a:3589_5: aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā sirīsabodhiṃ pāṭaliyā vuttappamāṇaṃ dibbagandhaṃ upavāyamānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3589_6: upagantvā catuttiṃsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
atk-s0511a:3589_7: sambodhiṃ patvā – “anekajātisaṃsāraṃ…pe… taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā
atk-s0511a:3589_8: sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā attanā saha pabbajitānaṃ cattālīsāya bhikkhusahassānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3589_9: saccappaṭivedhasamatthataṃ disvā ekāheneva makilanagarasamīpe sambhūtaṃ isipatanaṃ
atk-s0511a:3589_10: nāma migadāyaṃ pavisitvā tesaṃ majjhagato bhagavā dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi. Tadā cattālīsāya
atk-s0511a:3590_0: Puna kaṇṇakujjanagaradvāre mahāsālarukkhamūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā tiṃsakoṭisahassānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3590_1: dhammacakkhuṃ uppādesi, so dutiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Yadā pana khemavatīnagarassāvidūre
atk-s0511a:3590_2: aññatarasmiṃ devāyatane abhimatanaradevo naradevo nāma yakkho dissamānamanussasarīro
atk-s0511a:3590_4: sabbajanasurabhiramassa sarassa samīpe ṭhatvā kamalakuvalayakallahārādīhi satte upalāpetvā
atk-s0511a:3590_5: manusse khādati. Tasmiṃ magge pacchinne janasampātarahite mahāaṭaviṃ pavisitvā tattha
atk-s0511a:3590_6: sampatte satte khādati. So lokavissuto mahākantāramaggo ahosi. Ubhatokantāradvāre
atk-s0511a:3590_7: kira mahājanakāyo sannipatitvā kantāranittharaṇatthāya aṭṭhāsi. Atha vigatabhavabandho
atk-s0511a:3590_8: kakusandho satthā ekadivasaṃ paccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento
atk-s0511a:3590_9: ñāṇajālassa antogataṃ taṃ mahesakkhaṃ naradevayakkhaṃ tañca janasamūhamaddasa. Disvā
atk-s0511a:3590_10: ca pana gaganatalena gantvā tassa janakāyassa passantasseva bhagavā anekavihitaṃ
atk-s0511a:3590_11: pāṭihāriyaṃ karonto tassa naradevayakkhassa bhavane otaritvā tassa maṅgalapallaṅke nisīdi.
atk-s0511a:3591_0: Atha kho so manussabhakkho yakkho chabbaṇṇarasmiyo vissajjentaṃ indadhanuparivutamiva
atk-s0511a:3591_2: idhāgacchatī”ti pasannahadayo attano parivārayakkhehi saddhiṃ anekamigagaṇavantaṃ
atk-s0511a:3591_3: himavantaṃ gantvā nānāvaṇṇagandhāni jalajathalajāni kusumāni paramamanoramāni sugandhagandhe
atk-s0511a:3591_4: samāharitvā attano pallaṅke nisinnaṃ vigatarandhaṃ kakusandhaṃ lokanāyakaṃ mālāgandhavilepanādīhi
atk-s0511a:3591_5: pūjayitvā thutisaṅgītāni pavattento sirasi añjaliṃ katvā namassamāno aṭṭhāsi. Tato
atk-s0511a:3591_6: manussā taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā pasannahadayā samāgamma bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā namassamānā
atk-s0511a:3591_7: aṭṭhaṃsu. Atha appaṭisandho kakusandho bhagavā abhipūjitanaradevayakkhaṃ naradevayakkhaṃ
atk-s0511a:3591_9: kathesi, tadā aparimitānaṃ sattānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi, ayaṃ tatiyo abhisamayo
atk-s0511a:3607_0: Tattha ugghāṭetvāti samūhanitvā. Sabbabhavanti sabbaṃ navavidhaṃ bhavaṃ, bhavuppattinimittaṃ
atk-s0511a:3607_1: kammanti attho. Cariyāya pāramiṃ gatoti sabbapāramīnaṃ pūraṇavasena pāraṃ gato. Sīhova
atk-s0511a:3607_2: pañjaraṃ bhetvāti sīho viya pañjaraṃ munikuñjaro bhavapañjaraṃ vināsetvāti attho.
atk-s0511a:3607_3: Kakusandhassa viddhastabhavabandhanassa ekova sāvakasannipāto ahosi. Kaṇṇakujjanagare
atk-s0511a:3607_4: isipatane migadāye attanā saha pabbajitehi cattālīsāya arahantasahassehi parivuto
atk-s0511a:3607_5: māghapuṇṇamāyaṃ bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3614_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto khemo nāma rājā hutvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0511a:3614_1: mahādānaṃ datvā añjanādīni sabbabhesajjāni ca adāsi. Aññañca samaṇaparikkhāraṃ datvā
atk-s0511a:3614_2: tassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannahadayo hutvā bhagavato santike pabbaji. So pana
atk-s0511a:3614_3: satthā – “anāgate imasmiṃyeva kappe buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3620: Imetaṃ patthitaṃ sabbaṃ, paṭiyādemi varaṃ varaṃ.
atk-s0511a:3623: Imamhi bhaddake kappe, ayaṃ buddho bhavissati.
atk-s0511a:3629_0: Tattha añjanaṃ pākaṭameva. Madhulaṭṭhikanti yaṭṭhimadhukaṃ. Imetanti imaṃ etaṃ. Patthitanti
atk-s0511a:3629_1: icchitaṃ. Paṭiyādemīti dajjāmi, adāsinti attho. Varaṃ varanti seṭṭhaṃ seṭṭhanti attho.
atk-s0511a:3629_2: “Yadetaṃ patthita”ntipi pāṭho, tassa yaṃ icchati, etaṃ sabbaṃ adāsinti attho. Ayaṃ sundarataro.
atk-s0511a:3630_0: Tassa pana adandhassa kakusandhassa bhagavato khemaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi. Aggidatto
atk-s0511a:3630_1: nāma brāhmaṇo pitā, visākhā nāma brāhmaṇī mātā, vidhuro ca sañjīvo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a:3630_2: buddhijo nāmupaṭṭhāko, sāmā ca campā ca dve aggasāvikā, mahāsirīsarukkho bodhi, sarīraṃ
atk-s0511a:3630_3: cattālīsahatthubbedhaṃ ahosi, samantā dasayojanāni sarīrappabhā niccharati, cattālīsavassasahassāni
atk-s0511a:3630_4: āyu, bhariyā panassa rocinī nāma brāhmaṇī, uttaro nāma putto, ājaññarathena nikkhami. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3632: “Brāhmaṇo aggidatto ca, āsi buddhassa so pitā;
atk-s0511a:3648: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3655_0: Tattha vasate tattha kheme pureti ayaṃ gāthā kakusandhassa jātanagarasandassanatthaṃ
atk-s0511a:3655_1: vuttāti veditabbā. Mahākulanti uditoditaṃ bhagavato pitukulaṃ. Narānaṃ pavaraṃ seṭṭhanti
atk-s0511a:3655_2: jātivasena sabbamanussānaṃ pavaraṃ seṭṭhanti attho. Jātimantanti abhijātivantaṃ,
atk-s0511a:3655_3: uttamābhijātaṃ. Mahāyasanti mahāparivāraṃ, kiṃ taṃ buddhassa mahākulaṃ? Tattha mahākulaṃ
atk-s0511a:3656_0: Samantā dasayojananti samantato dasa yojanāni pharitvā niccakālaṃ sarīrato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0511a:3656_1: suvaṇṇavaṇṇā pabhā niccharatīti attho. Dhammāpaṇanti dhammasaṅkhātaṃ āpaṇaṃ. Pasāretvāti
atk-s0511a:3656_2: bhaṇḍavikkiṇanatthaṃ nānābhaṇḍasamiddhamāpaṇaṃ viya dhammāpaṇaṃ pasāretvāti attho.
atk-s0511a:3656_4: Sīhanādaṃ vāti sīhanādaṃ viya, abhayanādaṃ naditvā. Aṭṭhaṅgavacanasampannoti aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatasaro
atk-s0511a:3656_5: satthā. Acchiddānīti chiddādibhāvarahitāni sīlāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni.
atk-s0511a:3656_6: Atha vā acchiddāni avivarāni sāvakayugaḷādīni. Nirantaranti satataṃ sabbakālaṃ. Sabbaṃ
atk-s0511a:3656_7: tamantarahitanti satthā ca sāvakayugaḷādīni ca taṃ sabbaṃ munibhāvamupagantvā adassanabhāvamupagatanti attho.
atk-s0511a:3658: Tilokasandho kira saccasandho, kheme pane vāsamakappayittha”.
atk-s0511a:3663_0: Kakusandhassa pana bhagavato aparabhāge tassa sāsane ca antarahite sattesu tiṃsavassasahassāyukesu
atk-s0511a:3663_1: jātesu parahitakoṇāgamano koṇāgamano nāma satthā loke udapādi. Atha vā kanakāgamanato
atk-s0511a:3663_2: koṇāgamano nāma satthā loke udapādi. Tattha ka-kārassa koādesaṃ katvā na-kārassa
atk-s0511a:3663_3: ṇādesaṃ katvā ekassa ka-kārassa lopaṃ katvā niruttinayena kanakassa kanakādiābharaṇassa
atk-s0511a:3663_4: āgamanaṃ pavassanaṃ yassa bhagavato uppannakāle so koṇāgamano nāma. Ettha pana āyu
atk-s0511a:3663_5: anupubbena parihīnasadisaṃ kataṃ, na evaṃ parihīnaṃ, puna vaḍḍhitvā parihīnanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a:3663_6: Kathaṃ? Imasmiṃyeva kappe kakusandho bhagavā cattālīsavassasahassāyukakāle nibbatto,
atk-s0511a:3663_7: taṃ pana āyu parihāyamānaṃ dasavassakālaṃ patvā puna asaṅkhyeyyaṃ patvā tato parihāyamānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3663_8: tiṃsavassasahassāyukakāle ṭhitaṃ, tadā koṇāgamano bhagavā loke uppannoti veditabbo.
atk-s0511a:3664_0: Sopi pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā sobhavatīnagare yaññadattassa
atk-s0511a:3664_1: brāhmaṇassa bhariyāya rūpādīhi guṇehi anuttarāya uttarāya nāma brāhmaṇiyā kucchismiṃ
atk-s0511a:3664_2: paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena subhavatīuyyāne mātukucchito nikkhami.
atk-s0511a:3664_3: Jāyamāne pana tasmiṃ sakalajambudīpe devo kanakavassaṃ vassi. Tenassa kanakāgamanakāraṇattā
atk-s0511a:3664_4: “kanakāgamano”ti nāmamakaṃsu. Taṃ panassa nāmaṃ anukkamena pariṇamamānaṃ koṇāgamano”ti
atk-s0511a:3664_5: jātaṃ. So pana tīṇi vassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. Tusita-santusita-santuṭṭhanāmakā
atk-s0511a:3664_6: panassa tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ. Rucigattābrāhmaṇīpamukhāni soḷasa itthisahassāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3665_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā rucigattāya brāhmaṇiyā satthavāhe nāma putte uppanne hatthikkhandhavaragato
atk-s0511a:3665_1: hatthiyānena mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji. Taṃ tiṃsapurisasahassāni anupabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3665_2: So tehi parivuto cha māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ aggisonabrāhmaṇassa
atk-s0511a:3665_3: dhītāya aggisonabrāhmaṇakumāriyā dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā khadiravane divāvihāraṃ
atk-s0511a:3665_4: katvā sāyanhasamaye jaṭātindukena nāma yavapālena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā
atk-s0511a:3665_5: udumbarabodhiṃ puṇḍarīke vuttappamāṇaṃ phalavibhūtisampannaṃ dakkhiṇato upagantvā
atk-s0511a:3665_6: vīsatihatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā mārabalaṃ viddhaṃsetvā
atk-s0511a:3665_8: udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā attanā saha pabbajitānaṃ tiṃsabhikkhusahassānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3665_9: upanissayasampattiṃ disvā gaganapathena gantvā sudassananagarasamīpe isipatane migadāye
atk-s0511a:3665_10: otaritvā tesaṃ majjhagato dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi, tadā tiṃsakoṭisahassānaṃ paṭhamābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a:3666_0: Puna sundaranagaradvāre mahāsālarukkhamūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā vīsatikoṭisahassānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3666_1: dhammāmataṃ pāyesi, so dutiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Attano mātaraṃ uttaraṃ pamukhaṃ katvā
atk-s0511a:3666_2: dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu devatānaṃ samāgatānaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desente bhagavati
atk-s0511a:3666_3: dasannaṃ koṭisahassānaṃ tatiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3683: “Pakaraṇe satta desento, vassaṃ vasati so muni;
atk-s0511a:3685_0: Tattha dasa dhamme pūrayitvānāti dasa pāramidhamme pūrayitvā. Kantāraṃ samatikkamīti
atk-s0511a:3685_1: jātikantāraṃ samatikkami. Pavāhiyāti pavāhetvā. Malaṃ sabbanti rāgādimalattayaṃ.
atk-s0511a:3685_2: Pāṭihīraṃ karonte ca, paravādappamaddaneti paravādivādappamaddane, bhagavati pāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0511a:3685_3: karonteti attho. Vikubbananti vikubbaniddhiṃ, sundaranagaradvāre yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0511a:3685_4: katvā devapuraṃ gato tattha paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ vasi. Kathaṃ vasīti? Pakaraṇe satta
atk-s0511a:3685_5: desentoti tattha devānaṃ sattappakaraṇasaṅkhātaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desento vasi.
atk-s0511a:3685_6: Evaṃ tattha abhidhammaṃ desente bhagavati dasakoṭisahassānaṃ devānaṃ abhisamayo ahosīti attho.
atk-s0511a:3686_0: Parisuddhapāramipūraṇāgamanassa koṇāgamanassapi eko sāvakasannipāto ahosi. Surindavatīnagare
atk-s0511a:3686_1: surindavatuyyāne viharanto bhiyyasassa rājaputtassa ca uttarassa ca rājaputtassa
atk-s0511a:3686_2: dvinnampi tiṃsasahassaparivārānaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā sabbeva te ehibhikkhupabbajjāya
atk-s0511a:3686_3: pabbājetvā tesaṃ majjhagato māghapuṇṇamāyaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3693_0: Tattha oghānanti kāmoghādīnaṃ, catunnamoghānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Yassa pana te saṃvijjanti,
atk-s0511a:3693_1: taṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ ohananti osīdāpentīti oghā, tesaṃ oghānaṃ, upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ
atk-s0511a:3693_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Catubbidhe oghe atikkantānanti attho. Bhijjitānanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Maccuyāti maccuno.
atk-s0511a:3694_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto mithilanagare pabbato nāma rājā ahosi, tadā “saraṇagatasabbapāṇāgamanaṃ
atk-s0511a:3694_1: koṇāgamanaṃ mithilanagaramanuppatta”nti sutvā saparivāro rājā paccuggantvā vanditvā
atk-s0511a:3694_2: dasabalaṃ nimantetvā mahādānaṃ datvā tattha bhagavantaṃ vassāvāsatthāya yācitvā temāsaṃ
atk-s0511a:3694_4: mahagghāni ceva sukhumavatthāni ca suvaṇṇapādukā ceva aññañca bahuparikkhāramadāsi.
atk-s0511a:3694_5: Sopi naṃ bhagavā byākāsi – “imasmiṃyeva bhaddakappe ayaṃ buddho bhavissatī”ti. Atha
atk-s0511a:3694_6: so mahāpuriso tassa bhagavato byākaraṇaṃ sutvā mahārajjaṃ pariccajitvā tasseva bhagavato
atk-s0511a:3706: Imamhi bhaddake kappe, ayaṃ buddho bhavissati.
atk-s0511a:3715_0: Tattha anantabalavāhanoti bahukaṃ anantaṃ mayhaṃ balaṃ assahatthiādikaṃ vāhanañcāti
atk-s0511a:3715_1: attho. Sambuddhadassananti sambuddhadassanatthāya. Yadicchakanti yāvadicchakaṃ buddhappamukhaṃ
atk-s0511a:3715_2: saṅghaṃ catubbidhena āhārena “alamala”nti pavārāpetvā, hatthena pidahāpetvāti attho.
atk-s0511a:3715_3: Satthusāvaketi satthuno ceva sāvakānañca adāsiṃ. Naruttameti naruttamassa. Ohāyāti
atk-s0511a:3716_0: Tassa pana koṇāgamanassa bhagavato sobhavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, yaññadatto nāma
atk-s0511a:3716_1: brāhmaṇo pitā, uttarā nāma brāhmaṇī mātā, bhiyyaso ca uttaro cāti dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a:3716_2: sotthijo nāmupaṭṭhāko, samuddā ca uttarā ca dve aggasāvikā, udumbararukkho bodhi,
atk-s0511a:3716_3: sarīraṃ tiṃsahatthubbedhaṃ ahosi, tiṃsavassasahassāni āyu, bhariyā panassa rucigattā
atk-s0511a:3716_4: nāma brāhmaṇī, satthavāho nāma putto, hatthiyānena nikkhami. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3721: “Brāhmaṇo yaññadatto ca, āsi buddhassa so pitā;
atk-s0511a:3731: Ukkāmukhe yathā kambu, evaṃ raṃsīhi maṇḍito.
atk-s0511a:3734: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3741_0: Tattha ukkāmukheti kammāruddhane. Yathā kambūti suvaṇṇanikkhaṃ viya. Evaṃ raṃsīhi
atk-s0511a:3741_1: maṇḍitoti evaṃ rasmīhi paṭimaṇḍito samalaṅkato. Dhammacetiṃ samussetvāti sattattiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammamayaṃ
atk-s0511a:3741_3: katvāti dhammamayapupphamālāguḷaṃ katvā. Mahājanassa vipassanācetiyaṅgaṇe ṭhitassa
atk-s0511a:3741_4: namassanatthāya dhammacetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā sasāvakasaṅgho satthā parinibbāyīti attho.
atk-s0511a:3741_5: Mahāvilāsoti mahāiddhivilāsappatto. Tassāti tassa bhagavato. Janoti sāvakajano. Siridhammappakāsanoti
atk-s0511a:3741_6: lokuttaradhammappakāsano so bhagavā ca sabbaṃ tamantarahitanti attho.
atk-s0511a:3748_0: Koṇāgamanassa pana bhagavato aparabhāge tassa sāsane ca antarahite tiṃsavassasahassāyukā
atk-s0511a:3748_1: sattā anupubbena parihāyitvā dasavassāyukā hutvā puna vaḍḍhitvā aparimitāyukā hutvā
atk-s0511a:3748_2: puna anupubbena parihāyitvā vīsativassasahassāyukesu sattesu jātesu anekamanussapo
atk-s0511a:3748_3: kassapo nāma satthā loke udapādi. So pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato
atk-s0511a:3748_4: cavitvā bārāṇasīnagare brahmadattassa nāma brāhmaṇassa vipulaguṇavatiyā dhanavatiyā
atk-s0511a:3748_5: nāma brāhmaṇiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena isipatane
atk-s0511a:3748_6: migadāye mātukucchito nikkhami. Gottavasena panassa “kassapakumāro”ti nāmamakaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3748_7: So dve vassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. Haṃsavā yasavā sirinandoti tassa tayo pāsādā
atk-s0511a:3748_8: ahesuṃ. Sunandā nāma brāhmaṇippamukhāni aṭṭhacattālīsa itthisahassāni paccupaṭṭhitāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3749_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā sunandāya brāhmaṇiyā vijitasene nāma putte uppanne uppannasaṃvego
atk-s0511a:3749_2: pāsādo kulālacakkamiva bhamitvā gaganatalamabbhuggantvā paramarucirakaranikaro saradasamayarajanikaro
atk-s0511a:3749_3: viya tārāgaṇaparivuto anekanarasataparivuto gaganatalamalaṅkaronto viya puññānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0511a:3749_4: pakāsento viya jananayanahadayāni ākaḍḍhento viya rukkhaggāni paraṃ sobhayamāno viya
atk-s0511a:3749_5: ca gantvā nigrodhabodhiṃ majjhekatvā bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhahi. Atha bodhisatto mahāsatto
atk-s0511a:3749_6: pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā devadattaṃ arahattaddhajamādāya pabbaji. Tassa nāṭakitthiyo
atk-s0511a:3749_7: pāsādā otaritvā aḍḍhagāvutaṃ maggaṃ gantvā saparivārā senāsannivesaṃ katvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3749_8: Tato itthiparicārike ṭhapetvā sahāgatā sabbe pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3750_0: Mahāpuriso kira sattāhaṃ tehi parivuto padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya sunandāya
atk-s0511a:3750_1: nāma brāhmaṇiyā dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā khadiravane divāvihāraṃ katvā sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0511a:3750_2: somena nāma yavapālakena upanītā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā nigrodhabodhiṃ upagantvā
atk-s0511a:3750_3: pañcadasahatthāyāmavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā tattha nisīditvā abhisambodhiṃ
atk-s0511a:3750_4: pāpuṇitvā – “anekajātisaṃsāraṃ…pe… taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ
atk-s0511a:3750_5: vītināmetvā attanā saha pabbajitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ koṭiyā upanissayasampattiṃ disvā
atk-s0511a:3750_6: gaganatalena gantvā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye otaritvā tehi parivuto tattha
atk-s0511a:3750_7: dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi. Tadā vīsatiyā koṭisahassānaṃ paṭhamo dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3761_0: Tattha sañchaḍḍitanti chaḍḍitaṃ ujjhitaṃ pariccattaṃ. Kulamūlanti kulagharaṃ, aparimitabhogakkhandhaṃ
atk-s0511a:3761_2: chaḍḍitanti attho. Yācaketi yācakānaṃ datvā. Āḷakanti goṭṭhaṃ, yathā usabho goṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0511a:3761_3: bhinditvā yathāsukhaṃ icchitaṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇāti, evaṃ mahāpurisopi gehabandhanaṃ bhinditvā
atk-s0511a:3762_0: Puna catumāsaṃ janapadacārikaṃ caramāne satthari dasakoṭisahassānaṃ dutiyo abhisamayo
atk-s0511a:3762_1: ahosi. Yadā pana sundaranagaradvāre asanarukkhamūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karonto dhammaṃ
atk-s0511a:3762_2: desesi, tadā pañcannaṃ koṭisahassānaṃ tatiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Puna yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0511a:3762_3: katvā suraripudurabhibhavane tāvatiṃsabhavane sudhammā nāma devasabhā atthi, tattha
atk-s0511a:3762_4: nisīditvā attano mātaraṃ dhanavatīdeviṃ pamukhaṃ katvā dasasahassilokadhātuyā devatānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3762_5: anuggahakaraṇatthaṃ sattappakaraṇaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desento tīṇi devatākoṭisahassāni
atk-s0511a:3775_0: Tattha catumāsanti cātumāse. Ayameva vā pāṭho. Caratīti acari. Yamakaṃ vikubbanaṃ
atk-s0511a:3775_2: vadanti. Pakittayīti mahājanassa pakāsesi. Sudhammāti tāvatiṃsabhavane sudhammā nāma
atk-s0511a:3775_3: sabhā atthi, tattha nisīditvāti attho. Dhammanti abhidhammaṃ.
atk-s0511a:3776_0: Tadā kira ānubhāvavijitanaradevo naradevo nāma mahesakkho heṭṭhā vuttanaradevayakkho
atk-s0511a:3776_1: viya mahiddhiko yakkho ahosi. So jambudīpe ekasmiṃ nagare rañño yādisaṃ rūpaṃ, tādisaṃ
atk-s0511a:3776_2: rūpasaṇṭhānaṃ sarakuttiṃ nimminitvā taṃ rājānaṃ māretvā khāditvā sahaantepuraṃ rajjaṃ
atk-s0511a:3776_3: paṭipajjitvā aparimitamaṃsabhojano ahosi. So kira itthidhutto ca ahosi. Yadā pana
atk-s0511a:3776_4: taṃ kusalā chekā itthiyo – “nāyaṃ amhākaṃ rājā, amanusso eso”ti jānanti, tadā so
atk-s0511a:3776_5: lajjito hutvā tā sabbā khāditvā aññaṃ nagaraṃ paṭipajjati. Evameva so naradevayakkho
atk-s0511a:3776_6: manusse bhakkhayanto yadā sundaranagarābhimukho agamāsi, tadā taṃ disvā nagaravāsino
atk-s0511a:3776_7: manussā maraṇabhayatajjitasantāsā sakanagarato nikkhamitvā tato tato palāyiṃsu. Atha
atk-s0511a:3776_8: te manusse palāyamāne disvā kassapadasabalo tassa naradevassa yakkhassa purato aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:3776_9: Naradevo evaṃ devadevaṃ ṭhitaṃ disvā vissaraṃ ghoraṃ nādaṃ naditvā bhagavato bhayaṃ
atk-s0511a:3776_10: uppādetuṃ asakkonto taṃ saraṇaṃ gantvā pañhaṃ pucchi. Pañhaṃ vissajjetvā taṃ dametvā
atk-s0511a:3776_11: dhamme desiyamāne sampattānaṃ naramarānaṃ gaṇanapathātītānaṃ abhisamayo ahosi. Tena
atk-s0511a:3776_12: vuttaṃ – “naradevassa yakkhassā”tiādi. Tattha apare dhammadesaneti aparasmiṃ dhammadesane.
atk-s0511a:3777_0: Tassa pana kassapabhagavato ekova sāvakasannipāto ahosi. Bārāṇasīnagare purohitaputto
atk-s0511a:3777_1: tisso nāma ahosi. So kassapassa bodhisattassa sarīre lakkhaṇasampattiṃ disvā pituno
atk-s0511a:3777_2: bhāsato sutvā – “nissaṃsayaṃ eso mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā buddho bhavissati,
atk-s0511a:3777_3: etassāhaṃ santike pabbajitvā saṃsāradukkhato muccissāmī”ti cintetvā suddhamunigaṇavantaṃ
atk-s0511a:3777_4: himavantaṃ gantvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbaji. Tassa parivārabhūtāni vīsatitāpasasahassāni
atk-s0511a:3777_5: ahesuṃ. So aparabhāge “kassapakumāro nikkhamitvā abhisambodhiṃ anuppatto”ti sutvā
atk-s0511a:3777_6: saparivāro āgantvā kassapassa bhagavato santike saparivāro ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitvā
atk-s0511a:3777_7: arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tasmiṃ samāgame kassapo bhagavā māghapuṇṇamāyaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3784: Tattha atikkantabhavantānanti atikkantaputhujjanasotāpannādīnaṃ, sabbesaṃ khīṇāsavānamevāti attho. Hirisīlena tādinanti hiriyā ca sīlena ca sadisānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:3785_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto jotipālo nāma māṇavo tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū bhūmiyañceva antalikkhe
atk-s0511a:3785_1: ca pākaṭo ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa sahāyo ahosi. So tena saddhiṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0511a:3785_2: tassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā tassa santike pabbaji. So āraddhavīriyo tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā
atk-s0511a:3785_3: vattapaṭipattiyā buddhasāsanaṃ sobhesi. Sopi taṃ satthā byākāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3797: Tassa dhammaṃ suṇitvāna, pabbajiṃ tassa santike.
atk-s0511a:3806: Imamhi bhaddake kappe, ayaṃ buddho bhavissati.
atk-s0511a:3815_0: Tattha bhūmantalikkhakusaloti bhūmisikkhāsu ca antalikkhesu ca joticakkācāre jotivijjāya
atk-s0511a:3815_1: ca kusaloti attho. Upaṭṭhakoti upaṭṭhāyako. Sappatissoti sappatissayo. Nibbutoti
atk-s0511a:3815_2: vinīto, vissuto vā. Tatiye phaleti nimittasattamī, tatiyaphalādhigamahetu nibbutoti
atk-s0511a:3815_3: attho. Ādāyāti maṃ gahetvā. Vattāvattesūti khuddakavattamahāvattesu. Kovidoti tesaṃ
atk-s0511a:3815_4: pūraṇe kusalo. Na kvaci parihāyāmīti kvacipi sīlesu vā samādhisamāpattiādīsu vā katthaci
atk-s0511a:3815_5: kutopi na parihāyāmi, sabbattha me parihāni nāma na vijjatīti dīpeti. “Na koci parihāyāmī”tipi pāṭho, soyevattho.
atk-s0511a:3816_0: Yāvatāti paricchedavacanametaṃ, yāvatakanti attho. Buddhabhaṇitanti buddhavacanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:3816_1: Sobhayinti sobhesiṃ pakāsesiṃ. Mama acchariyanti mama sammāpaṭipattiṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:3816_2: acchariyaṃ abbhutaṃ kassapo bhagavā disvāti attho. Saṃsaritvāti saṃsāre saṃsaritvā.
atk-s0511a:3817_0: Tassa pana kassapassa bhagavato jātanagaraṃ bārāṇasī nāma ahosi, brahmadatto nāma
atk-s0511a:3817_1: brāhmaṇo pitā, paramaguṇavatī dhanavatī nāma brāhmaṇī mātā, tisso ca bhāradvājo ca
atk-s0511a:3817_2: dve aggasāvakā, sabbamitto nāmupaṭṭhāko, anuḷā ca uruveḷā ca dve aggasāvikā, nigrodharukkho
atk-s0511a:3817_3: bodhi, sarīraṃ vīsatihatthubbedhaṃ ahosi, vīsativassasahassāni āyu, sunandā nāmassa
atk-s0511a:3817_4: aggamahesī, vijitaseno nāma putto, pāsādayānena nikkhami. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:3835: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3841: Keci nibbānaṃ patthentā, passantu me alaṅkaraṃ.
atk-s0511a:3860_0: Tattha vijjulaṭṭhīvāti ghanabhāvena saṇṭhitā vijjulatā viya. Candova gahapūritoti
atk-s0511a:3860_1: parivesagahaparikkhito puṇṇacando viya. Dhammataḷākaṃ māpayitvāti pariyattidhammataḷākaṃ
atk-s0511a:3860_2: māpayitvā. Sīlaṃ datvā vilepananti catupārisuddhisīlasaṅkhātaṃ cittasantativibhūsanatthaṃ
atk-s0511a:3860_3: vilepanaṃ datvā. Dhammadussaṃ nivāsetvāti hirottappadhammasaṅkhātaṃ sāṭakayugaṃ nivāsetvā.
atk-s0511a:3860_4: Dhammamālaṃ vibhajjiyāti sattattiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammakusumamālaṃ vibhajitvā. Vidahitvāti attho.
atk-s0511a:3861_1: mahājanassa dhammataḷākatīre dhammādāsaṃ ṭhapetvāti attho. Mahājaneti mahājanassa.
atk-s0511a:3861_2: Kecīti ye keci. Nibbānaṃ patthentāti sabbākusalamalavilayakaraṃ amatamasaṅkhatamanītikaṃ
atk-s0511a:3861_3: paramasantaṃ accutirasaṃ nibbānaṃ patthentā vicaranti. Te imaṃ alaṅkāraṃ vuttappakāraṃ
atk-s0511a:3861_4: mayā dassitaṃ passantūti attho. “Nibbānamabhipatthentā, passantu maṃ alaṅkara”ntipi
atk-s0511a:3861_5: pāṭho, soyevattho. Alaṅkaranti rassaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a:3862_0: Sīlakañcukaṃ datvānāti pañcasīladasasīlacatupārisuddhisīlamayaṃ kañcukaṃ datvā. Jhānakavacavammitanti
atk-s0511a:3862_2: pārupitvā. Datvā sannāhamuttamanti uttamaṃ caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyasannāhaṃ datvāti
atk-s0511a:3862_6: ṭhapetvāti attho. Dhammakhaggavaraṃ datvāti tassa yogāvacarassa vīriyupalatalanisitadhāraṃ
atk-s0511a:3862_7: maggapaññāvarakhaggaṃ datvā. Sīlasaṃsaggamaddananti ariyaṃ lokuttarasīlaṃ kilesasaṃsaggamaddanatthāya,
atk-s0511a:3863_0: Tevijjābhūsanaṃ datvāti tevijjāmayaṃ vibhūsanaṃ datvā. Āveḷaṃ caturo phaleti cattāri
atk-s0511a:3863_1: phalāni vaṭaṃsakaṃ katvā. Chaḷabhiññābharaṇanti ābharaṇatthāya alaṅkārakaraṇatthāya
atk-s0511a:3863_2: cha abhiññāyo datvā. Dhammapupphapiḷandhananti navalokuttaradhammasaṅkhātaṃ kusumamālaṃ
atk-s0511a:3863_3: katvā. Saddhammapaṇḍaracchattaṃ, datvā pāpanivāraṇanti accantavisuddhaṃ vimuttisetacchattaṃ
atk-s0511a:3863_4: sabbākusalātapanivāraṇaṃ datvā. Māpayitvābhayaṃ pupphanti abhayapuragāminaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikamaggaṃ
atk-s0511a:3864_0: Kassapo kira bhagavā kāsiraṭṭhe setabyanagare setabyuyyāne parinibbāyi. Dhātuyo kirassa
atk-s0511a:3864_1: na vikiriṃsu. Sakalajambudīpavāsino manussā sannipatitvā ekekaṃ suvaṇṇiṭṭhakaṃ koṭiagghanakaṃ
atk-s0511a:3864_2: ratanavicittaṃ bahicinanatthaṃ ekekaṃ aḍḍhakoṭiagghanakaṃ abbhantarapūraṇatthaṃ manosilāya
atk-s0511a:3864_3: mattikākiccaṃ telena udakakiccaṃ karonto yojanubbedhaṃ thūpamakaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3876_0: Tattha amhākaṃ bodhisatto dīpaṅkarādīnaṃ catuvīsatiyā buddhānaṃ santike adhikāraṃ
atk-s0511a:3876_1: karonto kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni āgato. Kassapassa pana bhagavato
atk-s0511a:3876_2: orabhāge ṭhapetvā imaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ añño buddho nāma natthi. Iti dīpaṅkarādīnaṃ
atk-s0511a:3876_3: catuvīsatiyā buddhānaṃ santike laddhabyākaraṇo pana bodhisatto yenena –
atk-s0511a:3880_0: Ime aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā dīpaṅkarapādamūle katābhinīhārena “handa, buddhakare
atk-s0511a:3880_1: dhamme, vicināmi ito cito”ti ussāhaṃ katvā “vicinanto tadādakkhiṃ, paṭhamaṃ dānapārami”nti
atk-s0511a:3880_2: dānapāramitādayo buddhakārakadhammā diṭṭhā, te pūrento yāva vessantarattabhāvā āgami,
atk-s0511a:3880_3: āgacchanto ca ye te katābhinīhārānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ ānisaṃsā saṃvaṇṇitā –
atk-s0511a:3886: Jāyamānā manussesu, jaccandhā na bhavanti te.
atk-s0511a:3896: Te ānisaṃse adhigantvāva āgato. Evaṃ āgacchanto vessantarattabhāve ṭhito –
atk-s0511a:3899: Evaṃ mahāpathavikampanādīni mahāpuññāni katvā āyupariyosāne tato cavitvā tusitapure nibbatti.
atk-s0511a:3901_0: Tusitapure vasamāneyeva pana bodhisatte buddhakolāhalaṃ nāma udapādi. Lokasmiñhi
atk-s0511a:3901_1: tīṇi kolāhalāni uppajjanti. Seyyathidaṃ – kappakolāhalaṃ, buddhakolāhalaṃ, cakkavattikolāhalanti.
atk-s0511a:3901_2: Tattha “vassasatasahassassa accayena kappuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti lokabyūhā nāma kāmāvacaradevā
atk-s0511a:3901_3: muttasirā vikiṇṇakesā rudamukhā assūni hatthehi puñchamānā rattavatthanivatthā ativiya
atk-s0511a:3901_4: virūpavesadhārino hutvā manussapathe vicarantā evaṃ ārocenti – “mārisā, mārisā, ito
atk-s0511a:3901_5: vassasatasahassassa accayena kappuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissati, ayaṃ loko vinassissati, mahāsamuddopi
atk-s0511a:3901_6: ussussissati, ayañca mahāpathavī sineru ca pabbatarājā uḍḍayhissanti vinassissanti,
atk-s0511a:3901_7: yāva brahmalokā lokavināso bhavissati, mettaṃ, mārisā, bhāvetha, karuṇaṃ muditaṃ
atk-s0511a:3901_8: upekkhaṃ, mārisā, bhāvetha, mātaraṃ pitaraṃ upaṭṭhahatha, kule jeṭṭhāpacāyino hothā”ti.
atk-s0511a:3902_0: “Vassasahassassa accayena pana sabbaññubuddho loke upajjissatī”ti lokapāladevatā
atk-s0511a:3902_1: – “ito, mārisā, vassasahassassa accayena buddho loke uppajjissatī”ti ugghosentiyo
atk-s0511a:3903_0: “Vassasatassa accayena cakkavattirājā uppajjissatī”ti devatā – “ito, mārisā, vassasatassa
atk-s0511a:3903_1: accayena cakkavattirājā uppajjissatī”ti ugghosentiyo āhiṇḍanti. Idaṃ cakkavattikolāhalaṃ nāma.
atk-s0511a:3904_0: Tesu buddhakolāhalasaddaṃ sutvā sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā ekato sannipatitvā
atk-s0511a:3904_1: – “asuko nāma satto buddho bhavissatī”ti ñatvā upasaṅkamitvā āyācanti, āyācamānā
atk-s0511a:3904_2: ca tassa pubbanimittesu uppannesu āyācanti. Tadā pana sabbāpi tā ekekacakkavāḷe catumahārāja-sakka-suyāma-santusita-sunimmita-vasavatti-mahābrahmehi
atk-s0511a:3904_3: saddhiṃ ekacakkavāḷe sannipatitvā tusitabhavane uppannacutinimittassa bodhisattassa
atk-s0511a:3904_4: santikaṃ gantvā – “mārisa, tumhehi dasa pāramiyo pūritā, pūrentehi ca na sakkabrahmasampattiādikaṃ
atk-s0511a:3904_5: sampattiṃ patthentehi pūritā, lokanittharaṇatthāya pana vo sabbaññutaṃ patthentehi
atk-s0511a:3908_0: Atha mahāsatto devatāhi evaṃ āyāciyamāno devatānaṃ paṭiññaṃ adatvāva kāla-dīpa-desa-kula-janettiāyuparicchedavasena
atk-s0511a:3908_1: pañca mahāvilokanāni vilokesi. Tattha “kālo nu kho, na kālo”ti paṭhamaṃ kālaṃ vilokesi.
atk-s0511a:3908_2: Tattha vassasatasahassato uddhaṃ vaḍḍhitaāyukālo kālo nāma na hoti. Kasmā? Tadā hi
atk-s0511a:3908_3: sattānaṃ jātijarāmaraṇāni na paññāyanti, buddhānañca dhammadesanā tilakkhaṇamuttā
atk-s0511a:3908_4: nāma natthi, tesaṃ “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti kathentānaṃ “kiṃ nāmetaṃ kathentī”ti
atk-s0511a:3908_5: neva sotabbaṃ na saddhātabbaṃ maññanti, tato abhisamayo na hoti, tasmiṃ asati aniyyānikaṃ
atk-s0511a:3908_6: sāsanaṃ hoti. Tasmā so akālo. Vassasatato ūnaāyukālopi kālo na hoti. Kasmā? Tadā
atk-s0511a:3908_7: sattā ussannakilesā honti, ussannakilesānañca dinnovādo ovādaṭṭhāne na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0511a:3908_8: udake daṇḍarāji viya khippaṃ vigacchati. Tasmā sopi akālo. Vassasatasahassato pana
atk-s0511a:3908_9: paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā vassasatato paṭṭhāya uddhaṃ āyukālo kālo nāma. Tadā pana vassasatakālo
atk-s0511a:3909: Tato dīpaṃ olokento saparivāre cattāro mahādīpe oloketvā – “tīsu dīpesu buddhā na nibbattanti, jambudīpeyeva nibbattantī”ti dīpaṃ passi.
atk-s0511a:3910_0: Tato “jambudīpo nāma mahā, dasayojanasahassaparimāṇo. Katarasmiṃ nu kho padese buddhā
atk-s0511a:3910_1: nibbattantī”ti okāsaṃ olokento majjhimadesaṃ passi. “Kapilavatthu nāma nagaraṃ, tattha
atk-s0511a:3911_0: Tato kulaṃ vilokento – “buddhā nāma vessakule vā suddakule vā na nibbattanti. Lokasammate
atk-s0511a:3911_1: pana khattiyakule vā brāhmaṇakule vā nibbattanti, etarahi khattiyakulaṃ lokasammataṃ,
atk-s0511a:3911_2: tattha nibbattissāmi suddhodano nāma rājā pitā me bhavissatī”ti kulaṃ passi.
atk-s0511a:3912_0: Tato mātaraṃ vilokento – “buddhamātā nāma lolā surādhuttā na hoti, kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0511a:3912_1: pana pūritapāramī jātito paṭṭhāya akhaṇḍapañcasīlāyeva hoti. Ayañca mahāmāyā nāma
atk-s0511a:3912_2: devī edisī, ayaṃ me mātā bhavissati, kittakaṃ panassā āyūti, dasannaṃ māsānaṃ upari
atk-s0511a:3913_0: Iti imaṃ pañcavidhaṃ mahāvilokanaṃ viloketvā – “kālo me, mārisā, buddhabhāvāyā”ti
atk-s0511a:3913_1: devānaṃ paṭiññaṃ datvā – “gacchatha tumhe”ti tā devatā uyyojetvā tusitadevatāhi parivuto
atk-s0511a:3913_2: tusitapure nandanavanaṃ pāvisi. Sabbadevalokesu hi nandanavanaṃ atthiyeva. Tatra
atk-s0511a:3913_3: naṃ devatā – “ito cuto sugatiṃ gacchā”ti pubbe katakusalakammokāsaṃ sārayamānā vicaranti.
atk-s0511a:3913_4: So evaṃ tāhi devatāhi kusalaṃ sārayamānāhi parivuto tatra vicarantova cavitvā mahāmāyāya
atk-s0511a:3913_5: deviyā kucchismiṃ uttarāsāḷhanakkhattena paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Mahāpurisassa pana mātu
atk-s0511a:3914_0: Evaṃ gahitapaṭisandhikassa bodhisattassa ceva bodhisattamātuyā ca upaddavanivāraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0511a:3914_1: khaggahatthā cattāro devaputtā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu. Bodhisattassa mātu purisesu rāgacittaṃ
atk-s0511a:3914_2: nuppajji, lābhaggayasaggappattā ca sā ahosi sukhinī akilantakāyā. Bodhisattañca attano
atk-s0511a:3914_3: kucchigataṃ vippasanne maṇiratane āvutapaṇḍusuttaṃ viya passati. Yasmā bodhisattena
atk-s0511a:3914_4: vasitakucchi nāma cetiyagabbhasadisā hoti, na sakkā aññena sattena āvasituṃ vā paribhuñjituṃ
atk-s0511a:3914_5: vā, tasmā bodhisattamātā sattāhajāte bodhisatte kālaṃ katvā tusitapure nibbatti.
atk-s0511a:3914_6: Yathā pana aññā itthiyo dasa māse appatvāpi atikkamitvāpi nisinnāpi nipannāpi vijāyanti,
atk-s0511a:3914_7: na evaṃ bodhisattamātā. Bodhisattamātā pana bodhisattaṃ dasa māse kucchinā pariharitvā
atk-s0511a:3915_0: Mahāmāyāpi devī dasa māse kucchinā bodhisattaṃ pariharitvā paripuṇṇagabbhā ñātigharaṃ
atk-s0511a:3915_2: gantu”nti. Rājā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā kapilavatthuto yāva devadahanagarā añjasaṃ
atk-s0511a:3915_4: nisīdāpetvā mahatiyā vibhūtiyā mahatā parivārena pesesi. Dvinnaṃ pana nagarānaṃ antare
atk-s0511a:3915_5: ubhayanagaravāsīnaṃ paribhogārahaṃ lumbinīvanaṃ nāma maṅgalasālavanaṃ atthi, taṃ
atk-s0511a:3915_6: tasmiṃ samaye mūlato yāva aggasākhā sabbaṃ ekaphāliphullaṃ ahosi. Sākhantarehi ceva
atk-s0511a:3918_0: Amaccā rañño ārocetvā deviṃ gahetvā taṃ lumbinīvanaṃ pavisiṃsu. Sā maṅgalasālamūlaṃ
atk-s0511a:3918_1: gantvā tassa ujusamavaṭṭakkhandhassa pupphaphalapallavasamalaṅkatassa yaṃ sākhaṃ
atk-s0511a:3918_2: gaṇhitukāmā ahosi, sā sālasākhā abalā janahadayalolā sayameva vilambamānā hutvā tassā
atk-s0511a:3918_3: karatalasmiṃ samupagatā. Atha sā taṃ sālasākhaṃ tambatuṅganakhujjalena kamaladalavattivaṭṭaṅgulinā
atk-s0511a:3918_4: navakanakakaṭavalayasobhinā dakkhiṇena paramaratikarena karena aggahesi. Sā taṃ sālasākhaṃ
atk-s0511a:3918_5: gahetvā ṭhitā asitajaladharavivaragatā bālacandalekhā viya ca aciraṭṭhitikā accipabhā
atk-s0511a:3918_6: viya ca nandanavanajātā devī viya ca devī virocittha. Tāvadeva cassā kammajavātā
atk-s0511a:3918_7: caliṃsu. Athassā sāṇipākāraṃ parikkhipitvā mahājano paṭikkami. Sā sālasākhaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0511a:3919_0: Taṅkhaṇaṃyeva cattāro visuddhacittā mahābrahmāno suvaṇṇajālaṃ ādāya āgantvā tena
atk-s0511a:3919_1: suvaṇṇajālena bodhisattaṃ sampaṭicchitvā mātu purato ṭhapetvā – “attamanā, devi,
atk-s0511a:3919_2: hohi, mahesakkho te putto uppanno”ti āhaṃsu. Yathā pana aññe sattā mātukucchito nikkhamantā
atk-s0511a:3919_3: paṭikkūlena asucinā makkhitā nikkhamanti, na evaṃ bodhisatto. Bodhisatto pana dve
atk-s0511a:3919_4: hatthe dve pāde pasāretvā ṭhitakova mātukucchisambhavena kenaci asucinā amakkhitova
atk-s0511a:3919_5: suddho visado kāsikavatthe nikkhittamaṇiratanaṃ viya virocamāno mātukucchito nikkhami.
atk-s0511a:3919_6: Evaṃ santepi bodhisattassa ca bodhisattamātuyā ca sakkāratthaṃ ākāsato dve udakadhārā
atk-s0511a:3919_7: nikkhamitvā bodhisattassa ca mātuyā ca sarīre utuṃ gāhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3920_0: Atha naṃ suvaṇṇajālena paṭiggahetvā ṭhitānaṃ brahmānaṃ hatthato cattāro mahārājāno
atk-s0511a:3920_1: maṅgalasammatāya sukhasamphassāya ajinappaveṇiyā gaṇhiṃsu, tesaṃ hatthato manussā
atk-s0511a:3920_2: dukūlacumbaṭakena gaṇhiṃsu, manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya puratthimaṃ
atk-s0511a:3920_3: disaṃ olokesi, anekāni cakkavāḷasahassāni ekaṅgaṇāni ahesuṃ. Tattha devamanussā gandhapupphamālādīhi
atk-s0511a:3920_4: pūjayamānā – “mahāpurisa, tumhehi sadiso ettha natthi, kuto uttaritaro”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3920_5: Evaṃ dasa disā anuviloketvā attanā sadisaṃ adisvā uttaradisābhimukho sattapadavītihārena
atk-s0511a:3920_6: agamāsi. Gacchanto ca pathaviyā eva gato, nākāsena. Acelakova gato, na sacelako.
atk-s0511a:3920_7: Daharova gato, na soḷasavassuddesiko. Mahājanassa pana ākāsena gacchanto viya alaṅkatapaṭiyatto
atk-s0511a:3920_8: viya ca soḷasavassuddesiko viya ca ahosi. Tato sattame pade ṭhatvā “aggohamasmi lokassā”tiādikaṃ
atk-s0511a:3921_0: Bodhisatto hi tīsu attabhāvesu mātukucchito nikkhantamattova vācaṃ nicchāresi mahosadhattabhāve,
atk-s0511a:3921_1: vessantarattabhāve, imasmiṃ attabhāveti. Mahosadhattabhāve kirassa mātukucchito nikkhantamattasseva
atk-s0511a:3921_2: sakko devarājā āgantvā candanasāraṃ hatthe ṭhapetvā gato, taṃ muṭṭhiyaṃ katvāva nikkhanto.
atk-s0511a:3921_3: Atha naṃ mātā – “tāta, tvaṃ kiṃ gahetvā āgatosī”ti pucchi. “Osadhaṃ, ammā”ti. Iti
atk-s0511a:3922_0: Vessantarattabhāve pana mātukucchito nikkhantamattova dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā –
atk-s0511a:3922_1: “atthi nu kho, amma, kiñci gehasmiṃ dhanaṃ, dānaṃ dassāmī”ti vadanto nikkhami. Athassa
atk-s0511a:3922_2: mātā – “sadhane kule nibbattosi, tātā”ti puttassa hatthaṃ attano hatthatale katvā
atk-s0511a:3923_0: Imasmiṃ pana attabhāve imaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadīti evaṃ bodhisatto tīsu attabhāvesu mātukucchito
atk-s0511a:3923_1: nikkhantamattova vācaṃ nicchāresi. Jātakkhaṇepissa dvattiṃsa pubbanimittāni pāturahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3923_2: Yasmiṃ pana samaye amhākaṃ bodhisatto lumbinīvane jāto tasmiṃyeva samaye rāhulamātā
atk-s0511a:3923_3: devī ānando channo kāḷudāyī amacco kaṇḍako assarājā mahābodhirukkho catasso nidhikumbhiyo
atk-s0511a:3923_4: ca jātā, tattha eko gāvutappamāṇo eko aḍḍhayojanappamāṇo eko tigāvutappamāṇo eko
atk-s0511a:3923_5: yojanappamāṇo ahosi. Ime satta sahajātā nāma honti.
atk-s0511a:3924_0: Ubhayanagaravāsino mahāpurisaṃ gahetvā kapilavatthupurameva agamaṃsu. Taṃdivasameva
atk-s0511a:3924_1: – “kapilavatthunagare suddhodanamahārājassa putto bodhimūle nisīditvā buddho bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0511a:3924_2: tāvatiṃsabhavane haṭṭhatuṭṭhā devasaṅghā celukkhepādīni pavattentā kīḷiṃsu. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0511a:3924_3: samaye suddhodanamahārājassa kulūpako aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī kāḷadevalo nāma tāpaso
atk-s0511a:3924_4: bhattakiccaṃ katvā divāvihāratthāya tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gantvā tattha divāvihāraṃ nisinno
atk-s0511a:3924_5: tā devatā tuṭṭhamānasā kīḷantiyo disvā “kiṃkāraṇā tuṭṭhamānasā pamuditahadayā kīḷatha,
atk-s0511a:3924_6: mayhaṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ kathethā”ti pucchi. Tato devatā āhaṃsu – “mārisa, suddhodanarañño
atk-s0511a:3924_7: putto jāto, so bodhimaṇḍe nisīditvā buddho hutvā dhammacakkaṃ pavattessati, tassa
atk-s0511a:3924_8: ‘anantarūpaṃ buddhalīḷaṃ passituṃ labhissāmā’ti iminā kāraṇena tuṭṭhamhā”ti.
atk-s0511a:3925_0: Atha tāpaso tāsaṃ devatānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā paramadassanīyaratanāvalokato devalokato
atk-s0511a:3925_1: oruyha narapatinivesanaṃ pavisitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi. Tato katapaṭisanthāraṃ
atk-s0511a:3925_2: rājānaṃ – “putto kira te, mahārāja, jāto, taṃ passissāmā”ti āha. Rājā alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ
atk-s0511a:3925_3: tanayaṃ āharāpetvā devalatāpasaṃ vandāpetuṃ abhihari. Mahāpurisassa pādā parivattitvā
atk-s0511a:3925_4: vijjulatā viya asitajaladharakūṭesu tāpasassa jaṭāsu patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Bodhisattena
atk-s0511a:3925_5: hi tenattabhāvena vanditabbo nāma añño natthi. Tato tāpaso uṭṭhāyāsanā bodhisattassa
atk-s0511a:3925_6: añjaliṃ paggahesi. Rājā taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā attano puttaṃ vandi. Tāpaso bodhisattassa
atk-s0511a:3925_7: lakkhaṇasampattiṃ disvā – “bhavissati nu kho buddho, udāhu na bhavissatī”ti āvajjetvā
atk-s0511a:3926_0: Tato “ahaṃ imaṃ buddhabhūtaṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhissāmi nu kho, no”ti upadhārento – “na labhissāmi,
atk-s0511a:3926_1: antarāyeva kālaṃ katvā buddhasatenapi buddhasahassenapi gantvā bodhetuṃ asakkuṇeyye
atk-s0511a:3926_2: arūpabhave nibbattissāmī”ti disvā – “evarūpaṃ nāma acchariyapurisaṃ buddhabhūtaṃ
atk-s0511a:3926_3: daṭṭhuṃ na labhissāmi, mahatī vata me jāni bhavissatī”ti parodi. Manussā pana disvā
atk-s0511a:3926_4: – “amhākaṃ ayyo idāneva hasitvā puna roditumārabhi, kiṃ nu kho, bhante, amhākaṃ ayyaputtassa
atk-s0511a:3926_5: koci antarāyo bhavissatī”ti pucchiṃsu. Tāpaso āha – “natthetassa antarāyo, nissaṃsayena
atk-s0511a:3926_6: buddho bhavissatī”ti. “Atha kasmā tumhe paroditthā”ti? “Evarūpaṃ acchariyapurisaṃ
atk-s0511a:3926_7: buddhabhūtaṃ daṭṭhuṃ na labhissāmi, mahatī vata me jāni bhavissatīti attānaṃ anusocanto rodāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0511a:3927_0: Tato bodhisattaṃ pañcame divase sīsaṃ nhāpetvā – “nāmaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti rājabhavanaṃ
atk-s0511a:3927_1: catujjātikagandhena upalimpitvā lājapañcamāni kusumāni vikiritvā asambhinnapāyāsaṃ
atk-s0511a:3927_2: pacāpetvā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāraṅgate aṭṭhasate brāhmaṇe nimantetvā rājabhavane nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0511a:3927_3: madhupāyāsaṃ bhojetvā sakkāraṃ katvā – “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti lakkhaṇāni pariggāhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3927_4: Tesu rāmādayo aṭṭha brāhmaṇapaṇḍitā lakkhaṇapariggāhakā ahesuṃ. Tesu satta janā dve
atk-s0511a:3927_5: aṅguliyo ukkhipitvā dvedhā byākariṃsu – “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato agāraṃ ajjhāvasanto
atk-s0511a:3927_6: rājā hoti cakkavattī, pabbajamāno buddho”ti. Tesaṃ pana sabbadaharo gottena koṇḍañño
atk-s0511a:3927_7: nāma brāhmaṇo bodhisattassa lakkhaṇavarasampattiṃ disvā – “etassa agāramajjhe ṭhānakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:3927_8: natthi, ekanteneva vivaṭacchado buddho bhavissatī”ti ekameva aṅguliṃ ukkhipitvā ekaṃsabyākaraṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:3927_9: byākāsi. Athassa nāmaṃ gaṇhantā sabbalokatthasiddhikarattā siddhatthoti nāmamakaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3928_0: Atha te brāhmaṇā attano gharāni gantvā putte āmantetvā evamāhaṃsu – “amhe mahallakā,
atk-s0511a:3928_1: suddhodanamahārājassa puttaṃ sabbaññutaṃ pattaṃ sambhāveyyāma vā no vā, tumhe pana
atk-s0511a:3928_2: tasmiṃ pabbajitvā sabbaññutaṃ patte tassa sāsane pabbajathā”ti. Tato sattapi janā
atk-s0511a:3928_3: yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā yathākammaṃ gatā. Koṇḍaññamāṇavo arogo ahosi. Tadā pana rājā tesaṃ
atk-s0511a:3928_4: vacanaṃ sutvā – “kiṃ disvā mama putto pabbajissatī”ti te pucchi. “Cattāri pubbanimittāni,
atk-s0511a:3928_5: devā”ti. “Katarañca katarañcā”ti? “Jiṇṇaṃ byādhitaṃ mataṃ pabbajita”nti. Rājā “ito
atk-s0511a:3928_6: paṭṭhāya evarūpānaṃ mama puttassa santikaṃ āgamituṃ mā adatthā”ti vatvā kumārassa
atk-s0511a:3928_7: cakkhupathe jiṇṇapurisādīnaṃ āgamananivāraṇatthaṃ catūsu disāsu gāvutagāvutaṭṭhāne
atk-s0511a:3928_8: ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi. Taṃdivasaṃ maṅgalaṭṭhāne sannipatitesu asītiyā ñātikulasahassesu
atk-s0511a:3928_9: ekameko ekamekaṃ puttaṃ paṭijāni – “ayaṃ buddho vā hotu rājā vā, mayaṃ ekamekaṃ puttaṃ
atk-s0511a:3928_10: dassāma, sace buddho bhavissati, khattiyasamaṇeheva parivuto vicarissati. Sace rājā
atk-s0511a:3928_11: cakkavattī bhavissati, khattiyakumāreheva parivuto vicarissatī”ti. Atha rājā mahāpurisassa
atk-s0511a:3928_12: paramarūpasampannā vigatasabbadosā catusaṭṭhi dhātiyo adāsi. Bodhisatto anantena
atk-s0511a:3929_0: Athekadivasaṃ rañño vappamaṅgalaṃ nāma ahosi. Taṃdivasaṃ rājā mahatiyā vibhūtiyā
atk-s0511a:3929_1: mahatā parivārena nagarato nikkhamanto puttampi gahetvāva agamāsi. Kasikammaṭṭhāne
atk-s0511a:3929_2: eko jamburukkho paramaramaṇīyo ghanasandacchāyo ahosi. Tassa heṭṭhā kumārassa sayanaṃ
atk-s0511a:3929_3: paññāpetvā upari varakanakatārākhacitaṃ rattacelavitānaṃ bandhitvā sāṇipākārena parikkhipāpetvā
atk-s0511a:3929_4: ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā rājā sabbālaṅkāraṃ alaṅkaritvā amaccagaṇaparivuto naṅgalakaraṇaṭṭhānamagamāsi.
atk-s0511a:3929_5: Tattha rājā paramamaṅgalaṃ suvaṇṇanaṅgalaṃ gaṇhāti, amaccādayo rajatanaṅgalādīni
atk-s0511a:3929_6: gaṇhanti. Taṃdivasaṃ naṅgalasahassaṃ yojīyati. Bodhisattaṃ parivāretvā nisinnā dhātiyo
atk-s0511a:3930_0: Atha bodhisatto ito cito ca olokento kiñci adisvā sahasā uṭṭhāya pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
atk-s0511a:3930_1: ānāpāne pariggahetvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattesi. Dhātiyo khajjabhojjantare vicarantiyo
atk-s0511a:3930_2: thokaṃ cirāyiṃsu. Sesarukkhānaṃ chāyā nivattā, tassa pana jamburukkhassa chāyā parimaṇḍalā
atk-s0511a:3930_3: hutvā tattheva aṭṭhāsi. Dhātito panassa “ayyaputto ekakovā”ti vegena sāṇipākāraṃ
atk-s0511a:3930_4: ukkhipitvā pariyesantiyo sirisayane pallaṅkena nisinnaṃ tañca pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā gantvā
atk-s0511a:3930_5: taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā vegena āgantvā taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā – “ayaṃ vo,
atk-s0511a:3931_0: Atha mahāpuriso anukkamena soḷasavassuddesiko ahosi. Rājā bodhisattassa tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ
atk-s0511a:3931_1: anucchavike ramma-suramma-subhanāmake tayo pāsāde kāresi. Ekaṃ navabhūmikaṃ ekaṃ
atk-s0511a:3931_2: sattabhūmikaṃ ekaṃ pañcabhūmikaṃ. Tayopi pāsādā ubbedhena samappamāṇā ahesuṃ. Bhūmikāsu
atk-s0511a:3932_0: Atha rājā cintesi – “putto me vayappatto chattamassa ussāpetvā rajjasiriṃ passissāmī”ti.
atk-s0511a:3932_1: So sākiyānaṃ paṇṇāni pahiṇi “putto me vayappatto, rajje naṃ patiṭṭhāpessāmi, sabbe
atk-s0511a:3932_2: attano gehesu vayappattā dārikā imaṃ gehaṃ pesentū”ti. Te rañño sāsanaṃ sutvā – “kumāro
atk-s0511a:3932_3: kevalaṃ rūpasampanno, na kiñci sippaṃ jānāti, dārabharaṇaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissati,
atk-s0511a:3932_4: na mayaṃ dhītaro dassāmā”ti āhaṃsu. Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā puttassa santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0511a:3932_5: tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Bodhisatto – “kiṃ sippaṃ dassetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha. “Sahassatthāmaṃ
atk-s0511a:3932_6: dhanuṃ āropetuṃ vaṭṭati, tātā”ti. “Tena hi āharāpethā”ti āha. Rājā āharāpetvā adāsi.
atk-s0511a:3932_7: Taṃ dhanuṃ purisasahassaṃ āropeti, purisasahassaṃ oropeti. Mahāpuriso taṃ sarāsanaṃ
atk-s0511a:3932_8: āharāpetvā pallaṅkena nisinnova jiyaṃ pādaṅguṭṭhake veṭhāpetvā kaḍḍhanto pādaṅguṭṭhakeneva
atk-s0511a:3932_9: dhanuṃ āropetvā vāmena hatthena daṇḍe gahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena kaḍḍhitvā jiyaṃ
atk-s0511a:3932_10: ropesi. Sakalanagaraṃ uppattanākārappattaṃ ahosi. “Kiṃ eso saddo”ti ca vutte “devo
atk-s0511a:3932_11: gajjatī”ti āhaṃsu. Athaññe “tumhe na jānātha, na devo gajjati, aṅgīrasassa kumārassa
atk-s0511a:3932_12: sahassatthāmaṃ dhanuṃ āropetvā jiyaṃ poṭhentassa jiyappahārasaddo eso”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3932_13: Sākiyā taṃ sutvā tāvatakeneva āraddhacittā tuṭṭhamānasā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3933_0: Atha mahāpuriso – “kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha. Aṭṭhaṅgulabahalaṃ ayopaṭṭaṃ kaṇḍena
atk-s0511a:3933_1: vijjhituṃ vaṭṭatīti. Taṃ vijjhitvā – “aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha. Caturaṅgulabahalaṃ
atk-s0511a:3933_2: asanaphalakaṃ vijjhituṃ vaṭṭatīti. Tampi vijjhitvā – “aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0511a:3933_3: āha. Vidatthibahalaṃ udumbaraphalakaṃ vijjhituṃ vaṭṭatīti. Tampi vijjhitvā aññaṃ
atk-s0511a:3933_4: kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti. Tato “vālukasakaṭānī”ti āhaṃsu. Mahāsatto vālukasakaṭampi palālasakaṭampi
atk-s0511a:3933_5: vinivijjhitvā udake ekūsabhappamāṇaṃ kaṇḍaṃ pesesi thale aṭṭhausabhappamāṇaṃ. Atha
atk-s0511a:3933_6: naṃ “vātiṅgaṇasaññāya vālaṃ vijjhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āhaṃsu. “Tena hi yojanamattaṃ vātiṅgaṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:3933_7: bandhāpethā”ti vatvā yojanamattake vātiṅgaṇasaññāya vālaṃ bandhāpetvā rattandhakāre
atk-s0511a:3933_8: meghapaṭalehi channāsu disāsu kaṇḍaṃ khipi. Taṃ gantvā yojanamattake vālaṃ phāletvā
atk-s0511a:3933_9: pathaviṃ pāvisi. Na kevalaṃ ettakameva, taṃdivasaṃ mahāpuriso loke vattamānaṃ sippaṃ sabbameva dassesi.
atk-s0511a:3934_0: Atha sākiyā attano dhītaro alaṅkaritvā pesayiṃsu. Cattālīsasahassā nāṭakitthiyo ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3934_1: Rāhulamātā pana devī aggamahesī ahosi. Mahāpuriso devakumāro viya surayuvatīhi parivuto
atk-s0511a:3934_2: narayuvatīhi parivuto nippurisehi turiyehi paricāriyamāno mahāsampattiṃ anubhavamāno
atk-s0511a:3934_3: utuvārena utuvārena tesu tīsu pāsādesu viharati. Athekadivasaṃ bodhisatto uyyānabhūmiṃ
atk-s0511a:3934_4: gantukāmo sārathiṃ āmantetvā – “rathaṃ yojehi uyyānabhūmiṃ passissāmī”ti āha. So
atk-s0511a:3934_8: samalaṅkaritvā sasikumudasadisavaṇṇe anilagaruḷajave ājānīye cattāro maṅgalasindhave
atk-s0511a:3934_9: yojetvā bodhisattassa paṭivedesi. Bodhisatto devavimānasadisaṃ taṃ rathavaramāruyha
atk-s0511a:3935_0: Atha devatā “siddhatthakumārassa abhisambujjhanakālo āsanno, pubbanimittamassa dassessāmā”ti
atk-s0511a:3935_1: ekaṃ devaputtaṃ jarājajjarasarīraṃ khaṇḍadantaṃ palitakesaṃ vaṅkagattaṃ daṇḍahatthaṃ
atk-s0511a:3935_2: pavedhamānaṃ katvā dassesuṃ. Taṃ bodhisatto ceva sārathi ca passanti. Tato bodhisatto
atk-s0511a:3935_3: – “sārathi ko nāmesa puriso kesāpissa na yathā aññesa”nti mahāpadānasutte āgatanayeneva
atk-s0511a:3935_4: pucchitvā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā – “dhiratthu vata, bho, jāti, yatra hi nāma jātassa
atk-s0511a:3935_5: jarā paññāyissatī”ti saṃviggahadayo tatova paṭinivattitvā pāsādameva abhiruhi.
atk-s0511a:3936_0: Rājā “kiṃkāraṇā mama putto paṭinivattī”ti pucchi. “Jiṇṇapurisaṃ disvā, devā”ti. Tato
atk-s0511a:3936_1: kampamānamānaso rājā aḍḍhayojane ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi. Punekadivasaṃ bodhisatto uyyānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3936_2: gacchanto tāhi eva devatāhi nimmitaṃ byādhitañca purisaṃ disvā purimanayeneva pucchitvā
atk-s0511a:3936_3: saṃviggahadayo nivattitvā pāsādameva abhiruhi. Rājā pucchitvā nāṭakāni vissajjesi.
atk-s0511a:3936_4: “Pabbajjāya mānasaṃ assa bhinnaṃ karissa”nti ārakkhaṃ vaḍḍhetvā samantato tigāvutappamāṇe
atk-s0511a:3937_0: Punapi bodhisatto ekadivasaṃ uyyānaṃ gacchanto tatheva devatāhi nimmitaṃ kālaṅkataṃ
atk-s0511a:3937_1: disvā purimanayeneva pucchitvā saṃviggahadayo nivattitvā pāsādamabhiruhi. Rājā nivattanakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:3937_2: pucchitvā puna ārakkhaṃ vaḍḍhetvā yojanappamāṇe padese ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0511a:3938_0: Punapi bodhisatto ekadivasaṃ uyyānaṃ gacchanto tatheva devatāhi nimmitaṃ sunivatthaṃ
atk-s0511a:3938_1: supārutaṃ pabbajitaṃ disvā – “ko nāmeso, samma, sārathī”ti sārathiṃ pucchi. Sārathi
atk-s0511a:3938_2: kiñcāpi buddhuppādassa abhāvā pabbajitaṃ vā pabbajitaguṇe vā na jānāti, devatānubhāvena
atk-s0511a:3938_3: pana “pabbajito nāmāyaṃ devā”ti vatvā pabbajjāya guṇaṃ tassa vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0511a:3939_0: Tato bodhisatto pabbajjāya ruciṃ uppādetvā taṃdivasaṃ uyyānaṃ agamāsi. Dīghāyukā
atk-s0511a:3939_1: bodhisattā vassasate vassasate atikkante jiṇṇādīsu ekekaṃ addasaṃsu. Amhākaṃ pana
atk-s0511a:3939_2: bodhisatto appāyukakāle uppannattā catunnaṃ catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena uyyānaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0511a:3939_3: anukkamena ekekaṃ addasa. Dīghabhāṇakā panāhu – “cattāri nimittāni ekadivaseneva
atk-s0511a:3939_4: disvā agamāsī”ti. Tattha divasabhāgaṃ kīḷitvā uyyānarasamanubhavitvā maṅgalapokkharaṇiyaṃ
atk-s0511a:3939_5: nhatvā atthaṅgate sūriye maṅgalasilātale nisīdi attānaṃ alaṅkārāpetukāmo. Athassa
atk-s0511a:3939_6: cittācāramaññāya sakkena devānamindena āṇatto vissakammo nāma devaputto āgantvā tasseva
atk-s0511a:3939_7: kappakasadiso hutvā dibbehi alaṅkārehi alaṅkari. Athassa sabbālaṅkārasamalaṅkatassa
atk-s0511a:3939_8: sabbatālāvacaresu sakāni sakāni paṭibhānāni dassayantesu brāhmaṇesu ca “jaya nandā”tiādivacanehi
atk-s0511a:3939_10: rathavaraṃ abhiruhi. Tasmiṃ samaye – “rāhulamātā puttaṃ vijātā”ti sutvā suddhodanamahārājā
atk-s0511a:3939_11: – “puttassa me tuṭṭhiṃ nivedethā”ti sāsanaṃ pahiṇi. Bodhisatto taṃ sutvā – “rāhu
atk-s0511a:3939_12: jāto, bandhanaṃ jāta”nti āha. Rājā – “kiṃ me putto avacā”ti pucchitvā taṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0511a:3939_13: sutvā “ito paṭṭhāya me nattā ‘rāhulakumāro’tveva nāmaṃ hotū”ti āha.
atk-s0511a:3940_0: Bodhisattopi taṃ rathavaramāruyha mahatā parivārena atimanoramena sirisobhaggena
atk-s0511a:3940_1: nagaraṃ pāvisi. Tasmiṃ samaye rūpasiriyā guṇasampattiyā ca akisā kisāgotamī nāma
atk-s0511a:3940_2: khattiyakaññā uparipāsādavaratalagatā nagaraṃ pavisantassa bodhisattassa rūpasiriṃ
atk-s0511a:3941: “Nibbutā nūna sā mātā, nibbuto nūna so pitā;
atk-s0511a:3942: Nibbutā nūna sā nārī, yassāyaṃ īdiso patī”ti. –
atk-s0511a:3944_0: Bodhisatto taṃ sutvā cintesi – “ayaṃ me sussavanaṃ vacanaṃ sāvesi, ahañhi nibbānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3944_1: gavesanto vicarāmi, ajjeva mayā gharāvāsaṃ chaḍḍetvā nikkhamma pabbajitvā nibbānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3944_2: gavesituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. “Ayaṃ imissā ācariyabhāgo hotū”ti muttāhāraṃ kaṇṭhato omuñcitvā
atk-s0511a:3944_3: kisāgotamiyā satasahassagghanikaṃ paramaratikaraṃ muttāhāraṃ pesesi. Sā “siddhatthakumāro
atk-s0511a:3944_4: mayi paṭibaddhahadayo hutvā paṇṇākāraṃ pesesī”ti somanassajātā ahosi.
atk-s0511a:3945_0: Bodhisattopi mahatā sirisamudayena paramaramaṇīyaṃ pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā sirisayane
atk-s0511a:3945_5: madhuraravāni turiyāni gahetvā mahāpurisaṃ samparivāretvā ramāpayantiyo naccagītavāditāni
atk-s0511a:3945_6: payojayiṃsu. Bodhisatto pana kilesesu virattacittatāya naccagītādīsu anabhirato muhuttaṃ niddaṃ okkami.
atk-s0511a:3946_0: Tā taṃ disvā “yassatthāya naccādīni mayaṃ payojema, so niddaṃ upagato, idāni kimatthaṃ
atk-s0511a:3946_1: kilamāmā”ti gahitāni turiyāni ajjhottharitvā nipajjiṃsu, gandhatelappadīpā ca jhāyanti.
atk-s0511a:3946_2: Bodhisatto pabujjhitvā sayanapiṭṭhe pallaṅkena nisinno addasa tā itthiyo turiyabhaṇḍāni
atk-s0511a:3946_3: avattharitvā niddāyantiyo paggharitalālā kilinnakapolagattā, ekaccā dante khādantiyo,
atk-s0511a:3946_4: ekaccā kākacchantiyo, ekaccā vippalapantiyo, ekaccā vivaṭamukhā, ekaccā apagatavasanarasanā,
atk-s0511a:3946_6: sayiṃsu. Mahāsatto tāsaṃ taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā bhiyyosomattāya kāmesu virattacitto
atk-s0511a:3946_7: ahosi. Tassa pana alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ dasasatanayanabhavanasadisaṃ rucirasobhampi
atk-s0511a:3946_9: upaṭṭhāsi. Tayopi bhavā ādittabhavanasadisā hutvā upaṭṭhahiṃsu. “Upaddutaṃ vata,
atk-s0511a:3946_10: bho, upassaṭṭhaṃ vata bho”ti ca vācaṃ pavattesi. Ativiya pabbajjāya cittaṃ nami.
atk-s0511a:3947_0: So “ajjeva mayā mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sirisayanato uṭṭhāya dvārasamīpaṃ
atk-s0511a:3947_1: gantvā – “ko etthā”ti āha. Ummāre sīsaṃ katvā nipanno channo āha – “ahaṃ, ayyaputta,
atk-s0511a:3947_2: channo”ti. Atha mahāpuriso – “ahaṃ ajja mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitukāmo, na kañci
atk-s0511a:3947_3: paṭiveditvā sīghamekaṃ atijayaṃ sindhavaṃ kappehī”ti. So “sādhu, devā”ti assabhaṇḍakaṃ
atk-s0511a:3947_4: gahetvā assasālaṃ gantvā gandhatelappadīpesu jalantesu sumanapaṭṭavitānassa heṭṭhā
atk-s0511a:3947_5: paramaramaṇīye bhūmibhāge ṭhitaṃ arimanthakaṃ kaṇḍakaṃ turaṅgavaraṃ disvā – “ajja
atk-s0511a:3947_6: mayā ayyaputtassa nikkhamanatthāya imameva maṅgalahayaṃ kappetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti kaṇḍakaṃ
atk-s0511a:3947_7: kappesi. So kappiyamānova aññāsi – “ayaṃ kappanā atigāḷhā, aññesu divasesu uyyānakīḷaṃ
atk-s0511a:3947_8: gamanakāle kappanā viya na hoti. Nissaṃsayaṃ ajjeva ayyaputto mahābhinikkhamanaṃ
atk-s0511a:3947_9: nikkhamissatī”ti. Tato tuṭṭhamānaso mahāhasitaṃ hasi. So nādo taṃ sakalakapilavatthupuraṃ
atk-s0511a:3947_10: unnādaṃ kareyya, devatā pana sannirumbhitvā na kassaci sotuṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3948_0: Bodhisatto “puttaṃ tāva passissāmī”ti cintetvā ṭhitaṭṭhānato uṭṭhāya rāhulamātuyā
atk-s0511a:3948_1: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā gabbhadvāraṃ vivari. Tasmiṃ khaṇe antogabbhe gandhatelappadīpo
atk-s0511a:3948_2: jhāyati. Rāhulamātā sumanamallikādīnaṃ ambaṇamattena attippakiṇṇe varasayane puttassa
atk-s0511a:3948_3: matthake hatthaṃ ṭhapetvā niddāyati. Bodhisatto ummāre pādaṃ ṭhapetvā ṭhitakova oloketvā
atk-s0511a:3948_4: – “sacāhaṃ deviyā hatthaṃ apanetvā mama puttaṃ gaṇhissāmi, devī pabujjhissati, evaṃ
atk-s0511a:3948_5: me abhinikkhamanassa antarāyo bhavissati. Buddho hutvāva āgantvā puttaṃ passissāmī”ti
atk-s0511a:3948_6: cintetvā pāsādatalato otaritvā assassa samīpaṃ gantvā evamāha – “tāta kaṇḍaka, tvaṃ
atk-s0511a:3948_7: ajja ekarattiṃ maṃ tāraya, ahaṃ taṃ nissāya buddho hutvā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ tāressāmī”ti.
atk-s0511a:3948_8: Tato ullaṅghitvā kaṇḍakassa piṭṭhiṃ abhiruhi. Kaṇḍako gīvato paṭṭhāya āyāmato aṭṭhārasahattho
atk-s0511a:3948_9: hoti tadanurūpena ubbedhena samannāgato rūpaggajavabalasampanno sabbaseto dhotasaṅkhasadisadassanīyavaṇṇo.
atk-s0511a:3948_10: Tato bodhisatto varaturaṅgapiṭṭhigato channaṃ assassa vāladhiṃ gāhāpetvā aḍḍharattasamaye
atk-s0511a:3949_0: Tadā pana rājā pubbeva bodhisattassa gamanapaṭisedhanatthāya dvīsu dvārakavāṭesu
atk-s0511a:3949_1: ekekaṃ purisasahassena vivaritabbaṃ kāretvā tattha bahupurise ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi. Bodhisatto
atk-s0511a:3949_2: kira purisagaṇanāya koṭisatasahassassa balaṃ dhāresi, hatthigaṇanāya koṭisahassassa.
atk-s0511a:3949_3: Tasmā so cintesi – “yadi dvāraṃ na vivarīyati, ajja kaṇḍakassa piṭṭhe nisinno channaṃ
atk-s0511a:3949_4: vāladhiṃ gāhāpetvā tena saddhiṃyeva kaṇḍakaṃ ūrūhi nippīḷetvā aṭṭhārasahatthaṃ pākāraṃ
atk-s0511a:3949_5: uppatitvā atikkameyya”nti. Channo cintesi – “sace dvāraṃ na ugghāpayati, ahaṃ ayyaputtaṃ
atk-s0511a:3949_6: khandhe katvā kaṇḍakaṃ dakkhiṇahatthena parikkhipanto upakacchake katvā uppatitvā
atk-s0511a:3949_7: pākāraṃ atikkamissāmī”ti. Kaṇḍako cintesi – “ahaṃ dvāre avivariyamāne yathānisinnameva
atk-s0511a:3949_8: ayyaputtaṃ gahitavāladhinā channena saddhiṃ uppatitvā pākārassa purato patiṭṭhahissāmī”ti.
atk-s0511a:3949_9: Evameva tayo purisā cintayiṃsu. Dvāre adhivatthā devatā mahādvāraṃ vivariṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3950: Tasmiṃ khaṇe māro pāpimā “mahāsattaṃ nivattessāmī”ti āgantvā gaganatale ṭhatvā āha –
atk-s0511a:3951: “Mā nikkhama mahāvīra, ito te sattame dine;
atk-s0511a:3952: Dibbaṃ tu cakkaratanaṃ, addhā pātu bhavissati. –
atk-s0511a:3953: Dvisahassaparittadīpaparivārānaṃ catunnaṃ mahādīpānaṃ rajjaṃ kāressasi, nivatta, mārisā”ti. Mahāpuriso āha “kosi tva”nti. Ahaṃ vasavattīti.
atk-s0511a:3955: Anatthikohaṃ rajjena, gaccha tvaṃ māra mā idha.
atk-s0511a:3959_0: Mahāsatto ekūnattiṃsavassakāle hatthagataṃ cakkavattirajjaṃ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya anapekkho
atk-s0511a:3959_1: chaḍḍetvā cakkavattisirinivāsabhūtā rājabhavanā nikkhamitvā āsāḷhipuṇṇamāya uttarāsāḷhanakkhatte
atk-s0511a:3959_2: vattamāne nagarato nikkhamitvā nagaraṃ apaloketukāmo ahosi. Vitakkasamanantarameva
atk-s0511a:3959_3: cassa kulālacakkaṃ viya so bhūmippadeso parivatti. Yathāṭhitova mahāsatto kapilavatthupuraṃ
atk-s0511a:3959_4: disvā tassiṃ bhūmippadese kaṇḍakanivattanaṃ nāma cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā gantabbamagābhimukhaṃyeva
atk-s0511a:3959_5: kaṇḍakaṃ katvā pāyāsi mahatā sakkārena uḷārena sirisamudayena. Tadā mahāsatte gacchante
atk-s0511a:3959_6: tassa purato devatā saṭṭhi ukkāsatasahassāni dhārayiṃsu, tathā pacchato saṭṭhi dakkhiṇato
atk-s0511a:3959_7: saṭṭhi ukkāsatasahassāni, tathā vāmapassato. Aparā devatā surabhikusumamālādāmacandanacuṇṇacāmaradhajapaṭākāhi
atk-s0511a:3959_8: sakkarontiyo parivāretvā agamaṃsu. Dibbāni saṅgītāni anekāni ca turiyāni vajjiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3960_0: Iminā sirisamudayena gacchanto bodhisatto ekaratteneva tīṇi rajjāni atikkamma tiṃsayojanikaṃ
atk-s0511a:3960_1: maggaṃ gantvā anomānadītīraṃ sampāpuṇi. Atha bodhisatto nadītīre ṭhatvā channaṃ pucchi
atk-s0511a:3960_2: – “kā nāmāyaṃ nadī”ti? “Anomā nāma, devā”ti. “Amhākampi pabbajjā anomā bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0511a:3960_3: paṇhiyā assaṃ ghaṭṭento assassa saññaṃ adāsi. Asso ullaṅghitvā aṭṭhausabhavitthārāya
atk-s0511a:3960_4: nadiyā pārimatīre aṭṭhāsi. Bodhisatto assapiṭṭhito oruyha muttarāsisadise vālukāpuline
atk-s0511a:3960_5: ṭhatvā channaṃ āmantesi – “samma channa, tvaṃ mayhaṃ ābharaṇāni ceva kaṇḍakañca ādāya
atk-s0511a:3960_6: gaccha, ahaṃ pabbajissāmī”ti. Channo, “ahampi, deva, pabbajissāmī”ti. Bodhisatto
atk-s0511a:3960_7: āha – “na labbhā tayā pabbajituṃ, gaccheva tva”nti tikkhattuṃ nivāretvā ābharaṇāni
atk-s0511a:3960_8: ceva kaṇḍakañca paṭicchāpetvā cintesi – “ime mayhaṃ kesā samaṇasāruppā na honti,
atk-s0511a:3960_9: te khaggena chindissāmī”ti dakkhiṇena hatthena paramanisitamasivaraṃ gahetvā vāmahatthena
atk-s0511a:3960_10: moḷiyā saddhiṃ cūḷaṃ gahetvā chindi, kesā dvaṅgulamattā hutvā dakkhiṇato āvaṭṭamānā
atk-s0511a:3960_11: sīse allīyiṃsu. Tesaṃ pana kesānaṃ yāvajīvaṃ tadeva pamāṇaṃ ahosi, massu ca tadanurūpaṃ,
atk-s0511a:3960_12: puna kesamassuohāraṇakiccampissa nāhosi. Bodhisatto saha moḷiyā cūḷaṃ gahetvā – “sacāhaṃ
atk-s0511a:3960_13: buddho bhavissāmi, ākāse tiṭṭhatu, no ce, bhūmiyaṃ patatū”ti ākāse khipi. Taṃ cūḷāmaṇibandhanaṃ
atk-s0511a:3961: Atha sakko devarājā dibbena cakkhunā olokento yojanikena ratanacaṅkoṭakena taṃ paṭiggahetvā tāvatiṃsabhavane tiyojanaṃ sattaratanamayaṃ cūḷāmaṇicetiyaṃ nāma patiṭṭhāpesi. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a:3964_0: Puna bodhisatto cintesi – “imāni kāsikavatthāni mahagghāni, na mayhaṃ samaṇasāruppānī”ti.
atk-s0511a:3964_1: Athassa kassapabuddhakāle purāṇasahāyako ghaṭikāramahābrahmā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ vināsabhāvāppattena
atk-s0511a:3964_2: mittabhāvena cintesi – “ajja me sahāyako mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhanto, samaṇaparikkhāramassa
atk-s0511a:3965: “Ticīvarañca patto ca, vāsi sūci ca bandhanaṃ;
atk-s0511a:3967_0: Ime aṭṭha samaṇaparikkhāre āharitvā adāsi. Mahāpuriso arahaddhajaṃ nivāsetvā uttamaṃ
atk-s0511a:3967_1: pabbajjāvesaṃ gahetvā sāṭakayugalaṃ ākāse khipi. Taṃ mahābrahmā paṭiggahetvā brahmaloke
atk-s0511a:3967_2: dvādasayojanikaṃ sabbaratanamayaṃ cetiyaṃ katvā taṃ anto pakkhipitvā ṭhapesi. Atha
atk-s0511a:3967_3: naṃ mahāsatto – “channa, mama vacanena mātāpitūnaṃ ārogyaṃ vadehī”ti vatvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0511a:3967_4: Tato channo mahāpurisaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi. Kaṇḍako pana channena
atk-s0511a:3967_5: saddhiṃ mantayamānassa bodhisattassa vacanaṃ suṇanto ṭhatvā – “natthi dāni mayhaṃ
atk-s0511a:3967_6: puna sāmino dassana”nti cakkhupathamassa vijahanto viyogadukkhamadhivāsetuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0511a:3967_7: hadayena phalitena kālaṃ katvā suraripudurabhibhavane tāvatiṃsabhavane kaṇḍako nāma
atk-s0511a:3967_8: devaputto hutvā nibbatti. Tassa uppatti vimalatthavilāsiniyā vimānavatthuṭṭhakathāya
atk-s0511a:3967_9: gahetabbā. Channassa paṭhamaṃ ekova soko ahosi. So kaṇḍakassa kālakiriyāya dutiyena
atk-s0511a:3967_10: sokena pīḷiyamāno rodanto paridevanto dukkhena agamāsi.
atk-s0511a:3968_0: Bodhisattopi pabbajitvā tasmiṃyeva padese anupiyaṃ nāma ambavanaṃ atthi, tattheva
atk-s0511a:3968_1: sattāhaṃ pabbajjāsukhena vītināmetvā tato pacchā sañjhāppabhānurañjitasaliladharasaṃvuto
atk-s0511a:3968_2: saradasamaye paripuṇṇarajanikaro viya kāsāvavarasaṃvuto ekakopi anekajanaparivuto
atk-s0511a:3968_3: viya virocamāno taṃ vanavāsimigapakkhīnaṃ nayanāmatapānamiva karonto ekacaro sīho
atk-s0511a:3968_4: viya narasīho mattamātaṅgavilāsagāmī samassāsento viya vasundharaṃ pādatalehi ekadivaseneva
atk-s0511a:3968_5: tiṃsayojanikaṃ maggaṃ gantvā uttuṅgataraṅgabhaṅgaṃ asaṅgaṃ gaṅgaṃ nadiṃ uttaritvā
atk-s0511a:3968_7: ca pana sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya cari. Sakalaṃ pana taṃ nagaraṃ bodhisattassa rūpadassanena
atk-s0511a:3968_8: dhanapālake paviṭṭhe taṃ nagaraṃ viya asurinde paviṭṭhe devanagaraṃ viya saṅkhobhamagamāsi.
atk-s0511a:3968_9: Piṇḍāya carante mahāpurise nagaravāsino manussā mahāsattassa rūpadassanena sañjātapītisomanassā
atk-s0511a:3969_0: Tesaṃ manussānaṃ aññataro aññataramevamāha – “kinnu yaṃ, bho, rāhubhayena nigūḷhakiraṇajālo
atk-s0511a:3969_1: puṇṇacando manussalokamāgato”ti. Tamañño sitaṃ katvā evamāha – “kiṃ kathesi, samma,
atk-s0511a:3969_2: kadā nāma tayā puṇṇacando manussalokamāgato diṭṭhapubbo, nanu esa kusumaketukāmadevo
atk-s0511a:3969_3: vesantaramādāya amhākaṃ mahārājassa nāgarānañca paramalīḷāvibhūtiṃ disvā kīḷitumāgato”ti.
atk-s0511a:3969_4: Tamañño sitaṃ katvā evamāha – “kiṃ, bho, tvaṃ ummattosi, nanu kāmo issarakodhahutāsanaparidaḍḍhasarīro
atk-s0511a:3969_5: surapatidasasatanayano eso amarapurasaññāya idhāgato”ti! Tamañño īsakaṃ hasitvā –
atk-s0511a:3969_6: “kiṃ vadesi, bho, te pubbāparavirodhaṃ, kuto panassa dasasatanayanāni, kuto vajiraṃ,
atk-s0511a:3969_7: kuto erāvaṇo. Addhā brahmā esa brāhmaṇajanaṃ pamattaṃ ñatvā vedavedaṅgādīsu niyojanatthāya
atk-s0511a:3969_8: āgato”ti. Te sabbepi apasādetvā añño paṇḍitajātiko evamāha – “nevāyaṃ puṇṇacando,
atk-s0511a:3969_9: na ca kāmadevo, nāpi dasasatanayano, na cāpi brahmā, sabbalokanāyako satthā esa acchariyamanusso”ti.
atk-s0511a:3970_0: Evaṃ sallapantesu eva nāgaresu rājapurisā gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño bimbisārassa
atk-s0511a:3970_1: ārocesuṃ – “deva, devo vā gandhabbo vā udāhu nāgarājā vā yakkho vā ko nu vā amhākaṃ
atk-s0511a:3970_2: nagare piṇḍāya caratī”ti. Rājā taṃ sutvā uparipāsādatale ṭhatvā mahāpurisaṃ disvā
atk-s0511a:3970_3: acchariyabbhutacittajāto rājapurise āṇāpesi – “gacchatha, bhaṇe, taṃ vīmaṃsatha,
atk-s0511a:3970_4: sace amanusso bhavissati, nagarā nikkhamitvā antaradhāyissati, sace devatā bhavissati,
atk-s0511a:3970_5: ākāsena gamissati, sace nāgarājā bhavissati, pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā gamissati, sace
atk-s0511a:3971_0: Mahāpurisopi santindriyo santamānaso rūpasobhāya mahājanassa nayanāni ākaḍḍhento
atk-s0511a:3971_1: viya yugamattaṃ pekkhamāno missakabhattaṃ yāpanamattaṃ saṃharitvā paviṭṭhadvāreneva
atk-s0511a:3971_2: nagarā nikkhamitvā paṇḍavapabbatacchāyāya puratthābhimukho nisīditvā āhāraṃ paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0511a:3971_3: nibbikāro paribhuñji. Tato rājapurisā gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesuṃ. Tato dūtavacanaṃ
atk-s0511a:3971_4: sutvā magadhādhipati rājā bālajanehi duranusāro merumandārasāro sattasāro bimbisāro
atk-s0511a:3971_5: bodhisattassa guṇassavaneneva sañjātadassanakutūhalo vegena nagarato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0511a:3971_6: paṇḍavapabbatābhimukho gantvā yānā oruyha bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā tena katānuñño
atk-s0511a:3971_7: bandhujanasinehasītale silātale nisīditvā bodhisattassa iriyāpathe pasīditvā katapaṭisanthāro
atk-s0511a:3971_8: nāmagottādīni pucchitvā bodhisattassa sabbaṃ issariyaṃ niyyātesi. Bodhisatto – “mayhaṃ,
atk-s0511a:3971_9: mahārāja, vatthukāmehi vā kilesakāmehi vā attho natthi. Ahañhi paramābhisambodhiṃ
atk-s0511a:3971_10: patthayanto nikkhanto”ti āha. Rājā anekappakārena yācantopi tassa cittaṃ alabhitvā
atk-s0511a:3971_11: – “addhā buddho bhavissati, buddhabhūtena pana tayā paṭhamaṃ mama vijitaṃ āgantabba”nti
atk-s0511a:3972: “Atha rājagahaṃ vararājagahaṃ, nararājavare nagaraṃ tu gate;
atk-s0511a:3974_0: Atha bodhisatto anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno āḷārañca kālāmaṃ udakañca rāmaputtaṃ
atk-s0511a:3974_1: upasaṅkamitvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā – “nāyaṃ maggo bodhiyā”ti taṃ samāpattibhāvanaṃ
atk-s0511a:3974_2: analaṅkaritvā mahāpadhānaṃ padahitukāmo uruvelaṃ gantvā – “ramaṇīyo vatāyaṃ bhūmibhāgo”ti
atk-s0511a:3974_3: tattheva vāsaṃ upagantvā mahāpadhānaṃ padahi. Lakkhaṇapariggāhakabrāhmaṇānaṃ cattāro
atk-s0511a:3974_4: puttā koṇḍañño brāhmaṇo cāti ime pañca janā paṭhamaṃyeva pabbajitā gāmanigamarājadhānīsu
atk-s0511a:3974_5: bhikkhācariyaṃ carantā tattha bodhisattaṃ sampāpuṇiṃsu. Atha naṃ chabbassāni mahāpadhānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3974_6: padahantaṃ – “idāni buddho bhavissati, idāni buddho bhavissatī”ti pariveṇasammajjanādikāya
atk-s0511a:3974_8: dukkaraṃ karissāmī”ti ekatilataṇḍulādīhi vītināmesi. Sabbasopi āhārupacchedaṃ akāsi.
