atk-s0511a:3975_0: Athassa tāya nirāhāratāya paramakisabhāvappattakāyassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇo kāyo kāḷavaṇṇo
atk-s0511a:3975_1: ahosi, dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni paṭicchannāni ahesuṃ. Atha bodhisatto dukkarakārikāya
atk-s0511a:3975_2: antaṃ gantvā – “nāyaṃ maggo bodhiyā”ti oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āhāretuṃ gāmanigamesu piṇḍāya
atk-s0511a:3975_3: caritvā āhāraṃ āhari. Athassa dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni pākatikāni ahesuṃ, kāyo
atk-s0511a:3975_4: suvaṇṇavaṇṇo ahosi. Atha pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū taṃ disvā – “ayaṃ chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ
atk-s0511a:3975_5: karontopi sabbaññutaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ nāsakkhi, idāni gāmanigamarājadhānīsu piṇḍāya
atk-s0511a:3975_6: caritvā oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āhariyamāno kiṃ sakkhissati, bāhulliko esa padhānavibbhanto,
atk-s0511a:3975_7: kiṃ no iminā”ti mahāpurisaṃ pahāya bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatanaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3976_0: Atha mahāpuriso visākhapuṇṇamāya uruvelāyaṃ senānigame senākuṭumbikassa gehe nibbattā
atk-s0511a:3976_1: sujātā nāma dārikā ahosi. Tāya sampasādanajātāya dinnaṃ pakkhittadibbojaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ
atk-s0511a:3976_2: paribhuñjitvā suvaṇṇapātiṃ gahetvā nerañjarāya paṭisotaṃ khipitvā kāḷanāgarājaṃ supantaṃ
atk-s0511a:3976_3: bodhesi. Atha bodhisatto nerañjarātīre surabhikusumasamalaṅkate nīlobhāse manorame
atk-s0511a:3976_4: sālavane divāvihāraṃ katvā sāyanhasamaye devatāhi alaṅkatena maggena bodhirukkhābhimukho
atk-s0511a:3976_5: pāyāsi. Devanāgayakkhasiddhādayo dibbehi mālāgandhavilepanehi pūjayiṃsu. Tasmiṃ samaye
atk-s0511a:3976_6: sotthiyo nāma tiṇahārako tiṇaṃ ādāya paṭipathe āgacchanto mahāpurisassa ākāraṃ ñatvā
atk-s0511a:3976_7: aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo adāsi. Bodhisatto tiṇaṃ gahetvā asitañjanagirisaṅkāsaṃ ācarantamiva
atk-s0511a:3976_9: mandamāruteritāya ghanasākhāya samalaṅkataṃ naccantamiva pītiyā rañjamānamiva ca
atk-s0511a:3976_11: tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pubbuttaradisābhāge ṭhito tāni tiṇāni agge gahetvā cālesi.
atk-s0511a:3976_12: Tāvadeva cuddasahattho pallaṅko ahosi. Tāni ca tiṇāni cittakārena lekhāgahitāni viya
atk-s0511a:3976_13: ahesuṃ. Bodhisatto tattha cuddasahatthe tiṇasanthare tisandhipallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
atk-s0511a:3976_15: ca paññāsahatthaṃ bodhikkhandhaṃ piṭṭhito katvā upari maṇichattena viya bodhisākhāhi
atk-s0511a:3976_16: dhāriyamāno nisīdi. Suvaṇṇavaṇṇe panassa cīvare bodhiaṅkurā patamānā suvaṇṇapaṭṭe
atk-s0511a:3977_0: Bodhisatte pana tattha nisinneyeva vasavattimāro devaputto – “siddhatthakumāro mama
atk-s0511a:3977_1: visayamatikkamitukāmo, na dānāhamatikkamitumassa dassāmī”ti mārabalassa tamatthaṃ
atk-s0511a:3977_2: ārocetvā mārabalamādāya nikkhami. Sā kira mārasenā mārassa purato dvādasayojanā ahosi,
atk-s0511a:3977_3: tathā dakkhiṇato ca vāmapassato ca, pacchato pana cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ katvā ṭhitā,
atk-s0511a:3977_4: uddhaṃ navayojanubbedhā ahosi. Yassā pana unnadantiyā saddo navayojanasahassato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0511a:3977_5: pathaviundriyanasaddo viya suyyati. Tasmiṃ samaye sakko devarājā vijayuttaraṃ nāma
atk-s0511a:3977_6: saṅkhaṃ dhamamāno aṭṭhāsi. So kira saṅkho vīsahatthasatiko ahosi. Pañcasikho gandhabbadevaputto
atk-s0511a:3977_7: tigāvutāyataṃ beḷuvapaṇḍuvīṇaṃ ādāya vādayamāno maṅgalayuttāni gītāni gāyamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:3977_8: Suyāmo devarājā tigāvutāyataṃ saradasamayarajanikarasassirikaṃ dibbacāmaraṃ gahetvā
atk-s0511a:3977_9: mandaṃ mandaṃ bījayamāno aṭṭhāsi. Brahmā ca sahampati tiyojanavitthataṃ dutiyamiva
atk-s0511a:3977_10: puṇṇacandaṃ setacchattaṃ bhagavato uddhaṃ dhāretvā aṭṭhāsi. Mahākāḷopi nāgarājā asītiyā
atk-s0511a:3977_11: nāganāṭakasahassehi parivuto thutisaṅgītāni pavattento mahāsattaṃ namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:3977_12: Dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu devatāyo nānāvidhehi surabhikusumadāmadhūpacuṇṇādīhi pūjayamānā
atk-s0511a:3978_0: Atha māro devaputto diyaḍḍhayojanasatikaṃ himagirisikharasadisaṃ paramaruciradassanaṃ
atk-s0511a:3978_1: girimekhalaṃ nāma ratanakhacitavaravāraṇaṃ arivāraṇavāraṇaṃ abhiruhitvā bāhusahassaṃ
atk-s0511a:3978_2: māpetvā aggahitaggahaṇena nānāvudhāni aggahāpesi. Māraparisāpi asipharasusarasattisabalā
atk-s0511a:3978_5: ca nānābhīmavirūpabībhacchakāyā manussayakkhapisācasadisakāyā ca mahāsattaṃ bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0511a:3978_6: bodhimūle nisinnaṃ ajjhottharamānā gantvā parivārayitvā mārassa sandesaṃ samudikkhamānā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:3979_0: Tato mārabale bodhimaṇḍamupasaṅkamanteyeva tesaṃ sakkādīnaṃ ekopi ṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0511a:3979_1: Sammukhasammukhaṭṭhāneneva palāyiṃsu. Sakko pana devarājā taṃ vijayuttarasaṅkhaṃ
atk-s0511a:3979_2: piṭṭhiyaṃ katvā palāyitvā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Mahābrahmā setacchattaṃ
atk-s0511a:3979_3: cakkavāḷakoṭiyaṃ ṭhapetvā brahmalokameva agamāsi. Kāḷo nāgarājā sabbanāṭakāni chaḍḍetvā
atk-s0511a:3979_4: pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā pañcayojanasatikaṃ mañjerikanāgabhavanaṃ gantvā hatthena mukhaṃ
atk-s0511a:3979_5: pidahitvā nipajji. Ekadevatāpi tattha ṭhātuṃ samatthā nāma nāhosi. Mahāpuriso pana
atk-s0511a:3979_6: suññavimāne mahābrahmā viya ekakova nisīdi. “Idāni māro āgamissatī”ti paṭhamameva
atk-s0511a:3981: Ukkā samantā nipatiṃsu ghorā, dhūmandhakārā ca disā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3982: “Acetanāyampi sacetanā yathā, gatā viyogaṃ patineva kāminī;
atk-s0511a:3983: Lateva vātābhihatā sasāgarā, pakampi nānāsadharā dharā mahī.
atk-s0511a:3985: Kūṭāni nānātarusaṅghaṭāni, bhetvā girīnaṃ pathaviṃ bhajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3986: “Pavāyi vāto pharuso samantā, nighaṭṭasaddo tumulo ahosi;
atk-s0511a:3987: Bhajittha ghoraṃ ravirandhakāraṃ, kabandharūpaṃ gagane carittha.
atk-s0511a:3989: Anekarūpaṃ kira dunnimittaṃ, ahosi mārāgamane samantā.
atk-s0511a:3990: “Taṃ devadevaṃ abhihantukāmaṃ, kāmaṃ tu disvā pana devasaṅghā;
atk-s0511a:3991: Hāhāti saddaṃ anukampamānā, akaṃsu saddhiṃ amaraṅganāhi.
atk-s0511a:3993: Saantakaṃ taṃ sabalaṃ anekaṃ, hatthe ca tharū ca pātā tayiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3994: “Vihaṅgamānaṃ garuḷova majjhe, majjhe migānaṃ paramova sīho;
atk-s0511a:3995: Mahāyaso mārabalassa majjhe, visārado vītabhayo nisīdi”.
atk-s0511a:3996_0: Atha māro – “siddhatthaṃ bhiṃsāpetvā palāpessāmī”ti vātavassaṃ paharaṇavassaṃ pāsāṇavassaṃ
atk-s0511a:3996_1: puna aṅgārakukkuḷavālukakalalandhakāravuṭṭhīhi navahi māraiddhīhi bodhisattaṃ palāpetuṃ
atk-s0511a:3996_2: asakkonto kuddhamānaso – “kiṃ, bhaṇe, tiṭṭhatha, imaṃ siddhatthamasiddhatthaṃ karotha,
atk-s0511a:3996_3: gaṇhatha hanatha chindatha bandhatha na muñcatha palāpethā”ti māraparisaṃ āṇāpetvā
atk-s0511a:3996_4: sayañca girimekhalassa khandhe nisīditvā ekena karena saraṃ bhamayanto bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0511a:3996_5: upasaṅkamitvā – “bho siddhattha, uṭṭhaha pallaṅkā”ti āha. Māraparisāpi mahāsattassa
atk-s0511a:3996_6: atighoraṃ pīḷamakāsi. Atha mahāpuriso – “kadā te pūritā, māra, pallaṅkatthāya pāramī”tiādīni
atk-s0511a:3996_7: vacanāni vatvā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pathaviṃ ninnāmesi. Taṅkhaṇaññeva cuddasasahassādhikāni
atk-s0511a:3996_8: dasasatasahassayojanabahalāni pathavisandhārakāni vātudakāni paṭhamaṃ kampetvā tadantaraṃ
atk-s0511a:3996_9: catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalā ayaṃ mahāpathavī chadhā pakampittha. Upari
atk-s0511a:3996_10: ākāse anekasahassāni vijjulatā ca asanī ca phaliṃsu. Atha girimekhaladirado jaṇṇukena
atk-s0511a:3996_11: pati. Māro girimekhalakkhandhe nisinno bhūmiyaṃ pati. Māraparisāpi disāvidisāsu bhusamuṭṭhi viya vikiriṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3997_0: Atha mahāpurisopi taṃ samāraṃ mārabalaṃ khantimettāvīriyapaññādīnaṃ attano pāramīnamānubhāvena
atk-s0511a:3997_1: viddhaṃsetvā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā
atk-s0511a:3997_2: paccūsasamaye sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇe paccayākāre ñāṇaṃ otāretvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3997_3: nibbattetvā tameva pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā adhigatena
atk-s0511a:3997_4: catutthamaggena sabbakilese khepetvā sabbabuddhaguṇe paṭivijjhitvā sabbabuddhāciṇṇaṃ –
atk-s0511a:4001: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-s0511a:4005_0: Udānaṃ udānetvā nisinnassa bhagavato etadahosi – “ahaṃ kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri
atk-s0511a:4005_1: asaṅkhyeyyāni imassa pallaṅkassa kāraṇā sandhāviṃ, ayaṃ me pallaṅko vijayapallaṅko
atk-s0511a:4005_2: maṅgalapallaṅko, ettha me nisinnassa yāva saṅkappo na paripuṇṇo, na tāva ito vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti
atk-s0511a:4005_3: anekakoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā samāpattiyo samāpajjanto sattāhaṃ tattheva nisīdi. Yaṃ
atk-s0511a:4005_4: sandhāya vuttaṃ – “atha kho bhagavā sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedī”ti.
atk-s0511a:4006_0: Athekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ – “ajjāpi tāva nūna siddhatthassa kattabbakiccaṃ atthi. Pallaṅkasmiñhi
atk-s0511a:4006_1: ālayaṃ na vijahatī”ti parivitakko udapādi. Atha satthā devatānaṃ vitakkaṃ ñatvā tāsaṃ
atk-s0511a:4006_2: vitakkūpasamanatthaṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi. Evaṃ iminā pāṭihāriyena
atk-s0511a:4006_3: devatānaṃ vitakkaṃ vūpasametvā pallaṅkato īsakaṃ pācīnanissite uttaradisābhāge ṭhatvā
atk-s0511a:4006_4: – “imasmiṃ vata me pallaṅke sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭividdha”nti cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0511a:4006_5: kappasatasahassañca pūritānaṃ pāramīnaṃ phalādhigamanaṭṭhānaṃ pallaṅkañca bodhirukkhañca
atk-s0511a:4006_6: animisehi akkhīhi olokayamāno sattāhaṃ vītināmesi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ animisacetiyaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0511a:4007: Atha pallaṅkassa ca ṭhitaṭṭhānassa ca antarā caṅkamaṃ māpetvā puratthimapacchimato āyate ratanacaṅkame caṅkamanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ ratanacaṅkamacetiyaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0511a:4008_0: Catutthe pana sattāhe bodhito pacchimuttaradisābhāge devatā ratanagharaṃ māpayiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:4008_1: Tattha pallaṅkena nisīditvā abhidhammapiṭakaṃ vicinanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi, taṃ
atk-s0511a:4009_0: Evaṃ bhagavā bodhisamīpeyeva cattāri sattāhāni vītināmetvā pañcame sattāhe bodhirukkhamūlā
atk-s0511a:4009_1: yena ajapālanigrodho tenupasaṅkami. Tatrāpi dhammaṃ vicinanto vimuttisukhañca paṭisaṃvedento nisīdi.
atk-s0511a:4010_0: Satthā tattha sattāhaṃ vītināmetvā mucalindamūlaṃ agamāsi. Tattha sattāhavaddalikāya
atk-s0511a:4010_1: uppannāya sītādipaṭibāhanatthaṃ mucalindena nāgarājena sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhitto
atk-s0511a:4010_2: asambādhāya gandhakuṭiyā viharanto viya vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvediyamāno tattha sattāhaṃ
atk-s0511a:4010_3: vītināmetvā rājāyatanamūlaṃ upasaṅkami. Tatthapi vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvediyamānova
atk-s0511a:4010_4: sattāhaṃ nisīdi. Ettāvatā satta sattāhāni paripuṇṇāni. Etthantare bhagavato neva
atk-s0511a:4010_5: mukhadhovanaṃ na sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ nāhārakiccaṃ ahosi, phalasukheneva vītivattesi.
atk-s0511a:4010_6: Atha sattasattāhamatthake ekūnapaññāsatime divase sakkena devānamindena upanītena
atk-s0511a:4010_7: nāgalatādantakaṭṭhena ca anotattadahodakena ca mukhaṃ dhovitvā tattheva rājāyatanamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0511a:4011_0: Tasmiṃ samaye tapussabhallikā nāma dve vāṇijā ñātisālohitāya devatāya satthu āhāradāne
atk-s0511a:4011_1: ussāhitā manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca ādāya – “paṭiggaṇhātu bhagavā imaṃ āhāraṃ anukampaṃ
atk-s0511a:4011_2: upādāyā”ti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Bhagavā pāyāsapaṭiggahaṇadivaseyeva
atk-s0511a:4011_3: devadattiyassa pattassa antarahitattā – “na kho tathāgatā hatthesu āhāraṃ paṭiggaṇhanti,
atk-s0511a:4011_4: kimhi nu kho ahaṃ imaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya”nti cintesi. Athassa bhagavato ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā
atk-s0511a:4011_5: catūhi disāhi cattāro mahārājāno indanīlamaṇimaye cattāro patte upanāmesuṃ. Bhagavā
atk-s0511a:4011_6: te paṭikkhipi. Puna muggavaṇṇe silāmaye cattāro patte upanāmesuṃ. Bhagavā tesaṃ catunnampi
atk-s0511a:4011_7: devaputtānaṃ anukampaṃ upādāya paṭiggahetvā ekībhāvaṃ upanetvā tasmiṃ paccagghe selamaye
atk-s0511a:4011_8: patte āhāraṃ paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjitvā anumodanamakāsi. Te dve bhātaro vāṇijā buddhañca
atk-s0511a:4011_9: dhammañca saraṇaṃ gantvā dvevācikā upāsakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:4012_0: Atha satthā puna ajapālanigrodhameva gantvā nigrodhamūle nisīdi. Athassa tattha nisinnamattasseva
atk-s0511a:4012_1: adhigatassa dhammassa gambhīrataṃ paccavekkhantassa sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇo – “adhigato
atk-s0511a:4012_2: kho myāyaṃ dhammo”tiādinā paresaṃ dhammaṃ adesetukāmatākārappatto parivitakko udapādi.
atk-s0511a:4012_3: Atha brahmā sahampati “nassati vata bho loko, vinassati vata bho loko”ti dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu
atk-s0511a:4012_5: santikaṃ āgantvā – “desetu, bhante, bhagavā dhamma”ntiādinā nayena dhammadesanaṃ āyāci.
atk-s0511a:4013_0: Atha satthā tassa paṭiññaṃ datvā – “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti
atk-s0511a:4013_1: cintento āḷārudakānaṃ kālaṅkatabhāvaṃ ñatvā – “bahūpakārā kho me pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū”ti
atk-s0511a:4013_2: pañcavaggiye ārabbha manasikāraṃ katvā – “kahaṃ nu kho te etarahi viharantī”ti āvajjento
atk-s0511a:4013_3: – “bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye”ti ñatvā – “tattha gantvā dhammacakkaṃ pavattessāmī”ti
atk-s0511a:4013_4: katipāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍasāmanteyeva piṇḍāya caranto viharitvā āsāḷhipuṇṇamiyaṃ bārāṇasiṃ
atk-s0511a:4013_5: gamissāmī”ti pattacīvaramādāya aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ paṭipajji. Antarāmagge haṭṭhatupagaṃ
atk-s0511a:4013_6: upakaṃ nāma ājīvakaṃ disvā tassa attano buddhabhāvaṃ ācikkhitvā taṃdivasaṃyeva sāyanhasamaye isipatanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0511a:4014_0: Pañcavaggiyā pana tathāgataṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā – “ayaṃ, āvuso, samaṇo gotamo
atk-s0511a:4014_1: paccayabāhullāya āvatto paripuṇṇakāyo pīṇindriyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo hutvā āgacchati, imassa
atk-s0511a:4014_2: abhivādanādīni na karissāma, āsanamattaṃ pana paññāpeyyāmā”ti katikaṃ akaṃsu. Bhagavā
atk-s0511a:4014_3: tesaṃ cittācāraṃ ñatvā sabbasattesu anodhissakavasena pharaṇasamatthaṃ mettacittaṃ
atk-s0511a:4014_4: saṃkhipitvā odhissakavasena mettacittena phari. Te bhagavato mettacittena phuṭṭhā
atk-s0511a:4014_5: tathāgate upasaṅkamante sakāya katikāya saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā abhivādanādīni sabbakiccāni
atk-s0511a:4015_0: Atha bhagavā attano buddhabhāvaṃ te ñāpetvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīditvā uttarāsāḷhanakkhattayoge
atk-s0511a:4015_1: vattamāne aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi parivuto pañcavaggiye there āmantetvā dhammacakkappavattanasuttantaṃ
atk-s0511a:4015_2: desesi. Tesu aññāsikoṇḍañño desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesento suttapariyosāne aṭṭhārasahi
atk-s0511a:4015_3: brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a:4022_0: Tattha ahanti attānaṃ niddisati. Etarahīti asmiṃ kāle. Sakyavaḍḍhanoti sākiyakulavaḍḍhano.
atk-s0511a:4022_1: “Sakyapuṅgavo”tipi pāṭho. Padhānanti vīriyaṃ vuccati. Padahitvānāti ghaṭetvā vāyamitvā,
atk-s0511a:4022_2: dukkarakārikaṃ katvāti attho. Aṭṭhārasannaṃ koṭīnanti bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye
atk-s0511a:4023: Idāni bhagavā atītaṃ kathetvā anāgataṃ abhisamayaṃ kathento –
atk-s0511a:4026: Gaṇanāya na vattabbo, dutiyābhisamayo ahū”ti. – ādimāha;
atk-s0511a:4027_0: Tattha naradevasamāgameti tato aparena samayena mahāmaṅgalasamāgame dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu
atk-s0511a:4027_1: devamanussānaṃ majjhe maṅgalasuttapariyosāne gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattānaṃ naradevānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:4027_2: Dutiyābhisamayo ahūti hessatīti attho. Anāgatavacane vattabbe sotapatitattā “ahū”ti

atk-s0511a:4082_0: Mama pana rammasurammasubhanāmakā tayo pāsādā navabhūmikasattabhūmikapañcabhūmikā,
atk-s0511a:4082_1: cattālīsasahassā nāṭakitthiyo, yasodharā nāma mama aggamahesī, sohaṃ cattāro nimitte
atk-s0511a:4082_2: disvā assayānena mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamiṃ. Tato chabbassāni padhānaṃ padahitvā
atk-s0511a:4082_3: visākhapuṇṇamāya uruvelāyaṃ senānigame senākuṭumbikassa dhītāya sampasādajātāya sujātāya
atk-s0511a:4082_4: nāma dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṃ katvā sāyanhasamaye sotthiyena
atk-s0511a:4082_5: nāma tiṇahārakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā assatthabodhirukkhamūlaṃ upagantvā
atk-s0511a:4082_6: tattha mārabalaṃ viddhaṃsetvā sambodhiṃ pattosmīti sabbaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0511a:4083_0: Tattha saddhiṃ sāvakasaṅghatoti saddhiṃ sāvakasaṅghena. Parinibbissanti parinibbāyissāmi.
atk-s0511a:4083_1: Aggīvāhārasaṅkhayāti aggi viya indhanakkhayena yathā aggi nirupādāno nibbāyati, evaṃ
atk-s0511a:4085_0: Tāni ca atulatejānīti aggasāvakayugādīni tāni asadisatejāni. Imāni ca dasabalānīti
atk-s0511a:4085_1: etāni ca sārīradasabalāni guṇadhāraṇo dehoti chaasādhāraṇañāṇādiguṇadharo ayaṃ deho
atk-s0511a:4085_2: ca. Tamantarahissantīti sabbāni etāni vuttappakārāni antaradhāyissanti vinassissanti.
atk-s0511a:4085_3: Nanu rittā sabbasaṅkhārāti ettha nanūti ayaṃ anumatiatthe nipāto. Rittāti niccasāradhuvasārarahitattā
atk-s0511a:4085_4: tucchā, sabbameva pana saṅkhataṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammaṃ
atk-s0511a:4085_5: hutvā abhāvato aniccaṃ, uppādādipaṭipīḷitattā dukkhaṃ, avasavattanato anattā. Tasmā
atk-s0511a:4085_6: saṅkhāresu lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā amatamasaṅkhataṃ accutaṃ
atk-s0511a:4085_7: nibbānaṃ adhigacchatha. Ayaṃ vo amhākaṃ anusāsanī idaṃ amhākaṃ sāsanaṃ appamādena
atk-s0511a:4085_8: sampādethāti. Desanāpariyosāne kira devatānaṃ koṭisatasahassassa anupādāya āsavehi
atk-s0511a:4085_9: cittāni vimucciṃsu. Sesamaggaphalesu patiṭṭhitā pana gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:4086_0: Evaṃ bhagavā kappanāmajātiādivavatthitaṃ sakalampi buddhavaṃsaṃ ākāse ratanacaṅkame
atk-s0511a:4086_1: caṅkamantova kathetvā ñātijanaṃ vandāpetvā ākāsato otaritvā paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0511a:4086_2: nisīdi. Evaṃ nisinne pana bhagavati lokanāthe sikhāppatto ñātisamāgamo ahosi. Sabbe
atk-s0511a:4086_3: ekaggacittā nisīdiṃsu. Tato mahāmegho pokkharavassaṃ vassi. Taṅkhaṇe udakaṃ heṭṭhā
atk-s0511a:4086_4: viravantaṃ gacchati. Temetukāmova temeti, atemitukāmassa sarīre ekabindumattampi
atk-s0511a:4086_5: na patati. Taṃ disvā sabbe acchariyabbhutacittajātā hutvā – “aho acchariyaṃ, aho
atk-s0511a:4086_6: abbhuta”nti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ. Taṃ sutvā satthā – “na idāneva mayhaṃ ñātisamāgame
atk-s0511a:4086_7: pokkharavassaṃ vassi, atītepi vassī”ti imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā vessantarajātakaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0511a:4086_8: Sā dhammadesanā sātthikā jātā. Tato bhagavā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0511a:4092: “Aparimeyyito kappe, caturo āsuṃ vināyakā”tiādikā aṭṭhārasagāthā saṅgītikārakehi ṭhapitā nigamanagāthāti veditabbā. Sesagāthāsu sabbattha pākaṭamevāti.
atk-s0511a:4094_0: Imasmiṃ pana sakalepi buddhavaṃse niddiṭṭhānaṃ pañcavīsatiyā buddhānaṃ aṭṭha vemattāni
atk-s0511a:4094_1: veditabbāni. Katamāni aṭṭha? Āyuvemattaṃ, pamāṇavemattaṃ, kulavemattaṃ, padhānavemattaṃ,
atk-s0511a:4095_0: Tattha āyuvemattaṃ nāma keci dīghāyukā honti keci appāyukā. Tathā hi dīpaṅkaro koṇḍañño
atk-s0511a:4095_1: anomadassī padumo padumuttaro atthadassī dhammadassī siddhattho tissoti ime nava
atk-s0511a:4095_2: buddhā vassasatasahassāyukā ahesuṃ. Maṅgalo sumano sobhito nārado sumedho sujāto
atk-s0511a:4095_3: piyadassī phussoti ime aṭṭha buddhā navutivassasahassāyukā ahesuṃ. Revato vessabhū
atk-s0511a:4095_4: cāti ime dve buddhā saṭṭhivassasahassāyukā ahesuṃ. Vipassī bhagavā asītivassasahassāyukā
atk-s0511a:4095_5: ahosi. Sikhī kakusandho koṇāgamano kassapoti ime cattāro buddhā yathākkamena sattaticattālīsatiṃsavīsavassasahassāyukā
atk-s0511a:4095_6: ahesuṃ. Amhākaṃ pana bhagavato vassasataṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ ahosi. Upacitapuññasambhārānaṃ
atk-s0511a:4095_8: ahosi. Ayaṃ pañcavīsatiyā buddhānaṃ āyuvemattaṃ nāma.
atk-s0511a:4096_0: Pamāṇavemattaṃ nāma keci dīghā honti keci rassā. Tathā hi dīpaṅkara-revata-piyadassī-atthadassī-dhammadassī-vipassībuddhānaṃ
atk-s0511a:4096_2: kāyo ahosi. Sumanassa navutihatthubbedhaṃ sarīraṃ ahosi. Sobhita-anomadassī-paduma-padumuttara-phussabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0511a:4096_3: aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthubbedhaṃ sarīraṃ ahosi. Sujāto paṇṇāsahatthubbedhasarīro ahosi.
atk-s0511a:4096_6: ahesuṃ. Amhākaṃ bhagavā aṭṭhārasahatthubbedho ahosi. Ayaṃ pañcavīsatiyā buddhānaṃ
atk-s0511a:4097_0: Kulavemattaṃ nāma keci khattiyakule nibbattiṃsu keci brāhmaṇakule. Tathā hi kakusandhakoṇāgamanakassapasammāsambuddhā

atk-s0511a:4097_2: nibbattiṃsu. Ayaṃ pañcavīsatiyā buddhānaṃ kulavemattaṃ nāma.
atk-s0511a:4098_1: dasamāsikā padhānacariyā. Maṅgala-sumedhatissa sikhīnaṃ aṭṭhamāsikā. Revatassa sattamāsikā.
atk-s0511a:4098_2: Sobhitassa cattāro māsā. Padumaatthadassī vipassīnaṃ aḍḍhamāsikā. Nārada-padumuttara-dhammadassī-kassapānaṃ

atk-s0511a:4099_0: Rasmivemattaṃ nāma maṅgalassa kira sammāsambuddhassa sarīrasmi dasasahassilokadhātuṃ
atk-s0511a:4099_1: pharitvā aṭṭhāsi. Padumuttarabuddhassa dvādasayojanikā ahosi. Vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0511a:4099_2: sattayojanikā ahosi. Sikhissa tiyojanappamāṇā. Kakusandhassa dasayojanikā. Amhākaṃ
atk-s0511a:4099_3: bhagavato samantato byāmappamāṇā. Sesānaṃ aniyatā ahosi. Ayaṃ rasmivemattaṃ nāma
atk-s0511a:4099_4: ajjhāsayapaṭibaddhaṃ, yo yattakaṃ icchati, tassa sarīrappabhā tattakaṃ pharati, paṭividdhaguṇe

atk-s0511a:4100_0: Yānavemattaṃ nāma keci hatthiyānena keci assayānena keci rathapada-pāsāda-sivikādīsu
atk-s0511a:4100_4: sivikāyānena. Nārado padasā nikkhami. Sobhita-padumuttara-dhammadassī-kassapā pāsādena
atk-s0511a:4101_0: Bodhivemattaṃ nāma dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato kapītanarukkho bodhi; koṇḍaññassa bhagavato
atk-s0511a:4101_2: padumanāradānaṃ mahāsoṇarukkho, padumuttarassa salalarukkho, sumedhassa nīpo, sujātassa
atk-s0511a:4101_3: veḷu, piyadassino kakudho, atthadassissa campakarukkho, dhammadassissa rattakuravakarukkho,
atk-s0511a:4101_4: siddhatthassa kaṇikārarukkho, tissassa asanarukkho, phussassa āmalakarukkho, vipassissa
atk-s0511a:4101_5: pāṭalirukkho, sikhissa puṇḍarīkarukkho, vessabhussa sālarukkho, kakusandhassa sirīsarukkho,
atk-s0511a:4101_6: koṇāgamanassa udumbararukkho, kassapassa nigrodho, gotamassa assatthoti ayaṃ bodhivemattaṃ nāma.
atk-s0511a:4102_4: sikhissa dvattiṃsahattho, kakusandhassa chabbīsatihattho, koṇāgamanassa vīsatihattho,
atk-s0511a:4102_5: kassapassa pannarasahattho, gotamassa cuddasahattho pallaṅko ahosi. Ayaṃ pallaṅkavemattaṃ
atk-s0511a:4104_0: Sabbabuddhānaṃ pana cattāri avijahitaṭṭhānāni nāma honti. Sabbabuddhānañhi bodhipallaṅko
atk-s0511a:4104_1: avijahito ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne hoti. Dhammacakkappavattanaṃ isipatane migadāye avijahitameva
atk-s0511a:4104_2: hoti. Devorohaṇakāle saṅkassanagaradvāre paṭhamakkapādaṭṭhānaṃ avijahitameva hoti.
atk-s0511a:4104_3: Jetavane gandhakuṭiyā cattāri mañcapādaṭṭhānāni avijahitāneva honti. Vihāro pana
atk-s0511a:4104_4: khuddakopi mahantopi hoti. Vihāro na vijahatiyeva, nagaraṃ pana vijahati.
atk-s0511a:4106_0: Aparaṃ pana amhākaṃyeva bhagavato sahajātaparicchedañca nakkhattaparicchedañca dīpesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:4106_1: Amhākaṃ sabbaññubodhisattena kira saddhiṃ rāhulamātā ānandatthero channo kaṇḍako
atk-s0511a:4106_2: assarājā nidhikumbho mahābodhi kāḷudāyīti imāni satta sahajātāni. Ayaṃ sahajātaparicchedo.
atk-s0511a:4106_3: Mahāpuriso pana uttarāsāḷhanakkhatteneva mātukucchiṃ okkami, mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhami,
atk-s0511a:4106_4: dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi, yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ akāsi. Visākhanakkhattena jāto ca abhisambuddho
atk-s0511a:4106_5: ca parinibbuto ca. Māghanakkhattena tassa sāvakasannipāto ca āyusaṅkhāravosajjanañca
atk-s0511a:4108_0: Idāni pana sabbesaṃ buddhānaṃ sādhāraṇadhammataṃ pakāsayissāma. Sabbabuddhānaṃ samattiṃsavidhā
atk-s0511a:4108_2: mātukucchiyaṃ pallaṅkena nisīditvā bahimukholokanaṃ, ṭhitāya bodhisattamātuyā vijāyanaṃ,
atk-s0511a:4108_3: araññeyeva mātukucchito nikkhamanaṃ, kañcanapaṭṭesu patiṭṭhitapādānaṃ uttarābhimukhānaṃ
atk-s0511a:4108_4: sattapadavītihārānaṃ gantvā catuddisaṃ oloketvā sīhanādanadanaṃ, cattāri nimittāni
atk-s0511a:4108_5: disvā jātamattaputtānaṃ mahāsattānaṃ mahābhinikkhamanaṃ, arahaddhajamādāya pabbajitvā
atk-s0511a:4108_6: sabbaheṭṭhimena paricchedena sattāhaṃ padhānacariyā, sambodhiṃ pāpuṇanadivase pāyāsabhojanaṃ,
atk-s0511a:4108_8: mārabalaviddhaṃsanaṃ, bodhipallaṅkeyeva tisso vijjā ādiṃ katvā asādhāraṇañāṇādiguṇapaṭilābho,
atk-s0511a:4108_9: sattasattāhaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmanaṃ, mahābrahmuno dhammadesanatthāya āyācanaṃ,
atk-s0511a:4108_10: isipatane migadāye dhammacakkappavattanaṃ, māghapuṇṇamāya caturaṅgikasannipāte pātimokkhuddeso,
atk-s0511a:4108_12: abhidhammadesanā, saṅkassanagaradvāre devalokato otaraṇaṃ satataṃ phalasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ,
atk-s0511a:4108_13: dvīsu vāresu veneyyajanāvalokanaṃ, uppanne vatthumhi sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ uppannāya
atk-s0511a:4108_14: aṭṭhuppattiyā jātakakathanaṃ, ñātisamāgame buddhavaṃsakathanaṃ, āgantukehi bhikkhūhi
atk-s0511a:4108_15: paṭisanthārakaraṇaṃ, nimantitānaṃ vuṭṭhavassānaṃ anāpucchā agamanaṃ, divase divase
atk-s0511a:4110_0: Sabbabuddhānaṃ cattāro anantarāyikā dhammā. Katame cattāro? Buddhānaṃ uddissa abhihaṭānaṃ
atk-s0511a:4110_1: catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ na sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātuṃ. Buddhānaṃ āyuno na sakkā kenaci
atk-s0511a:4110_2: antarāyo kātuṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ – “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso, yaṃ parūpakkamena tathāgataṃ
atk-s0511a:4110_3: jīvitā voropeyyā”ti. Buddhānaṃ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇānaṃ asītiyā anubyañjanānañca
atk-s0511a:4110_4: na sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātuṃ. Buddharaṃsīnaṃ na sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātunti.
atk-s0511a:4126: Yathā buddhavaṃsassa saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ, gatā sādhu siddhiṃ vinā antarāyaṃ;
atk-s0511a:4127: Tathā dhammayuttā janānaṃ vitakkā, vināvantarāyena siddhiṃ vajantu.
atk-s0511a:4128: Imaṃ buddhavaṃsassa saṃvaṇṇanaṃ me, karontena yaṃ patthitaṃ puññajātaṃ;
atk-s0511a:4129: Sadā tassa devānubhāvena loko, dhuvaṃ santamaccantamatthaṃ payātaṃ.
atk-s0511a:4130: Vinassantu rogā manussesu sabbe, pavassantu devāpi vassantakāle;
atk-s0511a:4131: Sukhaṃ hotu niccaṃ varaṃ nārakāpi, pisācāpayātā pipāsā bhavantu.
atk-s0511a:4132: Surā accharānaṃ gaṇādīhi saddhiṃ, ciraṃ devaloke sukhaṃ cānubhontu;
atk-s0511a:4133: Ciraṃ ṭhātu dhammo munindassa loke, sukhaṃ lokapālā mahiṃ pālayantu.
atk-s0511a:4138: Iti bhāṇavāravasena chabbīsatibhāṇavārā, ganthavasena pañcasatādhikachasahassaganthā, akkharavasena tisahassādhikāni dvesatasahassakkharāni.
atk-s0511a:4139: Antarāyaṃ vinā esā, yathā niṭṭhaṃ upāgatā;
